tasmāt rajaḥ duḥkha upaghāta upaghātaka jijñāsoḥ sattvāt dharma ādi kuśala mūla vipāka utpitsoḥ duḥkha traya nivṛttaye idam śāstram pravṛttam
tad arthāt pariṇamate śiṣyasya iti

original: kathaṃ nāma śiṣyasya niḥśreyasena yogaḥ syādityevamarthamidaṃ vyākhyānaṃ kriyata iti /
analyzed: katham nāma śiṣyasya niḥśreyasena yogaḥ syāt iti evam artham idam vyākhyānam kriyate iti

original: āha, yaduktaṃ jijñāsave vyākhyānaṃ kartavyamiti tatra kutaḥ punariyaṃ jijñāsā kasmin vārthe bhavatīti ?
analyzed: āha yat uktam jijñāsave vyākhyānam kartavyam iti tatra kutas punar iyam jijñāsā kasmin vā arthe bhavati iti

original: ucyate - yattāvaduktaṃ kutaḥ punariyaṃ jijñāsā bhavatītyatra brūmaḥ
analyzed: ucyate  yat tāvat uktam kutas punar iyam jijñāsā bhavati iti atra brūmaḥ
duḥkha traya abhighātāt jijñāsā
duḥkham rajaḥ iti anarthāntaram
duḥkhayati iti duḥkham bhavati iti
trayam iti saṃkhyā padam sarva dravya viṣayam
duḥkha śabdena viśiṣyate

original: prādhānyācca vyatiriktabuddhyā gṛhyamāṇaṃ sambandhitvādādhārasya bhedanibandhanāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyā nimittattvaṃ pratipadyate- duḥkhānāṃ trayaṃ duḥkhatrayam
analyzed: prādhānyāt ca vyatirikta buddhyā gṛhyamāṇam sambandhi tvāt ādhārasya bheda nibandhanāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyā nimitta tvam pratipadyate duḥkhānām trayam duḥkha trayam
abhihanyate nena iti abhighātaḥ
kaḥ punar ayam abhighātaḥ nāma
ucyate saḥ upari ukta duḥkha trayeṇa antaḥkaraṇena cetanā śakteḥ abhisambandhaḥ
tasmāt duḥkha traya abhighātāt jijñāsā
yat uktam kasmin arthe bhavati iti tatra āha
tad apaghātake hetau
apahanti iti apaghātakaḥ
tasya apaghātakaḥ tad apaghātakaḥ
āha tad apaghātake iti samāsa anupapattiḥ
pratiṣedhāt

original: kartari yau tṛjakau tābhyāṃ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
analyzed: kartari yau tṛc akau tābhyām saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate

ucyate na śāstre darśanāt

pada kāraḥ ca āha jāti vācaka tvāt
tathā kadācid guṇaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ bhavati

original: kadācidguṇinā guṇo viśiṣyata iti cūrṇikārasya prayogaḥ tasmadanavadyametat /
analyzed: kadācid guṇinā guṇaḥ viśiṣyate iti cūrṇikārasya prayogaḥ tasmat anavadyam etat

trividhena duḥkhena abhihataḥ brāhmaṇaḥ tad apaghātakam hetum jijñāsate
kaḥ nāma asau hetuḥ syāt yaḥ duḥkha trayam abhihanyāt iti
āha duḥkha śabda avacanam ādau amaṅgala artha tvāt

original: maṅgalādīni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣāṇi ca bhavanti,
analyzed: maṅgala ādīni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīra puruṣāṇi ca bhavanti

duḥkham iti ayam ca amaṅgala arthaḥ śabdaḥ
tasmāt na ārabdhavyaḥ śāstra ādau iti
ucyate na vākyasya arthe prayogāt padasya ānarthakyāt amaṅgala artha tva anupapattiḥ
vākyam artha pratyāyana artham prayujyate
viśiṣṭa artha abhidhānāt
na padam

original: tathā hi padārthavyatirekeṇa viśiṣṭa eva vākyārthaḥ pratīyate,
analyzed: tathā hi padārtha vyatirekeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ pratīyate

ataeva na vivakṣita artha pratyāyana yogyatayā upādīyate

sarva karma kartṛ viṣaya tvāt

original: yadā tu devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklāmityucyate tadā devadattena gośabdena karmāntarebhyo vicchidya svātmanyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: yadā tu devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām iti ucyate tadā devadattena go śabdena karma antarebhyaḥ vicchidya sva ātmani avasthāpyate

original: kriyā ca gośabdaśca sarvakartṛbhyo devadattakarmatayā vyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: kriyā ca go śabdaḥ ca sarva kartṛbhyaḥ devadatta karma tayā vyavasthāpyate

original: śuklaśabdo gośabdaśca gośabdaṃ sarvaguṇaviṣayamādheyāntarebhyo vyavacchedya svātmana ādhāratve niyamya,
analyzed: śukla śabdaḥ go śabdaḥ ca go śabdam sarva guṇa viṣayam ādheya antarebhyaḥ vyavacchedya sva ātmanaḥ ādhāra tve niyamya
tad viṣaya tām pratipādayati iti anena krameṇa viśiṣṭaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: kevalānāntu padānāṃ sāmānyārthāt pracyutānāmviśeṣānabhidhānādānarthakyam / āha ca-
analyzed: kevalānām tu padānām sāmānya arthāt pracyutānām viśeṣa anabhidhānāt ānarthakyam āha ca

original: evaṃ sati kuto 'yaṃ niścayapratilambho yadduḥkhaśabdo 'yamamaṅgalārtho yāvatā sandihyata eva ayaṃ kiṃ svārthapratipattyarthamupātto 'tha heyatvāyeti

duḥkha prahāṇa artham upādānāt

original: yadyapi ekaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathāpi nimittānāmadhyātmādhibhūtādhidaivalakṣaṇānāṃ bhedādasya bhedopacāraḥ kariṣyata iti /

tat ca na evam

original: tadyathā catvāro varṇā ityasyāḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ sati paippalādādibhede teṣāṃ brāhmaṇatvādivyatirekābhāvānna saṃkhyāntarahetutvaṃ no khalvapi varṇāvyatirekādekatvaṃ  #

original: ucyate- mantrabrāhmaṇaṃ yāvadvā purātanamanuśrūyamāṇaṃ prāmāṇyenābhyupagamyate tatrabhavadbhiḥ /
analyzed: ucyate mantra brāhmaṇam yāvat vā purātanam anuśrūyamāṇam prāmāṇyena abhyupagamyate tatrabhavadbhiḥ
yathāśruti nibandhanāḥ smṛtayaḥ
aṅgāni vedāḥ tarkāḥ vā yathā āha
veda vedāṅga tarkeṣu veda saṃjñā nirucyate iti

original: āha, kiṃ pūrvasmādeva hetorayamānuśraviko heturanabhipreta iti ?
analyzed: āha kim pūrvasmāt eva hetoḥ ayam ānuśravikaḥ hetuḥ anabhipretaḥ iti
na iti ucyate kin tarhi
sa hi aviśuddhi kṣaya atiśaya yuktaḥ
iti saḥ iti ānuśravikasya hetoḥ pratinirdeśaḥ
hi śabdaḥ yasmāt arthe
aviśuddhiḥ ca kṣayaḥ ca atiśayaḥ ca taiḥ yuktaḥ
etat uktam bhavati
yasmāt ayam ānuśravikaḥ hetuḥ aviśuddhaḥ nityaḥ tāratamyavān ca atas dṛṣṭaḥ iva anabhipretaḥ
tatra aviśuddhi yuktaḥ tāvat hiṃsā vidhānāt
yat āha brāhmaṇe brāhmaṇam ālabheta ityādi tathā
ṣaṭśatāni niyujyante paśūnām madhyame hani
aśvamedhasya vacanāt ūnāni paśubhiḥ tribhiḥ
iti hiṃsā ca aviśuddhiḥ
prāṇinām iṣṭa śarīra vyāpādanāt
āha tad anupapattiḥ
śāstra codita tvāt

original: yadi śāstreṇa coditeyaṃ hiṃsā na syāt muktasaṃśayamaviśuddhitvamasyāḥ pratipadyāmahe,
analyzed: yadi śāstreṇa coditā iyam hiṃsā na syāt mukta saṃśayam aviśuddhi tvam asyāḥ pratipadyāmahe
śāsra coditā tu
tasmāt na iyam aviśuddhiḥ
tad prāmāṇya anabhyupagamāt aviśuddhiḥ iti ced syāt matam
veda prāmāṇyam abhyupagacchatām asaṃśayam etat evam syāt
hetuvāda kuśalāḥ tu vayam

original: tasmādadhīyatāṃ yadi kaścidastyubhayapakṣaprasiddho hetuḥ yato nissaṃśayaḥ pratyayaḥ syāditi /
analyzed: tasmāt adhīyatām yadi kaścid asti ubhaya pakṣa prasiddhaḥ hetuḥ yatas nissaṃśayaḥ pratyayaḥ syāt iti
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt abhyupagama virodhāt
dṛṣṭam anumānam āpta vacanam ca iti prāmāṇya trayam abhyupagatam bhavadbhiḥ
idānīm vedasya āpta vacana tve satya prāmāṇyam bruvataḥ sva mata vyāghātaḥ
tasmāt ayuktam etat
vedasya āpta vacana tva anupapatteḥ adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam

original: āptavacanatvaṃ prākprasādhyāsya vedasya paścāt ayamupālambho yuktamabhidhātuṃ syāt /
analyzed: āpta vacana tvam prāk prasādhya asya vedasya paścāt ayam upālambhaḥ yuktam abhidhātum syāt
tattva siddham
tasmāt anupālambhaḥ yam iti
etat api uktam

original: kasmāt ? puruṣabuddhipūrvakatve sati rāgādiyogācchabdo vicārārhaḥ syāt kimāptavacanaṃ na veti /
analyzed: kasmāt puruṣa buddhi pūrvaka tve sati rāga ādi yogāt śabdaḥ vicāra arhaḥ syāt kim āpta vacanam na vā iti
a puruṣa buddhi pūrvakaḥ tu āmnāyaḥ svatantraḥ puruṣa niśśreyasa artham pravartate
tasmāt na evaṃvidham aniṣṭam vicāram arhati
kim ca anyat aviśuddhi tva anupapatti prasaṅgāt

original: yadi caitasminnarthe bhavānapi paryanupayujyeta - kathamidaṃ niścīyate yaduta prāṇināmiṣṭaśarīravyāpādanādaviśuddhihiṃseti ?
analyzed: yadi ca etasmin arthe bhavān api paryanupayujyeta katham idam niścīyate yat uta prāṇinām iṣṭa śarīra vyāpādanāt aviśuddhi hiṃsā iti
avaśyam abhidhānīyam śāstrataḥ iti
tat eva ca śāstram kratau hiṃsām āha

original: tasmāt ko 'tra hetuḥ anyatra pramāṇamihaivaitadapramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati hiṃsāto dharma iti ?
analyzed: tasmāt kaḥ tra hetuḥ anyatra pramāṇam iha eva etat apramāṇam bhavitum arhati hiṃsātaḥ dharmaḥ iti

original: anugrahopaghātalakṣaṇatvādahiṃsāhiṃsayoḥ pratyakṣasiddhiriti cet - athāpi syāt ahiṃsātaścānugraho bhavatīṣṭaśarīravyāpādanalakṣaṇaḥ,
analyzed: anugraha upaghāta lakṣaṇa tvāt ahiṃsā ahiṃsayoḥ pratyakṣa siddhiḥ iti ced atha api syāt ahiṃsātaḥ ca anugrahaḥ bhavati iṣṭa śarīra vyāpādana lakṣaṇaḥ
hiṃsātaḥ ca upaghātaḥ bhavati abhipreta śarīra vyāpādana lakṣaṇaḥ
kriyā anurūpam ca phalam anumātum yuktam iti pratyakṣa siddham anayoḥ iṣṭa aniṣṭa phala hetu tvam
tasmāt kaḥ tra śāstra vyāpāraḥ iti
etat ca anupapannam
kasmāt aniṣṭa prasaṃgāt
evam hi parikalpyamāne guru bhāryā gamane syāt
māṇavakam ca upanīya vrata ādeśa śauca brahmacaryya svādhyāya abhyāsa bhaikṣa agni paricaraṇa guru śuśrūṣā ādiṣu pravartayataḥ niṣṭa phala sambandhaḥ syāt
tasmāt loka śāstra viruddhaḥ sat tarkaḥ na iṣṭaḥ iti

original: ubhayābhidhānācchāstravirodhaprasaṅga iti cet syānmatam tadeva śāstramahiṃsāmāha,
analyzed: ubhaya abhidhānāt śāstra virodha prasaṅgaḥ iti ced syāt matam tat eva śāstram ahiṃsām āha
tat eva hiṃsām
evam sati paraspara viruddhayoḥ arthayoḥ codita tvāt ubhaya anugraha asambhave śāstra virodha prasaṅgaḥ iti
tat ca na evam
kasmāt utsarga apavādayoḥ viṣaya bhedāt

original: sāmānye hi śāstramahiṃsāmutsṛjya viśeṣe kratulakṣaṇe 'pavādaṃ śāsti /
analyzed: sāmānye hi śāstram ahiṃsām utsṛjya viśeṣe kratu lakṣaṇe pa vādam śāsti
sāmānya vihitam ca viśeṣa vihitena bādhyate

original: tadyathā - dadhi brāhmaṇebho dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
analyzed: tat yathā dadhi brāhmaṇa ibhaḥ dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti
tasmāt utsarga apavādayoḥ viṣaya bhedāt na asti śāstra virodhaḥ iti
kim ca anyat
kanyā gamana vat punar vidhāne doṣa abhāvāt

original: yathā khalvapi śāsre pratiṣiddhaṃ kanyāgamanamiti nedānīmabhirūpaḥ pratigṛhya,
analyzed: yathā khalu api śāsre pratiṣiddham kanyā gamanam iti na idānīm abhirūpaḥ pratigṛhya
tām abhigamya adharma bhāj bhavati
gṛhasthaḥ sadṛśīm bhāryām vindeta ananya pūrvikām
iti śāstra antara sadbhāvāt
evam śāstre pratiṣiddhā hiṃsā
na idānīm kratau hiṃsāyām pravartamānaḥ niṣṭa phala bhāj syāt
pūrva uktāt eva śāstra antara sadbhāvāt
tara yat uktam prāṇinām iṣṭa śarīra vyāpādanāt aviśuddhiḥ hiṃsā iti etat ayuktam
ucyate na abhiprāya anavabodhāt
citram api bahu etat abhidhīyamānaḥ na abhiprāyam veda bhavān
kim kāraṇam
yasmāt na vayam vedasya prāmāṇyam pratyācakṣmahe

original: no khalvapi brūmaḥ śāstracoditāyāṃ hiṃsāyāṃ pravartamānasyāniṣṭaphalasambandho bhavati /
analyzed: no khalu api brūmaḥ śāstra coditāyām hiṃsāyām pravartamānasya aniṣṭa phala sambandhaḥ bhavati

original: kintarhi sati svargaprāptinimittatve vedavihitasya karmaṇaḥ samanuṣṭhānaṃ prāṇijamupaghātamantareṇa na sambhavati iti hitakāmairabhyupekṣyate
analyzed: kim tarhi sati svarga prāpti nimitta tve veda vihitasya karmaṇaḥ samanuṣṭhānam prāṇi jam upaghātam antareṇa na sambhavati iti hita kāmaiḥ abhyupekṣyate

original: yasmāt na hyetaduktaṃ yadanyeṣāmupaghātenātmānugrahaḥ kārya iti / āha -
analyzed: yasmāt na hi etat uktam yat anyeṣām upaghātena ātma anugrahaḥ kāryaḥ iti āha
na tat parasya sandadhyāt pratikūlam yat ātmanaḥ
eṣa saṅkṣepataḥ dharmaḥ kāmāt anyaḥ pravartate
āha yadi etat na abhyupagamyate katham pūrvam uktam prāṇinām iṣṭa śarīra vyāpādanāt aviśuddhiḥ hiṃsā iti
ucyate kārye kāraṇa upacārāt

original: yo 'sau hiṃsānimittakaḥ kāruṇyān manasi naḥ paritāpa utpadyate sā khalvaviśuddhirabhipretā /
analyzed: yaḥ sau hiṃsā nimittakaḥ kāruṇyāt manasi naḥ paritāpaḥ utpadyate sā khalu aviśuddhiḥ abhipretā
tasyām kāraṇam upacarya uktam aviśuddhiḥ hiṃsā iti
yathā mudgaiḥ tṛptāḥ gobhiḥ sukhinaḥ iti
āha katham etat avagamyate hiṃsā kāryam paritāpa mātram aviśuddhiḥ ācāryasya abhipretā
na punar hiṃsā eva iti
ucyate prakarṣa pratyaya upalabdheḥ
vakṣyati upadiṣṭāt tad viparītaḥ śreyān iti
samāna jātīyam ca pratiyoginam apekṣya prakarṣa pratyayaḥ utpadyate

original: yadi cānuśravikasya praśasyatā nābhipretā syāt prakarṣapratyayānupapattiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: yadi ca ānuśravikasya praśasya tā na abhipretā syāt prakarṣa pratyaya anupapatti prasaṅgaḥ
tasmāt na utsūtram etat
āha sannyāsa anupapattiḥ
a viyoga śravaṇāt
na hi tyāga sannyāsayoḥ tvam īśiṣe
kin tarhi śāstram yat āha tat avaśyam kartavyam
tat ca amaraṇāt karmabhiḥ aviyogam śāsti
kasmāt evam hi āha jarā maryam etat satram yat agnihotra dārśapaurṇamāsau

original: jarayā ha etasmāt satrādvimucyate, mṛtyunā ca /
analyzed: jarayā ha etasmāt satrāt vimucyate mṛtyunā ca
punar api āha kurvan eva iha karmāṇi jijīviṣet śatam samāḥ
tasmāt āmaraṇāt karmaṇām atyāgaḥ
tasmin sati hetu antara karmaṇām ānarthakyam
ucyate na sādhanānām asvabhāvika tvāt
patnī saṃyoga ādibhiḥ anekaiḥ sādhanaiḥ ayam karma vidhiḥ prasādhyate

original: teṣāṃ cāsvābhāvikatvāt aśakyamarjanaṃ prayogataḥ pūrvaṃ kartumiti pratipāditam /
analyzed: teṣām ca asvābhāvika tvāt aśakyam arjanam prayogataḥ pūrvam kartum iti pratipāditam
tasmāt anityāni karmāṇi
hetu śāstra vipratipattau śāstra balīyaḥ tvam iti ced syāt matam

original: yatra hetuśāstrayorvipratipattirbhavati tatra vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvādanumānasya balīyaḥ śāstramityavaśayamabhyupagantavyamiti /
analyzed: yatra hetu śāstrayoḥ vipratipattiḥ bhavati tatra vipralambha bhūyiṣṭha tvāt anumānasya balīyaḥ śāstram iti avaśayam abhyupagantavyam iti
tat ca anupapannam
kasmāt śaktitaḥ viniyogāt
śaktim apekṣya śāstram agnihotra ādīni karmāṇi vidadhat teṣām anitya tām jñāpayati
katham evam hi āha
yaḥ lam san agnihotrāya agnihotram na juhoti tam eṣā devatā aparuṇaddhi asmāt lokāt amuṣmāt ca ubhābhyām
tasmāt anityāni karmāṇi
kim ca anyat
jarā grahaṇa sāmarthyāt
tvadīye eva jñāpake jarā grahaṇam asti
atas numīyate śakti apekṣam anityam ca karma
kim ca anyat śāstra hāneḥ
ubhayam hi śāstre nirdiṣṭam
karmāṇi sannyāsaḥ ca

original: yadi punaḥ karmāṇi nityakartavyatayeṣyante tena sannyāsaśāstraṃ hīyate /
analyzed: yadi punar karmāṇi nitya kartavya tayā iṣyante tena sannyāsa śāstram hīyate
tasmāt viṣaya rāga āviṣkaraṇam etat vaḥ
āha na śruti balīyaḥ tvāt
tulya balayoḥ hi śāstrayoḥ eka viṣaya sannipāte dvayoḥ yugapad anugraha asambhave vikalpa paryāyau bhavataḥ
śruti smṛti sannipāte ca śrutiḥ balīyasī
smṛti vihitaḥ ca sannyāsaḥ
tasmāt na anayoḥ vikalpaḥ
na khalu api paryāyaḥ nyāyyaḥ
ucyate tat itaratra tulyam

original: yathaiva karmaṇāṃ samanuṣṭhānaṃ śāsti śāstraṃ tathā sannyāsamapi /
analyzed: yathā eva karmaṇām samanuṣṭhānam śāsti śāstram tathā sannyāsam api
katham evam hi āha

original: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaikenāmṛtatvamānaśuḥ /
analyzed: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgena ekena amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ

original: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yadyatayo viśanti //
analyzed: pareṇa nākam nihitam guhāyām vibhrājate yat yatayaḥ viśanti
tathā

original: na karmaṇā mṛtyumṛṣayo niṣeddhuḥ prajāvanto draviṇamicchamāṇāḥ /
analyzed: na karmaṇā mṛtyum ṛṣayaḥ niṣeddhuḥ prajāvantaḥ draviṇam icchamāṇāḥ
atha apare ṛṣayaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ param karmabhyaḥ mṛta tvam ānaśuḥ
brāhmaṇam ca atra bhavati tat ye idam viduḥ
ye ca ime raṇyāḥ śraddhā tapaḥ iti upāsate te rciṣam abhisambhavanti
arciṣaḥ harahnaḥ āpūryamāṇapakṣam āpūryamāṇapakṣāt yān ṣaṭ udaṅḍa iti māsān tān māsebhyaḥ
saṃvatsaram saṃvatsarāt ādityam ādityāt candramasam candramasaḥ vidyutam tad puruṣaḥ māṇavaḥ
saḥ etān brahma gamayati
punar api āha etam eva viditvā muniḥ bhavati
etam eva pravrājinaḥ lokam icchantaḥ pravrajanti

original: etaddha sma vai pūrve vidvāṃsaḥ prajāṃ nākāmayanta,
analyzed: etat ha sma vai pūrve vidvāṃsaḥ prajām na akāmayanta

original: prajayā kiṃ kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ nāyamātmā nāyaṃ loka iti te ha sma putraiṣaṇāyāśca vittaiṣaṇāyāśca lokaiṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ carantīti
analyzed: prajayā kim kariṣyāmaḥ yeṣām na ayam ātmā na ayam lokaḥ iti te ha sma putra eṣaṇāyāḥ ca vitta eṣaṇāyāḥ ca loka eṣaṇāyāḥ ca vyutthāya atha bhikṣā caryam caranti iti
tasmāt ete tyāga sannyāsayoḥ ubhayoḥ liṅgam

original: āha - yadyapyevaṃ śāstraṃ tathāpi samanuṣṭhāne vidhirasti /
analyzed: āha yadi api evam śāstram tathā api samanuṣṭhāne vidhiḥ asti
vihitam ca avaśyam kartavyam
sannyāse tu arthavāda mātram iti anayoḥ ayam viśeṣaḥ

original: tasmin sati samanuṣṭhānaṃ jyāyo na tyāgaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin sati samanuṣṭhānam jyāyaḥ na tyāgaḥ
ucyate kaḥ yam vidhiḥ
kaḥ yam arthavādaḥ
āha vidhiḥ tad artha tvena apūrva upadeśaḥ

original: yo hi vidhyarthena liṅā loṭā kṛtyairvāpūrvopadeśaḥ kriyate sa vidhiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ hi vidhi arthena liṅā loṭā kṛtyaiḥ vā apūrva upadeśaḥ kriyate sa vidhiḥ
yathā agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ
vāyavyam śvetam ajam ālabheta bhūti kāmaḥ iti
stutiḥ arthavādaḥ

original: tasya tu vihitasya prarocanārthaṃ yā stutiḥ so 'rthavādaḥ /
analyzed: tasya tu vihitasya prarocana artham yā stutiḥ sā arthavādaḥ

original: tadyathā- “vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva tena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati,
analyzed: tat yathā vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva tena bhāgadheyena upadhāvati
saḥ eva enam bhūtim gamayati iti

original: evaṃvidhāṃ hi stutimupaśrutya phalārthine hi yajamānāya vidhiḥ prarocate /
analyzed: evaṃvidhām hi stutim upaśrutya phala arthine hi yajamānāya vidhiḥ prarocate
etasmin hita kāmaḥ pravartate iti
ucyate na atas eva sannyāsa siddhiḥ
evam ced manyase yam āmnāyaḥ śreyāṃsam artham manyate

kasmāt stuta tvāt
bahula arthinām sannyāsa āmnāyaḥ stauti
sa kasmāt na prarocate
itarathā hi ānarthakyam

original: yadi khalvapyarthavādaḥ stuvannapi na prarocayet yaduktaṃ prarocanārtho 'rthavāda iti tadbhavadbhirhāpitavyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi khalu api arthavādaḥ stuvan api na prarocayet yat uktam prarocana arthaḥ rthavādaḥ iti tat bhavadbhiḥ hāpitavyam syāt
anarthakaḥ hi evam sati arthavādaḥ na prarocana arthaḥ
artha antara vacanam vā

original: yadi prarocanārthatvamasya neṣyate tena tarhyarthāntaraṃ vaktavyam /
analyzed: yadi prarocana artha tvam asya na iṣyate tena tarhi artha antaram vaktavyam
mā bhūt anarthaka tvam veda eka deśasya iti
tasmāt na anayā vibhīṣikayā vayam śakyāḥ sat mārgāt apanetum
kiṃca anyat
ubhayathā vikalpe niṣṭa prasaṅgāt

original: ihāyamāmnāyo vidheyatvena vā sannyāsaṃ stūyāt avidheyatvena vā /
analyzed: iha ayam āmnāyaḥ vidheya tvena vā san nyāsam stūyāt a vidheya tvena vā
kiṃca atas tat yadi tāvat vidheya tvena stauti kim anyat vicāryate
siddhaḥ sannyāsaḥ
atha vidheya tvena
stutau asya prayojanam kartavyam

original: yaddhi kartavyatayā neṣṭaṃ tadapuruṣabuddhipūrvakaḥ svatantraḥ puruṣaniśśreyasārthaṃ pravartamāna āmnāyaḥ kimiti prarocayeta ?
analyzed: yat hi kartavya tayā na iṣṭam tat apuruṣa buddhi pūrvakaḥ svatantraḥ puruṣa niśśreyasa artham pravartamānaḥ āmnāyaḥ kim iti prarocayeta
tasmāt etām api kalpanām kṛtvā kṛśam eva etat
athavā ubhathā vikalpaḥ iti asya ayam anyaḥ rthaḥ
iha ayam āmnāyaḥ bhūta arthena vā sannyāsam prarocayet
a bhūta arthena vā
kim ca atas

original: tadyadi tāvadbhūtārthena prarocayati tathā satyamṛtatvaprāpakasya sannyāsasyāparigrahe viṣayārāgādanyo heturvaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: tat yadi tāvat bhūta arthena prarocayati tathā sati amṛta tva prāpakasya sannyāsasya aparigrahe viṣaya arāgāt anyaḥ hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ
atha abhūta arthena
puruṣaḥ niḥśreyasāt hīyate

original: kasmāt ? na hyetadyuktaṃ yadaśreyasi mārge pramāṇabhūta āmnāyo mātṛmodakanyāyenehitārthinaḥ prāṇinaḥ pratārayet /
analyzed: kasmāt na hi etat yuktam yat aśreyasi mārge pramāṇa bhūtaḥ āmnāyaḥ mātṛ modaka nyāyena īhita arthinaḥ prāṇinaḥ pratārayet
tasmāt ayuktam etat
kiñca anyat anekāntāt

original: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman so 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitā /“
analyzed: katham evam hi āha satyam jñānam anantam brahma yaḥ veda nihitam guhāyām parame vyoman saḥ śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitā
yatas vācaḥ nivartante a prāpya manasā saha

original: ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān na bibheti kutaścana //“
analyzed: ānandam brahmaṇaḥ vidvān na bibheti kutaścana

āha jñāna vācinaḥ mṛta tva nimitta abhyupagamāt mahataḥ āmnāya antarasya ānarthakyam

original: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /

original: yadi niyamato viduṣaiva karmāṇi kartavyānītyabhyupagamyate tena yaḥ pūrvokto doṣaḥ saṃsārābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ,
analyzed: yadi niyamataḥ viduṣā eva karmāṇi kartavyāni iti abhyupagamyate tena yaḥ pūrva uktaḥ doṣaḥ saṃsāra abhāva prasaṅgaḥ
tasya aparihāraḥ
kim ca śāstra hāneḥ ca

original: yaśca śāstramiṣṭāpūrte samupāsyate te dhūmamabhisaṃbhavantīti tadetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ hīyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ca śāstram iṣṭāpūrte samupāsyate te dhūmam abhisaṃbhavanti iti tat etasyām kalpanāyām hīyate

svarga apavarga hetu tvāt

original: yacca kriyāyāḥ phalaṃ śrūyate agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmo,

original: evamubhayapakṣavyudāsātsvapakṣasiddhiriti cet athāpi syāt- sadasatoḥ kriyāsambandhaṃ pratyaviśeṣa upadarśyate bhavatā /

original: yadi mūlaṃ sarvāsāṃ prakṛtīnām avikṛtyaiva tayā bhavitavyam /

original: yathā kāraṇāntarāṇi na santi tathottaratra pratiṣedhaḥ kariṣyate /

nivṛta viśeṣāṇām avibhāga ātmanā avasthānam kāraṇam iti ayam siddhāntaḥ

analyzed: kāle rātrau bhujiḥ avasīyate evam iha api geha abhāva abhidhāna sāmarthyāt tad pratiyogini viparyayaḥ kalpyate

original: anyathā tu yadyabhāva evābhipretaḥ syānnāsti caitra eveti brūyāt /
analyzed: anyathā tu yadi abhāvaḥ eva abhipretaḥ syāt na asti caitre eva iti brūyāt
arthāpattiḥ ca anumānam
ceṣṭā nāma abhiprāya sūcakaḥ kaścid eva udara tāḍana añjali karaṇa ādiḥ śarīra vyāpāraḥ
sa hi bubhukṣā ādīni a pratīyamānāni pratipādayati iti pramāṇam iti ucyate
sa ca anumānam eva

original: kasmāt ? yasmād bhojanecchādisahacaro hi vyāpāro 'nuṣṭhīyamāno yadi sahacāriṇaṃ gamayati tadā nānumānātpṛthagiti śakyaṃ pratijñātum /
analyzed: kasmāt yasmāt bhojana icchā ādi sahacaraḥ hi vyāpāraḥ nuṣṭhīyamānaḥ yadi sahacāriṇam gamayati tadā na anumānāt pṛthak iti śakyam pratijñātum
āha pratibhā tarhi pramāṇa antaram bhaviṣyati
ucyate kā iyam pratibhā nāma

original: āha, yo 'yamanādau saṃsāre devamanuṣyatiraścāmabhinne 'rthe bāhye stryādau pratyaye
analyzed: āha yaḥ yamana ādau saṃsāre deva manuṣya tiraścām abhinne rthe bāhye strī ādau pratyaye
pūrva abhyāsa vāsanā apekṣaḥ kuṇapa kāminī bhakṣya ādi ākāra bheda bhinna pratyayaḥ itikartavya tā aṅgam utpadyate sā hi pratibhā
tathā ca uktam
yathābhyāsam hi vākyebhyaḥ vinā api arthena jāyate
sva pratyaya anukāreṇa pratipattiḥ anekadhā

original: yena hi yo 'rtho 'bhyastassukhāditvena tasya vināpi tenārthena śabdamātrāt pratipattirutpadyate /
analyzed: yena hi yaḥ rthaḥ bhyastaḥ sukha ādi tvena tasya vinā api tena arthena śabda mātrāt pratipattiḥ utpadyate

original: tadyathā vyāghro 'tra prativasatītyukte vināpi bāhyenārthenābhyāsavaśādeva svedavepathuprabhṛtayo bhavanti /
analyzed: tat yathā prativasati iti ukte vinā api bāhyena arthena abhyāsa vaśāt eva sveda vepathu prabhṛtayaḥ bhavanti
tasmāt pratibhā eva deva manuṣya tiraścām itikartavya tā aṅga tvāt pramāṇam iti āha ca
pramāṇa tvena tām lokaḥ sarvaḥ samanugacchati
vyavahārāḥ pravartante tiraścām api tad vaśāt
ucyate pratibhāyāḥ dṛṣṭa ādi vyatirekena rūpa antara anupapatteḥ
avacanam iti anuvartate

original: yadi pūrvābhyāsavāsanāpekṣaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhetyupagamyate tena tarhi asau pratyakṣamanumānamāptavacanaṃ cetyetadāpannam /
analyzed: yadi pūrva abhyāsa vāsanā apekṣaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhā iti upagamyate tena tarhi asau pratyakṣam anumānam āpta vacanam ca iti etat āpannam

original: kasmāt ? yato na dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa pratyakṣarūpaṃ kadācidapyupalabhāmahe /
analyzed: kasmāt yatas na dṛṣṭa ādi vyatirekeṇa pratyakṣa rūpam kadācid api upalabhāmahe
tasmāt na tebhyaḥ rtha antaram pratibhā
ārṣa pratyaya sambhavāt ayuktam iti ced syāt etat

original: astyārṣo hi dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa sarvapadārtheṣu sāṃsiddhikaḥ pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: asti ārṣaḥ hi dṛṣṭa ādi vyatirekeṇa sarva padārtheṣu sāṃsiddhikaḥ pratyayaḥ
sa prātibhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti
etat ca api ayuktam
kasmāt ukta tvāt
uktam etat siddha rūpam bhagavataḥ parama ṛṣeḥ jñānam
atas na pramāṇa apekṣam iti
yoginām iti ced na
anabhyupagamāt

original: na hi yogināmapramāṇapūrvakaṃ jñānamiti yathā tathā vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na hi yoginām apramāṇa pūrvakam jñānam iti yathā tathā vakṣyāmaḥ
sa laukika iti ced na
a niścita tvāt
syāt etat asti laukikaḥ pratyayaḥ dṛṣṭa ādi vyatirekeṇa

original: tadyathā santamase vrajato drāgiti vijñānamutpadyate - asti me pratīghāti dravyaṃ purastādūrdhvamavasthitamiti /
analyzed: tat yathā santamase vrajataḥ drāk iti vijñānam utpadyate asti me pratīghāti dravyam purastāt ūrdhvam avasthitam iti
tat ca na evam
kasmāt aniścita tvāt

original: na hi tatra niścaya utpadyate idaṃ taddravyamasti purato vā vyaktamastīti /
analyzed: na hi tatra niścayaḥ utpadyate idam tat dravyam asti puratas vā vyaktam asti iti
na ca aniścitam pramāṇa jñānam iṣyate
kiṃca anyat anavasthā prasaṃgāt

original: yadi caivaṃjātīyato 'pi pratyayaḥ pramāṇamabhyupagamyate tenānavasthā prāpnoti /
analyzed: yadi ca evaṃjātīyataḥ pi pratyayaḥ pramāṇam abhyupagamyate tena anavasthā prāpnoti
kim kāraṇam
anavasthānāt vikaraṇasya

original: kāmakrodhalobhayaviṣādadvārako vikalpaḥ samyaṅmithyā vā yasmādaneka utpadyate tasmānna laukikaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhā /
analyzed: kāma krodha lobha ya viṣāda dvārakaḥ vikalpaḥ samyak mithyā vā yasmāt anekaḥ utpadyate tasmāt na laukikaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhā
yat tu khalu idam ucyate abhyāsa vāsanā apekṣā asatsu api vyāghra ādiṣu pratipattiḥ utpadyate
iti
satyam etat

original: sā tu mithyājñānatvātpramāṇatvena na parigṛhyate ityayamadoṣaḥ /
analyzed: sā tu mithyā jñāna tvāt pramāṇa tvena na parigṛhyate iti ayam adoṣaḥ

original: tasmāt siddhaṃ dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa rūpāntaranupapatteḥ pratibhāyāḥ pṛthaganabhidhānam /
analyzed: tasmāt siddham dṛṣṭa ādi vyatirekeṇa rūpa antar anupapatteḥ pratibhāyāḥ pṛthak anabhidhānam
tatas ca sarva pramāṇa siddha tvāt trividham pramāṇam iṣṭam iti sthitam etat  /
kārikā
āha astu evam etat
lakṣaṇa anabhidhānāt tad apratipattiḥ
tasmāt tat abhidhānam
anavasthitam hi dṛṣṭa ādīnām lakṣaṇam
dṛṣṭi vaicitryāt
indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam pratyakṣam iti kecid
tathā ātma indriya manaḥ rtha sannikarṣāt yat niṣpadyate tat anyat iti eke
sat samprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam iti apare
śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ iti vārṣagaṇāḥ
kalpanā apoḍham iti anye
ittham anavasthitam lakṣaṇam
iti dṛṣṭa ādīnām apratipattiḥ
tasmāt lakṣaṇam abhidhānīyam
ucyate
prati viṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ dṛṣṭam
viṣiṇvanti iti viṣayāḥ śabda ādayaḥ
athavā viṣīyante upalabhyante iti arthaḥ
te ca dvividhāḥ
viśiṣṭāḥ a viśiṣṭāḥ ca
viśiṣṭāḥ pṛthivī ādi lakṣaṇāḥ asmat ādi gamyāḥ
a viśiṣṭāḥ ca tanmātra lakṣaṇāḥ yoginām ūrdhvasrotasām ca gamyāḥ
vakṣyati ca etat upariṣṭāt buddhīndriyāṇi teṣām pañca viśeṣa aviśeṣa viṣayāṇi
adhyavasāyaḥ buddhiḥ iti
ca vakṣyati
viṣayam prati vartate iti prativiṣayam
kintat indriyam
tasmin yaḥ dhyavasāyaḥ sa prativiṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ

original: upāttaviṣayāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ vṛttyupanipāti sattvodrekādarajastamaskaṃ yatprakāśarūpaṃ tad dṛṣṭamiti yāvat /
analyzed: upātta viṣayāṇām indriyāṇām vṛtti upanipāti sattva udrekāt arajaḥ tamaskam yat prakāśa rūpam tat dṛṣṭam iti yāvat
tat dṛṣṭam pratyakṣam iti arthaḥ
etat pramāṇam
anena yaḥ cetanā śakteḥ anugrahaḥ tat phalam
prameyāḥ śabda ādayaḥ
evam uttaratra api pramāṇa phala bhāvaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
āha kim punar idam pramāṇāt phalam arthāntaram āhosvit anarthāntaram
katham tāvat bhavitum arhati anartha antaram iti
āha kasmāt adhigama rūpa tvāt
adhigama rūpam hi jñānam
tasya utpattyā eva adhigataḥ rthaḥ iti kutas phala bhedaḥ iti
ucyate karaṇa bhāvaḥ idānīm katham syāt
āha karaṇa bhāvaḥ tu prasiddhi vaśāt

original: viṣayanirbhāsā hi jñānasyotpattiḥ adhigamarūpāpi loke savyāpāreva pratīteti kalpanayā karaṇabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate na paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya nirbhāsā hi jñānasya utpattiḥ adhigama rūpā api loke sa vyāpārā iva pratītā iti kalpanayā karaṇa bhāvaḥ bhyupagamyate na paramārthataḥ
ucyate phalasya artha antara bhāvaḥ
adhikaraṇa bhedāt
buddhi āśrayam hi pramāṇam adhyavasāya ākhyam
puruṣa āśrayam phalam anugraha lakṣaṇam
na ca bhinna adhikaraṇayoḥ eka tvam arhati bhavitum
yat tu uktam adhigama rūpa tvāt jñānam eva phalam iti tat anupapannam
kasmāt a siddha tvāt

original: yathaiva hi ghaṭādayo 'rthā jñānamantareṇa na tadrūpā nātadrūpā iti na śakyaṃ pratipattum,
analyzed: yathā eva hi ghaṭa ādayaḥ rthāḥ jñānam antareṇa na tad rūpāḥ na a tad rūpāḥ iti na śakyam pratipattum

original: evaṃ jñānamapi puruṣapratyayamantareṇa na viṣayarūpaṃ nāviṣayarūpam /
analyzed: evam jñānam api puruṣa pratyayam antareṇa na viṣaya rūpam na aviṣaya rūpam

original: tathā ca śāstram- “tatsaṃyogādacetanaṃ cetanāvadiva liṅgamiti” (ISk 20) vacanāt /
analyzed: tathā ca śāstram tad saṃyogāt acetanam cetanāvat iva liṅgam iti vacanāt
atas puruṣa pratyayam antareṇa jñānam adhigama rūpam iti sāṃkhyam prati asiddham etat
ubhaya pakṣa prasiddhena ca vyavahāraḥ
puruṣa abhāvāt ayuktam iti ced na uttaratra pratipādanāt
saṃghāta parārtha tvāt iti atra puruṣa astitvam pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ
tasmāt siddham adhyavasāya pramāṇa vādinaḥ pramāṇāt phalam artha antaram iti

original: āha- yadi hyadhyavasāyaḥ pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ laukikaḥ prayogo 'rthavān bhavati pratyakṣaṃ vastu iti ?
analyzed: āha yadi hi adhyavasāyaḥ pramāṇam katham laukikaḥ prayogaḥ rthavān bhavati pratyakṣam vastu iti
ucyate viṣaye pratyakṣa śabdaḥ tad pramita tvāt tad kāraṇā tvāt ca

original: yathā prasthapramito vrīhirāśiḥ prasthaśabdavācyo bhavati evaṃ pratyakṣapramito 'rthaḥ pratyakṣaśabdavācyaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yathā prastha pramitaḥ vrīhi rāśiḥ prastha śabda vācyaḥ bhavati evam pratyakṣa pramitaḥ rthaḥ pratyakṣa śabda vācyaḥ syāt
āha na anyatra api tad prasaṅgāt

original: yadi pratyakṣapramitatvādviṣaye pratyakṣaśabdastena tarhi anumāmapramito 'rtho 'numānamiti syāt /
analyzed: yadi pratyakṣa pramita tvāt viṣaye pratyakṣa śabdaḥ tena tarhi anumām apramitaḥ rthaḥ numānam iti syāt
śabda pramitaḥ rthaḥ śabdaḥ iti
na ca agni svarga ādayaḥ pramāṇa śabda vācyāḥ bhavanti
tasmāt viṣama liṅga liṅgi pūrvakam

original: yogināṃ ca dhyānabhūmikāsu viharatāmanumānāgamātītaṃ prātibhaṃ yadvijñānamutpadyate tadupasaṃkhyeyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yoginām ca dhyāna bhūmikāsu viharatām anumāna āgama atītam prātibham yat vijñānam utpadyate tat upasaṃkhyeyam syāt
kutas na hi sukha ādayaḥ śrotra ādi vṛtti grāhyāḥ
yoginām ca atindriyam jñānam iti
yathānyāsam tu kriyamāṇe te viṣayāḥ
teṣām yaḥ dhyavasāyaḥ tasya pratyakṣa tvam kena vāryate
ucyate tad abhāvāt itaratra apravṛttiḥ
pramāṇa antare tu na asti sāmānyam nimittam
katham anumīyate nena iti anumānam

original: na cāgnyādibhiḥ kaścidanumīyata ityatastulyaśabdavācyatā na bhavati /
analyzed: na ca agni ādibhiḥ kaścid anumīyate iti atas tulya śabda vācya tā na bhavati
āha adhyavasāya grahaṇam kimartham
ucyate atiprasaṃga nivṛtti artham

original: prativiṣayaṃ dṛṣṭamitīyatyucyamāne yāvatkiṃcit prativiṣayaṃ vartate 'nugrāhakatvenopaghātatvena vā tat sarvaṃ dṛṣṭamityetadāpadyate /
analyzed: prati viṣayam dṛṣṭam iti iyati ucyamāne yāvat kiṃcid prati viṣayam vartate nugrāhaka tvena upaghāta tvena vā tat sarvam dṛṣṭam iti etat āpadyate

original: adhyavasāyagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣo bhavati /
analyzed: adhyavasāya grahaṇe punar kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati
āha na pramāṇa adhikārāt
na adhyavasāya śabdasya prayojanam
kutas pramāṇa adhikāraḥ yam

original: na cādhyavasāyādṛte yatkiṃcidviṣayaṃ pratipadyate tena kiṃcit pramīyate /
analyzed: na ca adhyavasāyāt ṛte yat kiṃcid viṣayam pratipadyate tena kiṃcid pramīyate
tena vayam sāmarthyāt adhyavasāyam eva abhisaṃbhantyasyāmaḥ

original: tadyathā- adhyayanādhikāre brāhmaṇā ānīyantāmityukte ya evādhīyante ta evānīyante /
analyzed: tat yathā adhyayana adhikāre brāhmaṇāḥ ānīyantām iti ukte ye eva adhīyante te eva ānīyante
ucyate karaṇa antarāṇām tu sandeha nivṛtti artham

original: evaṃ tarhi śrotrādīnāmanyatamamantaḥkaraṇaṃ cetyetad dvāradvāribhāvena catuṣṭayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati vartate /
analyzed: evam tarhi śrotra ādīnām anyatamam antaḥkaraṇam ca iti etat dvāra dvāri bhāvena catuṣṭayam viṣayam prati vartate
tasmāt adhyavasāya grahaṇam kriyate sandehaḥ mā bhūt iti
āha astu atra sandehaḥ
na ekena kenacid kaścid viṣayaḥ upādīyate
tena vayam sarveṣām pratyakṣa tvam pratipatsyāmahe
ucyate sarva abhyupagame hi śāstra hāniḥ

original: yadi punaḥ sarveṣāmeva pramāṇatvamabhyupagamyate tena yacchāstramekameva darśanaṃ khyātireva darśanamiti taddhīyate /
analyzed: yadi punar sarveṣām eva pramāṇa tvam abhyupagamyate tena yat śāstram ekam eva darśanam khyātiḥ eva darśanam iti tat hīyate
vakṣyati ca ācāryaḥ ete pradīpa kalpāḥ isk
sarvam pratyupabhogam yasmāt puruṣasya sādhayati buddhiḥ iti
tat virudyate
tasmāt adhyavasāya grahaṇam kartavyam
sandehaḥ mā bhūt iti
āha na sandeha mātram etat bhavati

original: sarvasandeheṣu caitadupatiṣṭhate- vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna hi saṃdehādalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: sarva sandeheṣu ca etat upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣa pratipattiḥ na hi saṃdehāt alakṣaṇam
tatra adhyavasāyaḥ dṛṣṭam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
ucyate mukta saṃśayam ca indriya vṛtti pratipatteḥ
syāt etat yadi atra sandehaḥ syāt
na eva atra sandehaḥ prāptaḥ
kin tarhi śrotra ativṛtteḥ eva grahaṇam

original: āha- kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yena nimittāviśeṣe 'pi śrotrādivṛtterevātra grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti,
analyzed: āha kim punar kāraṇam yena nimitta aviśeṣe śrotra ādi vṛtteḥ eva atra grahaṇam prāpnoti
na antaḥkaraṇasya eva pratyakṣa tvam
ucyate tatra ca mukhyā śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ
kasmāt sākṣāt viṣaya grahaṇa sāmarthyāt
na antaḥkaraṇam
tad dvāreṇa pratipatteḥ
gauṇa mukhyayoḥ ca mukhye sampratipattiḥ

original: tadyathā- gauranubandhyaḥ ajo 'gnīṣomīya iti vāhīko nānubadhyate /
analyzed: tat yathā gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ gnīṣomīyaḥ iti vā ahīkaḥ na anubadhyate

original: āha- yadīyaṃ śrotrādivṛttireva pratyakṣamityabhupeyate ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ syāt ?
analyzed: āha yadi iyam śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ eva pratyakṣam iti abhupeyate kaḥ evam sati doṣaḥ syāt
ucyate rāga ādi viṣayam yat vijñānam liṅga liṅgi pūrvakam

original: yogināṃ ca dhyānabhūmikāsu viharatāmanumānāgamatītaṃ prātibhaṃ yadvijñānamutpadyate tadupasaṃkhyeyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yoginām ca dhyāna bhūmikāsu viharatām anumāna āgam atītam prātibham yat vijñānam utpadyate tat upasaṃkhyeyam syāt
kutas na hi sukha ādayaḥ śrotra ādi vṛtti bāhyāḥ
yoginām ca atīndriyam jñānam iti
yathānyāsam tu kriyamāne te viṣayāḥ
teṣām yaḥ dhyavasāyaḥ tasya pratyakṣa tvam kena vāryate
āha prativiṣaya grahaṇam tarhi kimartham
ucyate prati viṣaya grahaṇam asat vyudāsa artham

original: adhyavasāyo dṛṣṭamitīyatyucyamāne mṛgatṛṣṇikālātacakragandharvanagarādiṣu api yo 'dhyavasāyastad dṛṣṭamiti /
analyzed: adhyavasāyaḥ dṛṣṭam iti iyati ucyamāne mṛgatṛṣṇika alāta cakra gandharvanagara ādiṣu api yaḥ dhī avasāyaḥ tat dṛṣṭam iti
prativiṣaya grahaṇāt tu teṣām vyudāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati
āha yadi evam viṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ iti eva ca ucyatām
kim pratigrahaṇena
ucyate pratigrahaṇam sannikarṣa artham
viṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ dṛṣṭam iti iyati ucyamāne viṣaya mātre sampratyayaḥ syāt
pratigrahaṇe punar kriyamāṇe pratiḥ ābhimukhye vartate
tena sannikṛṣṭa indriya vṛtti upanipātī yaḥ dhī avasāyaḥ tat dṛṣṭam iti upalabhyate
āha kasya punar atīndriya sannikarṣe pratyakṣa tvam prāpnoti
ucyate anumānasya
kasmāt tat hi liṅga darśanāt asannikṛṣṭe viṣaye bhavati
āha anumānasya aprasaṅgaḥ
sāmānya vihitasya viśeṣa vihitena bādhanāt

original: sāmānye hi viṣayamātre 'dhyavasāyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vidhāya viśeṣe liṅgaliṅgipūrvake 'numānaṃ śāsti /
analyzed: sāmānye hi viṣaya mātre dhyavasāyasya pratyakṣa tvam vidhāya viśeṣe liṅga liṅgi pūrvake numānam śāsti
sāmānya vihitam ca viśeṣa vihitena bādhyate

original: yathā taddhi brāhmaṇebhyo dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
analyzed: yathā tat hi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti

kasmāt hetu antara abhidhānāt

original: yadi vṛttyā grahaṇaṃ puruṣasya sūpapādamabhaviṣyat saṃhatapārārthyamācāryo hetutvena nāvakṣyat /
analyzed: yadi vṛttyā grahaṇam puruṣasya su upapādam abhaviṣyat saṃhata pārārthyam ācāryaḥ hetu tvena na avakṣyat
tat ca avṛtti bhūtam iti avaśyam śeṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭayoḥ artha antara bhāvaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ
tasmāt siddham sāmānyatodṛṣṭāt atīndriyāṇām arthānām samadhigamaḥ
tasya prayoga mātra bhedāt dvaividhyam
vītaḥ avīta iti
tayoḥ lakṣaṇam āmananti
yadā hetuḥ sva rūpeṇa sādhya siddhau prayujyate
sa vītaḥ ṛthān ara ākṣepāt itaraḥ pariśeṣitaḥ

original: svarūpaṃ hi sādhanasya dvividham- sādhāraṇamasādhāraṇaṃ ca /
analyzed: svarūpam hi sādhanasya dvividham sādhāraṇam asādhāraṇam ca
tatra sādhāraṇam sādhya sahabhāvī tad pratipatti hetu tvena yathāvat āśrīyamāṇaḥ rtha ātmā
asādhāraṇam punar parimāṇam anvayaḥ saṃghāta para artha tvam ityādi

original: tatra yadā hetuḥ parapakṣamapekṣya yathārthena svarūpeṇa sādhyasiddhāvupadiśyate tadā vītākhyo bhavati /
analyzed: tatra yadā hetuḥ parapakṣam apekṣya yathārthena svarūpeṇa sādhya siddhau upadiśyate tadā vīta ākhyaḥ bhavati

original: yadā tu svasādhyādarthāntarabhūtānāṃ prasaṃgināṃ kṣepamapohaṃ kṛtvā pariśeṣataḥ sādhyasiddhāvapadiśyate tadāvītākhyo bhavati /
analyzed: yadā tu sva sādhyāt artha antara bhūtānām prasaṃginām kṣepam apoham kṛtvā pariśeṣataḥ sādhya siddhau apadiśyate tadā āvīta ākhyaḥ bhavati

original: tadyathā na cet paramāṇupuruṣeśvarakarmadaivakālasvabhāvayadṛcchābhyo jagadutpattiḥ sambhavati pariśeṣataḥ pradhānāditi tadā punaravītākhyo  #
analyzed: tat yathā na ced paramāṇu puruṣa īśvara karma daiva kāla svabhāva yadṛcchābhyaḥ jagat utpattiḥ sambhavati pariśeṣataḥ pradhānāt iti tadā punar avīta ākhyaḥ
bhavati

original: tatra yadā vīto hetuḥ svabuddhāvavahitavijñānasarūpaṃ vijñānāntaramādadhānena vaktrā pratipādyādau vākyabhāvamupanīyate /
analyzed: tatra yadā vītaḥ hetuḥ sva buddhau avahita vijñāna sarūpam vijñāna antaram ādadhānena vaktrā pratipādya ādau vākya bhāvam upanīyate
vākyam antareṇa arthasya buddhi antare saṃkrāmayitum aśakya tvāt
tadā avayavi vākyam parikalpyate
tasya punar avayavāḥ jijñāsā saṃśaya prayojana śakya prāpti saṃśaya vyudāsa lakṣaṇāḥ ca vyākhyā aṅgam
pratijñā hetu dṛṣṭānta upasaṃhāra nigamanāni para pratipādana aṅgam iti
tatra jñātum icchā jijñāsā
kaścid kaṃcid upasadya āha puruṣam jñātum icchāmi
kim asti na asti iti

original: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti paryanuyuktaḥ pratyāha- anupalabhyamānasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: kutas saṃśayaḥ iti paryanuyuktaḥ pratyāha anupalabhyamānasya ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt
iha anupalabhyamānam ubhayathā dṛṣṭam sat bhūtam asat bhūtam ca iti
sat bhūtam ca arka indu maṇḍala aparabhāga ādi
asat bhūtam ca śaśaviṣāṇa ādi
ayam api ca ātmā na upalabhyate
atas saṃśayaḥ kim asti na asti iti
kim asyāḥ cintāyāḥ prayojanam iti pṛṣṭaḥ vyācaṣṭe śāstra tattva adhigamaḥ
tatas ca mokṣa avāptiḥ
katham iti yadi tāvat ayam ātmā asti aprakṛti tva audāsīnya vibhu tva ādi sattva vijñānāt nairātmya bhrānti vipakṣa bhūtāt apavarga prāptiḥ avaśyaṃbhāvinī iti
yat uktam vyakta avyakta jña vijñānāt mokṣaḥ vā āpyate iti tat śāstram arthavat bhavati iti

original: atha nāstīti niścīyate tena sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānāttadvadanye 'pi padārthā na santīti
analyzed: atha na asti iti niścīyate tena sāmānyatodṛṣṭāt anumānāt tadvat anye pi padārthāḥ na santi iti
vipralambha bhūyiṣṭham ārṣam darśanam apahāya ātma graha dṛṣṭi vigamāt lokottaram avalambanam
śūnyam dhyāna viṣayam upasamprāptaḥ traidhātuka kleśa nirodha lakṣaṇam ātyantikam nirvāṇam avāpsyati iti
śakyaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ niścetum
pramāṇa traya parigrahāt iti vyavasthite
vyudāsya saṃśayam sādhya avadhāraṇam pratijñā

original: sādhyasya yadavadhāraṇamasti puruṣa iti sā pratijñā /
analyzed: sādhyasya yat avadhāraṇam asti puruṣaḥ iti sā pratijñā
sādhana samāsa vacanam hetuḥ
sādhyate nena iti sādhanam liṅgam
samāsaḥ saṃkṣepaḥ
sādhanasya samāsa vacanam sādhana samāsa vacanam
sādhana grahaṇam tad ābhāsa pratiṣedha artham
na hi tāni sādhanam
saṃśaya viparyaya hetu tvāt
samāsa grahaṇam avayava antara avakāśa pradāna artham
liṅga nirdeśa mātram hetuḥ

original: yastu tasya sādhyasahabhāvitvalakṣaṇaḥ prapañcaḥ so 'vayavāntarāṇītyuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ tu tasya sādhya sahabhāvi tva lakṣaṇaḥ prapañcaḥ saḥ vayava antarāṇi iti uktam bhavati
udāharaṇam tu atra nidarśanam dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tasya sādhanasya sādhyena sahabhāvitvanidarśanaṃ yadasau dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: tasya sādhanasya sādhyena sahabhāvi tva nidarśanam yat asau dṛṣṭāntaḥ
tat yathā saṃhatya kāriṇām parārtha tvam dṛṣṭam
yathā śayana āsana ratha śaraṇānām
vyatirekaḥ tu avītasya prasaṅgi dharma antara nivṛtti rūpa tvāt tad antarbhūtaḥ iti tad artham vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ ucyate
sādhya da dṛṣṭāntayoḥ eka kriyā upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ
sādhyasya cakṣuḥ ādi pārārthya lakṣaṇasya
dṛṣṭāntasya ca śayana ādeḥ eka kriyā upasaṃhāraḥ
tatra artha antara bhūta tvāt sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ añjasā na eka kriyā upapadyate
tena eva tasya a nidarśanāt iti atas dharma sāmānyāt yathā idam tathā idam iti eka kriyā upacaryate

original: yathā śayanādayaḥ saṃhatatvātparārthā evaṃ cakṣurādibhirapi parārthairbhavitavyam /
analyzed: yathā śayana ādayaḥ saṃhata tvāt para arthāḥ evam cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ api para arthaiḥ bhavitavyam
yaḥ sau paraḥ sa puruṣaḥ
tad vaśāt pratijñā abhyāsaḥ nigamanam
hetu dṛṣṭānta upasaṃhāra apekṣayā yaḥ punar abhyāsaḥ tat nigamanam

original: tadyathā- tasmādasti puruṣa ityeṣāmavayavānāṃ parasparasambandhādviśiṣṭārthaḥ samudāyo vākyamityupadiśyate /
analyzed: tat yathā tasmāt asti puruṣaḥ iti eṣām avayavānām paraspara sambandhāt viśiṣṭa arthaḥ samudāyaḥ vākyam iti upadiśyate

original: vākyamapyanekaṃ yadā guṇībhūtasvārthamarthāntaropakāritvāditareṇa saṃsṛjyate tadā śāstramapyekaṃ vākyamityavasīyate /
analyzed: vākyam api anekam yadā guṇībhūta sva artham artha antara upakāri tvāt itareṇa saṃsṛjyate tadā śāstram api ekam vākyam iti avasīyate
āha jijñāsā ādi an abhidhānam
tad vyatirekeṇa api svayam artha gateḥ
sva niścaya vat ca para pratipādanāt

original: yathā hi svayamutpadyate niścetuḥ pratyayastathaivānyaḥ pratyāyya ityetannyāyyam /
analyzed: yathā hi svayam utpadyate niścetuḥ pratyayaḥ tathā eva anyaḥ pratyāyyaḥ iti etat nyāyyam

original: na ca svayamevārthaṃ pratipadyamānasya jijñāsādīnāṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: na ca svayam eva artham pratipadyamānasya jijñāsā ādīnām tatra vyāpāraḥ
tasmāt para artham api eṣām upādānam na kalpyate
saṃśaya vacana ānarthakyam ca
pratīta artha tvāt
niścitau hi vādi prativādinau sva pakṣayoḥ
tayoḥ itaretara saṃśaya paryanuyoge na asti prayojanam
kiṃca anyat prayojana śakya prāpti avacanam ca
sādhana abhyupagamāt eva tad pratīteḥ
na hi mahatām niṣprayojanā pravṛttiḥ upapadyate
na ca aśakye rthe himavat samīkaraṇa ādiṣu pravṛtteḥ
tasmāt anarthakam tat abhidhānam

original: tadbhāve bhāvāditi cet syādetat satsu jijñāsādiṣu tattvādhigamaṃ prati pravṛttirbhavati,
analyzed: tad bhāve bhāvāt iti ced syāt etat satsu jijñāsā ādiṣu tattva adhigamam prati pravṛttiḥ bhavati
asatsu na bhavati
tasmāt etāni api sādhanam bhaviṣyanti iti
etat ca anupapannam
kasmāt atiprasaṃgāt
satsu ātma antaḥkaraṇa indriya āloka viṣayeṣu pravṛtti darśanāt teṣām api sādhana tvam syāt
aniṣṭam ca etat
tasmāt jijñāsā ādayaḥ narthakāḥ
pratijñā ādayaḥ durvihitāḥ
katham sādhya avadhāraṇasya avayava antareṣu api upapatteḥ

original: yadi sādhyāvadhāraṇaṃ pratijñetyucyate tena sādhyasya hetordṛṣṭāntasya vā yadavadhāraṇaṃ tadapi pratijñā prāpnoti,
analyzed: yadi sādhya avadhāraṇam pratijñā iti ucyate tena sādhyasya hetoḥ dṛṣṭāntasya vā yat avadhāraṇam tat api pratijñā prāpnoti
nimitta aviśeṣāt
sādhya śabdaḥ hi ayam sāmānya vṛttiḥ
na yatnam antareṇa viśeṣe vasthāpayitum śakyate iti
kim ca hetu lakṣaṇa anupapattiḥ ca
sādhana anupadeśāt

original: yo hi sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ heturityetallakṣaṇamācaṣṭe tena prāksādhanamabhidheyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yaḥ hi sādhana samāsa vacanam hetuḥ iti etat lakṣaṇam ācaṣṭe tena prāk sādhanam abhidheyam syāt

original: tato vaktavyamamuṣya samāsavacanaṃ heturiti na caivamuktam /
analyzed: tatas vaktavyam amuṣya samāsa vacanam hetuḥ iti na ca evam uktam
tasmāt alakṣaṇam etat
kiṃca anyat samāsa vacanam ca vistara niṣedha prasaṅgāt

original: yadi hi samāsagrahaṇaṃ kriyate kiṃ prāptaṃ yo 'yamādhyātmikānāṃ bhedānāṃ kāryakāraṇātmakānāṃ caikajātisamanvayo dṛṣṭa ityevamādiḥ sādhanaprapañcaḥ  #
analyzed: yadi hi samāsa grahaṇam kriyate kim prāptam yaḥ yam ādhyātmikānām bhedānām kārya kāraṇa ātmakānām ca eka jāti samanvayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti evamādiḥ sādhana prapañcaḥ
saḥ hetuḥ iti uktam bhavati
tasmāt samāsa grahaṇam aniṣṭam
liṅga abhidhānāt adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam
liṅgam hi naḥ sādhanam
tasya atra nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ
tasmāt sva mati jāḍyāt idam aniṣṭam adhyāropyate
na tu asmad pramādāt iti
etat api ayuktam

original: kasmāt ? tasya dvidhā bhinnasya pañcadhā sādhanabhāvāt /
analyzed: kasmāt tasya dvidhā bhinnasya pañcadhā sādhana bhāvāt
tat hi liṅgam vīta a vīta tvena iṣṭam
tena dvidhā bhinnam

original: tatrāpi vītaḥ pañcaprabhedaḥ ityataḥ samudāyānniṣkṛṣṭasyaikasya liṅgatvamaśakyaṃ vaktumiti /
analyzed: tatra api vītaḥ pañca prabhedaḥ iti atas samudāyāt niṣkṛṣṭasya ekasya liṅga tvam aśakyam vaktum iti
kiñca anyat dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇa ayogaḥ ca
śabda artha lakṣaṇe niṣṭa prasaṅgāt
tat nidarśanam dṛṣṭānte iti

original: atra śabdo vā yena sādhyasādhane nidarśyete sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt ?
analyzed: atra śabdaḥ vā yena sādhya sādhane nidarśyete sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt
arthaḥ vā yatra nidarśyate
kiñca atas

original: na tadyadi tāvacchabdaḥ parigṛhyate tata upanayalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate /
analyzed: na tat yadi tāvat śabdaḥ parigṛhyate tatas upanaya lakṣaṇam bādhyate

original: kasmāt ? na hi yathābhidhānaṃ tathā sādhyamityekakriyā yujyate iti /
analyzed: kasmāt na hi yathā abhidhānam tathā sādhyam iti eka kriyā yujyate iti
atha arthaḥ parigṛhyate tena abhidheyasya vākya anavayava tvāt pañca avayava tva virodhaḥ
kiñca anyat dṛṣṭānta upanaya nigamana abhedaḥ ca hetu pratijñā artha abhidhānāt
sādhana tvam eva sādhya avinābhāvi tva lakṣaṇam dṛṣṭānta upanayayoḥ
pratijñā artham ca nigamanasya na avayava antara tvam yujyate

original: ucyate- yaducyate svaniścayenāṅgabhāvagamanātparapratyāyanārthaṃ jijñāsādyanabhidhānamiti atra brūmaḥ- na, uktatvāt /
analyzed: ucyate yat ucyate sva niścayena aṅga bhāva gamanāt para pratyāyana artham jijñāsā ādi anabhidhānam iti atra brūmaḥ na ukta tvāt
uktam etat purastāt vyākhyā aṅgam jijñāsā ādayaḥ

original: sarvasya cānugrahaḥ kartavya ityevamarthaṃ śāstravyākhyānaṃ vipaścidbhiḥ pratāyate,
analyzed: sarvasya ca anugrahaḥ kartavyaḥ iti evam artham śāstra vyākhyānam vipaścidbhiḥ pratāyate
na sva artham sva sadṛṣa buddhi artham vā
tatra evam kalpyamāne ye vyutpādyāḥ tān prati na eva eṣām ānarthakyam

original: athaitadaniṣṭam- yaduktaṃ sandigdhaviparyastāvyutpannabuddhyanugrahārtho hi satāṃ viniścayaḥ śāstrakathetyasya vyāghātaḥ /
analyzed: atha etat aniṣṭam yat uktam sandigdha viparyasta avyutpanna buddhi anugraha arthaḥ hi satām viniścayaḥ śāstra kathā iti asya vyāghātaḥ
kim ca niyama an abhyupagamāt
na hi vayam eṣām āvaśyakam abhidhānam ācakṣmahe

original: kintarhi yadā prativādī paryanuyuṅkte- kiṃ jijñāsasa iti avaśyamabhidhānīyaṃ śabdamiti /
analyzed: kin tarhi yadā prativādī paryanuyuṅkte kim jijñāsase iti avaśyam abhidhānīyam śabdam iti
kena dharmeṇa
kim nityaḥ nityaḥ iti
kutas saṃśayaḥ mūrta tvāt

original: yastu na paryanuyuṅkte na taṃ pratyete vācyāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu na paryanuyuṅkte na tam prati ete vācyāḥ

original: kvacidānarthakyāt sarvatra prasaṅga iti cenna itareṣāmapi tatprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: kvacid ānarthakyāt sarvatra prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na itareṣām api tad prasaṅgāt
pratijñā ādīnām api tarhi kvacid anabhidhānam atas teṣām api sarvatra avacanam prasajyate

original: tathā ca bhavatoktaṃ kasyacittu kiñcit prasiddhameva bhavatītyanyataroktirapi sādhanaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: tathā ca bhavatā uktam kasyacid tu kiñcid prasiddham eva bhavati iti anyatara uktiḥ api sādhanam bhavati
śabde iva artha dvaya pratīta tvāt ubhaya anabhidhānam iti
yat api uktam niścita tvāt saṃśaya avacanam iti asat etat
kasmāt ukta tvāt
uktam etat sati paryanuyoge tat vacanam iti
etena prayojana śakya prāptī pratyukte

original: yo hi paryanuyuñjīta kiṃ prayojano 'yaṃ śakyo vāyamartha iti taṃ prati vācyametat /
analyzed: yaḥ hi paryanuyuñjīta kim prayojanaḥ yam śakyaḥ vā ayam arthaḥ iti tam prati vācyam etat
yat api uktam tad bhāve bhāvāt iti na
anabhyupagamāt
na brūmaḥ yasmāt satsu jijñāsā ādiṣu tattva adhigama sadbhāvaḥ tasmāt eteṣām avayava tvam iti

original: kintarhi yaṃ pratyeṣāṃ pratipattāvaṅgabhāvagamanaṃ taṃ pratyetāni sādhanamiti /
analyzed: kintarhi yam prati eṣām pratipattau aṅga bhāva gamanam tam prati etāni sādhanam iti

original: yadapyuktaṃ sādhyābhidhāyinaḥ pratijñābhyupagamāddhetudṛṣṭāntayorapi tatprasaṅga iti ayuktametat /
analyzed: yat api uktam sādhya abhidhāyinaḥ pratijñā abhyupagamāt hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ api tad prasaṅgaḥ iti ayuktam etat
kasmāt jijñāsā ādeḥ sadbhāve sati tad pratīteḥ

original: yadyapi sādhyaśabdo 'yamaviśeṣeṇa siddhatvādarthāntaramācaṣṭe tathāpi yaṃ prati jijñāsāsaṃśayaprayojanaśakyaprāptayastasya vyudasya saṃśayaṃ  #
analyzed: yadi api sādhya śabdaḥ yama viśeṣeṇa siddha tvāt arthāntaram ācaṣṭe tathā api yam prati jijñāsā saṃśaya prayojana śakya prāptayaḥ tasya vyudasya saṃśayam
sādhyasya avadhāraṇam pratijñā
na hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ tat asti iti asat etat
kiṃca anyat tad bhāve virodhāt

original: yadā tu jijñāsādayo hetau dṛṣṭānte vā bhavanti
analyzed: yadā tu jijñāsā ādayaḥ hetau dṛṣṭānte vā bhavanti

original: tadā kiṃ kṛtakaḥ śabdo 'tha na kṛtako 'tha buddhirnityā kṣaṇikā veti bhavatyeva tadavadhāraṇaṃ pratijñā /
analyzed: tadā kim kṛtakaḥ na buddhiḥ nityā kṣaṇikā vā iti bhavati eva tad avadhāraṇam pratijñā
yat api uktam sādhana anupadeśāt hetu lakṣaṇa ayogaḥ iti asat etat
kasmāt loka prasiddha tvāt

original: yathā sādhyavatvenepsitaḥ pakṣa iti pratijñālakṣaṇamācakṣāṇo bhavānna sādhyalakṣaṇamācaṣṭe, kasmāt ?
analyzed: yathā sādhyava tvena īpsitaḥ pakṣaḥ iti pratijñā lakṣaṇam ācakṣāṇaḥ bhavān na sādhya lakṣaṇam ācaṣṭe kasmāt
sādhanīyam sādhyam iti loke siddha tvāt

original: evaṃ sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ hetulakṣaṇamācakṣāṇā vayaṃ na sādhanamācakṣmahe /
analyzed: evam sādhana samāsa vacanam hetu lakṣaṇam ācakṣāṇāḥ vayam na sādhanam ācakṣmahe

original: kasmāt ? sādhyate 'neneti kṛtvā sādhanamiti loke siddhatvāt /
analyzed: kasmāt sādhyate nena iti kṛtvā sādhanam iti loke siddha tvāt
upetya vā anumāna nirdeśāt
liṅgam hi naḥ sādhanam
tat ca nirdiṣṭaiḥ iti
yat tu uktam vīta avīta bhede sati pañcadhā sādhana bhāvāt iti
atra brūmaḥ
ayuktam etat
kasmāt samāsa grahaṇa sāmarthyāt
atas eva samāsa grahaṇam kriyate
sādhana sva rūpa abhidhāna mātram hetuḥ iti yathā vijñāyate
prapañcaḥ tu avayava antarāṇi iti
etena vistara pratiṣedha prasaṅgaḥ prayuktaḥ

original: katham ? na hi samāsaśabdasyāyamartha iti kṛtvā /
analyzed: katham na hi samāsa śabdasya ayam arthaḥ iti kṛtvā
yat punar etat uktam śabda artha kalpane niṣṭa prasaṅgāt dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇa ayogaḥ iti
astu tāvat śabdaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
yat tu uktam upanaya lakṣaṇam bādhyate iti anupapannam etat
kasmāt asambhave sati sambandhi antare kārya vijñānāt
śabde sambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyāmaḥ
athavā punar astu arthaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: yattūktamabhidheyasya vākyānavayavatvātpañcāvayavatvavirodha iti arthe 'sambhavācchabde kāryaṃ vijñāsyāmaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu uktam abhidheyasya vākya anavayava tvāt pañca avayava tva virodhaḥ iti arthe sambhavāt śabde kāryam vijñāsyāmaḥ
yat api uktam pratijñā hetu artha abhidhānāt dṛṣṭānta upanaya nigamanānām na avayava antara tvam iti ayam adoṣaḥ
kasmāt a pratijñānāt
na hi etat asmābhiḥ pratijñāyate
kim tarhi prameya vacanam pratijñā
pramāṇa rūpa mātra vacanam hetuḥ
sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma sāmānyāt eka kriyā upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ
samudāyasya sādhya siddhaye vyāpāra nirdeśaḥ nigamanam
tasmāt ayuktam etat
kiṃca anyat
ekasya sādhana bhāva parikalpanā vat tad parikalpane doṣa abhāvāt

original: yathā vākyam evaṃ ca tadarthaśca mukhyau śabdārthau,
analyzed: yathā vākyam evam ca tad arthaḥ ca mukhyau śabda arthau
tayoḥ abhinna artha tvāt iti abhyupagamāt ekam eva artham abhāgam akramam ca buddhau avasthāpya
śrotra grāhya tva anitya tva kṛtaka tva prameya tva ādi lakṣaṇānām śaktīnām apoddhārāt sādhya sādhana saṃśaya rūpa āpannam vaktāraḥ bhinnam ācakṣate
na ca eka artha dharma tvāt sādhya sādhana saṃśaya abhidhānānām eka tvam anuṣajyate

original: tathaikasya sādhanasya sādhyadharmatatsahabhāvitvalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmabhidhānaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntādināvayavāntaraṃ naḥ syāt /
analyzed: tathā ekasya sādhanasya sādhya dharma tad sahabhāvi tva lakṣaṇānām śaktīnām abhidhānam hetu dṛṣṭānta ādinā avayava antaram naḥ syāt

original: tatra yaduktaṃ pratijñāhetvarthābhidhānād dṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanānāṃ nāvayavāntaratvamiti etadayuktam /
analyzed: tatra yat uktam pratijñā hetu artha abhidhānāt dṛṣṭānta upanaya nigamanānām na avayava antara tvam iti etat ayuktam
tasmāt sūktam daśa avayavaḥ vītaḥ
tasya purastāt prayogam nyāyyam ācāryāḥ manyante
kim kāraṇam
avīta lakṣaṇa avirodhāt
avītasya hi lakṣaṇam pariśeṣataḥ sādhya anugrahaḥ

original: tatrānvayadinā svarūpeṇādhigate pradhānalakṣaṇe dharmiṇi parapakṣapratiṣedhamātreṇopasaṃhāre kriyamāṇe pariśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate /
analyzed: tatra anvaya dinā sva rūpeṇa adhigate pradhāna lakṣaṇe dharmiṇi parapakṣa pratiṣedha mātreṇa upasaṃhāre kriyamāṇe pariśeṣa lakṣaṇam bādhyate
kasmāt iha pratiṣedha mātram ādau ucyate

original: tena yathā hetuvirodhātparamāṇvadibhyo na vyaktamutpadyate tathā hetvabhāvāt pradhānādapi notpadyate iti śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
analyzed: tena yathā hetu virodhāt paramāṇu ādibhyaḥ na vyaktam utpadyate tathā hetu abhāvāt pradhānāt api nā utpadyate iti śakyam kalpayitum
atas tad vyavacchedaḥ ca avītāt gamyate
tathā sati kaḥ pariśeṣaḥ syāt

original: svarūpeṇa tu paricchinne dharmiṇi upasaṃhāro yathāvadavakalpyate /
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa tu paricchinne dharmiṇi upasaṃhāraḥ yathāvat avakalpyate

original: na cetparamāṇvādibhyo vyaktamutpadyate pariśeṣataḥ pradhānādeva vyaktamutpadyate iti yathoktebhyo 'nvayādibhya ityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na ced paramāṇu ādibhyaḥ vyaktam utpadyate pariśeṣataḥ pradhānāt eva vyaktam utpadyate iti yathā uktebhyaḥ nvaya ādibhyaḥ iti uktam bhavati
tasmāt prāk vīta prayogaḥ iti siddham sāmānyatodṛṣṭāt anumānāt atīndriyāṇām arthānām samadhigamaḥ iti
āha na kāraṇa antarataḥ n upalabhyamānānām agrahaṇāt

original: yadi sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānātsarvaṃ parokṣamadhigamyate ityabhyupagamyate prāptamidaṃ yeṣāmapyarthānāṃ kāraṇāntarato 'nupalabdhisteṣāmapi tasmādeva  #
analyzed: yadi sāmānyatodṛṣṭāt anumānāt sarvam parokṣam adhigamyate iti abhyupagamyate prāptam idam yeṣām api arthānām kāraṇa antarataḥ nupalabdhiḥ teṣām api tasmāt eva
grahaṇam tat yathā
atidūrāt sāmīpyāt indriya ghātāt manaḥ nava sthānāt
saukṣmyāt vyavadhānāt abhibhavāt samāna abhihārāt ca
tatra atidūrāt tāvat tat yathā proḍḍīnasya śakuneḥ
ati sāmīpyāt añjana prabhṛtīnām
indriya ghātāt śabda ādīnām
manaḥ nava sthānāt śakaṭa ādīnām
saukṣmyāt truṭi ādīnām
vyavadhānāt hiraṇya ādīnām
abhibhavāt sūrya prakāśāt graha ādīnām
samāna abhihārāt aneka pradīpa prabhāṇām
caśabdāt aiśvarya yogāt deva ādīnām
na ca arhati bhavitum dharma sāmānya anupapatteḥ
tasmāt ayuktam sarvam atīndriyam anumāna grāhyam iti
ucyate śakyam tāvat kāraṇa antarataḥ nu upalabhyamānam kiṃcid sāmānyatodṛṣṭāt anumānāt adhigantum
tat yathā samīpa avasthitasya śakuneḥ ayatnena cakṣuṣā grahaṇam

original: yathā yathā tu viprakarṣaṃ pratipadyate praṇidhāya cakṣurgṛhyate tāvadyāvatkrameṇādarśanamupasaṃprāptaḥ /
analyzed: yathā yathā tu viprakarṣam pratipadyate praṇidhāya cakṣuḥ gṛhyate tāvat yāvat krameṇa adarśanam upasaṃprāptaḥ
tatra deśa viprakarṣe pracīyamāne darśanam upacīyamānam avagamya atyanta adarśanam api paścāt tad hetukam anumīyate
tathā na ati samīpa avasthitasya dravyasya asphuṭam ākāram avadhārya paścāt yathā yathārāt upasaṃpadyate
tathā tathā pratipadyamāna darśana śaktayaḥ numātāraḥ kṛṣṇasāra añjana prabhṛtīnām agrahaṇam ati sāmīpyāt anumīyate

original: tathā girisaritsamudrasamīpavartinaṃ śravaṇapratighātinaṃ prāk śabdamupalabhya paścāttasminneva deśe śabdamagṛhṇānāḥ śravaṇopaghātamanumimate
analyzed: tathā giri sarit samudra samīpa vartinam śravaṇa pratighātinam prāk śabdam upalabhya paścāt tasmin eva deśe śabdam agṛhṇānāḥ śravaṇa upaghātam anumimate
tasmāt api ca asiddham parokṣam āpta āgamāt sādhyam
tasmāt api ca asiddham iti anena āgama viṣaye sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya anavatāram ācaṣṭe
parokṣam iti viṣayam prati nirdiśati
āpta āgamāt sādhyam iti viṣayiṇam āha

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati- tasmādapi sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānādyanna siddhyati pratyakṣagrāhyamapi
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati tasmāt api sāmānyatodṛṣṭāt anumānāt yat na siddhi ati pratyakṣa grāhyam api
svayam adṛṣṭam kāraṇa antara pratibaddha viṣaya bhāvam atyanta parokṣam vā svarga apavarga devatā ādi
dharma sāmānya rahitam tat āpta āgamāt sādhyam
sarva vāda siddhi prasaṅgāt aprāmāṇyam iti ced syāt etat

original: yadi tarhyāgamaḥ pramāṇīkriyate tena pratiśāstraṃ ye 'bhiyuktāsteṣāṃ prāmāṇyamityavaśyamabhyupagantavyam /
analyzed: yadi tarhi āgamaḥ pramāṇīkriyate tena pratiśāstram ye bhiyuktāḥ teṣām prāmāṇyam iti avaśyam abhyupagantavyam
evam sati sarva ācārya prāmāṇyāt aneka vikalpa vicitrā tarka vṛttiḥ iti apariniścita tvāt bhrāntiḥ prasajyeta
tathā ca sati jijñāsūnām apavarga prāpti vighātaḥ syāt

original: tasmādbhiṣajeva bhavatā paropadeśaḥ prayukto nāsmānayaṃ prīṇāti /
analyzed: tasmāt bhiṣajā iva bhavatā para upadeśaḥ prayuktaḥ na asmān ayam prīṇāti
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt āpta lakṣaṇasya anavadhārita tvāt
vyapagata rāga ādi doṣāṇām asandigdha matīnām atīndriya artha dṛśvanām īśvara mahā ṛṣīṇām āpta tvam ācakṣmahe
na sarveṣām
yadi ca anyaḥ pi evam dharmaḥ sti bhavatu pramāṇam
kiṃca anyat
sva viṣaye ca tad prāmāṇyasya adoṣavat tvāt

original: yasya khalvapi yo viṣayastasya tasminviṣaye vaco 'ntareṇāpi sādhanaṃ pramāṇamityavaśyamabhyupagantavyam /
analyzed: yasya khalu api yaḥ viṣayaḥ tasya tasmin viṣaye vacaḥ ntareṇa api sādhanam pramāṇam iti avaśyam abhyupagantavyam
itarathā pratiśāstram ācāra sthiti niyamānām adṛṣṭa arthānām apratipattiḥ syāt
etena akhila liṅgāt āgamaḥ rtha antaram
yasmāt mahatā abhidhānena yuktiḥ anviṣyate tasmāt yukti apekṣāt liṅgāt āgamaḥ rthāntaram iti
āha na anvaya vyatirekābhyām adhigama hetu tvāt

original: yathā kṛtakatvādidharmo 'nityatvādau viṣaye dṛṣṭastadabhāve cādṛṣṭa ityanitye 'rthe niścayamādadhāti evaṃ śabdo 'pi svārthe tajjātīye na dṛṣṭaḥ  #
analyzed: yathā kṛtaka tva ādi dharmaḥ nitya tva ādau viṣaye dṛṣṭaḥ tad abhāve ca adṛṣṭe iti anitye rthe niścayam ādadhāti evam svārthe tad jātīye na dṛṣṭaḥ
pratipatti hetuḥ bhavati
tasmāt anumānāt abhinnaḥ eva ayam iti
ucyate candra ādiṣu idānīm asādhāraṇa viṣayeṣu kā pratipattiḥ syāt iti
āha avayava apekṣa tvāt candra śabdaḥ hi anekeṣu vacaneṣu vartate
jāti dravya guṇa kriyāsu ca
tathā ḍittha ādi śabdaḥ
tasmāt evaṃjātīyakānām api ca anumānāt abhedaḥ
ucyate svarga ādīnām tarhi katham anumāna tvam iti
āha āpta vacaḥ visaṃvāda sāmarthyāt
yathā hairaṇyaka prabhṛtīnām āptānām vākyam avyabhicāri evam īśvara mahā ṛṣayaḥ ca āptāḥ
tasmāt eṣām api vākyam avyabhicāri iti śakyam atra api sāmānya viṣaya tvam kalpayitum
evam anumānam eva āgamaḥ iti
ucyate yat uktam anvaya vyatirekābhyām adhigama hetu tvāt śabdaḥ numānam iti atra brūmaḥ na
a pratijñānāt
na hi vayam vyavahāra anupātinām vṛkṣa ādīnām āgama tvam ācakṣmahe
kim tarhi svarga ādīnām atyanta parokṣa viṣayāṇām
tasmāt apratijñānāt anupālambhaḥ yam iti
upetya vā vaktra apekṣa tvāt
athavā upetya api sarva śabdānām āgama tvam anumānāt artha antara bhāvam brūmaḥ

original: tathā hi kṛtakatvāditi liṅgaṃ caṇḍālakāpālikairapi prayujyamānaṃ sāhacaryāpekṣaṃ niścayamādadhāti /
analyzed: tathā hi kṛtaka tvāt iti liṅgam caṇḍāla kāpālikaiḥ api prayujyamānam sāhacarya apekṣam niścayam ādadhāti
na vaktṛ viśeṣam apekṣate
vaktṛ viśeṣa apekṣaḥ tu śabdaḥ
tasmāt na liṅgam
kim ca anyat viparyayāt
na hi liṅgam deśa antare viparyeti
śabdasya tu dṛṣṭaḥ viparyayaḥ
saḥ eva hi śabdaḥ deśa antare

original: kālāntare tu svārthaṃ na pratyāyayati arthāntaraṃ ca praśaṃsati /
analyzed: kāla antare tu sva artham na pratyāyayati artha antaram ca praśaṃsati
sambandha anupalabdheḥ iti ced syāt etat
sambandha antaram deśa antare na upalakṣitam
tasmāt śabda artha viparyayaḥ iti
etat anupapannam
liṅga vaidharmyāt

original: na hi pratyakṣābhimatasya liṅgina upalabdhau gavāderliṅgaṃ nopalabhyate /
analyzed: na hi pratyakṣa abhimatasya liṅginaḥ upalabdhau gavādeḥ liṅgam nā upalabhyate
śabdaḥ tu upalabhyamānaḥ gava ādau na upalabhyate
tasmāt na liṅgam
kiṃca anyat
deśa niyamāt
na hi liṅgasya deśa niyamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
asti tu śabdasya deśa niyamaḥ
tat yathā śavatiḥ gati karmā kāmbojeṣu eva bhāṣyate
raṃhatiḥ prācyeṣu
tathā dātiḥ lavana arthaḥ
dātram udīcyeṣu na anyatra
tasmāt na śabdaḥ liṅgam
kiṃca anyat iṣṭataḥ viniyogāt
svābhāvikam liṅgam

original: na hi dhūmognerapakṛṣya śakyate 'psu vāyāvākāśe 'nyatra vā niveśayitum /
analyzed: na hi dhūma ugneḥ apakṛṣya śakyate psu vāyau ākāśe nyatra vā niveśayitum
śabdaḥ tu yatra vaktuḥ abhiprāyaḥ tatra tatra viniveśyate

original: yatha vṛddhyādayaḥ śabdāḥ svārthābhyuccayādiṣu prasiddhā ādaikṣu viniveśyante /
analyzed: vṛddhi ādayaḥ śabdāḥ svārtha abhyuccaya ādiṣu prasiddhāḥ viniveśyante
tasmāt na te liṅgam

original: sarvābhidhānaśaktitvācchabdasyādoṣa iti cet syānmataṃ sarvābhidhānaśaktiḥ śabdaḥ sarvābhidheyaśaktiścārthastayoḥ puruṣavyāpāreṇa śaktyavavacchedaḥ  #
analyzed: sarva abhidhāna śakti tvāt śabdasya adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam sarva abhidhāna śaktiḥ śabdaḥ sarva abhidheya śaktiḥ ca arthaḥ tayoḥ puruṣa vyāpāreṇa śakti avavacchedaḥ
kriyate
katham ayam eva bhavatu
ayam eva ca arthaḥ nena śabdena abhidhīyatām
etāvati puruṣa vyāpāraḥ

original: tasmācchabdasya svābhāvikaḥ sambandho vaktrapekṣayā vyajyata iti /
analyzed: tasmāt śabdasya svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ vaktra apekṣayā vyajyate iti
etat api anyupapannam
kasmāt sutarām anumānāt artha antara tva prasaṃgāt
evam api kalpayitvā anumānāt sutarām śabdasya artha antara tvam āpadyate

original: kasmāt ? na hi yathā vakrapekṣayā sarvārthasya sataḥ śabdasya śaktyavacchedastathā sarvārthaṃ liṅgaṃ vaktrapekṣayārthāntarādavacchidyate /
analyzed: kasmāt na hi yathā vakra apekṣayā sarva arthasya sataḥ śabdasya śakti avacchedaḥ tathā sarva artham liṅgam vakra apekṣayā artha antarāt avacchidyate

original: yathā caikaḥ śabdo jagatyevamuditaḥ puruṣaviniyogāpekṣaḥ sarvamarthamabhidhātuṃ samarthastathaikaṃ liṅgaṃ kayācidyuktyā sarvārthapratyāyanasamartham
analyzed: yathā ca ekaḥ śabdaḥ jagati evam uditaḥ puruṣa viniyoga apekṣaḥ sarvam artham abhidhātum samarthaḥ tathā ekam liṅgam kayācid yuktyā sarva artha pratyāyana samartham
tasmāt na śabdaḥ liṅgam
yat punar etat uktam candra ādīnām avayava apekṣam sāmānyam abhyupagamyate
tat ayuktam
asādhāraṇa tvāt
anumāna abhāve śabda prasiddhaḥ rthaḥ iti vyāghātaḥ
kim ca anyat
jāti ādi sādhya tvāt jāti guṇa dravya kriyāṇām ca parasparataḥ ṛtha antara tvam
samudāyaḥ ca sādhyaḥ
tasmāt ayuktam eṣām tad apekṣayā sāmānya viṣaya tvam
yat api uktam āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt svarga ādi śabdānām anumāna tvam iti
atra brūmaḥ etat api anupapannam
kasmāt pramāṇa viṣaya tvāt
satyam asti eṣām sāmānya parikalpanā

original: sā tu pramāṇaviṣayā na tu prameyaviṣayā /
analyzed: sā tu pramāṇa viṣayā na tu prameya viṣayā
prameyam tu sāmānyam anumānam asya iti ayam abhyupagamaḥ vaḥ
tat ca a sādhāraṇa tvāt svarga ādīnām pratiṣiddham
tasmāt tyajyatām iyam āśaṅkā anumānam eva āgamaḥ iti
anyaḥ punar anumāna āgamayoḥ abheda pratijñaḥ idam āha
svarga ādayaḥ śabdāḥ na pramāṇam
kasmāt pramāṇa antareṇa tad artha anupalabdheḥ

original: yasya hi śabdasyārthaḥ pratyakṣato 'numānato vā nopalabhyate sa na pramāṇam /
analyzed: yasya hi śabdasya arthaḥ pratyakṣataḥ numānataḥ vā na upalabhyate sa na pramāṇam
itaraḥ tu pramāṇam
tat yathā nadyāḥ tīre pakvam āmra vanam
pathi guḍa śakaṭam viparyastam iti
na ca svarga ādi śabdānām arthaḥ pramāṇa antareṇa upalabhyate

original: tasmādyathā vibhurātmā sarvatra sukhādisambhavādityevamādayo bauddhaṃ prati dharmyasiddhatvādayo yathārthāstathā vedaśabdā api prāyeṇeti /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā vibhuḥ ātmā sarvatra sukha ādi sambhavāt iti evamādayaḥ bauddham prati dharmya siddha tva ādayaḥ yathārthāḥ tathā veda śabdāḥ api prāyeṇa iti
etat tu na yukta rūpam
kasmāt anyāyena sarva śabda apavādāt

original: kā hyatra yuktiryadasmadādibhiranupalabhyamānārthaṃ pramāṇabhūtānāmapi vākyamayathārthaṃ syāt ?
analyzed: kā hi atra yuktiḥ yat asmad ādibhiḥ anupalabhyamāna artham pramāṇa bhūtānām api vākyam ayathārtham syāt
saveṇa ca avaśyam kaścid āptaḥ tasya ca vākyam adṛṣṭa artham iti abhyupagantavyam
atas yam tava atrā api samānaḥ prasaṃgaḥ
na ca pramāṇam sva artha siddhaye pramāṇa antaram apekṣate

original: tatra yadi śabdasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ yathārthatvamāśrīyate tena na kevalaṃ svargādayaḥ kiṃ tarhi śabdā evāpramāṇamiti prāptam /
analyzed: tatra yadi śabdasya pramāṇa antara apekṣam yathārtha tvam āśrīyate tena na kevalam svarga ādayaḥ kim tarhi śabdāḥ eva apramāṇam iti prāptam

original: anumānasya ca pramāṇāntaranirapekṣasya gamakatvābhyupagamādāgamasya tato 'rthāntaratvaṃ sutarāṃ prasajyate /
analyzed: anumānasya ca pramāṇa antara nirapekṣasya gamaka tva abhyupagamāt āgamasya tatas ṛtha antara tvam sutarām prasajyate

original: tasmādyuktāgamavirodhina evaṃvidhā nāstikavādāḥ śreyo 'rthibhirdūrādapohyā iti sthitametat- anumānādasiddhaṃ vastu yattadāptāgamātsādhyamiti
analyzed: tasmāt yukta āgama virodhinaḥ evaṃvidhāḥ nāstika vādāḥ śreyaḥ rthibhiḥ dūrāt apohyāḥ iti sthitam etat anumānāt asiddham vastu yat tat āpta āgamāt sādhyam iti

original: evamasya trividhasya pramāṇasyaindriyikaṃ kāraṇāntarato 'nupalabhyamānaṃ ca prameyaṃ vyākhyātam /
analyzed: evam asya trividhasya pramāṇasya aindriyikam kāraṇa antarataḥ nupalabhyamānam ca prameyam vyākhyātam
etasmāt tu yat anyat tat asat iti pratyavagantavyam
kārikā
āha yadi evam pradhānasya asattva prasaṅgaḥ
anupalabdau kāraṇa antara tva anupalabdheḥ
tat hi pratyakṣa aviṣaya tve sati ati dūra ādibhiḥ anupalabdhi kāraṇaiḥ nā upalabhyate
tat na tāvat atidūrāt sāmīpyāt vyavadhānāt ca asya agrahaṇam
kasmāt vibhu tvāt
na indriya ghātāt
avikala indriyaiḥ agrahaṇāt
na manaḥ nava sthānāt
avasthita manobhiḥ agrahaṇāt
na saukṣmyāt
śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām sattva prasaṅgāt
na abhibhavāt
asambhavāt
na samāna abhihārāt ekatvāt
tasmāt kāraṇa antara abhāvataḥ nupalabhyamānasya asattvam icchataḥ pradhānasya api śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām api sattva prasaṅgaḥ
atha etat na iṣyate kāraṇa antaram tarhi anupalabdhau vaktavyam iti

original: ucyate- yattāvaduktaṃ anupalabdhau kāraṇāntarānupapatteḥ pradhānasyāsattvaprasaṅga iti, atrāstu /
analyzed: ucyate yat tāvat uktam anupalabdhau kāraṇa antara anupapatteḥ pradhānasya asattva prasaṅgaḥ iti atra astu
saukṣmyāt tad anupalabdhiḥ na abhāvāt
yat tu uktam śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām api sattva prasaṅgaḥ iti tat ayuktam
kasmāt sādhana upapatteḥ
asti hi pradhānasya saukṣmyāt tad anupalabdhau sādhanam
na śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām
kim tat ucyate
kāryataḥ tad upalabdhiḥ
pradhānasya hi kāryataḥ upalabdhiḥ iti etat upariṣṭāt pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ
na tu śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām kāryam asti
tasmāt viṣamaḥ yam upanyāsaḥ
āha evam api pratijñā antara ānarthakyam
ekena kṛta tvāt
saukṣmyāt tad anupalabdhiḥ iti ukte gamyate etat na abhāvāt iti
tasmāt tat vacanam anarthakam iti
ucyate na vīta avīta parigraha artha tvāt

original: evaṃ siddhe yatpratijñādvayaṃ karoti tat jñāpayatyācāryaḥ vītāvītābhyāmabhipretārthasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: evam siddhe yat pratijñā dvayam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vīta avītābhyām abhipreta artha siddhiḥ
prāk ca saukṣmya atiśayāt tad anupalabdhiḥ iti ācakṣāṇaḥ pratipādayati purastāt vītaḥ iti

original: ekasmiṃśca viṣaye dvau prayuṃjānaḥ samuccayena siddhiṃ dyotayati /
analyzed: ekasmin ca viṣaye dvau prayuṃjānaḥ samuccayena siddhim dyotayati
kim siddham bhavati

original: yaduktaṃ tantrāntarīyaiḥ na pṛthakpratipattihetū vītāvītāviti tadiṣṭamevaṃ saṃgṛhītaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yat uktam tantra antarīyaiḥ na pṛthak pratipatti hetū vīta avītau iti tat iṣṭam evam saṃgṛhītam bhavati
tatra vītasya pratijñā saukṣmyāt tad anupalabdhiḥ
tasya ca avītasya prasaṅgi dharma antara nivṛtti rūpeṇa
na abhāvāt hetuḥ ubhaya yogī
katham yasya pratyakṣataḥ nupalabhyamānasya kāryaḥ tad upalabdhiḥ tasya saukṣmyāt tad anupalabdhiḥ dṛṣṭā
tat yathā indriyāṇi
yadi punar asya abhāvāt anupalabdhiḥ syāt
kāryataḥ nupalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ
asti ca iyam kāryataḥ upalabdhiḥ
tasmāt na abhāvāt
na ced abhāvāt
pariśeṣataḥ saukṣmyāt tad anupalabdhiḥ iti

original: āha, kiṃ punastatkāryaṃ yadbhavānpradhānasyāstitve liṅgamācaṣṭa iti ?
analyzed: āha kim punar tat kāryam yat bhavān pradhānasya astitve liṅgam ācaṣṭe iti
ucyate

original: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
analyzed: mahat ādi tat ca kāryam prakṛti virūpam sarūpam ca

original: taddhi mahadahaṃkārendriyaviśeṣāviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ pradhānena visadṛśaṃ sadṛśaṃ cetyupariṣṭātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tat hi mahat ahaṃkāra indriya viśeṣa aviśeṣa lakṣaṇam kāryam pradhānena visadṛśam sadṛśam ca iti upariṣṭāt pravedayiṣyāmaḥ
āha prastāva abhāvāt ayuktam etat

original: kiṃ punaradhikṛtyedamucyate prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca mahadādi kāryamiti ?
analyzed: kim punar adhikṛtya idam ucyate prakṛti virūpam sarūpam ca mahat ādi kāryam iti
ucyate vyakta avyakta jña vijñānāt mokṣaḥ vā āpyate iti etat prakṛtam

original: etāni ca parasparavaidharmyasādharmyapratipattimantareṇa na śakyāni vijñātumityevamarthamidaṃ prastūyate /
analyzed: etāni ca paraspara vaidharmya sādharmya pratipattim antareṇa na śakyāni vijñātum iti evam artham idam prastūyate
tasmāt na ākasmikaḥ vairūpya sārūpya upanyāsaḥ iti
iti śrī yuktidīpikāyām saptati paddhatau dvitīyam āhnikam
kārikā
āha āstām tāvat vairūpya sārūpya cintā
kāryam idam eva tāvat mahat ādi parīkṣiṣyāmahe
kim prāk utpatteḥ asti na asti iti

original: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet syānmatam- asaṅgatārthaṃ prakaraṇāntaramupakṣipyate bhavatā /
analyzed: kutas saṃśayaḥ iti ced syāt matam asaṅga tā artham prakaraṇa antaram upakṣipyate bhavatā

original: na cāvidyamānasambandhasya saṃśayasya prakaraṇāntare 'bhidhīyamānasya nirṇītiṃ sādhvīmācāryā manyante /
analyzed: na ca avidyamāna sambandhasya saṃśayasya prakaraṇa antare bhidhīyamānasya nirṇītim sādhvīm ācāryāḥ manyante
avakāśa asambhavāt iti
ucyate asti saṃśaya avakāśaḥ
kasmāt ācārya vipratipatteḥ
prāk utpatteḥ kāryam asat iti ācāryāḥ kaṇāda akṣapāda prabhṛtayaḥ manyante
sat asat iti bauddhāḥ
na eva sat na asat iti anye
tasmāt upapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ
tatra idānīm bhavataḥ kā pratipattiḥ iti
ucyate
na a vidyamānasya mahat ādeḥ vikārasya pradhānāt āvirbhāvaḥ iti pratijānīmahe
kasmāt sanniveśa viśeṣa mātra abhyupagamāt

original: na hi naḥ kāraṇādarthāntarabhūtaṃ kāryamutpadyata ityabhyupagamaḥ /

original: kiṃ tarhi viśvātmakānāṃ sattvarajastamasāmapagataviśeṣāviśeṣāḥ sanmātralakṣaṇopacayāḥ pratinivṛttapariṇāmavyāpārāḥ paramavibhāgamupasaṃprāptāḥ  #

sūkṣmāḥ śaktayaḥ

original: etasyāṃ kalpanāyāmasata utpattau kaḥ prasaṅga iti ?
analyzed: etasyām kalpanāyām asataḥ utpattau kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti

original: etenaiva bāhyānāṃ tantvādikāryāṇāṃ paṭādīnāṃ sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvādasata utpattiḥ pratiṣiddhā boddhavyā /

āha a vidyamānam etat
kasmāt asiddhe
na artha antara siddheḥ

original: yadi hi sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvaṃ kāryasya siddhaṃ syādata etadyujyate vaktum- tadabhyupagamādasadutpatteraprasaṅga iti /

tattva siddham
dravya antara bhūtasya avayavinaḥ niṣpatti pratijñānāt

itas ca asat kāryam agrahaṇāt

original: iha śrotrādīnāṃ viṣayabhūtasya tatsannidhānādavaśyaṃ grahaṇena bhavitavyam /

original: iha prāgvyāpāropakramāt kartārastasmātphalamupalipsamānāḥ kāryaviśeṣaniyatasāmārthyaṃ sādhanamupādāya vyāpriyante /
analyzed: iha prāk vyāpāra upakramāt kartāraḥ tasmāt phalam upalipsamānāḥ kārya viśeṣa niyata sāmārthyam sādhanam upādāya vyāpriyante
tat ced prāk api vyāpārāt syāt tad arthasya parispandasya ānarthakyam prāptam
aniṣṭam ca etat
tasmāt kartṛ prayāsa sāphalyāt asatkāryam

original: pariṇāmādyupapatterna doṣa iti cet syānmataṃ kāraṇasya pariṇāmavyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayakṣaṇāndharmān yasmāt kartrādīni kurvanti nānarthakāni  #
analyzed: pariṇāma ādi upapatteḥ na doṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam kāraṇasya pariṇāma vyūha saṃśleṣa vyakti pracaya kṣaṇān dharmān yasmāt kartṛ ādīni kurvanti na anarthakāni
syuḥ
sattvam ca kāryasya na nirupyate
kaḥ evam sati doṣaḥ syāt iti
ucyate na śakyam evam kalpayitum
kasmāt mārga antara anupapatteḥ

original: pariṇāmo hi nāmāvasthitasya dravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttiḥ dharmāntarapravṛttiśca /

evam vyūha ādayaḥ api upasaṃhartavyāḥ
tasmāt pariṇāma ādibhiḥ abhibhavāt kartṛ ādīnām arthavat tvāt asatkāryam
tathā ca uktam

ārambha uparamayoḥ ādi anta aviśeṣa prasaṃgāt

original: yadi satkāryaṃ syāt tena yaḥ kriyārthaḥ sādhanānāmādau parispandaḥ so 'nte 'pi syāt /

original: vā yo 'nte virāmaḥ sa ādāvapi syāt /

na tu tat asti
tasmāt asatkāryam
itas ca asat kāryam utpatti dharmasya ādi antayoḥ aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt

original: yadi satkāryaṃ syāt tena yathā niṣpannasyotpattidharmeṇābhisambandhaḥ tathā ādāvapi syāt /
analyzed: yadi satkāryam syāt tena yathā niṣpannasya utpatti dharmeṇa abhisambandhaḥ tathā ādau api syāt

dṛṣṭaḥ tu abhisambandhaḥ na abhisambandhaḥ ca ādi antayoḥ
tasmāt asatkāryam
itas ca asat kāryam
janma sat śabdayoḥ virodhāt
iha janma śabdaḥ prāc abhūtasya arthasya bhāva kramam āha
sat śabdaḥ tu kriyā antara hetutvam āha
yadi sataḥ janma syāt aikārthyam anayoḥ syāt
na tu etat asti
tasmāt ayuktam sat jāyate iti

original: ucyate- yaduktaṃ dravyāntarabhūtasyāvayavino niṣpattipratijñānānna sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvāt satkāryamityatra brūmaha- tadasiddhiḥ,
analyzed: ucyate yat uktam dravya antara bhūtasya avayavinaḥ niṣpatti pratijñānāt na sanniveśa viśeṣa mātra tvāt satkāryam iti atra brūmaha tad asiddhiḥ
bhedena agrahaṇāt

original: yadi tantvādibhyo dravyāntarabhūtasyāvayavino niṣpattiḥ syāt tena yathā tantukalāpe paṭastatraiva vā paṭāntaramāhitaṃ bhedenopalabhyate tathaivopalabhyeta
analyzed: yadi tantu ādibhyaḥ dravya antara bhūtasya avayavinaḥ niṣpattiḥ syāt tena yathā tantu kalāpe paṭaḥ tatra eva vā paṭa antaram āhitam bhedena upalabhyate tathā eva upalabhyeta
na tu upalabhyate
tasmāt na dravya antaram
samavāyāt agrahaṇam iti ced syāt etat
saṃyoginoḥ dravyayoḥ sati ādhāra ādheya bhāve bhedena grahaṇam bhavati
samavāya lakṣaṇā tu prāptiḥ tantu paṭayoḥ
tasmāt na asti bhedena grahaṇam iti
tat ca anupapannam
kasmāt a siddha tvāt
siddhe sati artha antara bhāve vayavinaḥ tad prāptau ca samavāye sarvam etat syāt
tattva siddham ubhayam
tasmāt ayuktam etat
kiṃca anyat dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt

original: mahāparimāṇaṃ dravyamanyatrāhitaṃ samavāyāt bhedena nopalabhyate ityetasminnarthe paryanuyuktasya kaste dṛṣṭāntaḥ ?
analyzed: mahā parimāṇam dravyam anyatra āhitam samavāyāt bhedena na upalabhyate iti etasmin arthe paryanuyuktasya kaḥ te dṛṣṭāntaḥ
na ca asti anudāhṛtaḥ vādaḥ

original: vyāpte na grahaṇamiti cet syānmatamakāryakāraṇabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ satyapi sambandhe na dravyāntaraṃ vyaśnuta ityato bhedena gṛhyate /
analyzed: vyāpte na grahaṇam iti ced syāt matam akārya kāraṇa bhūtam dravyam sati api sambandhe na dravya antaram vyaśnute iti atas bhedena gṛhyate
tantu paṭayoḥ tu kārya kāraṇa bhūta tvāt vyāptiḥ
tasmāt na asti bhedena grahaṇam iti
etat api ayuktam
kasmāt sādhya tvāt
sati artha antara bhāve vayavi dravya antara vat kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sādhyaḥ samavāyaḥ ca
atas iyam vyāptiḥ syāt
sā ca aprasiddhā iti atas na samyak etat

original: vemādivat iti cet syādetat- yathā satyarthāntarabhāve vemādayo 'vayavinaḥ kāraṇam evaṃ tantavo 'pi /
analyzed: vema ādi vat iti ced syāt etat yathā sati artha antara bhāve vema ādayaḥ vayavinaḥ kāraṇam evam tantavaḥ pi
etat anupapannam
kasmāt anabhyupagamāt
karaṇam vema ādayaḥ paṭasya
na kāraṇam iti ayam abhyupagamaḥ naḥ
tasmāt viṣamaḥ yam dṛṣṭāntaḥ
kim ca anyat
tadvat avyāpti prasaṅgāt
vema ādi vat artha antaram paṭāt tantavaḥ iti evam bruvataḥ tadvat avyāpti prasaṅgaḥ
kim ca anyat
sparśa kriyā mūrti guru tva antaravataḥ tadvati pratighātāt iti
iha sparśa antaravati sparśa antara vat pratīghātaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tat yathā ghaṭasya aśmani
sparśa antaravān ca te paṭaḥ tantubhyaḥ iti atas sya tad vyāpi tvam ayuktam
evam ca kriyā ādayaḥ vaktavyāḥ
tasmāt yuktam etat bhedānām grahaṇāt na avayavī dravya antaram iti
itas ca na avayavī dravya antaram
kṛtsna eka deśa vṛtti anupapatteḥ

original: sa hyavayaveṣu vartamānaḥ kṛtsneṣu vā vartate pratyavayavaṃ vā ?
analyzed: sa hi avayaveṣu vartamānaḥ kṛtsneṣu vā vartate pratyavayavam vā
kim ca atas
tat na tāvat kṛtsneṣu vartate
kasmāt eka deśa grahaṇe grahaṇa abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: yadanekeṣu vartate tasya kṛtsnādhāragrahaṇe sati grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: yat anekeṣu vartate tasya kṛtsna ādhāra grahaṇe sati grahaṇam dṛṣṭam
tat yathā dvi tva ādīnām
evam ca sati viṣāṇa ādi grahaṇe go grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ
kim ca avayava anavasatha aprasaṅgāt
sa hi avayavān vyāpnuvan tad dvi atirekeṇa avayava antara abhāvāt kena vyāpnuyāt
avayava antara abhyupagame ca anavasthā prasaṃgaḥ
kṛtsna eka deśa vṛtti prasaṅgaḥ ca samānaḥ
tasmāt na sarveṣu parisamāpyate
na pratyekam aneka tva prasaṅgāt
aneka ādhāra parisamāptam hi anekam rūpa ādi dṛṣṭam iti
kiṃca anyat śāstra hāneḥ
pratyavayavam parisamāptaḥ vayavi iti etat icchataḥ mūrtimatā avayavena samāna deśaḥ syāt

original: tataśca yacchāstraṃ mūrtimatāmasamānadeśatvamiti tasya vyāghāto 'vayavaparimāṇaṃ ca prāpnoti /
analyzed: tatas ca yat śāstram mūrtimatām asamāna deśa tvam iti tasya vyāghātaḥ vayava parimāṇam ca prāpnoti
na mahat tva ādi parisamāpta tvāt eka dravyam ca prāpnoti

original: tataśca yacchāstraṃ dravyamanekadravyamadravyaṃ vā tasya hāniretāvatā cāsya vṛttirbhavantī bhavet /
analyzed: tatas ca yat śāstram dravyam aneka dravyam adravyam vā tasya hāniḥ etāvatā ca asya vṛttiḥ bhavantī bhavet
sarvathā ca doṣaḥ
tasmāt na avayavī dravya antaram

original: arthāntarāvasthāne 'rthāntarotpattivināśadarśanādanyatvamiti cet syādetat - vidyamāneṣu tantuṣu paṭo na bhavati saṃyogalakṣaṇasya kāraṇāntarasyānutpatteḥ
analyzed: artha antara avasthāne rtha antara utpatti vināśa darśanāt anyatvam iti ced syāt etat vidyamāneṣu tantuṣu paṭaḥ na bhavati saṃyoga lakṣaṇasya kāraṇa antarasya anutpatteḥ
saṃyoga uttara kālam tu bhavati
kāraṇa sāmagryā vidhamāneṣu eva ca tantuṣu vināśam upayāti
vibhāgāt artha antara avasthāne ca artha antara utpatti vināśau dṛṣṭau
tat yathā himavat avasthāne dava agneḥ
tasmāt artha antaram paṭaḥ tantubhyaḥ iti
etat api ayuktam
kasmāt sādhya tvāt
sādhyam tāvat etat kim atra artha antaram utpadyate vinaśyati vā
āhosvit tantuṣu eva samavasthāna viśeṣa apekṣasya paṭa abhidhānasya pravṛti nivṛttī senāvana vat bhavataḥ
tasmāt etat api na avayavinaḥ dravya antara bhāve liṅgam
tatpuruṣa bahuvrīhi dvandva samāsa upapatteḥ anyaḥ iti ced syāt matam
iha artha antara tve sati tatpuruṣaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tat yathā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rāja puruṣaḥ iti
bahuvrīhiḥ ca citraguḥ śabalaguḥ
dvandvaḥ ca plakṣa nyagrodhau iti
asti ca iha api tatpuruṣaḥ tantūnām paṭaḥ
bahuvrīhiḥ ca dṛḍha tantuḥ śukla tantuḥ
dvandvaḥ ca tantu paṭau iti
tasmāt ca avayavi artha antaram
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt anekāntāt
ananya tve pi hi tatpuruṣaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tat yathā senā gajaḥ kānana vṛkṣaḥ iti
bahuvrīhiḥ ca vīra puruṣā matta gajā senā iti
dvandvaḥ tu yadi syāt satyam eva artha antaram avayavī syāt
na tu kaścid paṭa avasthāyām evam prayuṅkte tantu paṭau ānaya iti
tasmāt manoratha mātram etat
etena samākhyā sāmarthya bhedāḥ prayuktāḥ

original: te cāpi cānarthānatve sati senādiṣu dṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: te ca api sati senā ādiṣu dṛṣṭāḥ
tasmāt na avayavī dravya antaram

atra brūmaḥ
etat api ayuktam

yat punar etat uktam kāraṇa antara anabhidhānāt iti etat api anupapannam
kasmāt abhiprāya anavabodhāt

original: yo hi yathā kuṇḍe badarāṇyarthāntarabhūtānyāhitāni tathā kāraṇe kāryamastītyetadācaṣṭe taṃ pratyayamupālambhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yathā kuṇḍe badarāṇi artha antara bhūtāni āhitāni tathā kāraṇe kāryam asti iti etat ācaṣṭe tam pratyayam upālambhaḥ syāt
vayantu aneka śakta dharmiṇaḥ sahakāri śakti antara anugṛhītasya pūrvasyāḥ śakteḥ tirobhāvam uttarasyāḥ ca āvirbhāvam upādadhānāḥ kāraṇam eva kāryam iti anumanyāmahe
tayoḥ tu śaktyoḥ yugapad agrahaṇam
itara itara pratibandha hetu tvāt
vastrasya āyāma vistāravat
kūrma aṅgam iva draṣṭavyam
yathā vastrasya upasaṃhāra pratibandhāt āyāma vistārau na grahaṇa viṣaya tām pratipadyete
sattām vā na jihītaḥ kūrmasya iva aṅgāni

original: tatha tantvādīnāmapi bhāvānāṃ kāraṇābhimatā kāryābhimatā cāvasthā krameṇa vā sthiraśca bhavat tannimittastadgrahaṇāgrahaṇavikalpaḥ /
analyzed: tantu ādīnām api bhāvānām kāraṇa abhimatā kārya abhimatā ca avasthā krameṇa vā sthiraḥ ca bhavat tad nimittaḥ tad grahaṇa agrahaṇa vikalpaḥ
etena kāraṇa grahaṇam pratyuktam
yat api uktam pramāṇa antara nivṛtti prasaṅgāt iti satyam etat
yat tu uktam kriyā guṇa vyapadeśa asambhavāt anumāna abhāvaḥ iti tat anupapannam

kārya kāraṇa pṛthaktva vādinaḥ tad kriyā guṇānām pṛthaktvam anumātum yuktam iti atas tantu avasthāne paṭa kriyā guṇa grahaṇāt anumāna abhāvaḥ iti ayam upālambhaḥ
sa avakāśaḥ syāt

original: asmākantu kāraṇamātrasyaiva saṃghātādākārāntaraparigrahādvā kriyāguṇānāṃ pracitirvyaktiviśeṣo bhavatīti bruvatāmadoṣaḥ /
