original: kiṃ tarhi sādhanānugṛhītasya dharmiṇo dharmāntarasyāvirbhāvaḥ pūrvasya ca tirobhāvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
analyzed: kim tarhi sādhana anugṛhītasya dharmiṇaḥ dharma antarasya āvirbhāvaḥ pūrvasya ca tirobhāvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ
na ca āvirbhāva tirobhāvau utpatti nirodhau

original: vyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayāstu kimasato dharmā uta svato 'santa iti vicāryam /
analyzed: vyūha saṃśleṣa vyakti pracayāḥ tu kim asataḥ dharmāḥ uta svatas santaḥ iti vicāryam
kim ca atas

original: yadi tāvadasato dharmāḥ yathā kasyeti vācyam /
analyzed: yadi tāvat asataḥ dharmāḥ yathā kasya iti vācyam
atha svayam asantaḥ paścāt bhavanti tat api ayuktam
kasmāt anartha antara tvāt
sati artha antara bhāve prāk asantaḥ paścāt upalabhyamānāḥ satkārya vādam nirākuryuḥ
sa ca eṣām artha antara bhāvaḥ na prasiddhaḥ
tasmāt kim atra upapannam
grahaṇa agrahaṇa vikalpe ca uktaḥ parihāraḥ
kim ca anyat
dravya antara utpatti vyāghātāt

original: upetya vaiṣāmutpattiṃ brūmaḥ- yadi hi pariṇāmavyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayamātraṃ kāryamiṣyate yaduktaṃ dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhanta iti tasya  #
analyzed: upetya vā eṣām utpattim brūmaḥ yadi hi pariṇāma vyūha saṃśleṣa vyakti pracaya mātram kāryam iṣyate yat uktam dravyāṇi dravya antaram ārabhante iti tasya
vyāghātaḥ
kasmāt na hi ete bhāvāḥ dravya antaram
tasmāt dinakara kiraṇa pratāpa mūrchitasya iva dāva agni upasarpaṇa doṣaḥ nu tāpāya eva bhavataḥ pratipattiḥ
etena ārambha uparama utpatti aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ janma sat śabdaḥ pratyuktaḥ

original: katham ? ātmabhūtaṃ hi tantūnāṃ paṭākhyaṃ vyūhasthānīyaṃ sanniveśaviśeṣaṃ yadā kārakāṇi
analyzed: katham ātma bhūtam hi tantūnām paṭa ākhyam vyūha sthānīyam sanniveśa viśeṣam yadā kārakāṇi

original: svena svena vyāpāreṇāviṣkurvanti tadā kriyate utpadyate jāyata ityevamādirlokasya
analyzed: svena svena vyāpāreṇa āviṣkurvanti tadā kriyate utpadyate jāyate iti evamādiḥ lokasya
vyavahāraḥ pravartate

original: yadā tu kārakāṇi śaktyantarāvirbhāvātsaṃsthānāntareṇautsukyavartitāmavasthāmupasaṃharanti tadā prāgupalabdhaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vināśaśabdavācyatāṃ  #
analyzed: yadā tu kārakāṇi śakti antara āvirbhāvāt saṃsthāna antareṇa autsukya vartitām avasthām upasaṃharanti tadā prāc upalabdham saṃsthānam vināśa śabda vācya tām
pratipadyate
paramārthataḥ tu na kasyacid utpādaḥ asti na vināśaḥ
yat punar etat uktam janma śabdaḥ prāc abhūtasya arthasya bhāva upakramam āha iti tat api icchā mātram
kasmāt vivādāt

original: sadasadviṣayaṃ janmeti vivāde 'nuṣakte janmaśabdaḥ prāgabhūtasya sadbhāvamācaṣṭa iti brūvato 'nuktasamam /
analyzed: sat asat viṣayam janma iti vivāde nuṣakte janma śabdaḥ prāk abhūtasya sadbhāvam ācaṣṭe iti

original: puruṣādāvadṛṣṭatvādasiddhiriti cet syādetat yadi tarhi kriyate utpadyate jāyata ityeṣorthaḥ sadviṣayaḥ kalpyate,
analyzed: puruṣa ādau adṛṣṭa tvāt asiddhiḥ iti ced syāt etat yadi tarhi kriyate utpadyate jāyate iti eṣaḥ ṛthaḥ sat viṣayaḥ kalpyate
pradhāna puruṣayoḥ api tad prasaṃgaḥ
sat asat aviśeṣāt iti
atas ca vivāda avastham eva etat prakaraṇam iti
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt saṃsthāna viṣaya tvāt

original: yadā bhāvaḥ svato 'narthāntarabhūtaṃ saṃsthānaṃ bhajate tadaite śabdāḥ pravartanta ityuktam /
analyzed: yadā bhāvaḥ svatas nartha antara bhūtam saṃsthānam bhajate tadā ete śabdāḥ pravartante iti uktam

original: dṛṣṭaṃ ca loke tadyathā muṣṭigranthikuṇḍalāni karoti janayatyutpādayati,
analyzed: dṛṣṭam ca loke tat yathā muṣṭi granthi kuṇḍalāni karoti janayati utpādayati
abhivyakta ātmasu ca mūla udaka ādiṣu bhavati utpannam jātam iti

original: ubhayapakṣaprasiddhe tu śaśaviṣāṇādau naite śabdāḥ pravartante /
analyzed: ubhaya pakṣa prasiddhe tu śaśaviṣāṇa ādau na ete śabdāḥ pravartante
tasmāt bhavataḥ eva aniṣṭa prasaṅgaḥ iti uktam ca
yadi asattvam ghaṭa ādīnām utpattau hetuḥ iṣyate
śaśa śṛṅge pi tulya tvāt utpattiḥ te prasajyate
iti siddham satkāryam
itas ca satkāryam
śaktyasya śakya karaṇāt
śakyam idam asya
śaktaḥ ca ayam asya iti ayam niyamaḥ satām dṛṣṭaḥ
tat yathā cakṣuṣaḥ rūpasya

original: āsti cāyaṃ paṭasya vemādīnāṃ ca niyamaḥ /
analyzed: ā asti ca ayam paṭasya vema ādīnām ca niyamaḥ
tasmāt ca satkāryam

original: sahakārivattanniyama iti cet syānmatam yathāpo bījāṅkurasyotpattau samarthā bhavanti na kāṣṭhādagnervā /
analyzed: sahakāri vat tad niyamaḥ iti ced syāt matam yathā āpaḥ bīja aṅkurasya utpattau samarthāḥ bhavanti na kāṣṭhāt agneḥ vā
ubhayam ca tat tāsu ca vidyate
bījāt apām vicchinna tvāt

original: yathā ca sūryaḥ sūryakāntādagnimutpādayituṃ samartho na candrakāntācca pānīyam /
analyzed: yathā ca sūryaḥ sūryakāntāt agnim utpādayitum samarthaḥ na candrakāntāt ca pānīyam
ubhayam tat tatra na vidyate

original: tathā ca tattvādīnāṃ paṭasyaiva śaktiniyamaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tathā ca tattva ādīnām paṭasya eva śakti niyamaḥ syāt

original: na ca paṭasya tantuṣu sattvaṃ syāditi /
analyzed: na ca paṭasya tantuṣu sattvam syāt iti
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt sādhya tvāt
aṃkura ādayaḥ pi kāryam ap ādīnām
atas sādhyam
kim aṅkuraḥ sti atha na asti eva
tathā sūryakānte gniḥ
tad artham eva ca ayam vivādaḥ anuṣaktaḥ

original: yattūktamapāṃ vicchinnavānna tāsvaṅkuro 'stīti tatrāpi yāsāmapāṃ bījānupraveśadaṅkurabhāvena vipariṇāmastābhyastasyānanyatvaṃ sādhyam /
analyzed: yat tu uktam apām vicchinnavān na tāsu aṅkuraḥ sti iti tatra api yāsām apām bīja anupraveśa daṅkura bhāvena vipariṇāmaḥ tābhyaḥ tasya ananya tvam sādhyam
atas na kiṃcid etat
kim ca anyat
rūpa vyavasthānāt ca

original: tadyathā vijñānotpattihetutve sati na rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nedānīṃ tatsāmānyāt rūpamapyarūpaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat yathā vijñāna utpatti hetu tve sati na rūpam dṛṣṭam iti na idānīm tad sāmānyāt rūpam api arūpam bhavati

original: evaṃ paṭakāraṇatvādvemādayo na paṭa iti nedānīṃ tantavopyapaṭaḥ /
analyzed: evam paṭa kāraṇa tvāt vema ādayaḥ na paṭaḥ iti nā idānīm tantavaḥ api apaṭaḥ
tasmāt yuktam etat śaktasya śakya karaṇāt satkāryam
kāraṇa bhāvāt ca satkāryam
iha asati kārye kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na asti
tat yathā vandhyāyāḥ
asti ca iha kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tantu paṭayoḥ tasmāt satkāryam

original: kāraṇāntarātkāryotpattidarśanādanyatra tadbuddhiriti cet syānmataṃ prākkāraṇāntarātkāryāntarasyāsata utpattimupalabhya paścātkāraṇāntare kāraṇabuddhirbhavatīti
analyzed: kāraṇa antarāt kārya utpatti darśanāt anyatra tad buddhiḥ iti ced syāt matam prāk kāraṇa antarāt kārya antarasya asataḥ utpattim upalabhya paścāt kāraṇa antare kāraṇa buddhiḥ bhavati iti
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt anabhyupagamāt
asataḥ kāryasya utpattiḥ eva na siddhā śaśaviṣāṇa ādiṣu asiddha tvāt
kutas punar tad nimitta ākāra buddhiḥ
kāraṇa bhāvāt iti ced syāt etat
asattva aviśeṣe pi paṭasya kāraṇam samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta lakṣaṇam asti
tasmāt paṭaḥ ucyate
na śaśaviṣāṇasya iti
etat ca ayuktam
kutas hetu abhāvāt

original: asattvāviśeṣe 'pi paṭasya kāraṇamasti na śaśaviṣāṇasyetyatra heturanuktaḥ /
analyzed: asattva aviśeṣe pi paṭasya kāraṇam asti na śaśa viṣāṇasya iti atra hetuḥ anuktaḥ
puruṣa vat iti ced syāt etat

original: yathā tulyatve sattve paṭasya kāraṇamasti na puruṣasya,
analyzed: yathā tulya tve sattve paṭasya kāraṇam asti na puruṣasya
evam asattve paṭasya saṃsthānam na śaśa viṣāṇasya iti etat api ayuktam
kasmāt ukta tvāt
saṃsthānam kāryam paṭasya
saṃsthānam na puruṣasya iti uktam prāk

original: saṃsthānavattadviśeṣa iti cet syānmataṃ yathā sattvāviśeṣe paṭaḥ saṃsthānaṃ na puruṣa evamasattvāviśeṣe paṭaḥ kāryaṃ na śaśaviṣāṇamiti /
analyzed: saṃsthāna vat tad viśeṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam yathā sattva aviśeṣe paṭaḥ saṃsthānam na puruṣaḥ evam asattva aviśeṣe paṭaḥ kāryam na śaśaviṣāṇam iti
etat api ayuktam
kasmāt sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvāt
sāmānyasya hi viśeṣa parigrahaḥ saṃsthānam
na tu ayam asti cetanā śaktau vikalpaḥ
tasmāt na puruṣaḥ saṃsthānam
asataḥ tu nirātmaka tvāt viśeṣaḥ durupapādaḥ

original: tadupapattau vā sattvaprasaṃga iti / āha ca-
analyzed: tad upapattau vā sattva prasaṃgaḥ iti āha ca
nirātmaka tvāt asatām sarveṣām aviśiṣṭa tā
viśeṣaṇam ced bhinnam te sattvam abhyupagamyatām
tasmāt yuktam etat kāraṇa bhāvāt ca satkāryam
evam tāvat vaiśeṣika matena asatkārya vādaḥ na vimarda sahaḥ
bauddha pakṣe tu bhūyān doṣaḥ
katham tarhi dravya antaram paṭaḥ na iṣyate

original: “tantuṣveva tathāstheṣu paṭa ityādibuddhayaḥ” ityevamādinā nyāyenāvayavipratiṣedhātsaṃyogo 'pi na saṃyogibhyasteṣāmarthāntaramiṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: tantuṣu eva tathāstheṣu paṭaḥ ityādi buddhayaḥ iti evamādinā nyāyena avayavi pratiṣedhāt saṃyogaḥ pi na saṃyogibhyaḥ teṣām artha antaram iṣṭaḥ

original: tatraitāvatī parikalpanā syāt- yaduta tantusaṃyogo vā paṭaḥ,
analyzed: tatra etāvatī parikalpanā syāt yat uta tantu saṃyogaḥ vā paṭaḥ
saṃyoga kāraṇam vā dravya antaram
ubhayam ca teṣām na artha antaram
atha utpatti vināśau kasya api iti māyākāra ceṣṭitam
tat api citrataraḥ yam upanyāsaḥ
kāṇādānām tu dravya antara uttpati vināśa abhyupagamāt na tārkika sadṛśaḥ vicāraḥ
tasmāt pāramarṣaḥ eva pakṣaḥ jyāyān

original: yathā cāsatkāryaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā caśabdātsadasatkāryamapi /
analyzed: yathā ca asat kāryam na saṃbhavati tathā caśabdāt sat asat kāryam api
paraspara virodhāt na eva sat na asat iti eke
etat api anupapannam

original: kasmāt ? sattve hetvabhidhānānniścitaḥ prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya sadbhāvaḥ // 9 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: kasmāt sattve hetu abhidhānāt niścitaḥ prāk utpatteḥ kāryasya sadbhāvaḥ
kārikā
prakṛtam idānīm vakṣyāmaḥ
kim ca prakṛtam

original: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ceti vacanādvairūpyam /
analyzed: mahat ādi tat ca kāryam prakṛti virūpam sarūpam ca iti vacanāt vairūpyam
āha prāk sārūpya grahaṇam
sukha pratipatti hetu tvāt

original: adhigatasārūpyasya hi sukhaṃ vairūpyasya pratipattirbhavatīti prāksārūpyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam /
analyzed: adhigata sārūpyasya hi sukham vairūpyasya pratipattiḥ bhavati iti prāk sārūpya grahaṇam kartavyam

original: yathā tantrāntarīyāṇāṃ sadanityaṃ dravyavatkāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavaditi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmaviśeṣasāmānyamuktvā
analyzed: yathā tantra antarīyāṇām sat anityam dravyavat kāryam kāraṇam sāmānya viśeṣa vat iti dravya guṇa karmaṇām aviśeṣa sāmānyam uktvā
dravyāṇi dravya antaram ārabhante guṇāḥ ca guṇa antaram iti evamādiḥ viśeṣaḥ bhidhīyate
ucyate tad anupapattiḥ
aviśeṣāt
yathā eva adhigata sārūpyasya laghīyasī vairūpya pratipattiḥ evam adhigata vairūpyasya laghīyasī sārūpya pratipattiḥ
kasmāt paraspara apekṣa tvāt
vairūpya apekṣam hi sārūpyam
sārūpya apekṣam ca vairūpyam iti
āha evam api vairūpyasya prāk abhidhāne prayojana vacanam
dvayoḥ aviśeṣe nyatarasya prāk abhidhāne niyama hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ iti
ucyate na vairūpyasya prakaraṇa anaṅga bhāvāt

original: vicchinnaṃ hi vairūpyamatastatpūrvamabhidhāya prakaraṇāṅgaṃ sārūpyaṃ sukhamabhidhātumityevamarthamācāryeṇaivaṃ kriyate /
analyzed: vicchinnam hi vairūpyam atas tat pūrvam abhidhāya prakaraṇa aṅgam sārūpyam sukham abhidhātum iti evam artham ācāryeṇa evam kriyate

original: kathaṃ sārūpyasya prakaraṇāṅgatvamiti cet traiguṇyābhidhānadvāreṇa guṇalakṣaṇopadeśāt /
analyzed: katham sārūpyasya prakaraṇa aṅga tvam iti ced traiguṇya abhidhāna dvāreṇa guṇa lakṣaṇa upadeśāt
tad siddhau ca aviveki ādīnām vyakta siddheḥ
kāraṇa guṇa ātmaka tvāt ca kāryasya pradhāne traiguṇya ādi pratipatteḥ
kārya kāraṇa bhāva asandehāt ca pradhāna astitva prasiddhi apadeśāt tad siddhau ca bhogyasya
bhoktṛ apekṣa tvāt puruṣa siddheḥ adhigata bhoktṛ bhogyasya tad saṃyogasya ca sukha pratipādya tvāt tādarthyāt ca
tattva bhūta bhāva sargāṇām
tasmāt yuktam etat prakaraṇa aṅga tvāt sārūpyam paścāt nirdiśyate
tad asambandhāt itarat prāk iti

original: āha- yadi tarhi bhavānprāgvairūpyābhidhānaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyate tadvaktavyaṃ kiṃ punaridaṃ vairūpyamiti /
analyzed: āha yadi tarhi bhavān prāk vairūpya abhidhānam nyāyyam manyate tat vaktavyam kim punar idam vairūpyam iti
ucyate
hetumat anityam avyāpi sa kriyam anekam āśritam liṅgam

nityam dhruvam
na nityam anityam

saha kriyayā sa kriyam
anekam bhinnam
āśritam ādheyam
liṅgam tat lakṣaṇa upapannam
avayūyante iti avayavāḥ
pṛthak upalabhyante iti arthaḥ
saha avayavaiḥ sa avayavam
paratantram anya adhīnam

original: ete hetumadādayaḥ paratantrāntā nirapavādāḥ vyaktasyāsādhāraṇā pradhānapuruṣābhyāṃ dharmāḥ /
analyzed: ete hetumat ādayaḥ paratantra antāḥ nirapavādāḥ vyaktasya asādhāraṇā pradhāna puruṣābhyām dharmāḥ
āha hetumat iti aviśeṣaḥ sarvatra sadbhāvāt

original: vyaktāvyaktapuruṣāṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ heturastīti aviśeṣa evāyaṃ paṭhitavyaḥ /
analyzed: vyakta avyakta puruṣāṇām hi sarveṣām hetuḥ asti iti aviśeṣaḥ eva ayam paṭhitavyaḥ
ucyate na kāraka parigrahāt

original: yadyapi vyaktāvyaktapuruṣāṇāmaviśiṣṭaṃ hetumattvaṃ tathāpi viśiṣṭasya kārakasya hetoḥ parigrahaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api vyakta avyakta puruṣāṇām aviśiṣṭam hetumat tvam tathā api viśiṣṭasya kārakasya hetoḥ parigraham kariṣyāmaḥ

original: sa ca vyaktasyaiva nānyasyeti nāyamaviśeṣo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: sa ca vyaktasya eva na anyasya iti na ayam aviśeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati
āha tad anupapattiḥ
viśeṣa anupādānāt
hetuḥ iti sāmānya śabdaḥ yam

original: sāmānyaśabdāśca nārthaprakaraṇaśabdāntarābhisambandhamantareṇa viśeṣe 'vatiṣṭhanta iti viśeṣa upādeyaḥ syāt /
analyzed: sāmānya śabdāḥ ca na artha prakaraṇa śabda antara abhisambandham antareṇa viśeṣe vatiṣṭhante iti viśeṣaḥ upādeyaḥ syāt
sa tu na upādīyate
tasmāt te aviśeṣāḥ eva iti
ucyate na sarva sambhavinaḥ bhidhānasya prakarṣa artha tvāt

original: iha yaḥ sarvasaṃbhavī dharma ekaviṣaya upādīyate tasmātprakarṣo vijñāyate /
analyzed: iha yaḥ sarva saṃbhavī dharmaḥ eka viṣayaḥ upādīyate tasmāt prakarṣaḥ vijñāyate

original: tadyathā bhoktā māṇavaka ityukte sarveṣāṃ bhoktṛtvasya saṃbhavādevaṃ vijñāyate prakarṣeṇāyaṃ bhokteti,
analyzed: tat yathā bhoktā māṇavakaḥ iti ukte sarveṣām bhoktṛ tvasya saṃbhavāt evam vijñāyate prakarṣeṇa ayam bhoktā iti
evam iha api sarva sambhavi iti āha ācāryaḥ vyaktam hetumat iti
tena vayam asmāt prakarṣam vijñāsyāmaḥ
kaḥ ca prakarṣaḥ
kāraka jñāpakayoḥ ubhayoḥ api sambhave kārakasya eva grahaṇam
anitya śabda sambandhāt vā
athavā ayam ācāryaḥ hetumat iti uktvā anityam iti paṭhati
śabda antara abhisambandhāt
yaḥ nitya sahacaraḥ hetuḥ tasya iha grahaṇam gamyate
kaḥ ca anitya sahacaraḥ hetuḥ kārakaḥ
āha evam api anupapannam etat
kasmāt ubhayatra tad saṃbhavāt

original: utpādyavyaṅgyayorhi vināśaṃ paṭādiṣu dṛṣṭatvāt avyabhicārāttantrāntarīyā manyante /
analyzed: utpādya vyaṅgyayoḥ hi vināśam paṭa ādiṣu dṛṣṭa tvāt avyabhicārāt tantra antarīyāḥ manyante
tasya vā parihāraḥ vaktavyaḥ
na vā vaktavyaḥ viśeṣe sthitiḥ asti iti
ucyate na ekānta vāda prasaṅgāt
sarveṇa hi vādinā avaśyam kiṃcid nityam abhyupagantavyam

original: antato vināśe 'pi na kaścidarthaḥ śabdabuddhibhyāṃ na vyajyate /
analyzed: antatas vināśe na kaścid arthaḥ śabda buddhibhyām na vyajyate
tathā sati ekāntavādaḥ yam syāt
sa ca yuktimadbhiḥ na iṣyate

original: tathā ca saṃskṛtamapyevaṃ kalpyamāne vināśi syāt /
analyzed: tathā ca saṃskṛtam api evam kalpyamāne vināśi syāt
tasmāt utpādya vyaṅgyayoḥ vināśam tisāhasam
āha anitya tva anupapattiḥ satkārya vāda abhyupagamāt

original: yathaiva hi nāsata utpattirastyevaṃ sato 'pi vināśena na bhavitavyam /
analyzed: yathā eva hi na asataḥ utpattiḥ asti evam vināśena na bhavitavyam

original: atha sato 'pi vināśo 'bhyupagamyate tena pralayakāle vinaṣṭānāṃ tattvādīnāṃ praścādasatāmutpattiḥ satkāryavādaṃ nirākuryāt /
analyzed: atha sataḥ pi vināśaḥ abhyupagamyate tena pralaya kāle vinaṣṭānām tattva ādīnām praścāt asatām utpattiḥ satkārya vādam nirākuryāt
tasmāt anityam vyaktam iti ayuktam
ucyate na vyakti apagama pratijñānāt
sadā vayam sataḥ vināśam ācakṣāṇāḥ na
satkārya vādam pratyācakṣīmahi

original: kāraṇānāṃ tu yaḥ parasparaṃ saṃsargāt saṃsthānaviśeṣaparigrahastasya virodhiśaktyantarāvirbhavādvyaktistirodhīyata ityetad vināśaśabdena vivakṣitam
analyzed: kāraṇānām tu yaḥ parasparam saṃsargāt saṃsthāna viśeṣa parigrahaḥ tasya virodhi śakti antara āvirbhavāt vyaktiḥ tirodhīyate iti etat vināśa śabdena vivakṣitam

original: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti- “tadetat trailokyaṃ vyakterapaiti,
analyzed: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti tat etat trailokyam vyakteḥ apaiti
na sattvāt apetam api asti vināśa pratiṣedhāt
a saṃsargāt ca asya saukṣmyam saukṣmyāt ca anupalabdhiḥ tasmāt vyakti apagamaḥ vināśaḥ

original: sa tu dvividhaḥ- ā sargapralayāt tattvānāṃ kiñcitkālāntarāvasthānāditareṣām” iti /
analyzed: sa tu dvividhaḥ ā sarga pralayāt tattvānām kiñcid kāla antara avasthānāt itareṣām iti
āha ayuktam etat
kasmāt vipratipatteḥ
sarvam eva kṣaṇikam buddhi bodhyam ākāśa nirodha varjitam iti śākyaputrīyāḥ pratipannāḥ

original: teṣāṃ pratiṣedho vaktavyo vā na vaktavyaṃ dvividhamanityamiti /
analyzed: teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ vā na vaktavyam dvividham anityam iti
ucyate na hetu anupagamāt
pratikṣaṇam ucchidyate trailokyam iti atra liṅgam abhiyuktāḥ api na upalabhāmahe
tasmāt na etat asmākam buddhau avatiṣṭhate iti
āha ante kṣaya darśanāt
iha yasya ante kṣayaḥ tasya kṣaṇika tvam dṛṣṭam
tat yathā pradīpa jvālā buddhi śabdānām

original: asti cānte kṣayaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ tasmāt kṣaṇikāḥ ucyante /
analyzed: asti ca ante kṣayaḥ saṃskārāṇām tasmāt kṣaṇikāḥ ucyante
tad anupapattiḥ
sādhya tvāt
iha tu siddhena atideśaḥ bhavati
tat yathā gavā gavayasya
na tu pradīpa jvālā buddhi śabdānām kṣaṇika tvam prasiddham
atas na kiñcid etat
āha na etat aprasiddham
kasmāt vṛddhi adarśanāt

original: yadi hi avinaṣṭāyāṃ jvālāyāmindhanāntarāle jvālāntaramutpadyeta vṛddhirapi syāt,
analyzed: yadi hi a vinaṣṭāyām jvālāyām indhana antarāle jvālā antaram utpadyeta vṛddhiḥ api syāt
na tu dṛśyate
tasmāt anavasthitā pradīpa jvālā
kiñca āśraya abhāvāt

original: yadāśrayā jvālotpattistadutpadyamānaivāsau niruṇaddhīti na yuktamasyā vināśrayeṇāvasthātum /
analyzed: yad āśrayā jvālā utpattiḥ tad utpadyamānā eva asau niruṇaddhi iti na yuktam asyāḥ vinā āśrayeṇa avasthātum
upayukta indhanāyāḥ api avasthāna prasaṅgāt
kiñca āvaraṇa upari pātena prabhā bheda prasaṅgāt
jvālānām avasthānam icchataḥ upariṣṭāt āvaraṇa upanipātāt prabhāyāḥ tantoḥ iva dvaidhīkaraṇam syāt
aniṣṭat ca etat
tasmāt na dīpe jvālānām avasthitiḥ asti iti
etena śabdaḥ pi pratyuktaḥ

original: katham ? tasyāpi yadi vināśo na syāt,
analyzed: katham tasya api yadi vināśaḥ na syāt
druta pavana ambu dhārā abhighātāt pratikṣaṇam apūrva śabda āvirbhāvāt pūrva śabda vināśāt ca vṛddhiḥ syāt
adṛṣṭā ca asau
kiñca pratyakṣataḥ upalabdheḥ

original: pāṇyupaghātajo hi śabda utpatterūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti pratyakṣasiddham /
analyzed: pāṇi upaghāta jaḥ hi śabdaḥ utpatteḥ ūrdhvam na bhavati iti pratyakṣa siddham
abhivyaktiḥ iti ced na
niyama adarśanāt
śabdānām vācya vaktṛ bheda bhinnānām kāraṇa niyamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
na ca etat asti samāna indriya grāhyāṇām
kiñca pṛthak śruteḥ
abhivyakti kāraṇa deśāt ca pṛthak śrūyate śabdaḥ
na ca etat abhivyaṅgyānām ghaṭa ādīnām dṛṣṭam iti
kṣaṇika buddheḥ tu prāk eva uktāḥ nāśa hetavaḥ

original: tatra yaduktaṃ sādhyatvāt pradīpajvālābuddhiśabdādīnāṃ kṣaṇikatvasya na saṃskārāḥ kṣaṇikā ityetadayuktam /
analyzed: tatra yat uktam sādhya tvāt pradīpa jvālā buddhi śabda ādīnām kṣaṇika tvasya na saṃskārāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ iti etat ayuktam
ucyate yat uktam vṛddhi adarśanāt iti
atra brūmaḥ ayuktam etat
kasmāt viśeṣa pratipatteḥ
kṣaṇikam iti ukta parimāṇaḥ yam kāla nirdeśaḥ āśrīyate
vṛddhi abhāva ādibhyaḥ ca kadācid vināśa mātram pratīyate

original: sa tu vināśa ekakṣaṇamavasthitānāṃ jvālānāṃ bhavati na punaḥ kṣaṇadvayamityetadapramāṇakamājñāmātrañca gṛhītaśikṣākaḥ kaḥ pratipattumutsaheta
analyzed: sa tu vināśaḥ eka kṣaṇam avasthitānām jvālānām bhavati na punar kṣaṇa dvayam iti etat apramāṇakam ājñā mātram ca gṛhīta śikṣākaḥ kaḥ pratipattum utsaheta
yat tu uktam āvaraṇa upanipātāt prabhā bheda prasaṅgaḥ iti
etat api ayuktam
kasmāt ubhayathā anupapatteḥ

original: kiṃ tāvadyasya dvaidhībhāvo dṛṣṭastadakṣaṇikamāhosvid yasya na dṛṣṭastat kṣaṇikamiti /
analyzed: kim tāvat yasya dvaidhībhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tat akṣaṇikam āhosvit yasya na dṛṣṭaḥ tat kṣaṇikam iti

original: kiñcātaḥ ? tadyadi tāvadevamabhyupagamyate yasya dvaidhībhāvastadakṣaṇikamiti tantorakṣaṇikatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: kiñca atas tat yadi tāvat evam abhyupagamyate yasya dvaidhībhāvaḥ tat akṣaṇikam iti tantoḥ akṣaṇika tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: atha mataṃ yasya dvaidhīkaraṇaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tat kṣaṇikamiti yathā kimatrodāharaṇam /
analyzed: atha matam yasya dvaidhīkaraṇam na dṛṣṭam tat kṣaṇikam iti yathā kim atra udāharaṇam
kutas yasmāt na hi anudāhṛtaḥ vādaḥ
etena śabda vṛddhiḥ pratyuktā
yat punar etat uktam pāṇi upaghāta ja śabda anavasthānāt iti
tatra bhavatā evā uktam vyaṅgya tvāt iti

original: yattūktaṃ niyamadarśanānna vyaṅgyaḥ śabda iti tadayuktam, anekāntāt /
analyzed: yat tu uktam niyama darśanāt na vyaṅgyaḥ śabdaḥ iti tat ayuktam anekāntāt
yathā śukla kṛṣṇau niyamatas śukla kṛṣṇa śabdābhyām pratyāyyete
na ca tau tayoḥ na vyaṅgyau
evam śabdasya api vakti a vādi niyamaḥ syāt
na ca a vyaṅgyaḥ syāt
yat api uktam vyaṅgya vyañjakayoḥ deśa bheda anupapatteḥ na vyaṅgyaḥ śabdaḥ iti
tat api ayuktam
kasmāt cakṣuḥ vat tad siddheḥ

original: tadyathā- cakṣuṣo rūpasya ca deśabhede 'pi vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: tat yathā cakṣuṣaḥ rūpasya ca deśa bhede vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāvaḥ
evam śabdasya api syāt
tasmāt na śabdaḥ api kṣaṇikaḥ

original: buddhestu svādhikāra eva kṣaṇikatve heturiti karaṇo (kāraṇam ?) vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: buddheḥ tu sva ādhikāraḥ eva kṣaṇika tve hetuḥ iti kāraṇam vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tatra yaduktamante kṣayadarśanāt pradīpajvālābuddhiśabdavat kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārā ityetadayuktamiti /
analyzed: tatra yat uktam ante kṣaya darśanāt pradīpa jvālā buddhi śabda vat kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārāḥ iti etat ayuktam iti

original: āha- itastarhi pradīpādīnāmanyeṣāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatvam /
analyzed: āha itas tarhi pradīpa ādīnām anyeṣām ca bhāvānām kṣaṇika tvam
kutas anavasthāna hetu abhāvāt

original: naṣṭaścedartho 'bhyupagamyate nanu prāptamidamutpannamātrasyāsya vināśavighno nāstīti kauṭasthyaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ prāptamiti /
analyzed: naṣṭaḥ ced arthaḥ bhyupagamyate nanu prāptam idam utpanna mātrasya asya vināśa vighnaḥ na asti iti kauṭasthyam sarva bhāvānām prāptam iti
ucyate na kāraṇa upapatteḥ
adhikāraḥ hi sarva bhūtānām saṃskāra vaśāt utpattiḥ tad avasthānam eva
teṣām alam sthitaye

original: sati vinaśvaratve saṃskāropayoge tu sthityapabhraṃśa ityato 'sti kiñcitkālamavasthānaṃ bhāvānām /
analyzed: sati vinaśvara tve saṃskāra upayoge tu sthiti apabhraṃśaḥ iti atas sti kiñcid kālam avasthānam bhāvānām
na ca kauṭasthya prasaṅgaḥ
kiñca anyat santati vināśa prasaṅgāt
naṃṣṭuḥ ced utpatti samanantaram vināśaḥ iṣyate
santatiḥ api ante kṣaya darśanāt naṃṣṭrī
tasyāḥ api tathā eva vināśaḥ prāptaḥ
tatas ca taḍit vilasita vat kṣaṇa dṛṣṭa naṣṭasya trailokyasya abhāve saṃsāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ
tasmāt ayuktam naṃṣṭuḥ utpatti sama kālam eva vināśaḥ iti

original: kāraṇāvasthānāt na doṣa iti cet- syānmatam,
analyzed: kāraṇa avasthānāt na doṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam
asti kāraṇam pūrva utpannaḥ bhāvaḥ uttarasya utpattau
sa ca api uttarasya
iti evam santateḥ anucchedaḥ virodhi bhāva antara saṃsargāt tu ubhayatas tathā utpatteḥ bhraṃśaḥ iti
etat api ayuktam
kasmāt pūrva hetu tyāgāt

original: prāguktaṃ yena naṃṣṭavyamasau mantrauṣadhaprayogairapi kṣaṇādūrddhvaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: prāk uktam yena naṃṣṭavyam asau mantra auṣadha prayogaiḥ api kṣaṇāt ūrddhvam na avatiṣṭhate

original: sāmprataṃ tu naṃṣṭrī santatiḥ kāraṇavaśādeva tiṣṭhatīti so 'yaṃ pūrvahetutyāgaḥ /
analyzed: sāmpratam tu naṃṣṭrī santatiḥ kāraṇa vaśāt eva tiṣṭhati iti saḥ yam pūrva hetu tyāgaḥ
vināśa hetu abhāvāt kṣaṇika tvam iti ced
syāt etat na asti bhāvānām vināśa hetoḥ upalambhaḥ iti
atas svābhāvikaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ
tasmāt utpatti sama kālam asau kena vāryate
idam api ayuktam
kasmāt anabhyupagamāt
kaḥ hi etat avamaṃsyati ahetukaḥ vināśaḥ
kim tarhi prāk evā uktam artha vaśāt bhāvānām sthitiḥ bhavati iti
vināśasya vināśa prasaṅgāt ayuktam iti ced
yadi tarhi abhāvaḥ hetumān parikalpyate
prāptam asya api ghaṭa vat vināśi tvam
aniṣṭam ca etat
tasmāt ahetukaḥ vināśaḥ iti etat ayuktam
kasmāt vyakti apagama pratijñānāt
bhāva vināśinam prati satyam eva ayam upālambhaḥ syāt
vyakti apagamaḥ tu no vināśaḥ

original: sa tu hetumattvena kathaṃ virotsyata iti /
analyzed: sa tu hetumat tvena katham virotsyate iti
tasmāt na vināśa hetu abhāvāt kṣaṇikam saṃskṛtam iti
itas ca na kṣaṇikam
kasmāt a grahaṇa prasaṅgāt
iha asataḥ grahaṇam dṛṣṭam
tat yathā dvitīyasya śirasaḥ

original: kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca te ghaṭādayo na bhavanti /
analyzed: kṣaṇāt ūrdhvam ca te ghaṭa ādayaḥ na bhavanti

original: tatsadṛśotpatteradoṣa iti cet syādetat - utpattisamakālaṃ nirodhe 'pi ghaṭasyānyasya tādṛśasyotpattirbhavati,
analyzed: tad sadṛśa utpatteḥ adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt etat utpatti sama kālam nirodhe pi ghaṭasya anyasya tādṛśasya utpattiḥ bhavati
tad nirodhe nyasya iti evam avicchedena
grahaṇam bhavati
jvālā nadī srotaḥ nu sandhānavat iti
etat api ayuktam
kutas kāraṇa abhāvāt

original: syādetadevaṃ yadi tadānīṃ sadṛśotpattau kāraṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: syāt etat evam yadi tadānīm sadṛśa utpattau kāraṇam syāt
na tu tat asti
prāk eva nirodhāt
tasmāt asat etat
pūrva utpannasya kāraṇa bhāvāt tad siddhiḥ iti ced na
iha upādānāt mṛd piṇḍaka saṃjñakāt loke ghaṭa niṣpattiḥ prasiddhā
na ca mṛd piṇḍaḥ
kiñca krama anupalabdheḥ
iha śibikā ādīnām anukrameṇa ghaṭa utpattiḥ upalabhyate
na ca anukramaḥ sti
kiñca kāraka sāmagrī ābhavāt
iha kumbhakāra daṇḍa cakra sūtra upala sāmagryāt ghaṭa niṣpattiḥ prasiddhā
na ca asti eṣām tatra sambhavaḥ
kiñca tad utpādya antara utpādyasya aniṣpatteḥ

original: iha ghaṭād ghaṭe nirvṛttirna prasiddhā loke /
analyzed: iha ghaṭāt ghaṭe nirvṛttiḥ na prasiddhā loke

original: buddhiśabdavaditi cet syādetat yathā buddhirbuddhyantaraṃ sadṛśaṃ sūte,
analyzed: buddhi śabda vat iti ced syāt etat yathā buddhiḥ buddhi antaram sadṛśam sūte
śabdaḥ ca śabda antaram evam ghaṭāt ghaṭa niṣpattiḥ bhavati iti
etat api asat

original: kasmāt ? siddhaṃ hi buddherbuddhyantaraṃ śabdācca śabdāntaraṃ jāyata ityetadapyasmākaṃ prasiddham /
analyzed: kasmāt siddham hi buddheḥ buddhi antaram śabdāt ca śabda antaram jāyate iti etat api asmākam prasiddham

original: tatra yaduktaṃ sadṛśotpatteḥ so 'yamiti grahaṇamavicchinnaṃ kṣaṇikatve 'pi bhāvānāmityetadayuktam /
analyzed: tatra yat uktam sadṛśa utpatteḥ saḥ yam iti grahaṇam avicchinnam kṣaṇika tve pi bhāvānām iti etat ayuktam
kiñca anyat
kārya utpatti kāle kāraṇa nivṛtteḥ

original: yadā na kāraṇamasti na tadā kāryamutpadyate dvayorghaṭayoryugapadupalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: yadā na kāraṇam asti na tadā kāryam utpadyate dvayoḥ ghaṭayoḥ yugapad upalabdhi prasaṅgāt

original: yadā tu kāryamutpadyate tadā kāraṇaṃ niruddhamiti nirbījaḥ pradurbhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
analyzed: yadā tu kāryam utpadyate tadā kāraṇam niruddham iti nirbījaḥ pradurbhāvaḥ prāpnoti
aniṣṭam ca etat
satata utpatti prasaṃgāt

original: anutpanne hetusāmarthyādadoṣa iti cet syāttadanutpanne kārye kāraṇena prayojanam /
analyzed: anutpanne hetu sāmarthyāt adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt tat anutpanne kārye kāraṇena prayojanam
utpanne tad vyāpāra ānarthakyāt
asti ca anutpanne kārye kāraṇam
atas na nirbījaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ iti
etat api ayuktam
kasmāt abhāve pi tad utpatti prasaṅgāt

original: aṃga tāvat aṇuśo vibhajyatāmagnau vā kṣipyantām,
analyzed: aṃga tāvat aṇuśas vibhajyatām agnau vā kṣipyantām
tantavaḥ tadā api prasiddha vināśānām abhūvan iti śakyam upadeṣṭum
yadi tebhyaḥ paṭaḥ utpadyate
tasmāt bhrāntiḥ iyam

original: yugapatkāryakāraṇayorutpattinirodhau tulānatonnatavaditi cet syādetadyathā nāmonnāmau tulāntaryā (?)
analyzed: yugapad kārya kāraṇayoḥ utpatti nirodhau tulā ānata unnata vat iti ced syāt etat yathā nāma unnāmau tulā antaryā
yaugapadyena bhavataḥ evam utpatti vināśau kārya kāraṇayoḥ iti
tat api ayuktam
kasmāt kārya kāraṇa bhāva adarśanāt
kim idam udake nimajjadbhiḥ phenam avalambyate

original: tulyā tasya hyekasyāvanatiravasthā tad dvitīyasyonnataye heturbhavati,
analyzed: tulyā tasya hi ekasya avanatiḥ avasthā tat dvitīyasya unnataye hetuḥ bhavati
bhavataḥ kāraṇa vināśaḥ kārya utpattiḥ ca yaugapadyena bhavataḥ
na ca tayoḥ hetumat bhāvaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayitum
tasmāt ayuktam etat

original: viśeṣagrahaṇāt kṣaṇikatvasiddhiriti cet syānmatam- yadyutpannamātroparatirnāsti bhāvānāṃ,
analyzed: viśeṣa grahaṇāt kṣaṇika tva siddhiḥ iti ced syāt matam yadi utpanna mātra uparatiḥ na asti bhāvānām

original: kiṃkayutaḥ śarīrādīnāṃ prāṇāpānaśramarūpādikṛto 'bjāśmaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca śītoṣṇasparśakṛto bhedaḥ ?
analyzed: kiṃka yutaḥ śarīra ādīnām prāṇa apāna śrama rūpa ādi kṛtaḥ bja aśma prabhṛtīnām ca śīta uṣṇa sparśa kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ
ghaṇṭā ādīnām ca aśabdakānām paścāt śabdavatām grahaṇam
tasmāt aniṣiddhaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ iti etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt ukta tvāt
uktam atra uttaram kāraṇa abhāve nutpatti prasaṅgāt iti
kiñca saṃsthāna antara an upaladheḥ
na hi atra pūrva saṃśāna viparītam saṃsthāna antaram gṛhṇīmahe
tasmāt aviśiṣṭāḥ te iti evam avagamyatām
viśeṣa grahaṇam tu avastu antara anugrahe śakti antara āvirbhāvāt
ca vyakteḥ apagamaḥ bhīṣṭaḥ pūrva saṃsthāna hānitaḥ
tad abhāvāt asidhaḥ sya viśe
