kārikā

original: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamiṣṭamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
analyzed: sattvam laghu prakāśakam iṣṭam upaṣṭambhakam calam ca rajaḥ
guru varaṇakam eva tamaḥ
eva śabdaḥ pratyekam
sattvam laghu prakāṣakam eva iṣṭam

original: yat kiṃcitkāryakaraṇe laghu prakāśaṃ ca tatsattvarūpamiti pratyavagantavyam /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid kārya karaṇe laghu prakāśam ca tat sattva rūpam iti pratyavagantavyam
tatra kāryasya tāvat udgama hetuḥ dharmaḥ laghu tvam
prakāśaḥ tu pṛthivī dharmasya chāyā lakṣaṇasya tamasaḥ tiraskāreṇa dravya antara prakāśanam
karaṇasya api grahaṇam saṅkalpa abhimāna adhyavasāya viṣayeṣu yathāsvam pravartamānam
upaṣṭambhakam calam eva rajaḥ
yaḥ kaścid upastambhaḥ calatā ca upalabhyate tat rajaḥ rūpam iti avagantavyam
tatra upastambhaḥ prayatnaḥ
cala tā kriyā
sā ca dvividhā
pariṃṇāma lakṣaṇā praspanda lakṣaṇā ca
tatra pariṇāma lakṣaṇayā sahakāri bhāva antara anugṛhītasya dharmiṇaḥ pūrva dharmāt pracyutiḥ
praspanda lakṣaṇā prāṇa ādayaḥ karmendriya vṛttayaḥ ca vacana ādyāḥ
bāhyānām dravyāṇām utpatana nipatana bhramaṇa ādīni
guru varaṇakam eva tamaḥ

original: yatkiṃcid gauravaṃ varaṇaṃ copalabhyate tattamorūpamiti pratyavagantavyam /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid gauravam varaṇam ca upalabhyate tat tamaḥ rūpam iti pratyavagantavyam
tatra guru tvam kāryasya adhas gamana hetuḥ dharmaḥ karaṇasya vṛtti manda tā
varaṇam api kārya gatam ca dravya antara tirodhānam
karaṇa gatā ca aśuddhiḥ prakāśa pratidvandvi bhūtā

original: ityeṣa sattvādīnāmavyatikareṇa svabhāvopalambho yata eṣāṃ nānātvamavasīyate /
analyzed: iti eṣa sattva ādīnām avyatikareṇa svabhāva upalambhaḥ yatas eṣām nānātvam avasīyate
yat punar etat uktam strī kṣatra megheṣu svabhāva vyatikara upalambhāt ekaḥ guṇaḥ trirūpaḥ
sarve vā sarva rūpā

original: rūpāntarasya vā sata utpattiriti atra brūmaḥ na,
analyzed: rūpa antarasya vā sataḥ utpattiḥ iti atra brūmaḥ na
guṇa bhūtasya bhaktitaḥ upakārāt pradhāna rūpa upapatteḥ

original: iha guṇabhūtasya bhaktitaḥ pradhānopakāritve sati bhaktitastadrūpopapattirdṛṣṭā /
analyzed: iha guṇa bhūtasya bhaktitaḥ pradhāna upakāri tve sati bhaktitaḥ tad rūpa upapattiḥ dṛṣṭā
tat yathā kṣīra ādeḥ

original: taddhi mukhādiṣu dṛṣṭapratilabdhapravṛttiḥ pittasya svena rūpeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ gacchaṃstasyopakārāttiktaṃ saṃpadyate /
analyzed: tat hi mukha ādiṣu dṛṣṭa pratilabdha pravṛttiḥ pittasya svena rūpeṇa aṅga bhāvam gacchan tasya upakārāt tiktam saṃpadyate
na ca tathā sat eva

original: sattvamapi straiṇaguṇabhūtaṃ sapatnīrajasaḥ svena rūpeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ gacchaṃstasyopakārādduḥkhaṃ saṃpadyate /
analyzed: sattvam api straiṇa guṇa bhūtam sapatnī rajasaḥ svena rūpeṇa aṅga bhāvam gacchan tasya upakārāt duḥkham saṃpadyate
tamasaḥ mohaḥ

original: evaṃ kṣātraṃ rajaḥ āryadāralakṣaṇasya sattvasya dasyulakṣaṇasya ca tamasaḥ /
analyzed: evam kṣātram rajaḥ ārya dāra lakṣaṇasya sattvasya dasyu lakṣaṇasya ca tamasaḥ

original: evaṃ medhyaṃ tamaḥ kārṣike sattvasya proṣitadayitāyāśca rajasaḥ /
analyzed: evam medhyam tamaḥ kārṣike sattvasya proṣita dayitāyāḥ ca rajasaḥ
tasmāt na asti guṇānām svābhāva vyatikaraḥ
kim ca anyat
aguṇa bhūtānām svabhāva grahaṇāt

original: yadā caite 'ṅgabhāvamapagacchanto madhyasthāstulyasaṃskārāśca pratipadyante tadā svarūpeṇaiva /
analyzed: yadā ca ete ṅga bhāvam apagacchantaḥ madhyasthāḥ tulya saṃskārāḥ ca pratipadyante tadā sva rūpeṇa eva
tasmāt asaṃkīrṇam guṇa rūpam
āha na sandehāt
ubhayathā hi rūpa antara grahaṇam kṣīra ādiṣu dṛṣṭam
tādrūpyāt taiḥ ca vipariṇatānām guṇa bhāvāt ca

original: yathoktaṃ tatra kathamidamekāntena niścīyante guṇabhāvātsattvādīnāṃ rūpāntaragrahaṇaṃ na punastādrūpyādeveti ?
analyzed: yathā uktam tatra katham idam ekāntena niścīyante guṇa bhāvāt sattva ādīnām rūpa antara grahaṇam na punar tādrūpyāt eva iti
ucyate grahaṇa vikalpa upalambhāt

original: yadi straiṇaṃ sattvaṃ tādrūpyādeva sapatnyā tena gṛhyate tena bharturapi tathā grahaṇaprasaṃgo madhyasthānāṃ tulyasaṃskārāṇāṃ ca /
analyzed: yadi straiṇam sattvam tādrūpyāt eva sapatnyā tena gṛhyate tena bhartuḥ api tathā grahaṇa prasaṃgaḥ madhyasthānām tulya saṃskārāṇām ca
aniṣṭam ca etat
tasmāt bhāktaḥ yam guṇa vikalpa upalambhaḥ
kim ca anyat

original: uttarakālaṃ svarūpagrahaṇānnivṛttānuśayābhiścaikārthatāmupagatābhiḥ sapatnībhiḥ svenaiva rūpeṇa straiṇasya sattvasya grahaṇamupalabhyate /
analyzed: uttara kālam sva rūpa grahaṇāt nivṛtta anuśayābhiḥ ca ekārtha tām upagatābhiḥ sapatnībhiḥ svena eva rūpeṇa straiṇasya sattvasya grahaṇam upalabhyate
sva gṛha samavasthitaiḥ ca ārya dāraiḥ kṣatriyāṇām
niṣpanna śasyaiḥ ca kṛṣīvalaiḥ meghānām
tasmāt bhāktaḥ yam grahaṇa vikalpa upalambhaḥ
tasmāt yuktam etat anyaḥ nya janana vṛttayaḥ guṇāḥ
na ca saṃkīrṇa svabhāvāḥ iti
yat punar etat uktam anyonya mithuna tva anupapattiḥ
sattvasya itara virodhāt

original: ityatra brūmaḥ - asti cāyaṃ virodho guṇānāṃ
analyzed: iti atra brūmaḥ asti ca ayam virodhaḥ guṇānām
pradīpa vat ca arthataḥ vṛttiḥ
kim utpadyate iti vākya śeṣaḥ
tat yathā varti jyotiḥ tailānām paraspara virodhe pi pradīpa karaṇa eka kārya sādhana bhāva upagatānām

original: vṛttaya ekatra saṃmūrchitāḥ sahabhāvaḥ prakṛṣṭamapi kālamanubhavanti evaṃ sattvarajastamasāṃ
analyzed: vṛttayaḥ ekatra saṃmūrchitāḥ sahabhāvaḥ prakṛṣṭam api kālam anubhavanti evam sattva rajaḥ tamasām

original: sati virodhe mahadādyekakāryasādhanabhāvopagatānāṃ vṛttaya ekatra mūrchitāḥ saha bhavantīti /
analyzed: sati virodhe mahat ādi eka kārya sādhana bhāva upagatānām vṛttayaḥ ekatra mūrchitāḥ saha bhavanti iti

original: yuktyabhāvādasiddhiriti cet syānmatam - kā punaratra yuktiryena virodhināmekakāryatā bhavatīti ?
analyzed: yukti abhāvāt asiddhiḥ iti ced syāt matam kā punar atra yuktiḥ yena virodhinām eka kārya tā bhavati iti
ucyate guṇa pradhāna bhāvāt

original: guṇabhūto hi pratiyogī pradhānabhūtena tadupakarakatvānna virudhyata iti saṃsargeṇa varttitumutsahate /
analyzed: guṇa bhūtaḥ hi pratiyogī pradhāna bhūtena tad upakaraka tvāt na virudhyate iti saṃsargeṇa varttitum utsahate

original: tulyabalayostu dvayoḥ satyameva sahāvasthānasya nāsti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: tulya balayoḥ tu dvayoḥ satyam eva saha avasthānasya na asti sambandhaḥ

original: tathā ca bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ paṭhati rūpātiśayā vṛttyatiśayāśca virudhyante /
analyzed: tathā ca bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ paṭhati rūpa atiśayāḥ vṛtti atiśayāḥ ca virudhyante
sāmānyāni tu atiśayaiḥ saha vartante
tat yathā jala agnī pacanīya svedanīyeṣu kāryeṣu
chāyā ātapau ca sūkṣma rū prakāśane
śīta uṣṇe ca prajā avasthitau
evam tad siddhaḥ pradīpa vat sattva rajaḥ tamasām virodhe sahabhāvaḥ
āha yat uktam laghu ādi bhāva svabhāva bhedāt guṇa nānātvam iti atra brūmaḥ
bhinnāḥ lakṣaṇa bhedāḥ ced mithas sattva ādayaḥ guṇāḥ
tarhi lakṣaṇa yukta tvāt ṣaḍguṇāḥ prāpnuvanti te

original: yadi laghvādilakṣaṇabhedātsattvādīnāṃ nānātvaṃ mitho 'bhyupagamyate tena laghutvaprakāśatvayorapi bhedo 'sti guṇadvayaprasaṃgaḥ /
analyzed: yadi laghu ādi lakṣaṇa bhedāt sattva ādīnām nānātvam mithas bhyupagamyate tena laghu tva prakāśa tvayoḥ api bhedaḥ sti guṇa dvaya prasaṃgaḥ

original: evamupastambhacalatābhyāṃ gauravavaraṇābhyāṃ ca dvayaṃ dvayamiti ṣaḍguṇāḥ prāpnuvanti /
analyzed: evam upastambha cala tābhyām gaurava varaṇābhyām ca dvayam dvayam iti ṣaḍguṇāḥ prāpnuvanti

original: atha mataṃ laghutvaprakāśayorabheda iti pṛthaganabhidhānaṃ prāptam /
analyzed: atha matam laghu tva prakāśayoḥ abhedaḥ iti pṛthak anabhidhānam prāptam

original: tadbhede vā grahaṇabhedamanicchataḥ prāpto laghutvādibhede 'pi guṇābhedastathā caiko guṇa iti prāptam /
analyzed: tad bhede vā grahaṇa bhedam an icchataḥ prāptaḥ laghu tva ādi bhede guṇa abhedaḥ tathā ca ekaḥ guṇaḥ iti prāptam
yat punar etat uktam guṇa bhūtasya bhaktitaḥ upakārāt pradhāna rūpa āpattiḥ iti
aṅga bhāvam vrajat sattvam duḥkham sampadyate yadi
vairūpyasya upasaṃhārāt pūrva doṣa a nivartanam

original: yadi hi rajaso 'ṅgabhāvamupagacchatsattvamupakārāttadrūpaṃ bhavati tena pratijñātasya rūpāntarasyopasaṃhārāttrairūpyaṃ guṇānāmekaikasya prāptam  #
analyzed: yadi hi rajasaḥ ṅga bhāvam upagacchat sattvam upakārāt tat rūpam bhavati tena pratijñātasya rūpa antarasya upasaṃhārāt trairūpyam guṇānām ekaikasya prāptam  /
rūpa antarasya vā sataḥ utpattiḥ
tasmāt pūrva doṣa aparihārāt pratijñā mātram eva ayam samādhiḥ
yat api uktam aguṇa bhūtānām svabhāva grahaṇāt iti
aṅga bhāva anapekṣam tu grahaṇam na asti ṛṣeḥ api

original: paramarṣerapi guṇānāṃ kāryameva pratyakṣaṃ na śaktimātreṇāvasthānamasaṃvedyatvāt /
analyzed: parama ṛṣeḥ api guṇānām kāryam eva pratyakṣam na śakti mātreṇa avasthānam asaṃvedya tvāt
tatra ca āṅa aṅgi bhāva gamanam anivāryam
tasmāt doṣam an icchatā guṇāḥ parityājyāḥ
na asti vā su dūram api gatvā tad saṃkara doṣa parihāraḥ

original: ucyate- yattāvaduktaṃ lakṣaṇabhedād guṇanānātvavādino lakṣaṇadvayayogādekaikasya guṇaṣaṭtvaprasaṃga iti tanna /
analyzed: ucyate yat tāvat uktam lakṣaṇa bhedāt guṇa nānātva vādinaḥ lakṣaṇa dvaya yogāt ekaikasya guṇa ṣaṭtva prasaṃgaḥ iti tat na
kasmāt dvayoḥ guṇa pradhāna bhāva anupapatteḥ
iha artha antarasya artha antareṇa guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ bhavati
yathā strī kṣatra megheṣu vyākhyātam
na ca laghu tva prakāśayoḥ upastambha calanayoḥ gaurava varaṇayoḥ ca mithau guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ sti

original: tadanarthāntaraṃ dharmāsta iti nāsti ṣaṭtvaprasaṃga iti /
analyzed: tat anartha antaram dharmāḥ te iti na asti ṣaṭtva prasaṃgaḥ iti
kim ca aprasiddha tvāt

original: na hyetatkvacitprasiddham yathā yāvanto dharmāstāvanto dharmiṇa iti /
analyzed: na hi etat kvacid prasiddham yathā yāvantaḥ dharmāḥ tāvantaḥ dharmiṇaḥ iti
na ca aprasiddhena vyavahāraḥ
kiṃca pṛthaktva ekānta prasaṅgāt
lakṣaṇa bhedāt nānātva pratijñasya sarva arthānām sva sāmānya lakṣaṇa yogāt svatas ṛtha antaram iti pṛthaktva ekānta prasaṃgaḥ

original: athaitadaniṣṭaṃ na tarhi vaktavyaṃ lakṣaṇabhedād guṇānāṃ ṣaṭtvamiti /
analyzed: atha etat aniṣṭam na tarhi vaktavyam lakṣaṇa bhedāt guṇānām ṣaṭtvam iti
yat punar etat uktam aṅga bhūtasya pradhāna rūpa āpatteḥ pūrva doṣa anivṛttiḥ iti tat api ayuktam
kasmāt bhakti abhidhānāt
asakṛt adhītam asmābhiḥ bhāktaḥ yam guṇānām grahaṇa vikalpaḥ iti

original: na ca bhaktiḥ paramārtha ityasthāne yatnaḥ /
analyzed: na ca bhaktiḥ parama arthaḥ iti asthāne yatnaḥ
yat punar etat uktam aguṇa bhūtānām sattva ādīnām ṛṣeḥ api aviṣaya tvam iti satyam etat
yat tu uktam kāryasya viṣaya bhūta tvāt aṅgāṅgibhāva gamanam guṇānām sakala satkāryam apekṣate

original: tathā strīkṣatrameghāḥ prakṛtāsteṣvaṅgabhāvamagacchata iti vijñāyata iti /
analyzed: tathā strī kṣatra meghāḥ prakṛtāḥ teṣu aṅga bhāvam agacchata iti vijñāyate iti
sāmānya śabdānām hi prakaraṇāt viśeṣe va sthānam bhavati
tat yathā bhojana kāle saindhavam ānaya iti ukte lavaṇe saṃpratipattiḥ na aśva ādiṣu
tasmāt prakaraṇam an apekṣya mahati tantre doṣa abhidhānam bāla vākya sthānīyam
evam guṇa lakṣaṇa upadeśāt siddham traiguṇyam
kārikā

original: āha- avivekyādiridānīṃ gaṇaḥ kathaṃ pratipattavya iti ?
analyzed: āha aviveki ādiḥ idānīm gaṇaḥ katham pratipattavyaḥ iti
ucyate
aviveki ādiḥ siddhaḥ traiguṇyāt
yat triguṇam tat aviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyam acetanam prasava dharmi iti
katham avagamyate iti ced
tad viparyaya abhāvāt
yasmāt guṇa viparyayaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ

original: tatra viṣayatvamacetanatvaṃ prasavadharmitvaṃ ca na bhavatīti purastātpratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tatra viṣaya tvam acetana tvam prasava dharmi tvam ca na bhavati iti purastāt pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ
tasmāt pariśeṣataḥ vyakte eteṣām dharmāṇām avirodhaḥ
āha tathā pradhānam iti prāk uktam ka bhavatā
tat idānīm katham pratipattavyam pradhānam api triguṇa ādi yuktam iti
ucyate
kāraṇa guṇa ātmaka tvāt kāryasya avyaktam api siddham
iha kāraṇa guṇa ātmakam kāryam dṛṣṭam paṭa ādi
vyakte ca traiguṇya ādi upalabhyate
tasmāt kāraṇam api asya tathājātīyakam iti śakyam anumātum
siddhānta mātra upadarśanam etat ācāryaḥ karoti
nyāyam tu yathā ukteṣu pradeśeṣu upapādayiṣyāmaḥ
kārikā
āha kārya dharmasya kāraṇa upalabdhau hetumat ādi prasaṃgaḥ aviśeṣāt

original: yadi kārye dṛṣṭasya dharmasya kāraṇe sadbhāvo 'bhyupagamyate prāptau hetumadādīnāmapi dharmāṇāṃ kāryadṛṣṭatvātpradhāne prasaṃgaḥ /
analyzed: yadi kārye dṛṣṭasya dharmasya kāraṇe sadbhāvaḥ bhyupagamyate prāptau hetumat ādīnām api dharmāṇām kārya dṛṣṭa tvāt pradhāne prasaṃgaḥ

original: atha kāryopalabdhau tulyāyāṃ hetumadādayo neṣyante na tarhītareṣāmapi kāraṇāvasthitirastīti /
analyzed: atha kārya upalabdhau tulyāyām hetumat ādayaḥ na iṣyante na tarhi itareṣām api kāraṇa avasthitiḥ asti iti
ucyate na svarūpa virodhi tve tad apavāda vijñānāt
kāraṇa guṇa ātmaka tvāt kāryasya iti anena liṅgena hetumat ādayaḥ pi kāraṇe prasajyante
teṣām tu kārya kāraṇa rūpa virodhi tvāt apavādaḥ vijñāyate

original: katham ? yadi tāvaddhetumadādayo vyakte dṛṣṭatvātpradhāne vyañjante,
analyzed: katham yadi tāvat hetumat ādayaḥ vyakte dṛṣṭa tvāt pradhāne vyañjante
kṛtaka tvāt kāryam eva tat na kāraṇam iti prāptam
anitya tvāt ca svayam ucchidyamānam ananugrāhakam avyāpi tva ādibhiḥ ca ananta vikāra utpādana śakti hīnam

original: ahetumadādayaḥ pradhāne 'bhyupagamādvyakterapi prāpyante tādṛśāḥ kāraṇāsambhavātkāryameva tanna bhavatīti prāptam /
analyzed: ahetumat ādayaḥ pradhāne abhyupagamāt vyakteḥ api prāpyante tādṛśāḥ kāraṇa asambhavāt kāryam eva tat na bhavati iti prāptam
aviveki ādayaḥ tu ubhayatra api bhavantaḥ na itaretara svarūpa virodhinaḥ
tasmāt kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhyupagamāt hetumat ādi apavādaḥ
itareṣām ca kāraṇa sadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
yat uktam kāraṇa guṇa ātmaka tvāt kāryasya avyaktam api siddham iti tat ayuktam
kasmāt vyakta avyaktayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva aprasiddheḥ

original: siddhe hi vyaktāvyaktayoḥ kāraṇatve etadevaṃ syāt /
analyzed: siddhe hi vyakta avyaktayoḥ kāraṇa tve etat evam syāt
tattva siddham
tasmāt ayuktam etat
viśeṣa anabhidhānāt ubhaya sāmyam iti ced syāt matam
yathā bhavān āha vyakta avyaktayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ prasiddhaḥ
evam vayam vakṣyāmaḥ tayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva aprasiddhiḥ api asiddhā
na ca kvacid viśeṣaḥ u sti ubhaya sāmyam bhaviṣyati iti
tat ca ayuktam
kasmāt sadbhāva asiddheḥ
satyam an abhidhīyamāne viśeṣe syāt ubhaya sāmyam

original: avyaktasya tu sadbhāva evāsiddha ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: avyaktasya tu sadbhāvaḥ eva asiddhaḥ iti ayam viśeṣaḥ
tasmāt ayuktam etat api iti

original: kāryasya kāraṇapūrvakatvādvyaktasya ca kāryatvādavyaktasadbhāve pratipattiriti cet syādetat /
analyzed: kāryasya kāraṇa pūrvaka tvāt vyaktasya ca kārya tvāt avyakta sadbhāve pratipattiḥ iti ced syāt etat
kāryam kāraṇa pūrvakam dṛṣṭam
ghaṭa ādi kāryam ced avyaktam pramita tvāt tasmāt idam api kāraṇa pūrvakam bhavitum arhati
yat ca tasya kāraṇam tat avyaktam iti
tat ca anupapannam
kasmāt anekāntāt
iha ākasmikī ca kāryasya utpattiḥ dṛṣṭā
tat yathā indradhanuṣaḥ
asataḥ ca bhrānti mātrāt
tat yathā māyā svapna indrajāla mṛgatṛṣṇika alāta cakra gandharvanagarāṇām
sataḥ ca kāraṇāt
tat yathā mṛd ādibhyaḥ ghaṭa ādīnām

original: kāryaṃ cedavyaktamataḥ saṃśayaḥ kimindradhanurvadakasmādasya prādurbhāvo 'tha māyādivadasato 'tha kāraṇātsato ghaṭavaditi ?
analyzed: kāryam ced avyaktam atas saṃśayaḥ kim indradhanuḥ vat akasmāt asya māyā ādi vat asataḥ kāraṇāt sataḥ ghaṭa vat iti
ucyate na ākasmikam asat pūrvam vyaktam kasmāt
bhedānām parimāṇāt
yad parimitam tasya sataḥ utpattiḥ dṛṣṭā
tat yathā mūla aṅkura parṇa nāla daṇḍa vusa tuṣa śūka puṣpa kṣīra taṇḍula kaṇānām
parimitāḥ mahat ahaṃkāra indriya tanmātra mahābhūta lakṣaṇa bhedāḥ
tasmāt sat kāraṇa pūrvakāḥ
yat eṣām kāraṇam tat avyaktam

original: // iti yuktidīpikāyāṃ sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau tṛtīyamāhnikaṃ prathamaṃ ca prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti yuktidīpikāyām sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau tṛtīyam āhnikam prathamam ca prakaraṇam samāptam
āha kasmāt asti avyaktam
asat bhedānām api parimāṇa darśanāt
anekāntaḥ iti ced syāt matam
asti hi māyā svapna indrajāla anuvidhāyinām api bhedānām parimāṇam iti
tasmāt anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ iti
tat ca na evam
kasmāt na hi teṣām niyamaḥ asti
etāvadbhiḥ eva utpattavyam na anyaiḥ iti
mahat ādayaḥ tu pralaya kāle tirobhūtāḥ tāvantaḥ eva utpadyante
āha parimāṇa anavasthānam kāla dvaya anupalabdheḥ

original: satyaṃ, sāmprate kāle mahadādayo yuktaparimāṇāḥ pratyakṣānumānopalabdheḥ /
analyzed: satyam sāmprate kāle mahat ādayaḥ yukta parimāṇāḥ pratyakṣa anumāna upalabdheḥ
atīta anāgatayoḥ tu kālayoḥ nā asti prasiddhiḥ
tasmāt ayuktam etat
ucyate na viparyaye pramāṇa anupalabdheḥ

original: idānīmetāvanto bhedā ityetacchakyamanumātum atītānāgatayostu kālayornāsti prasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: idānīm etāvantaḥ bhedāḥ iti etat śakyam anumātum atīta anāgatayoḥ tu kālayoḥ na asti prasiddhiḥ
tasmāt na bheda anavasthā prasaṃgaḥ
āha bheda abheda anavasthānāt

original: mahadādīnāṃ ye bhedā devamanuṣyatiryañco ghaṭādayaśca teṣāmaśakyaṃ parimāṇaṃ paricchettum /
analyzed: mahat ādīnām ye bhedāḥ deva manuṣya tiryañcaḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ ca teṣām aśakyam parimāṇam paricchettum
sāmānye ntarbhāvāt ayuktam iti ced syāt matam

original: asti śarīrāṇāṃ mahābhūtasāmānyaṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ ca pṛthivīsāmānyaṃ,
analyzed: asti śarīrāṇām mahābhūta sāmānyam ghaṭa ādīnām ca pṛthivī sāmānyam
tad parimāṇāt ete pi parimitāḥ iti
tat ayuktam
kasmāt abhāvāt
nahi vaḥ sāmānyam dravyāt artha antara bhūtam asti
sārūpya mātre sāmānya parikalpanāt
ucyate na tattva antara anupapatteḥ

original: tattvabhedena parimitā bhedā ityetadvivakṣitaṃ yathoktamasmābhiruktaṃ ca yadyasti tattvāntaramucyatām /
analyzed: tattva bhedena parimitāḥ bhedāḥ iti etat vivakṣitam yathā uktam asmābhiḥ uktam ca yadi asti tattva antaram ucyatām
yat punar etat uktam sāmānyasya artha antara bhūtasya bhavat pakṣe nupapattiḥ iti satyam etat

original: tathāvidhenāpi tu tena saṃvyavahāro na pratiṣidhyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tathāvidhena api tu tena saṃvyavahāraḥ na pratiṣidhyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ
tasmāt siddham bhedānām parimāṇāt asti avyaktam
kim ca anyat
samanvayāt

original: iha yena bhedānāṃ samanupagatistasya sattvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: iha yena bhedānām samanupagatiḥ tasya sattvam dṛṣṭam
tat yathā mṛdā ghaṭa ādīnām
asti ca iyam sukha duḥkha mohaiḥ śabda ādīnām samanugatiḥ
tasmāt te santi ye ca sukha ādayaḥ stamita viśeṣāḥ tat avyaktam
tasmāt asti avyaktam
āha na asiddha tvāt

original: sukhādibhiḥ śabdādayo 'nugamyanta ityetadaprasiddham kena kāraṇena pratipattavyamiti ?
analyzed: sukha ādibhiḥ śabda ādayaḥ nugamyante iti etat aprasiddham kena kāraṇena pratipattavyam iti
ucyate tad buddhi nimitta tvāt

original: iha śabdasparśarūparasagandhānāṃ sannidhāne svasaṃskāraviśeṣayogātsukhaduḥkhamohākārāḥ prāṇināṃ buddhaya utpadyante /
analyzed: iha śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandhānām sannidhāne sva saṃskāra viśeṣa yogāt sukha duḥkha moha ākārāḥ prāṇinām buddhayaḥ utpadyante
yat ca yādṛśīm buddhim utpādayati tat tena anvitam
tat yathā candana ādibhiḥ śakala ādayaḥ
tasmāt na asiddhiḥ samanvayasya iti
āha asiddhaḥ eva ayam samanvayaḥ
kasmāt vilakṣaṇa kārya utpatti darśanāt
na hi ayam niyamaḥ kāraṇa sadṛśam eva kāryam utpadyate
kim tarhi vilakṣaṇam agni dhūma śabda ādi
katham na hi agniḥ tṛṇa ādi svabhāvakaḥ gni svabhāvakaḥ vā dhūmaḥ
na ca bherī daṇḍa ādi svabhāvaḥ śabdaḥ
tasmāt sukha ādi anugatāḥ śabda ādayaḥ iti icchā mātram
ucyate na viśeṣita tvāt
sukha ādi svarūpāḥ śabda ādayaḥ
tad sannidhāne sukha ādi ākāra pratyaya utpattiḥ iti etat āditas eva asmābhiḥ viśeṣitam
tasmāt na bhinna jātīyāḥ te iti
yat tu khalu idam ucyate gni ādīnām vilakṣaṇānām utpatti darśanāt pradhāna bhedānām atajjātīya prasaṃgaḥ iti tat ayuktam
kasmāt abhiprāya anavabodhāt

original: naiva brūmo yo yasya vikāraḥ sa tajjātīyaka iti /
analyzed: na eva brūmaḥ yaḥ yasya vikāraḥ sa tad jātīyakaḥ iti

original: kiṃ tarhi yo yajjātīyakaḥ sa tasya vikāra iti /
analyzed: kim tarhi yaḥ yad jātīyakaḥ sa tasya vikāraḥ iti
tasmāt ayuktam etat
kiṃca anyat udāharaṇa aprasiddheḥ

original: na caitadudāharaṇaṃ prasiddhaṃ agnyādayaḥ svakāraṇajātiṃ nānuvidadhatīta /
analyzed: na ca etat udāharaṇam prasiddham agni ādayaḥ sva kāraṇa jātim na anuvidadhati ita
kasmāt bala vīrya anuvidhānāt
tat yathā agneḥ dhūmasya ca tvak candana nalikā ādi snigdhatā anuvṛtteḥ taikṣṇya ādi anuvṛtteḥ ca

original: bherīvikāraḥ śabdo na tu yathā bherīrūpamavasthitam /
analyzed: bherī vikāraḥ śabdaḥ na tu yathā bherī rūpam avasthitam

original: pradīpeneva tu daṇḍābhighātena vyajyata iti sādhyametat /
analyzed: pradīpena iva tu daṇḍa abhighātena vyajyate iti sādhyam etat
na ca ekaikaḥ rūpa ādīnām dravya ākāraḥ samudāya dharma tvāt
tasmāt na bherī vikāraḥ śabdaḥ
tatra yat uktam vilakṣaṇa kārya utpatti darśanāt asiddhaḥ nvayaḥ iti etat ayuktam
tasmāt yuktam etat samanvayāt asti avyaktam iti
kim ca anyat
śaktitaḥ pravṛtteḥ ca

original: iha yāvatī kācilloke pravṛttirupalabhyate sā sarvā śaktitaḥ /
analyzed: iha yāvatī kācid loke pravṛttiḥ upalabhyate sā sarvā śaktitaḥ

original: tadyathā kumbhakārasya daṇḍādisādhanavinyāsalakṣaṇāyāśca śakteḥ sannidhānād ghaṭakaraṇe pravṛttirasti /
analyzed: tat yathā kumbhakārasya daṇḍa ādi sādhana vinyāsa lakṣaṇāyāḥ ca śakteḥ sannidhānāt ghaṭa karaṇe pravṛttiḥ asti
vyaktasya ca iyam kārya tvāt tad bhāve pravṛttiḥ iti
atas tasya api śaktyā bhavitavyam
yā asau śaktiḥ tat avyaktam
tasmāt asti avyaktam iti
āha prāk pravṛtteḥ śakti abhāvaḥ
pravṛtti anupalabdheḥ

original: yadi śaktipūrvikā pravṛttiriti manyadhvaṃ tena yāvatpravṛttirnopalabhyate tāvacchaktirnāstītyetadāpannam /
analyzed: yadi śakti pūrvikā pravṛttiḥ iti manyadhvam tena yāvat pravṛttiḥ na upalabhyate tāvat śaktiḥ na asti iti etat āpannam
kasmāt satyām śaktyām kārya abhāve svarūpa abhāva prasaṃgāt

original: yadi khalvapi vidyamānā śaktiḥ kenacitprabandhena kāryaṃ notpādayecchaktitaraśaktetyetadāpannam /
analyzed: yadi khalu api vidyamānā śaktiḥ kenacid prabandhena kāryam na utpādayet śaktitara śaktā iti etat āpannam
tasmāt sahakāri bhāva antara sannidhānāt pravrutti sama kalām eva arthānām śaktayaḥ utpadyante
tāḥ ca tāvat eva pradhvaṃsante

original: tatra yaduktaṃ prākpravṛtteḥ śaktidarśanādvyaktasyāpi niṣpādikā śaktirastītyetadayuktam /
analyzed: tatra yat uktam prāk pravṛtteḥ śakti darśanāt vyaktasya api niṣpādikā śaktiḥ asti iti etat ayuktam
kim ca anyat bheda abheda kalpanā anupapatteḥ

original: iha pradhānameva vā śaktiḥ syāt pradhānādvā bhinnā ?
analyzed: iha pradhānam eva vā śaktiḥ syāt pradhānāt vā bhinnā
kim ca atas

original: tadyadi tāvatpradhānameva śaktistena kārye bhedācchaktibhedo 'vasīyata iti śaktibhedātpradhānanānātvaprasaṃgaḥ /
analyzed: tat yadi tāvat pradhānam eva śaktiḥ tena kārye bhedāt śakti bhedaḥ vasīyate iti śakti bhedāt pradhāna nānātva prasaṃgaḥ
pradhāna ekatvāt vā tad avyatiriktānām śaktīnām ekatva prasaṃgaḥ
tatas ca kārya nānātva abhāvaḥ

original: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti pradhānādarthāntarabhāvaḥ śaktīnāmabhyupagamyate tena bhinnānāṃ śaktīnāṃ pravṛttitaḥ siddhau pradhānasiddhirnāstītyetadāpannam
analyzed: atha mā bhūt ayam doṣaḥ iti pradhānāt artha antara bhāvaḥ śaktīnām abhyupagamyate tena bhinnānām śaktīnām pravṛttitaḥ siddhau pradhāna siddhiḥ na asti iti etat āpannam
kim ca anyat
svarūpa abhidhānam ca
pradhānasya śakti mātrāt api artha antara tvam abhyupagamya rūpam īdṛś pradhānam sva avasthāyām iti
tat ca aśakyam abhidhātum
tasmāt bheda abheda kalpanā anupapatteḥ akalpanīyā śaktiḥ iti
ucyate yat uktam prāk pravṛtteḥ śakti abhāvaḥ pravṛtti anupalabdheḥ iti
atra brūmaḥ na aprasiddha tvāt
kāraṇam śaktiḥ kāryam pravṛttiḥ

original: na ca kāryānupalabdhau kāryābhāva ityetalloke prasiddham /
analyzed: na ca kārya anupalabdhau kārya abhāvaḥ iti etat loke prasiddham

original: yatpunaruktaṃ kāryaniṣpattau śakteḥ svarūpahānamiti atra brūmaḥ na,
analyzed: yat punar uktam kārya niṣpattau śakteḥ svarūpa hānam iti atra brūmaḥ na
pradīpa dṛṣṭāntāt
yat yathā pradīpasya ghaṭa ādi prakāśana śaktiḥ asti
atha ca kuḍya ādi āvaraṇa sāmarthyāt na ghaṭa ādīn prakāśayitum śaknoti

original: na ca śakyate vaktuṃ pradīpasya prakāśanaśaktiraśakteti /
analyzed: na ca śakyate vaktum pradīpasya prakāśana śaktiḥ aśaktā iti
evam anyeṣām api bhāvānām prāk prarutteḥ api śaktiḥ syāt
na ca apravṛtti darśanāt asyāḥ sva rūpa hānam syāt

original: yattūktaṃ sahakāribhāvāntarasannidhānātpravṛttisamakālamevārthānāṃ śaktiprādurbhāva iti atra brūmaḥ- tadaprasiddhiḥ śaktyapekṣatvāt /
analyzed: yat tu uktam sahakāri bhāva antara sannidhānāt pravṛtti sama kālam eva arthānām śakti prādurbhāvaḥ iti atra brūmaḥ tad aprasiddhiḥ śakti apekṣa tvāt

original: iha sarvaḥ kartā svagatāṃ śaktimapekṣya tadyogyatayā sahakāribhāvāntaramupādatte,
analyzed: iha sarvaḥ kartā svagatām śaktim apekṣya tad yogyatayā sahakāri bhāva antaram upādatte
sā ced prāk pravṛtteḥ na syāt sādhanānām viṣaya svabhāva anavadhāraṇāt anupādāna prasaṃgaḥ
aniṣṭam ca etat
tasmāt prāk pravṛtteḥ śaktiḥ

original: yatpunaretaduktaṃ tāvadeva pradhvaṃsaṃ iti atra brūmaḥ na,
analyzed: yat punar etat uktam tāvat eva pradhvaṃsam iti atra brūmaḥ na
kārya niṣṭhā darśanāt

original: yadi pravṛttisamakālameva pradhvaṃsaḥ iti atra brūmaḥ na,
analyzed: yadi pravṛtti sama kālam eva pradhvaṃsaḥ iti atra brūmaḥ na
kārya niṣṭhā darśanāt

original: yadi pravṛttisamakālameva pradhvaṃsaḥ syātkāryaniṣṭhaiva na syāt /
analyzed: yadi pravṛtti sama kālam eva pradhvaṃsaḥ syāt kārya niṣṭhā eva na syāt
tad nimitta tvāt kāryasya asti tu asau
tasmāt na pravṛtti sama kālam eva śati pradhvaṃsaḥ
sadṛśa sandhāna utpatyā kārya niṣṭhā iti ced na
vināśa sama kāla utpatti asambhavāt

original: athāpi syādekasyāṃ śaktau kṣaṇasādhyamaṃśamavasāya vinaṣṭāyāmanyattatsadṛśaṃ śaktyantaramutpadyate,
analyzed: atha api syāt ekasyām śaktau kṣaṇa sādhyam aṃśam avasāya vinaṣṭāyām anyat tad sadṛśam śakti antaram utpadyate
tasmin vinaṣṭe nyaditi
evam śakti santānāt kārya niṣṭhā bhavati iti
etat api ayuktam
kasmāt vināśa kāla utpatti asambhavāt

original: ko hyatra heturyena vināśasamakālamanyacchaktirūpaṃ kāryamavasīyayati na punaḥ prāktanamevāvasthitamiti ? kiṃ cānyat /
analyzed: kaḥ hi atra hetuḥ yena vināśa sama kālam anyat śakti rūpam kāryam avasīyayati na punar prāktanam eva avasthitam iti kim ca anyat
kauṭasthya doṣa parihārāt

original: kṣaṇottarakālāvasthāne ca bhāvānāṃ yo doṣa upāttaḥ kauṭasthyaprasaṃga iti tasya parihāra uktaḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇa uttara kāla avasthāne ca bhāvānām yaḥ doṣaḥ upāttaḥ kauṭasthya prasaṃgaḥ iti tasya parihāraḥ uktaḥ
tasmāt na asti śaktīnām pravṛtti kāle vināśaḥ
pravṛtti uttara kālam api na asti kasmāt
punar pravṛtti darśanāt
śakti antara utpattau pravṛti uttara kālam api iti ced na
hetu abhāvāt

original: ko hyatra nirbandhaḥ tasyāṃ vinaṣṭāyāmanyā pravṛttyantaraheturbhavati naiva punaḥ saiveti ?
analyzed: kaḥ hi atra nirbandhaḥ tasyām vinaṣṭāyām anyā pravṛtti antara hetuḥ bhavati na eva punar sā eva iti
kṛtārtha tva ādi ced na anabhyupagamāt
na hi eka ghaṭa arthā śaktiḥ abhyupagamyate

original: tatra yenaiva hetunā ekaṃ ghaṭamavasāya na vinaśyati tenaiva yāvanti kartavyānīti /
analyzed: tatra yena eva hetunā ekam ghaṭam avasāya na vinaśyati tena eva yāvanti kartavyāni iti
tasmāt triṣu kāleṣu śaktayaḥ vatiṣṭhante
yat punar etat uktam bheda abheda kalpanā anupapattiḥ iti
atra brūmaḥ astu pradhānāt abhinnā śaktiḥ

original: na tasya nānātvaṃ śaktyekatvaṃ vā prasajyate /
analyzed: na tasya nānātvam śakti ekatvam vā prasajyate
kasmāt saṃkhyā vyavahārasya buddhi apekṣa tvāt buddhi nimittasya ca asatkāreṇa pradhāna śakti svabhāvāt
iha ayam saṃkhyā vyavahāraḥ buddhi apekṣaḥ
katham yat abhinnām buddhim utpādayati tat ekam
pradhāna avasthāyām ca śaktayoḥ stamita viśeṣa tvāt abhinnām buddhim utpādayanti
tasmāt ekam tad pravṛtti kāle viśeṣa avagrahaṇe bhedam pratipadyate
deva śaktiḥ manuṣya śaktiḥ ityādi
tasmāt na āsām eka tvam atas na bheda abheda kalpanā anupapattiḥ iti
vyakte darśanāt śaktīnām avyakte pratipattiḥ iti ced syāt etat
vyakte śakti pravṛttī dṛṣṭe na ca avyakte
kvacid anyatas vyaktam eva etasmāt hetoḥ siddhi ati na avyaktam iti etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭāntāt siddheḥ

original: yathaiva hi devadattādhārayā kriyayā tasya deśāntaraprāptimupalabhyātyantādṛṣṭaṃ
analyzed: yathā eva hi devadatta ādhārayā kriyayā tasya deśa antara prāptim upalabhya atyanta adṛṣṭam
jyotiṣām deśa antara prāpteḥ gamanam anumīyate evam pravṛtteḥ śakti niyamita tvāt vyaktasya
ca pravṛtti bhūta tvāt avaśyam atyanta adṛṣṭā śaktiḥ abhyupagantavyā iti siddham śaktitaḥ
pravṛtteḥ asti avyaktam
kim ca anyat
kāraṇa kārya vibhāgāt

original: kāraṇaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca kāraṇakārye tayorvibhāgaḥ kāryakāraṇavibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇam ca kāryam ca kāraṇa kārye tayoḥ vibhāgaḥ kārya kāraṇa vibhāgaḥ

original: idaṃ kāraṇamidaṃ kāryamiti buddhyā dvidhāvasthāpanaṃ vibhāgo yaḥ sa kāraṇakāryavibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: idam kāraṇam idam kāryam iti buddhyā dvidhā avasthāpanam vibhāgaḥ yaḥ sa kāraṇa kārya vibhāgaḥ
tad avasthita bhāva pūrvakam dṛṣṭam
tat yathā śayana āsana ratha caraṇa ādiḥ
asti ca ayam vyaktasya kāraṇa kārya vibhāgaḥ tasmāt idam api avasthita bhā pūrvakam
saḥ avasthitaḥ bhāvaḥ tat avyaktam
āha tad anupalabdheḥ ayuktam
na hi śayana ādīnām kāraṇa kārya vibhāgaḥ kaścid upalabhyate
tasmāt ayuktam etat
ucyate na kārya kāraṇayoḥ upakāraka upakārya paryāya tvāt kāraṇam kāryam iti nirvati anirvartaka bhāvaḥ bhipretaḥ
kim tarhi upakāraka upakārya bhāvaḥ
sa ca asti śayana ādīnām vyaktasya ca
atas na

original: āha, kaḥ punarvyaktasya parasyaparasya kāryakāraṇabhāva iti ?
analyzed: āha kaḥ punar vyaktasya parasya aparasya kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti
ucyate guṇānām tāvat sattva rajaḥ tamasām prakāśa pravṛtti niyama lakṣaṇaiḥ dharmaiḥ itaretara upakāreṇa yathā pravṛttiḥ bhavati
prīti aprīti viṣāda ātmakāḥ iti etasmin sūtre
vyākhyātam
tathā śabda ādīnām pṛthivī ādiṣu paraspara artham eka ādhāra tvam
śrotra ādīnām itaretara arjana rakṣaṇa saṃskārāḥ
karaṇasya kāryāt sthāna sādhana prakhyāpana ādi kāryasya karaṇāt vṛtti kṣata bhaṃga saṃrohaṇa saṃśoṣaṇa paripālanāni
pṛthivī ādīnām vṛtti saṃgrahaṇa panthi vyūha avakāśa dānaiḥ go ādi bhāvaḥ daiva mānuṣa tiraścām
yathā ṛtu vidhāna ijyā poṣaṇa abhyavahāra saṃvyavahāraiḥ itaretara adhyayanam varṇānām svadharma pravṛtti viṣaya bhāvaḥ
anyaḥ ca lokāt yathāsaṃbhavam draṣṭavyaḥ
āha tad anupapattiḥ
krama yaugapadya asambhavāt

original: yo 'yaṃ guṇānāṃ prakāśapravṛttiniyamairitaretaropakāro 'bhyupagamyate sa khalu krameṇa vā syāt yugapadvā ?
analyzed: yaḥ yam guṇānām prakāśa pravṛtti niyamaiḥ itaretara upakāraḥ abhyupagamyate sa khalu krameṇa vā syāt yugapad vā
kim ca atas
tat na tāvat krameṇa saṃbhavati
kasmāt ekasya nirapekṣasya pravṛttau itarayoḥ api tad prasaṃgāt

original: yadi tāvatsattvaṃ pūrvaṃ guṇāntaranirapekṣaṃ svaśaktita eva prakāśate tayorupakārakamityāśrīyate /
analyzed: yadi tāvat sattvam pūrvam guṇa antara nirapekṣam sva śaktitaḥ eva prakāśate tayoḥ upakārakam iti āśrīyate

original: tena yathā sattvamevamitarāvapyupakāranirapekṣau svakāryaṃ kariṣyata ityupakārānarthakyam /
analyzed: tena yathā sattvam evam itarau api upakāra nirapekṣau sva kāryam kariṣyataḥ iti upakāra ānarthakyam

original: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa ityato yaugapadyamāśrīyate /
analyzed: atha mā bhūt ayam doṣaḥ iti atas yaugapadyam āśrīyate
tat api anupapannam
kasmāt sahabhūtānām anupakāraka tvāt
go viṣāṇa vat
kim ca anyat
sat asat vikalpa anupapatteḥ

original: iha sattvaṃ prakāśamānaṃ rajastamasorvidyamānaṃ vā prakāśamāviṣkuryāt avidyamānaṃ vā ?
analyzed: iha sattvam prakāśamānam rajaḥ tamasoḥ vidyamānam vā prakāśam āviṣkuryāt a vidyamānam vā
kim ca atas
tat yadi tāvat vidyamānam abhivyanakti tena sarveṣām eka svābhāvyāt guṇa tva prasaṃgaḥ
kiṃca sattva vat ca itarayoḥ svātaṃtrya prasaṃgaḥ

original: yathā sattvasya prakāśaktirastītyatastad guṇāntaranirapekṣaṃ prakāśate tadvaditarāvapītyadoṣaḥ /
analyzed: yathā sattvasya prakāśa ktiḥ asti iti atas tat guṇa antara nirapekṣam prakāśate tadvat itarau api iti adoṣaḥ
atha vā avidyamānā prakāśa śaktiḥ sattva smbandhāt rajaḥ tamasoḥ upajāyate

original: tena yaduktaṃ prākpravṛttereva tiṣṭhante śaktaya iti tad hīnam /
analyzed: tena yat uktam prāk pravṛtteḥ eva tiṣṭhante śaktayaḥ iti tat hīnam
tatas ca satkārya vāda vyāghātaḥ
kim ca ayam anekāntāt
na hi ayam ekāntaḥ paraspara upakāriṇām avasthita bhāva pūrvaka tvam iti

original: tathā hi sattvādayaḥ parasparopakāriṇo na cāvasthitabhāvapūrvakāḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi sattva ādayaḥ paraspara upakāriṇaḥ na ca avasthita bhāva pūrvakāḥ
tena yat uktam kāraṇa kārya vibhāgāt bhedānām avyaktam asti etat ayuktam
ucyate yat uktam upakāra abhāvaḥ
krama yaugapadya asambhavāt iti
astu yugapad upakāraḥ
yat tu uktam sahabhūtānām anupakāraka tvam go viṣāṇa ādi vat iti
atra brūmaḥ na
anyathā anupapatteḥ
na hi go viṣāṇayoḥ sahabhūta tvāt aukāra anupapattiḥ
kim tarhi eka kārya abhāvāt

original: yeṣāṃ tu kāryamekaṃ sahabhāve tu teṣāmupakāro na pratiṣidhyate /
analyzed: yeṣām tu kāryam ekam sahabhāve tu teṣām upakāraḥ na pratiṣidhyate
tat yathā pṛthivī ādīnām dhṛti saṃgraha śakti vyūha avakāśa dānaiḥ
śarīra sthitayoḥ akrama bhāvinoḥ api khura viṣāṇayoḥ nā asti paraspara upakāraḥ
tasmāt na sahabhāva asahabhāvau upakāra anupakāra hetū
kim ca dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: dṛṣṭaḥ khalu vegenordhvagamane vāyoraraghaṭṭādīnāṃ yugapadupakāraḥ na kaściddoṣaḥ tathā guṇānāmapi syāt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ khalu vegena ūrdhva gamane vāyoḥ araghaṭṭa ādīnām yugapad upakāraḥ na kaścid doṣaḥ tathā guṇānām api syāt

original: saṃyoganimitta iti cet sādhyaṃ kimarthāntarabhūtamuta prāptimātraṃ saṃyoga iti /
analyzed: saṃyoga nimittaḥ iti ced sādhyam kim artha antara bhūtam uta prāpti mātram saṃyogaḥ iti
yat punar etat uktam sat asat vikalpa anupapatteḥ iti atra brūmaḥ ayuktam etat
kasmāt paṅgu andhavat tad upakāre doṣa anupapatteḥ
tat yathā paṅgu andhayoḥ itaretara sambandhāt na vidyamānayoḥ dṛś gati śaktyoḥ anyonya ātmani

original: vyaktiḥ na cāvidyamānayoratha caikakāryasiddhiryathā ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ parasparopakāritvaṃ
analyzed: vyaktiḥ na ca avidyamānayoḥ atha ca eka kārya siddhiḥ yathā ca pṛthivī ādīnām paraspara upakāri tvam
śaktayoḥ abhivyajyate na para śaktyā evam guṇānām api iti
yat punar etat uktam anekāntāt iti tat ayuktam
kasmāt śāstra anavabodhāt
iha asmākam kārya kāraṇayoḥ artha an abhyupagamāt guṇānām avasthāntaram eva avasthā antara anapekṣam kārya kāraṇa śabda vācya tām labhate

original: tatra ye tāvatpradhānāvasthānubhāvino guṇāsteṣāṃ śaktimātrarūpatvādanirdeśyaprakāśādisvabhāvānāṃ nāsti tannibandhana upakāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra ye tāvat pradhāna avasthā anubhāvinaḥ guṇāḥ teṣām śakti mātra rūpa tvāt anirdeśya prakāśa ādi svabhāvānām na asti tad nibandhanaḥ upakāraḥ
yadā vaiṣamyam āpadyante tadā a nivārita prakāśa ādi rūpāḥ tad nimittam upakāram pratipadyante
tasmāt vyaktānām upakāra abhyupagamāt avasthita bhāva pūrvakatvam na virudhyate iti śāstram an avagamya evam ucyate na aikāntikaḥ yam hetuḥ
pradhāna avasthāyām upakāra anabhyupagamāt uttarakālam api tad prasaṃgaḥ iti ced syāt matam

original: yadi guṇānāmādye prakope svasāmarthyādeva pūrvasmātpracyutistenottarakālamapi tadvadeva bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: yadi guṇānām ādye prakope sva sāmarthyāt eva pūrvasmāt pracyutiḥ tena uttara kālam api tadvat eva bhaviṣyati

original: atha pradhānāvasthāyāmapi copakāro na tarhi nānaikāntiko heturiti /
analyzed: atha pradhāna avasthāyām api ca upakāraḥ na tarhi na anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ iti
tat ca na evam
kasmāt agni vat sva śakti nimitta tvāt

original: tadyathā sūkṣmo 'gniḥ sūkṣmaṃ prakāśaṃ svayameva karoti,
analyzed: tat yathā sūkṣmaḥ gniḥ sūkṣmam prakāśam svayam eva karoti
ghaṭa ādi prakāśane tu taila vartti ādi apekṣate
tadvat guṇānām ādyaḥ prakopaḥ sva śaktitaḥ
mahat ādi apekṣaḥ tu upakārataḥ
tasmāt yuktam etat kāraṇa kārya vibhāgāt asti avyaktam iti
kim ca anyat
avibhāgāt vaiśvarūpyasya
iha yat viśva rūpam tasya avibhāgaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tat yathā salila ādīnām
jala bhūmī viśva rūpāḥ ca mahat ādayaḥ
tasmāt eṣām api avibhāgena bhavitavyam
yaḥ saḥ avibhāgaḥ tat avyaktam
tasmāt asti avyaktam
āha kim punar tat vaiśvarūpyam
kaḥ vā viśva rūpaḥ iti
ucyate vaiśvarūpyam iti viśiṣṭam avasthānam ācakṣmahe
astamita viśeṣa tvam avibhāgaḥ iti
viśeṣasya sāmānya pūrvaka tvāt iti yaḥ rthaḥ tat uktam bhavati avibhāgāt vaiśvarūpyasya iti
evam etaiḥ pañcabhiḥ vītaiḥ vyaktasya kāraṇam asti avyaktam iti siddham
āha vipratiṣedha prasaṃgaḥ
kāraṇa antara pratiṣedha avacanāt
yathā bhavān āha pradhānam jagat utpatti samartham kāraṇam asti
evam tantra antarīyāḥ paramāṇu puruṣa īśvara karma daiva svabhāva kāla yadṛcchā bhāvān kāraṇa tvena abhidadhati
teṣām ca pratiṣedhaḥ na ucyate iti
atas vipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
kim pradhānam eva kāraṇam āhosvit etāni eva vā ubhayam iti

original: anvayadarśanāttadanupapattiriti cet syānmatam pradhānānvaya eva pṛthivyādiṣu sukhādilakṣaṇa upalabhyate /
analyzed: anvaya darśanāt tad anupapattiḥ iti ced syāt matam pradhāna anvayaḥ eva pṛthivī ādiṣu sukha ādi lakṣaṇaḥ upalabhyate

original: yacca yenānvitaṃ tasyāsau vikāra iti yuktametatprāgapadiṣṭam /
analyzed: yat ca yena anvitam tasya asau vikāraḥ iti yuktam etat prāk apadiṣṭam
tasmāt pradhāna vikāraḥ eva vyaktam iti
tat ca anupapannam
kasmāt aneka anvaya saṃbhavāt
paramāṇu anvayaḥ pi hi vyakte upalabhyate rūpa ādi sattvāt
puruṣa anvayaḥ karaṇasya saṃvedaka tvāt
īśvara anvayaḥ śakti viśeṣa yuktānām upalabdheḥ
svabhāva anvayaḥ dravya antara saṃsarge bhāvānām tasmāt apracyuteḥ
kāla anvayaḥ yuga ādi anuvidhānāt
yadṛcchā anvayaḥ niyama abhāvāt
abhāva anvayaḥ gavā ādīnām paraspara ātma sva darśanāt itaretarāṇi prayuktāni

original: kāraṇāntarapūrvakatve 'pi khalu vyaktasya śaktyāḥ parimāṇādayaḥ pūrvameva kalpayitum /
analyzed: kāraṇa antara pūrvaka tve pi khalu vyaktasya śaktyāḥ parimāṇa ādayaḥ pūrvam eva kalpayitum
tasmāt ayuktam anvaya ādibhyaḥ kāraṇam asti avyaktam iti
ucyate yat tāvat uktam paramāṇūnām apratiṣedhāt vipratiṣedha prasaṃgaḥ iti
atra brūmaḥ tad anupapattiḥ astitva anabhyupagamāt

original: astitve hi paramāṇūnāmabhyupagamyamāne sati satyamevaṃ syādiyamāśaṃkā,
analyzed: astitve hi paramāṇūnām abhyupagamyamāne sati satyam evam syāt iyam āśaṃkā
kim paramāṇu pūrvakam idam viśvam atha pradhāna pūrvakam iti
na tu teṣām sadbhāvaḥ niścitaḥ
tasmāt ayuktam etat

original: yattu khalvidamucyate pṛthivyādiṣu rūpādyupalambhādanvayadarśanādaṇūnāṃ sadbhāvaḥ pradhānavadeva kalpayitavya ityetadapi cānupapannam /
analyzed: yat tu khalu idam ucyate pṛthivī ādiṣu rūpa ādi upalambhāt anvaya darśanāt aṇūnām sadbhāvaḥ pradhāna vat eva kalpayitavyaḥ iti etat api ca anupapannam
kasmāt anyathā api tad upapatteḥ

original: tanmātrapūrvakatve 'pi hi pṛthivyādīnāṃ kalpyamāne rūpādisattvādato na yuktametat /
analyzed: tanmātra pūrvaka tve hi pṛthivī ādīnām kalpyamāne rūpa ādi sattvāt atas na yuktam etat
sukha ādīnām ātma guṇa tvena abhyupagamāt pradhāne pi tad prasaṃgaḥ iti ced

original: athāpi syādyathā tanmātrāṇāṃ rūpādimattvaṃ kalpyate tatpūrvakatvaṃ ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ dṛśyamapi teṣu rūpādisattvaliṅgena paramāṇubhyo niṣkṛṣyate,
analyzed: atha api syāt yathā tanmātrāṇām rūpa ādimattvam kalpyate tad pūrvakatvam ca pṛthivī ādīnām dṛśyam api teṣu rūpa ādi sattva liṅgena paramāṇubhyaḥ niṣkṛṣyate
evam asmābhiḥ sukha ādīnām ātma guṇa tva abhyupagamāt tad buddhi nimitta tve pṛthivya ādīnām pradhāna pūrvatva ākṣepaḥ kariṣyate iti
etat ca anupapannam
kasmāt ātma guṇa tva atiṣedhāt
tasmāt ca viparyāsāt iti atra isk
sukha ādīnām ātma guṇa tva pratiṣedham kariṣyāmaḥ tasmāt asamyak etat

original: āha, yadi punastanmātrāṇāmeva paramāṇutvamabhyupagamyate ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ syāt ?
analyzed: āha yadi punar tanmātrāṇām eva paramāṇu tvam abhyupagamyate kaḥ evam sati doṣaḥ syāt
ucyate na śakyam evam bhavitum
kim kāraṇam
vṛddhimatyaḥ tanmātra lakṣaṇāḥ prakṛtayaḥ smābhiḥ abhyupagamyante

original: kasmāt ? svakāryāddhi prathīyasī prakṛtirbhavatīti ca naḥ samayaḥ /
analyzed: kasmāt sva kāryāt hi prathīyasī prakṛtiḥ bhavati iti ca naḥ samayaḥ
mahānti ca pṛthivī ādīni mahābhūtāni
tasmāt teṣām tad atirikta tayā pṛthivyā bhavitavyam
paricchinna deśāḥ ca paramāṇavaḥ
tasmāt na tanmātra abhyupagamāt teṣām abhyupagamaḥ
upetya vā tad asambhavaḥ kṛtaka tvāt

original: astu vā paramāṇūnāṃ sadbhāvastathāpi tebhyo jagadutpatterasambhavaṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: astu vā paramāṇūnām sadbhāvaḥ tathā api tebhyaḥ jagat utpatteḥ asambhavam brūmaḥ
kim kāraṇam
kṛtaka tvāt
akṛtakena hi jagat kāraṇena yuktam bhavitum
kṛtakāḥ ca paramāṇavaḥ

original: tasmātsatyapi sadbhāve na teṣāṃ jagatkāraṇamiṣyate iti ?
analyzed: tasmāt sati api sadbhāve na teṣām jagat kāraṇam iṣyate iti
ucyate tasya eva kāraṇa tva prasaṃgāt

original: yaddhi tatparamāṇūnāṃ kāraṇaṃ tadeva jagatkāraṇatvena yuktaṃ kalpayituṃ syāt na tanniṣādimatāḥ paramāṇavaḥ /
analyzed: yat hi tat paramāṇūnām kāraṇam tat eva jagat kāraṇa tvena yuktam kalpayitum syāt na tat niṣādi matāḥ paramāṇavaḥ

original: kṛtakatvāsiddherayuktamiti cet syānmataṃ yadi paramāṇūnāṃ kṛtakatvaṃ prasiddhamata etadyujyate vaktumamuṣmāddhetorakāraṇaṃ paramāṇava iti /
analyzed: kṛtaka tva asiddheḥ ayuktam iti ced syāt matam yadi paramāṇūnām kṛtaka tvam prasiddham atas etat yujyate vaktum amuṣmāt hetoḥ akāraṇam paramāṇavaḥ iti
tattva siddham
tasmāt na kiṃcid etat
ucyate paricchinna deśa tvāt
iha yat paricchinna deśaḥ tat kṛtakam dṛṣṭam
tat yathā ghaṭaḥ
paricchinna deśaḥ ca
tasmāt paramāṇavaḥ kṛtakāḥ
kim ca anyat rūpa ādimat tvāt
iha yat rūpa ādimat tat kṛtakam dṛṣṭam
tat yathā ghaṭāḥ
rūpa ādimantaḥ ca paramāṇavaḥ
tasmāt kṛtakāḥ
kim ca anyat auṣṇya yogāt
yat auṣṇya yuktam tat kṛtakam
tat yathā pradīpaḥ
tadvantaḥ ca āgneyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ
tasmāt kṛtakāḥ
kiṃca vegavat tvāt
iha yat vegavat tat kṛtakam
tat yathā iṣuḥ vegavān
tadvantaḥ vāyavīyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ
tasmāt kṛtakāḥ
kiṃca sneha drava tva yogāt
iha yat sneha drava tva yuktam tat kṛtakam
yathā kedāra ādiṣu āpaḥ
ittham cāpyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ
tasmāt kṛtakāḥ
kiṃca ādheya tvāt
iha yat anyasmin ādhīyate tat kṛtakam
tat yathā ṭhaghavam
ādhīyante ca paramāṇavaḥ pṛthivyām
tasmāt kṛtakāḥ
kiṃca artha antara ādhāra tvāt
iha yat artha antarasya ādhāra tvam pratipadyate tat kṛtakam
tat yathā ghaṭaḥ
artha antarasya ca dvi aṇuka ādeḥ ādhāra tvam aṇavaḥ pratipadyante tasmāt kṛtakāḥ
kiṃca prāpti vyavadhānāt

original: iha yayormadhye antarā dravyamavasthitam prāptervyavadhāyakaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: iha yayoḥ madhye antarā dravyam avasthitam prāpteḥ vyavadhāyakam bhavati
tau kṛtakau
tat yathā dvi aṅgulī
tathā ca aṇū dvau antarā aṇu antaram avasthitam

original: yo yaḥ prāptervyavadhāyakaṃ tau kṛtakau tasmāttāvapi kṛtakau /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ prāpteḥ vyavadhāyakam tau kṛtakau tasmāt tau api kṛtakau
kiṃca dravya antara ārambhaka tvāt
iha yat dravya antara ārambhakam tat kṛtakam vaḥ
tat yathā tantuḥ
dravya ārambhakāḥ ca paramāṇavaḥ
tasmāt kṛtakāḥ
kiṃca pratyakṣa tvāt
iha yat pratyakṣam tat kṛtakam dṛṣṭam
tat yathā ghaṭaḥ
pratyakṣāḥ ca yoginām paramāṇavaḥ
tad kṛtakāḥ

original: ataeva kṛtakatvamiti cet syānmataṃ yata eva yogināṃ pratyakṣāḥ paramāṇavastata eva kṛtakāḥ /
analyzed: ataeva kṛtaka tvam iti ced syāt matam yatas eva yoginām pratyakṣāḥ paramāṇavaḥ tatas eva kṛtakāḥ
kim kāraṇam

original: asmadādipratyakṣaṃ ghaṭādi hi kṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā /
analyzed: asmat ādi pratyakṣam ghaṭa ādi hi kṛtakam dṛṣṭam iti kṛtvā
etat api anupapannam
kasmāt śarīra kṛtaka tva prasaṅgāt
śarīram api hi yoginām pratyakṣam
kāmam tat api akṛtakam astu
atha na etat eva tarhi na akṛtakāḥ paramāṇavaḥ
pradhāna ādiṣu prasaṃgaḥ iti ced na anabhyupagamāt
śrī kapila brāhmaṇaiḥ api pradhāna puruṣau apratyakṣau iti naḥ śāstram
tasmāt yat kiṃcid etat
sattā ādi vat iti ced syāt matam

original: yathā sattāguṇatvarūpatvādīnāṃ sati pratyakṣatve 'kṛtakatvam evaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: yathā sattā guṇa tva rūpa tva ādīnām sati pratyakṣa tve kṛtaka tvam evam paramāṇūnām bhaviṣyati iti
tat api ayuktam
kasmāt sādhya tvāt
paramāṇu akṛtaka tva vat sattā ādīnām sadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
tasmāt śaśaviṣāṇāt puruṣa viṣāṇa siddhi vat agrāhyam etat
saukṣmyāt aṇūnām kṛtaka tva aprasaṃgaḥ iti ced syāt matam

original: na hi paramāṇubhyaḥ sūkṣmataramanyad bhāvāntaramasti yadeṣāmārambhakaṃ syāt /
analyzed: na hi paramāṇubhyaḥ sūkṣmataram anyat bhāva antaram asti yat eṣām ārambhakam syāt
parā khalu eṣā kāṣṭhā saukṣmyasya yat paramāṇavaḥ
tasmāt eṣām kṛtaka tvam anupapannam iti
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt pāka jeṣu atiprasaṃgāt
saukṣmyāt akṛtaka tva prasaṃgaḥ
te pi paramāṇavaḥ sūkṣmāḥ
yat tu khalu ati saukṣmyāt pradhāna puruṣayoḥ akṛtaka tvam dṛṣṭam tat sati vibhu tve

original: na ca yathā pradhānapuruṣāvevamaṇavo 'pi viśvaṃ vyaśnuvate /
analyzed: na ca yathā pradhāna puruṣau evam aṇavaḥ viśvam vyaśnuvate
tasmāt sati
saukṣmye pāka ja vat eṣām kṛtaka tvam anivāryam

original: yeṣāṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ pacyata iti pakṣasteṣāmayamanupālambha ityataḥ paramāṇusamavetaṃ karmodāhāryam /
analyzed: yeṣām tu kārya dravyam pacyate iti pakṣaḥ teṣām ayam anupālambhaḥ iti atas paramāṇu samavetam karma udāhāryam

original: taddhi sūkṣmamatīndriyaṃ kṛtakaṃ ceti siddhaṃ kṛtakāḥparamāṇavaḥ /
analyzed: tat hi sūkṣmam atīndriyam kṛtakam ca iti siddham kṛtakāḥ paramāṇavaḥ
kṛtaka tvāt ca eṣām anitya tā api anapātinī iti kṛtvā antarāla pralaya mahāpralayeṣu pradhvaṃsāt paramāṇūnām kāraṇa abhāvāt kārya abhāvaḥ iti sva śāstra siddhāt anumānāt jagat ucchitti doṣa prasaṃgaḥ
tathā bhoginām upacitasya sva karmaṇaḥ n upabhogāt kṛtasya vipraṇāśaḥ
aniṣṭam ca etat
tasmāt na jagat kāraṇam paramāṇavaḥ
yā api khalu iyam āśaṃkā puruṣāt jagat utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati iti sā api ayuktā
kasmāt pratiṣedhāt
tasmāt ca viparyāsāt iti atra isk
puruṣasya akartṛ tvam upapādayiṣyāmaḥ

original: caitanyāviśeṣādīśvarasyāpi sa eva vidhiḥ kāraṇatvapratiṣedhe boddhavyaḥ /
analyzed: caitanya aviśeṣāt īśvarasya api saḥ eva vidhiḥ kāraṇatva pratiṣedhe boddhavyaḥ
āha asti evam īśvaraḥ iti pāśupata vaiśeṣikāḥ
kasmāt kārya viśeṣasya atiśaya buddhi pūrvaka tvāt
iha kārya viśeṣaḥ prāsāda vimāna ādiḥ atiśaya buddhi pūrvakaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
asti ca ayam mahābhūta indriya bhuvana vinyāsa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ kārya viśeṣaḥ
tasmāt anena api atiśaya buddhi pūrvakeṇa bhavitavyam
yad pūrvakaḥ yam saḥ īśvaraḥ
tasmāt asti īśvaraḥ iti
kim ca anyat cetana acetanayoḥ abhisambandhasya cetana kṛta tvāt
iha cetana acetanayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ cetana kṛtaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tat yathā go śakaṭayoḥ
asti ca ayam cetana acetanayoḥ śarīra śarīriṇoḥ abhisambandhaḥ
tasmāt anena api cetana kṛtena bhavitavyam
yad kṛtaḥ yam saḥ īśvaraḥ
tasmāt asti īśvaraḥ kāraṇam
ucyate yat tāvat uktam kārya viśeṣasya atiśaya buddhi pūrvaka tvāt īśvara sadbhāva siddhiḥ iti atra brūmaḥ na
sādhya tvāt
asmat ādi buddhi pūrvikāḥ prāsāda ādayaḥ
atiśaya buddhi pūrvikā vā iti sādhyam etat
tasmāt anuttaram
kiṃca prāk pradhāna pravṛtteḥ buddhi asambhavāt kāraṇa antara pratiṣedhāt pradhānāt ayam buddhi pūrvakam kārya viśeṣam kurvīta
prāk ca pradhāna vipariṇāmāt buddhiḥ eva na asti iti upapannam etat

original: śaktimattvātsvata iti cet syātpunaretat sarvaśaktipracita īśvaraḥ /
analyzed: śaktimat tvāt svatas iti ced syāt punar etat sarva śakti pracitaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: tasya prāgapi pradhānavipariṇāmātsvata evecchāyogād buddhisadbhāvo na pratiṣidhyata iti /
analyzed: tasya prāk api pradhāna vipariṇāmāt svatas eva icchā yogāt buddhi sadbhāvaḥ na pratiṣidhyate iti
etat api anupapannam
kasmāt dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt
buddhiḥ svatas evā iti atra paryanuyuktasya
kaḥ te dṛṣṭāntaḥ
tasmāt asat etat
śakti viśeṣāt adoṣaḥ iti ced
atha api syāt na anyeṣām buddhimatām īśvara tulyā śaktiḥ
atas eṣām pradhānāt śarīra vyūha sama kālam ātma ādi sannikarṣāt vā buddhayaḥ utpadyante iti
īśvarasya tu svatas iti
etat api anupapannam
kasmāt sarva vāda siddhi prasaṃgāt

original: dṛṣṭāntaviruddhamarthamādāya pratibadhyamānena śaktiviśeṣaḥ smartavya ityetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sarvavādasiddhiprasaṃgaḥ syāt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta viruddham artham ādāya pratibadhyamānena śakti viśeṣaḥ smartavyaḥ iti etasyām kalpanāyām sarva vāda siddhi prasaṃgaḥ syāt
tasmāt graha mātram etat

original: evaṃ svata īśvarasya buddhisambhavo na cedbhavet yuktamucyate prākpradhānapravṛtterbuddhyasambhavānna buddhimatpūrvako 'yaṃ kāryaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: evam svatas īśvarasya buddhi sambhavaḥ na ced bhavet yuktam ucyate prāk pradhāna pravṛtteḥ buddhi asambhavāt na buddhimat pūrvakaḥ yam kārya viśeṣaḥ
kiṃca phala anupapatteḥ

original: dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā phalamuddiśya buddhimantaḥ kāryaviśeṣānprāsādavimānādīnārabhamāṇā dṛśyante /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam vā phalam uddiśya buddhimantaḥ kārya viśeṣān prāsāda vimāna ādīn ārabhamāṇāḥ dṛśyante
an upahataḥ ca ayam aiśvaryāt
kim ca prayojaka anupapatteḥ
kim ca anekāntāt
na ca sarvaḥ kārya viśeṣaḥ buddhi pūrvakaḥ
vṛkṣa ādīnām tad vyatirekeṇa utpatteḥ
sarvasya īśvara buddhi pūrvaka tva abhyupagame dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ
na ca asti anudāhṛtaḥ vādaḥ
tasmāt anekāt na buddhimat pūrvakam vyaktam
kim ca duḥkha uttara tvāt
buddhi pūrvakaḥ ced asya kārya viśeṣaḥ syāt kartuḥ duḥkha uttara vidhāne prayojanam na asti
śaktimān ca ayam iti sukha uttaram eva vidadhyāt
duḥkha uttaraḥ ca ayam
tasmāt na buddhi pūrvakaḥ kārya viśeṣaḥ
kiṃca duḥkha upāya tvāt
buddhi pūrvakaḥ ced ayam kārya viśeṣaḥ syāt dharma artha kāma mokṣa prāptayaḥ sukha upāyāḥ syuḥ
duḥkha upāyāḥ ca
tasmāt abuddhi pūrvakaḥ
dharma adharma nimitta tvāt adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam

original: yadyapīśvarapūrvako 'yaṃ kāryaviśeṣaḥ tathāpyādisarge sukhottarāṇāmasmadutpannānāṃ prāṇināṃ dharmādharmaparigrahād hīnamadhyamotkṛṣṭavayojātisvabhāvādiyogo  #
analyzed: yadi api īśvara pūrvakaḥ yam kārya viśeṣaḥ tathā api ādisarge sukha uttarāṇām asmat utpannānām prāṇinām dharma adharma parigrahāt hīna madhyama utkṛṣṭa vayaḥ jāti svabhāva ādi yogaḥ
bhavati
tatas ca na aparādhaḥ yam īśvarasya iti
etat api ayuktam
kasmāt adharma utpatti hetu abhāvāt
īśvaraḥ ced dharma adharmayoḥ utpattau īṣṭe dharmam eva prāṇinām sukha hetu tvāt utpādayet na adharmam
prayojana abhāvāt
atha matam svābhāvikī dharma adharmayoḥ sva kāraṇāt utpattiḥ

original: yaduktaṃ sarvamīśvarabuddhipūrvakaṃ vyaktamiti tu tasya vyāghātaḥ /
analyzed: yat uktam sarvam īśvara buddhi pūrvakam vyaktam iti tu tasya vyāghātaḥ
tasmāt īśvaraḥ na kāraṇam
yat punar etat uktam cetana acetanayoḥ abhisambandhasya cetana kṛta tvāt īśvarasya sadbhāvaḥ iti
atra brūmaḥ ayuktam etat
kasmāt sādhya tvāt

original: yo 'yaṃ cetanācetanayorgośakaṭayorabhisambandhaḥ sa kena cetanena kṛtaḥ ?
analyzed: yaḥ yam cetana acetanayoḥ go śakaṭayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ sa kena cetanena kṛtaḥ
yadi caitreṇa
tasya kārya kāraṇa saṃghāta tvāt ācetanyam

original: atha caitraśabdavācyasya piṇḍasyopadraṣṭā kṣetrajñaḥ tatkṛta iṣyate tadayuktam,
analyzed: atha caitra śabda vācyasya piṇḍasya upadraṣṭā kṣetrajñaḥ tad kṛtaḥ iṣyate tat ayuktam
sādhya tvāt
na hi puruṣa kartṛ tvam asmad pakṣe prasiddham
ubhaya pakṣa prasiddhena vyavahāraḥ
kim ca anyat anavasthā prasaṃgāt
cetana acetanayoḥ abhisambandhasya cetana kṛta tvam bruvataḥ prāptam īśvara kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhisambandhasya cetana kṛta tvam
tathā ca anavasthā prasaṃgaḥ

original: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti svābhāvika īśvarasya kāryakāraṇayorabhisambandha iṣyate,
analyzed: atha mā bhūt ayam doṣaḥ iti svābhāvikaḥ īśvarasya kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ iṣyate
na tarhi aikāntikaḥ hetuḥ
tayoḥ ācetanyāt adoṣaḥ iti ced
syāt punar etat īśvarasya yat kāryakāraṇam tat api cetanam īśvaraḥ
tasmāt sambandhena pratyudāharaṇam upapadyate iti
etat ayuktam
kasmāt asambandha prasaṃgāt
caitanya aviśeṣāt ātmanaḥ ātma antareṇa abhisambandhaḥ na asti
evam īśvara kārya kāraṇayoḥ api na syāt
aniṣṭam ca etat
kim ca aviparyaya prasaṃgāt
ubhaya caitanya pratijñasya yathā īśvarasya karaṇam buddhi ādayaḥ
evam īśvaraḥ u pi buddhi ādīnām karaṇam syāt
kasmāt aviśeṣāt
atha etat aniṣṭam na
tarhi ubhayoḥ caitanyam

original: kāryakāraṇavattānabhyupagamādadoṣa iti cet vyāpī niravayavo 'nantaśaktiḥ sūkṣmebhyaḥ
analyzed: kārya kāraṇavat tā an abhyupagamāt adoṣaḥ iti ced vyāpī niravayavaḥ nanta śaktiḥ sūkṣmebhyaḥ
sūkṣmatamaḥ mahadbhyaḥ mahattamaḥ dhikaraṇa dharma anādiḥ iti evam ananta lakṣaṇam īśvara padārtha
tad vidaḥ vyācakṣate
tasya kutas kārya kāraṇam avalambya idam ādhyāropitam iti
etat api anupapannam
kasmāt anumāna virodhāt

original: itthaṃ cedīśvaro yadidamanumānaṃ kāryaviśeṣasyātiśayabuddhipūrvakatvācca cetanācetanayorabhisambandhasya cetanakṛtatvāditi tadvyāhanyate /
analyzed: ittham ced īśvaraḥ yat idam anumānam kārya viśeṣasya atiśaya buddhi pūrvaka tvāt ca cetana acetanayoḥ abhisambandhasya cetana kṛta tvāt iti tat vyāhanyate
kasmāt na hi etāvat īdṛśā arthena saha etat dṛṣṭam iti
upetya vā mūrti parigraha vyāghātāt
yadi ekāntena evaṃrūpaḥ īśvaraḥ
kṣiti ādi mūrti parigrahaḥ vyāhanyeta
kim ca anyat śruteḥ

original: śrutirapi cāsya mūrtimācaṣṭe kṛttivāsāḥ pinākahasto vitatadhanvā nīlaśikhaṇḍītyādi /
analyzed: śrutiḥ api ca asya mūrtim ācaṣṭe kṛttivāsāḥ pinākahastaḥ vitata dhanvā nīlaśikhaṇḍī ityādi
tad abhyupagamāt sva pakṣa hāniḥ iti ced
syāt matam yadi tarhi śruti vacanāt mūrtimān īśvaraḥ parigṛhyate
tena siddham asya astitvam

original: kasmāt ? na hyasato mūrtimattvamupapadyata iti kṛtvā /
analyzed: kasmāt na hi asataḥ mūrtimat tvam upapadyate iti kṛtvā
etat api ayuktam
abhiprāya an avabodhāt

original: na hyekāntena vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śaktiviśeṣaṃ pratyācakṣmahe,
analyzed: na hi ekāntena vayam bhagavataḥ śakti viśeṣam pratyācakṣmahe
māhātmya śarīra ādi parigrahāt

original: yathā tu bhavatocyate pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ tayoḥ prayoktā nāstītyayamasmadabhiprāyaḥ,
analyzed: yathā tu bhavatā ucyate pradhāna puruṣa vyatiriktaḥ tayoḥ prayoktā na asti iti ayam asmad abhiprāyaḥ
tasmāt etasya bādhakam
atas na pradhāna puruṣayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ nyakṛtaḥ
kim ca anyat aśakya tvāt

original: kurvāṇaḥ khalvapyayamabhisambandhaṃ śarīramātreṇa vā śarīriṇaḥ kuryāt,
analyzed: kurvāṇaḥ khalu api ayam abhisambandham śarīra mātreṇa vā śarīriṇaḥ kuryāt
śarīra kāraṇena vā
kim ca atas
tat na tāvat śarīra mātreṇa karoti
kasmāt anapekṣasya śarīra utpattau nimitta abhāvāt
na śarīra kāraṇena vibhu tvāt
paricchinnayoḥ go śakaṭayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ nyakṛtaḥ
vibhū ca pradhāna puruṣau
kim ca pārārthyāt
go śakaṭayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ para arthaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
na tu pradhāna puruṣayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ para arthaḥ iti
īśvara arthaḥ iti ced na ukta tvāt
dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa arthaḥ īśvarasya anupapannaḥ ityādau eva uktam etat
evam tāvat pāśupatānām īśvara parigrahe doṣaḥ
vaiśeṣikāṇām ca ayam doṣaḥ
kim ca dravya ādi padārtha antara bhāva abhāva parikalpanā anupapattiḥ ca
taiḥ īśvaraḥ dravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāya bhūtaḥ vā parikalpyamānaḥ parikalpyate
padārtha antara bhūtaḥ vā
kim ca atas
tat na tāvat dravya ādi bhūtaḥ

original: kasmāt ? dvividhaṃ hi dravyaṃ anekadravyamadravyaṃ ca /
analyzed: kasmāt dvividham hi dravyam aneka dravyam adravyam ca
tatra na aneka dravyam īśvaraḥ
kṛtaka tva ādi doṣa prasaṃgāt
na a dravyam parisaṃkhyānāt

original: pṛthivyādīni manaḥparyantāni navaiva dravyāṇi vaḥ siddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: pṛthivī ādīni manaḥ paryantāni nava eva dravyāṇi vaḥ siddhāntaḥ
iti karaṇasya parisamāpti artha tvāt
kim ca guṇa karma nirdeśāt

original: sati cāsya dravyatve vaiśeṣikaguṇanirdeśa ācāryeṇa kṛtaḥ syāt /
analyzed: sati ca asya dravya tve vaiśeṣika guṇa nirdeśaḥ ācāryeṇa kṛtaḥ syāt
kāraṇa antara prayoga samarthasya ca karma nirdiṣṭam syāt
na tu tathā
tasmāt na dravya guṇa ādayaḥ
āśraya paratantrāḥ hi guṇa ādayaḥ para arthāḥ
evam na dravya ādi bhūtaḥ na api padārtha antara bhūtaḥ
padārtha tve hi sati dravya ādi vat lakṣaṇam uktam abhaviṣyat
ācāryeṇa tu na uktam
na asti īśvaraḥ
liṅgāt iti ced
syāt matam saṃjñā karma tvam asmad viśiṣṭānām liṅgam

original: pratyakṣapūrvakatvādvā saṃjñākarmaṇa ityetasmālliṅgādīśvaraparigraha ācāryasya siddha iti /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt vā saṃjñā karmaṇaḥ iti etasmāt liṅgāt īśvara parigrahaḥ ācāryasya siddhaḥ iti
tat api ayuktam
kasmāt abhipreta asiddheḥ

original: satyamanena liṅgenāsmadādibhyo viśiṣṭaśakteḥ kasyacideva māhātmyaśarīrasyānyasya vā pratipattiḥ syāt /
analyzed: satyam anena liṅgena asmat ādibhyaḥ viśiṣṭa śakteḥ kasyacid eva māhātmya śarīrasya anyasya vā pratipattiḥ syāt

original: saṃjñāmātraṃ tu yathā bhavadbhiḥ sarvakāraṇānāṃ sṛṣṭyupasaṃhārapravṛttiheturekaḥ svatantra iṣyate /
analyzed: saṃjñā mātram tu yathā bhavadbhiḥ sarva kāraṇānām sṛṣṭi upasaṃhāra pravṛtti hetuḥ ekaḥ svatantraḥ iṣyate
tathā ca asmāt liṅgāt pratipattiḥ
kim ca anyat
prāk anupadeśe kauśala prasaṃgāt

original: īśvaraparatantre cedaṇūnāṃ pravṛttinivṛttī syātāṃ tameva prāgupadiśet /
analyzed: īśvara paratantre ced aṇūnām pravṛtti nivṛttī syātām tam eva prāk upadiśet
dharmavat pradhāna padārthasya vā prāk anupadeśāt akuśalaḥ sūtrakāraḥ iti etat āpadyate
na ca etat iṣṭam ubhayam
kim ca anyat a saṃkīrtanāt
śāstra pradeśe ca ayam īśvaraḥ na kasmiṃścid api ācāryeṇa saṃkīrtitaḥ

original: na cāsya vadhvā iva śvaśuranāmasaṃkīrtane doṣopapattiḥ syāt /
analyzed: na ca asya vadhvāḥ iva śvaśura nāma saṃkīrtane doṣa upapattiḥ syāt
doṣa saṃvibhāga artham idam ācāryasya aniṣṭam adhyāropyate
na tu matam asya etat
evam kāṇādānām īśvaraḥ sti iti pāśupata upajñam etat
tasmāt īśvaraḥ upi akāraṇam
karma aṇubhiḥ vyākhyātam
katham yathā kṛtaka tvāt na jagat kāraṇam aṇavaḥ
evam karma api na śarīra nimittam
tasmāt tat api akāraṇam
itaretara nimitta tvāt adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam

original: yathāntareṇa śarīraṃ karma notpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamevamantareṇa karma śarīrasyāpi kāraṇāntaramaśakyaṃ kalpayitumiti parasparanimittatvānnāsya parivartasya  #
analyzed: yathā antareṇa śarīram karma na utpadyamānam dṛṣṭam evam antareṇa karma śarīrasya api kāraṇa antaram aśakyam kalpayitum iti paraspara nimitta tvāt na asya parivartasya
pūrva koṭiḥ prajñāyate
tasmāt na asti anayoḥ kāraṇa antaram iti
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt anavasthānām avasthāna pūrvaka tva darśanāt
tat yathā śukra śoṇitāt śarīram śarīrāt śukra śoṇitam iti asya parivartasya pūrva koṭiḥ adṛṣṭā
pratijñāyate ca ayonija tvam īśvara śarīrāṇām ādisarge ca
tathā ca bīja aṅkura ādayaḥ ṅkura ādibhyaḥ bījam iti anavasthā
bhāti ca atra ādisarge paramāṇu mātrāt api bīja prādurbhāvaḥ tathā śarīra karmaṇoḥ anavasthā
idānīm api ca ādisarge ca adhikāra mātra vaśāt śarīra utpattiḥ syāt
sādhāraṇa vigraha tva prasaṃgaḥ iti ced syāt etat

original: yadyadhikāranimittā śarīrotpattirādisarge 'bhyupagamyate prāptamekena śarīreṇa sarvapuruṣāṇāmabhisambandho niyamahetvabhāvāt /
analyzed: yadi adhikāra nimittā śarīra utpattiḥ ādisarge bhyupagamyate prāptam ekena śarīreṇa sarva puruṣāṇām abhisambandhaḥ niyama hetu abhāvāt
tatas ca śarīra antara ānarthakyam
tena eva sarveṣām upabhoga sāmarthyāt iti
etat anupapannam
kasmāt pratyakṣa virodhāt
satyam etat anumānataḥ
pratyakṣatas tu śarīrāṇi pratipuruṣam
tasmāt na ayam prasaṃgaḥ

original: apavarganiyamaprasaṃga iti cet syānmataṃ yadyadhikāramātravaśāccharīrotpattiḥ paramarṣerevāpavargasādhanaṃ śarīrādutpadyeteti /
analyzed: apavarga niyama prasaṃgaḥ iti ced syāt matam yadi adhikāra mātra vaśāt śarīra utpattiḥ parama ṛṣeḥ eva apavarga sādhanam śarīrāt utpadyeta iti
ucyate na tasya eva

original: kiṃ tarhi sarveṣāṃ guṇānāṃ prādhānyāttannimittāni śarīrāṇyādisarge sāṃsiddhikānyutpadyante /
analyzed: kim tarhi sarveṣām guṇānām prādhānyāt tad nimittāni śarīrāṇi ādisarge sāṃsiddhikāni utpadyante

original: tatra yasya sattvapradhānaṃ kāryakaraṇaṃ sa paramarṣiḥ /
analyzed: tatra yasya sattva pradhānam kārya karaṇam sa parama ṛṣiḥ
yasya sattvam rajaḥ bahulam sa māhātmya śarīraḥ

original: evaṃ guṇasamparkād guṇapradhānāpradhānabhāvena yāvatsthāvaraśarīraprādurbhāva ityato nāsti guṇānāṃ śarīraviniyogapakṣapātaḥ /
analyzed: evam guṇa samparkāt guṇa pradhāna apradhāna bhāvena yāvat sthāvara śarīra prādurbhāvaḥ iti atas na asti guṇānām śarīra viniyoga pakṣapātaḥ
tasmāt yuktam etat kṛtaka tvāt na karma jagat kāraṇam iti
etena ca evam vyākhyām
tat api hi karmaṇām eva prāpta paripākāṇām abhidhānam artha antaram eva iti ced sādhyam
tasmāt api akalpanīyam iti
yat api uktam kālāt jagat utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati iti tat anupapannam
kasmāt kāraṇa parispandasya eva tad abhidhāna sanniveśāt

original: na hi naḥ kālo nāma kaścidasti,
analyzed: na hi naḥ kālaḥ nāma kaścid asti
kim tarhi kriyamāṇa kriyāṇām eva āditya gati godoha ghaṭa āstanita ādīnām viśiṣṭa avadhi sarūpa pratyaya nimitta tvat
para apara ādi liṅga sadbhāvāt pratipattiḥ iti ced na
akṛtakeṣu tad anupapatteḥ

original: yadeva kṛtakaṃ tatraiva paramaparamityādiḥ pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: yat eva kṛtakam tatra eva param aparam ityādiḥ pratyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
sa yadi kriyā vyatirikta nimittaḥ syāt aviśeṣāt nitya anityeṣu syāt

original: kvacitsāmarthādapākajavadadoṣa iti cet syānmatam- yathāgnisaṃyogaḥ pākajahetuḥ tathā cāviśeṣe 'pi pṛthivyāmeva pākajotpattinimittaṃ bhavati  #
analyzed: kvacid sāmarthāt apākaja vat adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam yathā agni saṃyogaḥ pāka ja hetuḥ tathā ca aviśeṣe pi pṛthivyām eva pāka ja utpatti nimittam bhavati
na ākāśa ādiṣu

original: evaṃ kālo 'pi parāparādiheturatha cānityeṣveva syānna nityeṣviti /
analyzed: evam para apara ādi hetuḥ atha ca anityeṣu eva syāt na nityeṣu iti
tat ca ayuktam
kasmāt viśeṣa upapatteḥ
rūpa ādi vikriyā hetuḥ agniḥ tat yuktam yat asau tadvati dravye pāka jān ādadyāt na
tadvati ākāśa ādau
kālaḥ tu sambandha mātra upakārī na vikriyā hetuḥ
tasmāt asat etat

original: evaṃ yadi kriyābhyo 'nyaḥ kāla iṣyate kāraṇaparispandasya jagatkāraṇatvamathānyatsādhyam /
analyzed: evam yadi kriyābhyaḥ nyaḥ kālaḥ iṣyate kāraṇa parispandasya jagat kāraṇa tvam atha anyat sādhyam
yadṛcchā api na kāraṇam karma vat kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt
kārya kāraṇa bhūtam hi idam vyaktam iti prāk vyākhyātam

original: sa ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ prekṣāpūrvakṛtānāṃ śayanādīnāmupalabdhau yādṛcchikeṣu cānupalabdhau na tasyā liṅgamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
analyzed: sa ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ prekṣā pūrva kṛtānām śayana ādīnām upalabdhau yādṛcchikeṣu ca anupalabdhau na tasyāḥ liṅgam iti śakyam vaktum
abhāvaḥ pi akāraṇam
parimāṇa ādi darśanāt

original: na hi tata utpannānāṃ parimāṇamupapadyata ityato nāpyanvayaḥ /
analyzed: na hi tatas utpannānām parimāṇam upapadyate iti atas na api anvayaḥ
sātmaka nirātmakayoḥ atyanta jāti bhedāt
nā api śaktiḥ tad abhāvāt
na upakāraḥ nava sthānāt
na vibhāgaḥ nirātmaka tvāt
tasmāt na paramāṇu puruṣa īśvara karma daiva kāla svabhāva yadṛcchā bhāvebhyaḥ vyaktam utpadyate
na ced ebhyaḥ
pariśeṣataḥ pradhānasya eva astitva liṅgam idam
tasmāt yuktam etat bhedānām parimāṇa ādibhyaḥ kāraṇam asti avyaktam iti
kārikā
āha evam api asya vyakta hetu tvam anupapannam ekatvāt
bahūnām kārya ārambhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tantu ādīnām
ekam pradhānam
tasmāt na tad ārambha śakti yuktam iti
ucyate yadi api guṇānām pradhāna lakṣaṇam avasthā antaram abhinna buddhi nimitta tvāt ekam api
kārya kāle kiṃcid vaiṣamya upajanita vyapadeśya rūpābhiḥ itaretara upakāriṇībhiḥ śaktibhiḥ
smudāya tvam āpadyate
tasmāt idānīm
pravartate triguṇataḥ samudayāt ca
pravartate iti anena utpattim ācaṣṭe
triguṇataḥ iti avyapadeśya rūpāṇām pradhāna apradhāna bhāvena guṇa śaktīnām vaiṣamyāt vyapadeśya rūpa antaram āha

original: yatraitacchakyate vaktuṃ trayaḥ sattvādaya iti tadavasthānaṃ kāryārambhakamiti /
analyzed: yatra etat śakyate vaktum trayaḥ sattva ādayaḥ iti tad avasthānam kārya ārambhakam iti
samudayāt iti anena paraspara apekṣāṇām ārambha śaktim avadyotayati

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kāryakāle guṇāḥ parityaktapūrvāvasthā bhedaṃ pratilabhya parasparopakāreṇa saṃhanyate /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati kārya kāle guṇāḥ parityakta pūrva avasthāḥ bhedam pratilabhya paraspara upakāreṇa saṃhanyate
saṃhatāḥ ca vyaktam utpādayanti
tasmāt na avasthā antarasya abhinna buddhi nimitta tvāt pradhāna ekatva doṣaḥ guṇa bhedāt na ekasya kārya ārambhaḥ iti
āha niṣkriya tvāt tarhi prakṛteḥ kārya ārambhaḥ nu papannaḥ
kriyā tva anabhyupagame vā vyakta vaidharmya virodhaḥ iti
ucyate na kriyā vaidharmya bhedāt

original: dvividhā hi kriyā praspandalakṣaṇā pariṇāmalakṣaṇā ca /
analyzed: dvividhā hi kriyā praspanda lakṣaṇā pariṇāma lakṣaṇā ca
tatra praspandaḥ pradhānasya saukṣmyāt pratiṣidhyate
pariṇāmataḥ
tu tat kāryam ārabhate iti

original: āha- nanu ca pariṇāmo 'pi saukṣmyātpradhānasya nopapadyate /
analyzed: āha nanu ca saukṣmyāt pradhānasya na upapadyate

original: kasmāt ? na hi saukṣmyātsūkṣmasyākāśādervipariṇāmo dṛṣṭa iti /
analyzed: kasmāt na hi saukṣmyāt sūkṣmasya ākāśa ādeḥ vipariṇāmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti
ucyate
saṃskārasya saukṣmye pi pariṇāmaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ
tasmāt yuktaḥ sūkṣma pariṇāmī iti
āha kaḥ punar ayam pariṇāmaḥ nāma
ucyate
jahat dharma antaram pūrvam ādatte yadā param

original: tattvādapracyuto dharmī pariṇāmaḥ sa ucyate // iti /
analyzed: tattvāt apracyutaḥ dharmī pariṇāmaḥ saḥ ucyate iti

original: yadā śaktyantarānugrahātpūrvadharmān tirobhāvya svarūpādapracyuto dharmī dharmāntareṇāvirbhavati tadavasthānamasmākaṃ pariṇāma ityucyate /
analyzed: yadā śakti antara anugrahāt pūrva dharmān tirobhāvya svarūpāt apracyutaḥ dharmī dharma antareṇa āvirbhavati tat avasthānam asmākam pariṇāmaḥ iti ucyate
āha na etat abhidhāna mātram dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa pratipadyāmahe
tasmāt yathā kim iti vaktavyam

original: ucyate- yathā pālāśaṃ palāśādapracyutanimittāntarasyātapāderanugrahācchyāmatāṃ tirobhāvya pītatāṃ vrajati tathedaṃ draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: ucyate yathā pālāśam palāśāt apracyuta nimitta antarasya ātapa ādeḥ anugrahāt śyāma tām tirobhāvya pīta tām vrajati tathā idam draṣṭavyam
āha na anyathā utpatteḥ apratiṣedhāt

original: kathaṃ punaretavagamyate pālāśaṃ svarūpādapracyutaṃ dharmāntarasya parityāgamupādānaṃ ca karoti,
analyzed: katham punar etad avagamyate pālāśam svarūpāt a pracyutam dharma antarasya parityāgam upādānam ca karoti
na punar anyathā ca anyathā ca upapadyate iti

original: ucyate- kṣaṇabhaṅgapratiṣedhāt prāgeva kṣaṇabhaṅganirdiṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭānāṃ bhāvānāṃ punarutpattau nāsti kāraṇam /
analyzed: ucyate kṣaṇa bhaṅga pratiṣedhāt prāk eva kṣaṇa bhaṅga nirdiṣṭam vinaṣṭānām bhāvānām punarutpattau na asti kāraṇam
tad abhāve ca utpattiḥ ayuktā iti
āha dharma dharmiṇoḥ ananyatva abhyupagamāt dharma utpatti vināśe dharmi utpatti vināśa prasaṃgaḥ
na hi vaḥ dharmebhyaḥ nyaḥ dharmī

original: tatra yadi dharmasya nivṛttirabhyupagamyate dharmiṇo 'pi nivṛttirananyatvātprāptā /
analyzed: tatra yadi dharmasya nivṛttiḥ abhyupagamyate dharmiṇaḥ u pi nivṛttiḥ ananyatvāt prāptā
dharma utpattau tad utpattiḥ
tatra yat uktam dharma utpatti virodhe dharmī svarūpa avasthānam iti etat ayuktam
ucyate na senā ādi vat vyavasthāna upapatteḥ
tat yathā senā aṅgebhyaḥ na anya tvam senāyāḥ
na ca senā aṅgānām vināśe senā vināśaḥ
tat yathā na anyaḥ paṭaḥ
bauddhānām saṃyoga avayavi pratiṣedhāt
na ca paṭa vināśe tantu vināśaḥ

original: tatra yaduktaṃ dharmivināśe dharmavināśa iti etadayuktam /
analyzed: tatra yat uktam dharmi vināśe dharma vināśaḥ iti etat ayuktam
āha evam api ayuktam
tat kasmāt sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ dharmi svarūpa parikalpanā anupapatteḥ

original: iha rūpādisāmānyaṃ vā dharmirūpatvena parikalpyamānaṃ parikalpyeta rūpādiviśeṣo vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ /
analyzed: iha rūpa ādi sāmānyam vā dharmi rūpa tvena parikalpyamānam parikalpyeta rūpa ādi viśeṣaḥ vā kim ca atas
tatra tāvat rūpa ādi sāmānyam dharmi svarūpam iti śakyam kalpayitum
kasmāt asambhavāt

original: yadi tāvatpṛthivī sāmānyaṃ ghaṭādirviśeṣastena pṛthivyapi tanmātrāpekṣayā viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: yadi tāvat pṛthivī sāmānyam ghaṭa ādiḥ viśeṣaḥ tena pṛthivī api tanmātra apekṣayā viśeṣaḥ
yāvat pradhānam iti na asti sāmānyam
atha viśeṣāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ teṣām viśeṣa antareṇa saha avasthānāt dharmi svarūpa anavasthānāt

original: tataśca yaduktaṃ svarūpādapracyuto dharmī dharmāntaraṃ vijahāti,
analyzed: tatas ca yat uktam svarūpāt apracyutaḥ dharmī dharma antaram vijahāti
dharma antaram upādatte iti tat vyāhanyate iti
ucyate yat uktam rūpa ādi sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ dharmi svarūpa parikalpanā anupapattiḥ iti
astu sāmānyam

original: yattūktaṃ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyāntarāpekṣaṃ viśeṣatvamiti na pratyayanivṛttau sāmānyābhāvāvasthitestataśca dharmisvarūpasiddheḥ,
analyzed: yat tu uktam sāmānyam sāmānya antara apekṣam viśeṣa tvam iti na pratyaya nivṛttau sāmānya abhāva avasthiteḥ tatas ca dharmi svarūpa siddheḥ

original: yāvatpṛthivītyayaṃ pratyayo na nivartate sāmānyaṃ ghaṭādirviśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: yāvat pṛthivī iti ayam pratyayaḥ na nivartate sāmānyam ghaṭa ādiḥ viśeṣaḥ
dravya tvam ca asau
dharma antara parivarteṣu tad ākāra pratyaya utpattitaḥ svarūpa avasthāna siddheḥ dharmāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ

original: yadā tu pṛthivīpratyayanivṛttistadā tanmātrāṇāṃ sāmānyabhāvo dravyatvaṃ ca viśeṣo dharma iti yāvatpradhānaṃ tasya tu sāmānyāntarānupapatteḥ  #
analyzed: yadā tu pṛthivī pratyaya nivṛttiḥ tadā tanmātrāṇām sāmānya bhāvaḥ dravya tvam ca viśeṣaḥ dharmaḥ iti yāvat pradhānam tasya tu sāmānya antara anupapatteḥ
kauṭasthyam eva
yatra sarva viśeṣa abhāvaḥ tat pradhānam

original: yadi tu pṛthivyādīnāṃ nityamavyāvṛtaṃ sati kauṭasthyameṣāṃ prāptam /
analyzed: yadi tu pṛthivī ādīnām nityam avyāvṛtam sati kauṭasthyam eṣām prāptam
tasmāt na dharmi svarūpa abhāvaḥ
śakteḥ vā sāmānya bhāva abhyupagamāt

original: athavā sukhaduḥkhamohaśaktaya eveha mahadādinā viśeṣāntena liṅgena pariṇāmaṃ pratipadyante /
analyzed: athavā sukha duḥkha moha śaktayaḥ eva iha mahat ādinā viśeṣa antena liṅgena pariṇāmam pratipadyante

original: tāsāṃ ca satataṃ sāmānyapratyayanimittatvātsvarūpādapracyute taddravyatvaṃ liṅgasya dharmatvam /
analyzed: tāsām ca satatam sāmānya pratyaya nimitta tvāt svarūpāt apracyute tat dravya tvam liṅgasya dharma tvam
aprasiddheḥ ayuktam iti ced na ukta tvāt
prāk uktam etat sukha ādi pūrvakam viśvam iti
āha evam api vaiśvarūpya anupapattiḥ
kāraṇa viśeṣāt

original: yadi sukhādiśaktaya eva pariṇāminyo yadidaṃ brahmādi sthāvarāntaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ tannopapadyate /
analyzed: yadi sukha ādi śaktayaḥ eva pariṇāminyaḥ yat idam brahma ādi sthāvara antam vaiśvarūpyam tat na upapadyate
kasmāt na hi abhinnam kāryam utpadyate iti
ucyate śaktitaḥ ca pariṇāmini
bhavati tena vaiśvarūpyam katham
salila vat prati prati guṇa āśraya viśeṣāt
yathā antarikṣa a viśiṣṭasya ambhasaḥ pracyutiḥ āśrayeṇa go bhujaṅgama uṣṭra ādīnām
viśeṣāt kṣīra mūtra viṣa ādi vaiśvarūpyam ca upapadyate

original: tathā guṇaśaktayo viśiṣṭāḥ parasparāśrayaviśeṣād brahmādi stambāntaṃ jātyākṛtivāgbuddhisvabhāvāhāravihārarūpaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ pratipadyante /
analyzed: tathā guṇa śaktayaḥ viśiṣṭāḥ paraspara āśraya viśeṣāt brahma ādi stamba antam jāti ākṛti vāc buddhi svabhāva āhāra vihāra rūpam vaiśvarūpyam pratipadyante
tasmāt siddham etat prakṛtiḥ eva sarva bhāvanām prasavitrī
na ca kaścid doṣaḥ iti
yuktidīpikāyām sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau caturtham āhnikam
kārikā
āha samadhigatam pradhānam
puruṣaḥ idānīm kārya kāraṇa vyatiriktaḥ sti iti etat pratipādyam

original: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet anupalabhyamānasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvādityuktam /
analyzed: kutas saṃśayaḥ iti ced anupalabhyamānasya ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt iti uktam
kim ca anyat
ācārya vipratipatteḥ

original: vijñānaskandhavyatirikto nāsti kaścidartha iti śākyaputrīyāḥ pratipannāḥ /
analyzed: vijñāna skandha vyatiriktaḥ na asti kaścid arthaḥ iti śākyaputrīyāḥ pratipannāḥ
kasmāt sarva pramāṇa anupalabdheḥ
iha yat asti tat pratyakṣa ādinā pramāṇena upalabhyate
tat yathā rūpa ādi
tatas ca tāvat ayam ātmā na pratyakṣataḥ upalabhyate
kasmāt a śabda ādi lakṣaṇāt
na antar pratyakṣataḥ
kasmāt triguṇa ādi viparītasya tad aviṣaya tvāt
na pūrvavat śeṣavadbhyām
kārya kāraṇa anupapatteḥ
na ca sāmānyatodṛṣṭāt
dharma sāmānya abhāvāt
na āpta vacanāt
anabhyupagamāt
na hi bauddhānām śruti smṛti purāṇa itihāsāḥ pramāṇam
yaḥ ca eṣām āgamaḥ saḥ evam āha
ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ na asti viparītena kalpyate
na eva iha sattvam ātmā asti dharmāḥ tu ete sa hetukāḥ
dvādaśa eva tava aṅgāni skandha āyatana dhātavaḥ

original: yatpunaretaduktaṃ “asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyata” iti satyametat /
analyzed: yat punar etat uktam asti karma asti vipākaḥ kārakaḥ tu na upalabhyate iti satyam etat

original: na hi puruṣaskandhānāṃ nikṣepe pratisaṃdhāne 'nyatra vā kāraka iti naḥ pakṣaḥ /

original: maraṇamiti pūrvakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalabhogaparisamāpteḥ sāmpratasya ca phalabhogasya pratyupasthāne liṅgasya pūrvaśarīratyāgaḥ /
analyzed: maraṇam iti pūrva kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phala bhoga parisamāpteḥ sāmpratasya ca phala bhogasya pratyupasthāne liṅgasya pūrva śarīra tyāgaḥ
karaṇam trayodaśavidham iti isk vakṣyati

original: janma ca maraṇaṃ ca karaṇāni ca janmamaraṇakaraṇāni /

teṣām pratipuruṣam niyamaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati- janmalakṣaṇaṃ ca maraṇalakṣaṇaṃ ca kāryakāraṇasyāvasthāntaram /

paraspara virodhinī tamaḥ prakāśa vat

original: tatra yadyeka ātmā syāt tena yathaikaṃ dravyaṃ tamaḥprakāśāvekapradeśopanipātinau na śaknotyanubhavitumasambhavāt,

evam ayam janma maraṇe api na śaknuyāt upabhoktum
asti ca ayam kenacid kārya karaṇena janma upabhogaḥ kenacid maraṇa upabhogaḥ
tena manyāmahe nānā ātmānaḥ
yeṣām virodhi dharma upabhoga sāmarthyam iti
tathā karaṇānām prakāśa atiśayaḥ viṣaya grahaṇa lakṣaṇa aśuddhi atiśayaḥ ca aṣṭāviṃśatidhā āśaktiḥ
tayoḥ paraspara virodhāt ekena ātmanā yugapad upabhogaḥ na upapadyate

original: na hi śakyamekenātmanā prakāśātiśayo viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇo 'śuddhyatiśayaścāśaktilakṣaṇo virodhitvādyugapadupabhoktum /

original: yathā caite tathā tatpratiyogino nairguṇyādayaḥ puruṣadharmāḥ /

adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam katham iti

original: ucyate- yathā hi kriyāsākṣiṇi kasmiṃścidavasthite kartā tadicchānuvidhāyī kāryaṃ nirvartayati,

kaivalyam iti anena saṃsarga dharma tvam ātmanaḥ nivartayati

original: na yathā sattvādīnāṃ paraspareṇa prakāśādidharmāpekṣāṇāṃ saṃsargaḥ,
analyzed: na yathā sattva ādīnām paraspareṇa prakāśa ādi dharma apekṣāṇām saṃsargaḥ

original: mādhyasthyamityanenātiśayanihrāsānupapatteḥ puruṣasya guṇaiḥ saha bādhānugrahānupapattiṃ svakāryapravṛttau cāpakṣapātaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: mādhyasthyam iti anena atiśaya nihrāsa anupapatteḥ puruṣasya guṇaiḥ saha bādhā anugraha anupapattim sva kārya pravṛttau ca apakṣapātam darśayati
draṣṭṛ tvam iti anena udāsīnasya kārya kāraṇa piṇḍa vyūha sama kālam caitanya śakti sadbhāvāt sukha duḥkha moha svabhāvānām
guṇa ceṣṭānām anivṛtta arthānām sannidhāna mātrāt upalabdhi mātram pratijānāti
akartṛ bhāvaḥ ca iti anena saptavidham akartṛ tvam āśrayati
na hi ayam viṣayeṣu bāhya antaḥkaraṇa sānnidhye dhyavasāyam kurute

original: na ca sattvādīnāṃ prakāśapravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇairdharmairitaretaropakāreṇa pravartamānānāṃ svena caitanyalakṣaṇena dharmeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ pratipadyate,
analyzed: na ca sattva ādīnām prakāśa pravṛtti niyama lakṣaṇaiḥ dharmaiḥ itaretara upakāreṇa pravartamānānām svena caitanya lakṣaṇena dharmeṇa aṅga bhāvam pratipadyate
na api aṅgi bhāvam

original: evaṃ saha guṇaiḥ kāryaṃ na kurute strīkumāravat /

sthita prayogam na kurute ratha śakaṭa yantra preraka vat

na paratas kumbhakāra vat
na api adeśāt māyākāra vat
na ubhayatas mātṛ pitṛ vat

original: tadevamanena sūtreṇācāryaḥ puruṣasyādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ nairguṇyamaudāsīnyaṃ bhoktṛtvamakartṛtvaṃ ca sādhyatāmāpādya triguṇayādiviparyayaṃ sādhanatvenopanyati
analyzed: tat evam anena sūtreṇa ācāryaḥ puruṣasya adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam nairguṇyam audāsīnyam bhoktṛ tvam akartṛ tvam ca sādhya tām āpādya triguṇayā ādi viparyayam sādhana tvena upanyati

original: taiḥ pañcabhistriguṇādiviparītaiḥ karmabhiḥ pañcānāmeṣāṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pravṛttiravagantavyā /

āha tad asiddheḥ

original: yadyasya sukhādidharmatvamātmanaḥ prasiddhaṃ syādata etadyujjate vaktum /

tattva siddham

viśeṣa anabhidhānāt itarāt siddhiḥ api iti ced syāt matam

original: ātmaguṇāḥ sukhādayo na śabdaguṇā ityatrāpi bhavatā viśeṣo nābhidhīyate /

etat api ayuktam

tasmāt sukha duḥkhayoḥ śabda ādi ātma bhāvaḥ na yuktaḥ
ucyate na gaura ādiṣu anekāntāt

original: tadyathā gauraḥ kṛṣṇo 'hamiti śarīradharmerātmano bhinnādhikaraṇatvamahaṅkāreṇa evaṃ sukhaduḥkhayorapi syāt /
analyzed: tat yathā gauraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ham iti śarīra dharmeḥ ātmanaḥ bhinna adhikaraṇa tvam ahaṅkāreṇa evam sukha duḥkhayoḥ api syāt
na ca ātma guṇa tvam syāt iti
āha pṛthak upalabdheḥ ayuktam

original: yadyapi gaurādīnāmavibhaktamahaṃkāreṇa grahaṇaṃ tathāpi pṛthagayaṃ prāgetānātmano gṛhītvā paścādavibhaktāngṛhṇanśaktnoti vyavasthāpayitumuṣyaite  #
analyzed: yadi api gaura ādīnām avibhaktam ahaṃkāreṇa grahaṇam tathā api pṛthak ayam prāk etān ātmanaḥ gṛhītvā paścāt avibhaktān gṛhṇan śaktnoti vyavasthāpayitum uṣya ete
na punar amuṣya iti
na tu evam sukha duḥkhayoḥ pṛthak upalabdhiḥ

ucyate na evam utpadyate
kasmāt mārga antara gamanāt
ahaṃkāreṇa avibhakta grahaṇāt ātma guṇa tvam iti prāk apadiṣṭam

original: idānīṃ tu satyapi tasminpṛthaggrahaṇādabhāvaṃ bruvato mārgāntaragamanamanaikāntikasya cāparihāraḥ /

original: yata eva gaurādayaḥ pṛthagupalabhyante na sukhādayo eva saṃśayaḥ /

original: na ca yata eva saṃśayastata eva nirṇayo yuktaḥ /

kim ca anyat
svabhāva anavadhāraṇāt anupādāna prasaṃgāt
sukha ādi ātmakāḥ śabda ādayaḥ iti ced syāt matam

original: yathāgniḥ pākajanimittamupādīyate 'tha caiṣāṃ pārthivatvamevaṃ śabdādayo 'pi sukhādinimittatvenopādīyeran atha caiṣāmātmaguṇatvameva syāditi
analyzed: yathā agniḥ pāka ja nimittam upādīyate ca eṣām pārthiva tvam evam śabda ādayaḥ api sukha ādi nimitta tvena upādīyeran atha ca eṣām ātma guṇa tvam eva syāt iti
tat api anupapannam
