original: yathā nimittasyāgnerna pākajaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pakvo 'gniḥ pacyate 'gniriti evaṃ śabdādīnāṃ nimittatvānna sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yathā nimittasya agneḥ na pāka jaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam pakvaḥ gniḥ pacyate gniḥ iti evam śabda ādīnām nimitta tvāt na sāmānādhikaraṇyam syāt
sukha śabdaḥ duḥkhaḥ iti dṛṣṭam tu
tasmāt na teṣām nimitta arthena upādānam iti

original: āha, evamapi sukhādīnāṃ śabdādyātmabhāvo na yuktaḥ /
analyzed: āha evam api sukha ādīnām śabda ādi ātma bhāvaḥ na yuktaḥ
kasmāt vipratipatteḥ

original: yathā hi śabdāḥ śabdātmakā eti sarvaiḥ śabdarūpeṇa gṛhyante,
analyzed: yathā hi śabdāḥ śabda ātmakāḥ sarvaiḥ śabda rūpeṇa gṛhyante
evam sukha ātmakaḥ yam iti sarvaiḥ tad rūpeṇa gṛhyate
dṛṣṭā tu vipratipattiḥ
tasmāt ātma guṇāḥ iti
ucyate na saṃskāra viśeṣa nimitta tvāt
tat yathā pitta ādi sāmarthāt mādhurya ādiṣu vipratipattiḥ
na ca eṣām aśabda ādi guṇa tva saṃskāra viśeṣa yogāt sukha ādiṣu vipratipattiḥ
na ca eṣām aśabda ādi guṇa tvam iti
kim ca anyat
nimitta tve pi tad prasaṃgāt
nimitta vādinaḥ pi etat samānam
na hi nimitta naimittikayoḥ vipratipattiḥ asti
tat yathā pradīpa prakāśayoḥ
tatas ca vipratipatteḥ nimitta tvam api śabda ādīnām akalpanīyam syāt
yaḥ ca dvayoḥ doṣaḥ na tam ekaḥ codyate iti

original: ātmaguṇākāṃkṣitvādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam nimittapradhānatvādanyaparipākavaśena sukhaduḥkhenotpādayatyātmanaḥ /
analyzed: ātma guṇa ākāṃkṣi tvāt adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam nimitta pradhāna tvāt anya paripāka vaśena sukha duḥkhena utpādayati ātmanaḥ

original: tanmayatve tu nirākāṃkṣatvātpradhānasya vyavasthābhedo na yukta iti /
analyzed: tad maya tve tu nirākāṃkṣa tvāt pradhānasya vyavasthā bhedaḥ na yuktaḥ iti
tat ca na evam
kasmāt ukta tvāt
tad maya tve pi guṇa bhāvāt mādhurya ādiṣu vipratipattiḥ iti ādau eva uktam etat
tasmāt tad maya tve prādhānyam iti ca aniścita abhidhānam etat
āha evam api ayuktam etat
kasmāt atīta anāgateṣu api tu dṛṣṭeḥ
tasmāt sukha ādīnām śabda ādi ātma bhāvaḥ na yuktaḥ iti
ucyate na smṛti nimitta tvāt buddheḥ
ayam atīta anāgateṣu api śabda ādiṣu smārta sukha duḥkha yogaḥ bhavati
tad saṃparkāt tu puruṣeṇa tathā anubhūyate

original: puruṣaguṇatve tu pākajavannimittādutpannānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ viśeṣabhāvāttīvramandatānupapattiḥ syāt /
analyzed: puruṣa guṇa tve tu pāka ja vat nimittāt utpannānām sukha ādīnām viśeṣa bhāvāt tīvra manda tā anupapattiḥ syāt
tasmāt sukha duḥkhayoḥ śabda ādi ātma bhāvaḥ na yuktaḥ
kiṃca anyat
a nirmokṣa prasaṃgāt
dravyasya guṇaiḥ aviprayogāt sukha duḥkhayoḥ ātma guṇa tve sati ātmanaḥ tābhyām anirmokṣa prasaṃgaḥ
tasmāt tayoḥ ātma guṇa tvam ayuktam iti
śyāma ādi vat tad vinivṛttiḥ iti ced syāt matam
yathā śyāma guṇa tve sati aṇoḥ agni sambandhāt tad vinivṛttiḥ
śabda ādi guṇa tve ca ākāśasya aśabdakasya avasthānam evam ātmanaḥ pi
etat ayuktam
kasmāt viśeṣa upādāna prasaṃgāt
sādhya tvāt ca

original: yathā hyaṇuḥ śyāmatāṃ parityajya rūpaviśeṣameva raktalakṣaṇamupādatte,
analyzed: yathā hi aṇuḥ śyāma tām parityajya rūpa viśeṣam eva rakta lakṣaṇam upādatte
na rūpavat tām tyajati
evam ātmā api bāhya nimitta sāmarthyāt sukha antaram duḥkhāt duḥkha antaram upādadīta
na te atyantam jahyāt

original: tathā ākāśaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ kasyāṃcidavasthāyāmaśabdakaṃ bhavatītyasmānprati sādhyo 'yamarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ākāśam śabda lakṣaṇam kasyāṃcid avasthāyām aśabdakam bhavati iti asmān prati sādhyaḥ yam arthaḥ

original: bheryādiśabdāstu tadguṇa eveti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ tasmātsukhaduḥkhayoḥ śabdādyātmabhāvo 'yuktaḥ /
analyzed: bherī ādi śabdāḥ tu tad guṇaḥ eva iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt sukha duḥkhayoḥ śabda ādi ātma bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ
evam anāmiśra rūpaḥ ātmā
tatas ca icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma jñāna saṃskārāṇām aneka svabhāvānām paraspara virodhinām ca tad guṇa tvam anupapannam

original: tasmādyuktametannirguṇa ātmā nairguṇyācca sākṣimātra iti kevalo viviktatvāt /
analyzed: tasmāt yuktam etat nirguṇaḥ ātmā nairguṇyāt ca sākṣi mātraḥ iti kevalaḥ vivikta tvāt

original: tasmādayaṃ guṇebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtaḥ tasmātkevalaḥ na taiḥ saha saṃsargeṇa vartate /
analyzed: tasmāt ayam guṇebhyaḥ pṛthak bhūtaḥ tasmāt kevalaḥ na taiḥ saha saṃsargeṇa vartate

original: āha, kaḥ punarasyātmano guṇebhyaḥ pṛthagbhāvo 'bhipreta iti ?
analyzed: āha kaḥ punar asya ātmanaḥ guṇebhyaḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ bhipretaḥ iti
ucyate tad upakāra nirapekṣāṇām sattva ādīnām sva kārya sāmarthya pṛthagbhāvaḥ

original: na hi sattvādayaḥ prakāśādibhirdharmairitaretaropakāreṇa vartamānāḥ puruṣakṛtamupakāramapekṣante /
analyzed: na hi sattva ādayaḥ prakāśa ādibhiḥ dharmaiḥ itaretara upakāreṇa vartamānāḥ puruṣa kṛtam upakāram apekṣante
prakāśa ādi dharma sannidhāna mātrāt eva tu pravartante

original: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti “pradhānapravṛttirapratyayā puruṣeṇāparigṛhyamāṇādisarge vartante” iti /
analyzed: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti pradhāna pravṛttiḥ apratyayā puruṣeṇa a parigṛhyamāṇa ādi sarge vartante iti
yasmāt guṇāḥ tad upakāra nirapekṣāḥ pravartante tasmāt asau api tad saṃsarga na anubhavati
dṛṣṭā tu loke pi eka kārya tva apṛthak pṛthagbhāva parikalpanā
tat yathā ime bhrātaraḥ pṛthak
eṣām na ekam kāryam
na pṛthak ime yeṣām ekam iti
madhyasthaḥ viṣayi tvāt
yasmāt ayam puruṣaḥ viṣayī tasmāt madhyasthaḥ
kim kāraṇam
viṣayāṇām hi atulya bala tvāt
nyūna atiśaya upapatteḥ ca paraspareṇa bādhā anugrahau utpannau
viṣayī ca ayam
tasmāt nā asti nyūna tā ādi upapattiḥ
tatas cetanā bhāvaḥ
na ca amiśra rūpa tvāt saṅga dveṣau guṇa viṣayau
atas madhya sthaḥ
draṣṭṛ tvam caitanyāt
prakṛti vikāra bhūta tvāt sattva ādibhyaḥ caitanyam apoddhṛtya puruṣe vyavasthāpanīyam

original: na cācetanānāṃ draṣṭṛtvamupapadyate ityataḥ puruṣa eva caitanyād dṛṣṭā nānyattattvāntaram /
analyzed: na ca acetanānām draṣṭṛ tvam upapadyate iti atas puruṣaḥ eva caitanyāt dṛṣṭā na anyat tattva antaram
akartṛ bhāvaḥ
aprasava dharmi tvāt
prasava arthaḥ dharmaḥ prasava dharmaḥ saḥ sya asti iti prasava dharmī
kaḥ punar asau prasava arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti
ucyate praspandana pariṇāmau
niṣkriya tvāt akartā iti yāvat
tat idam aprasava dharmi tvāt akartā iti
katham asya niṣkriya tvam iti ced caitanyāt
acetanānām hi kṣīra ādīnām kriyāvat tvam upalabdham
cetanasya na kasyacid iti atas niṣkriyaḥ puruṣaḥ
kiṃca anāmiśra rūpa tvāt
anāmiśra rūpam hi kriyā ādimat kṣīra ādi
anāmiśra rūpaḥ ca ayam
tasmāt niṣkriyaḥ
vibhu tvāt iti ced syāt etat

original: yathā vibhutve sati pradhānasya sakriyatvamevaṃ puruṣasya iti vibhutve sakriyatvena bhavitavyamiti /
analyzed: yathā vibhu tve sati pradhānasya sa kriya tvam evam puruṣasya iti vibhu tve sa kriya tvena bhavitavyam iti
tat ca na evam
kasmāt dharma dvaya sahitasya sāhacarya upalabdheḥ
tat vibhu tvam ācetanya aneka rūpa tva sahitam kriyāvati dṛṣṭam na kevalam
na tu tathā puruṣe
tasmāt viṣamam etat

original: evaṃ niṣkriyaḥ puruṣaḥ niṣkriyatvācca pradhānātkāryakāraṇaṃ na kurute /
analyzed: evam niṣkriyaḥ puruṣaḥ niṣkriya tvāt ca pradhānāt kāryakāraṇam na kurute
kasmāt kriyāvataḥ kumbhakārasya mṛd piṇḍāt kārya niṣpatti sāmarthya darśanāt
syāt etat
utpāditasya anyena sthitim kurute
dhātrī kumāra vat
sthitasya vā prayogam ratha śakaṭa yantra preraka vat iti
etat api anupapannam

original: pūrvasmādeva hetoḥ athāpi syātsvataḥ puruṣaḥ kāryakaraṇaṃ kuruta iti tadapyayuktam /
analyzed: pūrvasmāt eva hetoḥ atha api syāt svatas puruṣaḥ kārya karaṇam kurute iti tat api ayuktam
cetana acetanayoḥ atyanta bhedāt prakṛti vikāra bhāva anupapatteḥ
atha matam ubhayatas iti
tat api na eva saṃbhavati
ubhaya doṣa prasaṃgāt

original: syātpunaretat avyapadiśya yoniṃ puruṣo 'bhidhyānamātreṇa kāryakaraṇaṃ kurute ityasadetat /
analyzed: syāt punar etat a vyapadiśya yonim puruṣaḥ abhidhyāna mātreṇa kārya karaṇam kurute iti asat etat
kasmāt anutpattau abhidhyāna anupapatteḥ
īśvara kāraṇa pratiṣedhe bhihitam prāk pradhāna vipariṇāmāt buddhimataḥ buddhiḥ na asti
na ca buddhim antareṇa abhidhyānam upapadyate
tad vṛtti bhūta tvāt tathā buddhimat pūrvaka sṛṣṭi pratiṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ
saḥ iha api yojyaḥ
adhyavasāya kartṛ tvam ca prāc pratiṣiddham
evam saptavidhena akartṛ tvena akartā puruṣaḥ uktam ca

original: nādhyavasāyaṃ kurute puruṣo naivaṃ sthitiṃ prayogaṃ vā /
analyzed: na adhyavasāyam kurute puruṣaḥ na evam sthitim prayogam vā

original: na svātmano na parato na vyapadeśānna cobhayataḥ //
analyzed: na sva ātmanaḥ na paratas na vyapadeśāt na ca ubhayatas
tat yuktam etat
tasmāt ca viparyāsāt siddham sākṣi tvam asya puruṣasya
kaivalyam mādhyasthyam draṣṭṛ tvam akartṛ bhāvaḥ ca iti
kārikā
yatas cetanā śakti sambandhāt puruṣaḥ eva draṣṭā na anyat tattva antaram
guṇāḥ ca kartāraḥ na puruṣaḥ
tasmāt tad saṃyogāt acetanam cetanāvat iva liṅgam

original: guṇakartṛtve ca tathā karteva bhavatyudāsīnaḥ // ISk_20 //
analyzed: guṇa kartṛ tve ca tathā kartā iva bhavati udāsīnaḥ
puruṣa samparkāt hi grahaṇa dhāraṇa vijñāna vacana ūha apoha kriyāḥ yathā nyāya abhiniveśānām
karaṇa dharmāṇām pratyaya rūpāṇām iva upalabdheḥ cetanā śakteḥ ca adhyavasāya vṛttim anurudhyamānāyāḥ tad bhāva sanniveśinām
sattva ādīnām vyāpāravatām abhisambandhāt vyāpāra āviṣṭāyāḥ iva upalabdhiḥ
yatas tatra ayam aneka kāla pravṛtta mithyā pratyaya abhyāsa vāsanā apekṣaḥ bhava bīja hetuḥ jñāna viśeṣaḥ prāṇabhṛtām avabhāsate
śrotram upalabhyate tvac cakṣuḥ jihvā ghrāṇam ityādi
tathā puruṣaḥ karmaṇām kartā
puruṣaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ iti
tasmāt karaṇasya grahaṇa rūpa tā puruṣasya ca kartṛ rūpa tā
sambandhi antara samparkāt anya gatā anyatra upalabhyamānā bhaktyā adhyavasātavyā
na paramārthataḥ uktam ca
cetanā adhiṣṭhātā buddhiḥ cetanā iva vibhāvyate
kartṛṣu avasthitaḥ ca ātmā bhoktā kartā iva lakṣyate
āha saṃyogāt para rūpa tā āpattau atiprasaṃgaḥ aviśeṣāt

original: yadi cetanasaṃyogād buddhyādīnāṃ pratyayavadupacāraḥ vyāpitvādasya ghaṭādibhirapi saṃyogo na pratiṣidhyata ityataḥ prāptasteṣāmapi pratyayavadupacāraḥ
analyzed: yadi cetana saṃyogāt buddhi ādīnām pratyaya vat upacāraḥ vyāpi tvāt asya ghaṭa ādibhiḥ api saṃyogaḥ na pratiṣidhyate iti atas prāptaḥ teṣām api pratyaya vat upacāraḥ
atha saṃyoga aviśeṣāt karaṇānām eva pratyaya vat upacāraḥ na ghaṭa ādīnām
viśeṣaḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ iti
ucyate tad aprasaṃgaḥ
śakti apekṣa tvāt sphaṭika ādi vat

original: yathopadhānasaṃyogaviśeṣe satyākāśasphaṭikayoḥ sphāṭikamevopadhanasarūpaṃ pratyavabhāsate śaktito nākāśam,
analyzed: yathā upadhāna saṃyoga viśeṣe sati ākāśa sphaṭikayoḥ sphāṭikam eva upadhana sarūpam pratyavabhāsate śaktitaḥ na ākāśam

original: evaṃ puruṣasaṃyogāviśeṣe buddhighaṭayoḥ śaktito buddhireva cetanārūpāpannevopalabhyate, na ghaṭaḥ /
analyzed: evam puruṣa saṃyoga aviśeṣe buddhi ghaṭayoḥ śaktitaḥ buddhiḥ eva cetanā rūpa āpannā iva upalabhyate na ghaṭaḥ
āha puruṣasya vikārya tva prasaṃgaḥ
rūpa antara upādanāt

original: yadi tarhi karaṇasambandhātpuruṣaḥ kartṛtvopacāraṃ viṣayasarūpatāṃ ca pratipadyate,
analyzed: yadi tarhi karaṇa sambandhāt puruṣaḥ kartṛ tva upacāram viṣaya sarūpa tām ca pratipadyate
prāptam asya api sphaṭika vat rūpa antara upādānāt vikārya tvam
atha na asya viṣaya rūpa āpattiḥ
na tarhi karaṇa svarūpaḥ puruṣaḥ iti
ucyate na bhaktitaḥ bhyupagamāt
buddhiḥ upātta viṣaya indriya vṛtti upanipātāt tādrūpyam pratipadyate
buddhi rūpam tu sannidhāna mātrāt śakti viśeṣa yogāt phala bhoktṛ tvāt ca rājani bhṛtya jaya parājaya upacāra vat puruṣaḥ upacaryate
na tu asau buddhi saṃparkāt tad rūpaḥ bhavati

original: ata evāsya satyāṃ cetanāśaktau vyavasāyakartṛtvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
analyzed: atas eva asya satyām cetanāśaktau vyavasāya kartṛ tvam pratiṣidhyate
mā bhūt viṣaya rūpa āpattau satyām aneka svabhāva tva ādi kāryatva prasaṃgaḥ
tasmāt viṣaya samparkāt api avikāryaḥ puruṣaḥ

original: na hyasya nityatvātkiṃcidanugrahāya nāpaghātāya / āha ca
analyzed: na hi asya nitya tvāt kiṃcid anugrahāya na apaghātāya āha ca
muṣṭiḥ yathā vikīrṇaḥ sūci agre sarṣapa ādīnām
tiṣṭhanti na sūkṣma bhāvāt tadvat dvandvāni sarvajñe
iti cetanā śakti yogāt tu draṣṭṛ tvam asya svābhāvikam
evam ced ya yuktam
varṣa ātapābhyām kim vyomnaḥ carmaṇi asti tayoḥ phalam
carma upamaḥ ced saḥ nityaḥ kha tulyaḥ ced asat samaḥ
iti tat ayuktam
kim kāraṇam
yasmāt avikārya rūpasya ākāśasya sannidhāna mātrāt megha payaḥ rajaḥ dhūma prabhṛtibhiḥ abhinna deśa tvāt atyanta śuddhasya api malinam iva rūpam upalakṣyate
na ca vikārya tvam
evam anātmanaḥ pi syāt
tat yuktam etad puruṣa saṃyogāt karaṇasya pratyaya upacāraḥ
puruṣasya ca guṇa saṃyogāt kartṛ tva upacāraḥ iti
āha ayuktam etat
kasmāt saṃyoga anupapatteḥ

original: puruṣasya hi guṇānāṃ ca saṃyogaḥ parikalpyamāno 'nyatarakarmajo vā parikalpyate yathā sthāṇuśyenayoḥ,
analyzed: puruṣasya hi guṇānām ca saṃyogaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nyatara karma jaḥ vā parikalpyate yathā sthāṇu śyenayoḥ
ubhaya karma jaḥ yathā meṣayoḥ
saṃyoga jaḥ vā dvi aṅgula ākāśayoḥ
svābhāvikaḥ vā yathā agni uṣṇayoḥ
śakti nimittaḥ vā yathā cakṣu rūpayoḥ
yogyatā lakṣaṇaḥ vā yathā matsya udakayoḥ iti
tat na tāvat anyatara karma jaḥ ubhya karma jaḥ ca saṃyogaḥ eṣām upapadyate
kasmāt vibhu tvāt
na svābhāvikaḥ anirmokṣa prasaṃgāt

original: yathāgneḥ svābhāvikādauṣṇyānmokṣo na bhavati evamātmanaḥ svābhāvikatvādguṇasaṃyogādanirmokṣaprasaṃgaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yathā agneḥ svābhāvikāt auṣṇyāt mokṣaḥ na bhavati evam ātmanaḥ svābhāvika tvāt guṇa saṃyogāt anirmokṣa prasaṃgaḥ syāt
śakti nimittaḥ ca
kim anirmokṣa prasaṃgāt eva
sa na bhavati iti anuvartate

original: svasvāmiśaktinimitte hi saṃyoge parikalpyamāne śaktyoḥ satatāvasthānādanirmokṣa eva prasajyeta /
analyzed: sva svāmi śakti nimitte hi saṃyoge parikalpyamāne śaktyoḥ satata avasthānāt anirmokṣaḥ eva prasajyeta
yogyatā lakṣaṇaḥ śakti mātra rūpa tvāt asaṃvedyaḥ tad asiddhiḥ
kiṃca prayojana antara anupapatteḥ
pravṛtti anuguṇam hi yogyam iti ucyate

original: tasyā eva tu pravṛtte puruṣārthamapohya nimittāntaraṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
analyzed: tasyāḥ eva tu pravṛtte puruṣa artham apohya nimitta antaram śakyam kalpayitum
ākasmika tve ca niyama dvaita anupapattiḥ

original: tasmādayuktaṃ puruṣasya guṇānāṃ ca yogyatālakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ayuktam puruṣasya guṇānām ca yogyatā lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ
na yādṛcchikaḥ
saṃyoga kāraṇa pratidvandvam kaivalya kāraṇam

original: yadi ca yādṛcchiko guṇapuruṣasaṃyogaḥ syāttasyājñānānnivṛttirnāstīti tadarthasyābhyutthānasyānarthakyaṃ prāptaṃ viśeṣānupapatteśca kāraṇāntaraṃ  #
analyzed: yadi ca yādṛcchikaḥ guṇa puruṣa saṃyogaḥ syāt tasya ajñānāt nivṛttiḥ na asti iti tad arthasya abhyutthānasya ānarthakyam prāptam viśeṣa anupapatteḥ ca kāraṇa antaram
kalpayitum
atas etat api ayuktam iti
na vaiṣayikaḥ
a nirmokṣa prasaṃgāt

original: satatameva hi puruṣasya viṣayitvamavyāvṛttaṃ guṇānāṃ ca viṣayatvamityanirmokṣaprasaṃga eva syāt /
analyzed: satatam eva hi puruṣasya viṣayi tvam avyāvṛttam guṇānām ca viṣaya tvam iti anirmokṣa prasaṃgaḥ eva syāt
etāvān ca saṃyogaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ parikalpyeta
sarvathā ca na upapadyate
tasmāt tad saṃyogāt iti ayuktam abhidhātum iti
ucyate saṃyoga anitya tvāt iha ca aupakārika parikalpanāt adoṣaḥ
iha anekavidhaḥ saṃyogaḥ
tat yathā prāpti pūrvikā prāptiḥ
yathā udāhṛtam anyatara jaḥ ubhaya karma jaḥ saṃyogaḥ ityādi

original: yatrāsau na saṃbhavati tatra sannidhimātrasāmānyād bhaktyā kalpyate /
analyzed: yatra asau na saṃbhavati tatra sannidhi mātra sāmānyāt bhaktyā kalpyate
tat yathā ākāśasya go ādibhiḥ
pradeśaiḥ iti ced na abhāvāt
te pi hi niravayava tvāt ākāśasya bhaktyā kalpyante
mā bhūt kṛtaka tva anitya tva doṣa prasaṃgaḥ
tasmāt pradeśa upacārāt kāryam api upacaritam
anyaḥ tu śāstrīyaḥ saṃyogaḥ rtha nimittaḥ
tatra aneka saṃyoga upapatteḥ iha puruṣa antaḥkaraṇayoḥ abhinna deśa tvāt sannidhi mātra sāmānyāt bhāktam saṃyogam parikalpya evam ucyate iti adoṣaḥ  /
kārikā
āha vijñātam saṃyoga dvayam

original: ayaṃ tvanyo 'rthanimittaḥ śāstrīyaḥ saṃyogo bhavatā paribhāṣyate /
analyzed: ayam tu anyaḥ rtha nimittaḥ śāstrīyaḥ saṃyogaḥ bhavatā paribhāṣyate
tatra vaktavyam sau iti
ucyate
puruṣasya darśana arthaḥ
dṛṣṭiḥ darśanam
artha śabdaḥ nimitta vacanaḥ
sya asau darśana arthaḥ
darśana nimittaḥ darśana hetuḥ darśana kāraṇaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati- sannidhānāviśeṣe sati ātmana ākāśādeśca yasmāddṛkchaktiyuktaḥ puruṣaḥ tasmātkāryakāraṇatāmāpannena pradhānena saha bhoktṛtvena
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati sannidhāna aviśeṣe sati ātmanaḥ ākāśa ādeḥ ca yasmāt dṛś śakti yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ tasmāt kārya kāraṇa tām āpannena pradhānena saha bhoktṛ tvena
na acaitanyāt ākāśa ādayaḥ iti
athavā artha śabdaḥ phala vacanaḥ

original: yathā tṛptyarthā bhujikriyā tṛptyau satyāṃ nivartate prāptyarthā gamikriyā prāptau satyām,
analyzed: yathā tṛpti arthā bhuji kriyā tṛptyau satyām nivartate prāpti arthā gami kriyā prāptau satyām

original: evaṃ puruṣasya pradhānena darśanārthaḥ saṃyogaḥ darśane sati nivartate /
analyzed: evam puruṣasya pradhānena darśana arthaḥ saṃyogaḥ darśane sati nivartate

original: tathā ca vakṣyati dṛṣṭā mayetiyupekṣaka eko dṛṣṭāhamityuparataiketi (ISk 66) /
analyzed: tathā ca vakṣyati dṛṣṭā mayā iti yupekṣakaḥ ekaḥ dṛṣṭā aham iti uparatā ekā iti
āha evam api śabda ādi upalabdhi sama kālam eva nivṛtti prasaṃgaḥ
kim kāraṇam
tasyām api avasthāyām śakyam vaktum dṛṣṭā prakṛtiḥ iti

original: ucyate yadyapyetadevaṃ tathāpi yathā puruṣasya darśanārthaḥ saṃyogaḥ
analyzed: ucyate yadi api etat evam tathā api yathā puruṣasya darśana arthaḥ saṃyogaḥ
kaivalya arthaḥ tathā pradhānasya
kaivalyam iti viveka paricchinnam sattva ādibhiḥ a saṃsarga dharmi tvam ātmanaḥ
saḥ sya saḥ yam kaivalya arthaḥ

original: satyapi hi darśanāviśeṣe pradhānaṃ puruṣasya kaivalyārthaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: sati api hi darśana aviśeṣe pradhānam puruṣasya kaivalya artham pravartate

original: yadāsya buddhistamaso 'ṅgitvādye guṇāḥ kāryarūpāpannāḥ śiraḥpāṇyādaya ādhyātmikā,
analyzed: yadā asya buddhiḥ tamasaḥ ṅgi tvāt ye guṇāḥ kārya rūpa āpannāḥ śiraḥ pāṇi ādayaḥ ādhyātmikā
bāhyāḥ ca go ādayaḥ
kāraṇa rūpa āpannāḥ ca ālocana kriyā saṃkalpa abhimāna adhyavasāya lakṣaṇāḥ
saḥ ham iti a viśiṣṭa pratyaya upasaṃhāram karoti tadā pravartate eva

original: yadā tvanye guṇāḥ prakṛtibhūtā vikārabhūtāḥ kāryabhūtāḥ kāraṇabhūtā acetanāḥ parārthā
analyzed: yadā tu anye guṇāḥ prakṛti bhūtāḥ vikāra bhūtāḥ kārya bhūtāḥ kāraṇa bhūtāḥ acetanāḥ para arthā

original: anyo 'haṃ na prakṛtirna vikṛtirna kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ nācetanaḥ svārtha iti bhinnapratyayopasaṃhāraṃ
analyzed: anyaḥ ham na prakṛtiḥ na vikṛtiḥ na kāryam na kāraṇam na acetanaḥ svārthaḥ iti bhinna pratyaya upasaṃhāram
karoti tadā nivartate

original: so 'yaṃ puruṣasya dṛkchaktinimittaḥ pradhānasya ca kaivalyāvadhiparicchinnaḥ puruṣārthaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ yam puruṣasya dṛś śakti nimittaḥ pradhānasya ca kaivalya avadhi paricchinnaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ
sati api pāribhāṣika tve
paṅgu andhavat ubhayoḥ api saṃyogaḥ
etat uktam bhavati
prāk api kārya kāraṇa sambandhāt puruṣe

original: tadyathā agnerdahanaṃ paraśośchedanamasati dāhye chedye na vyajyate /
analyzed: tat yathā agneḥ dahanam paraśoḥ chedanam asati dāhye chedye na vyajyate
tad sannidhāna sama kālam eva tu vyajyate
iti atas pradhānam apekṣate

original: tathā pradhānamapyantareṇa puruṣopakāraṃ svakādasarmarthamaniṣpannakāryasamaṃ cetitamanarthakama syādityataḥ puruṣamapekṣate /
analyzed: tathā pradhānam api antareṇa puruṣa upakāram svakāt asarmartham aniṣpanna kārya samam cetitam anarthakam syāt iti atas puruṣam apekṣate
tatra ubhayoḥ itaretara apekṣā tam saṃyogam adhikāra bandham āhuḥ ācāryāḥ
paṅgu andha dṛṣṭāntaḥ tu nāntarīyaka mātra pradarśana artham

original: yathā paṅgurnāntareṇāndhaṃ dṛkchaktyā viśiṣṭenārthenārthavānbhavati andhaśca nāntareṇa paṅguṃ viśiṣṭenārthena,
analyzed: yathā paṅguḥ na antareṇa andham dṛś śaktyā viśiṣṭena arthena arthavān bhavati andhaḥ ca na antareṇa paṅgum viśiṣṭena arthena

original: evaṃ pradhānaṃ nāntareṇa puruṣaṃ kṛtamapi kāryaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaktamanavadhikaṃ ca pravartamānaṃ viśeṣābhāvānnaiva nivartate /
analyzed: evam pradhānam na antareṇa puruṣam kṛtam api kāryam draṣṭum śaktam anavadhikam ca pravartamānam viśeṣa abhāvāt na eva nivartate

original: tathā puruṣaḥ satyapi cetanatve nāntareṇa pradhānamupalabhyābhāvādupalabdhā bhavediti pradhānamapekṣate /
analyzed: tathā puruṣaḥ sati api cetana tve na antareṇa pradhānam upalabhya abhāvāt upalabdhā bhavet iti pradhānam apekṣate
tasmāt itaretara apekṣayā saṃyoga tve kalpyamāne yat uktam

original: vinā sargeṇa bandho hi puruṣasya na yujyate /
analyzed: vinā sargeṇa bandhaḥ hi puruṣasya na yujyate
sargaḥ tasya eva mokṣa artham aho sāṃkhyasya su ukta tā
iti tat ayuktam

original: kasmāt ? na hyasau vinā sargeṇa na yujyata iti / āha ca
analyzed: kasmāt na hi asau vinā sargeṇa na yujyate iti āha ca
dṛśya darśana bhāvena prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca
apekṣā śāstra tattva jñaiḥ bandhaḥ iti abhidhīyate
evam vinā api sargeṇa yasmāt baddhaḥ pumān guṇaiḥ
tasmāt viphala tām yātu manoratha manorathaḥ
iti siddhaḥ saṃyogaḥ
tad kṛtaḥ sargaḥ
pradhāna puruṣayoḥ hi bhoktṛ bhogya bhāva apekṣa nimittaḥ yam tattva sargaḥ mahat ādiḥ
bhāva sargaḥ ca dharma ādiḥ
bhūta sargaḥ ca brāhma ādiḥ pravartate

original: sā cāpekṣā puruṣānantyānna nivartata ityato 'rthavatīnāṃ hi prakṛtīnāṃ tadaparisamāpterna nivṛtirasti // 21 //
analyzed: sā ca apekṣā puruṣa ānantyāt na nivartate iti atas rthavatīnām hi prakṛtīnām tad aparisamāpteḥ na nivṛtiḥ asti  /

original: // iti śrīyuktidīpikāyāṃ saptatipaddhatau pañcamamāhnikaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca prakaraṇam // @-----------------------------------------------------------------------

kārikā

original: evaṃ kāraṇāntarapratiṣedhātprakṛteḥ puruṣārtho 'yaṃ vyaktabhāvena vipariṇāma iti sthitam /

original: tadanyeṣāṃ purāṇetihāsapraṇetḥṇāṃ mahato 'haṃkāro vidyata iti pakṣaḥ- mahato 'smipratyayakartṛtvābhyupagamāt /

ahaṃkārāt pañca tanmātrāṇi iti sarve

original: mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ sṛjyante pañca tanmātrāṇyahaṃkāraśceti vindhyavāsimatam /
analyzed: mahataḥ ṣaṭ aviśeṣāḥ sṛjyante pañca tanmātrāṇi ahaṃkāraḥ ca iti vindhyavāsi matam

bhautikāni indriyāṇi iti pañca adhikaraṇa matam
eka rūpāṇi tanmātrāṇi iti anye
eka uttarāṇi iti vārṣagaṇyaḥ
indriyāṇi saṃskāra viśeṣa yogāt parigṛhīta rūpāṇi iti kecid

adhikaraṇam api kecid trayodaśavidham āhuḥ

eka tvam vindhya vāsinaḥ
tathā karaṇam nirlikhita svarūpam śūnya grāma nadī kalpam

original: prākṛtavaikṛtikāni tu jñānāni prerakāṅgasaṃgṛhītāni pradhānādāgacchanti ceti pañcādhikaraṇaḥ,

sarvā paratas iti pañca adhikaraṇaḥ

original: evamanekaniścayeṣvācāryeṣu ye tāvatpradhānamahatorantarāle tattvāntaramicchanti tatpratikṣepāyācāryaḥ svamatamupanyasyati /

original: anyasya tu pakṣe naivāhaṃkāro vidyata iti pratiṣedhavivakṣayedamāha /

yaḥ punar āha

original: mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ sṛjyante pañca tanmātrāṇyahaṃkāraśceti tannirāsārthamāha
analyzed: mahataḥ ṣaṭ aviśeṣāḥ sṛjyante pañca tanmātrāṇi ahaṃkāraḥ ca iti tad nirāsa artham āha

anena eva ca bhautika indriya vādī pratikṣiptaḥ boddhavyaḥ

original: tasmādapi ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni // ISk_22 //
analyzed: tasmāt api ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni

original: tasmādapi ṣoḍaśakādgaṇādyaḥ pañcako gaṇastataḥ pañca mahābhūtānyutpadyante /
analyzed: tasmāt api ṣoḍaśakāt gaṇāt yaḥ pañcakaḥ gaṇaḥ tatas pañca mahābhūtāni utpadyante

original: bhūtasaṃjñā hi tanmātrāṇāṃ na pṛthivyādīnāmatra tu sāṃkhyācāryāṇāmavipratipattiḥ bhūtakauṭasthyavādinastu mīmāṃsakā ārhatāśca /

kārikā
āha uktam pradhānāt buddhiḥ utpadyate iti
tatra vaktavyam kiṃlakṣaṇā punar buddhiḥ iti ucyate
adhyavasāyaḥ buddhiḥ
kaḥ yam adhyavasāyaḥ
gauḥ eva ayam

original: puruṣa evāyamiti yaḥ pratyayo niścayo 'rthagrahaṇaṃ so 'dhyavasāyaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ eva ayam iti yaḥ pratyayaḥ niścayaḥ ṛtha grahaṇam saḥ dhī avasāyaḥ
atra kṣaṇika vādī āha yadi artha grahaṇam buddhiḥ anityā
kasmāt hetu apekṣaṇāt
artha grahaṇam hi indriya ādi viṣaya sannidhānam āvaraṇa ādi abhāvam ca apekṣate
na ca nityasya kāraṇa apekṣā upapadyate
tasmāt anityā buddhiḥ

original: abhivyakteradoṣa iti cetsyādetannendriyasannidhānādibhirarthagrahaṇaṃ janyate kiṃ tarhyabhivyajyata iti /
analyzed: abhivyakteḥ adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt etat na indriya sannidhāna ādibhiḥ artha grahaṇam janyate kim tarhi abhivyajyate iti
tat ca na evam
dvidhā doṣāt

original: sā hyabhivyaktiḥ svarūpalābho vā syāt grahaṇapratibandhavyudāso vā /
analyzed: sā hi abhivyaktiḥ svarūpa lābhaḥ vā syāt grahaṇa pratibandha vyudāsaḥ vā

original: kiṃ cātaḥ ? tadyadi tāvatsvarūpalābhaḥ kriyate 'rthagrahaṇamiti prāptam /
analyzed: kim ca atas tat yadi tāvat sva rūpa lābhaḥ kriyate rtha grahaṇam iti prāptam
artha grahaṇa pratibandhasya andhakārasya vyudāsaḥ tat api ayuktam
vipratiṣedhāt
grahaṇam ca syāt tad pratibandhaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham
kiṃca bhedāt
vyaṅgyam hi ghaṭa ādi candra arka oṣadhi maṇi ratna pradīpa bhedāt na bhidyate
asti buddhīnām artha bhedāt bhedaḥ
vṛtti bhedāt adoṣaḥ mṛd vat iti ced syāt matam
yathā mṛd dravyasya ghaṭa ādi saṃsthāna vṛtti bhede pi abhedaḥ evam buddheḥ iti
tat api ayuktam
an anya tvāt
yadā buddhiḥ anyā vṛttibhyaḥ
prāptaḥ tad bhede buddhi bhedaḥ
kiṃca dṛṣṭānta asiddheḥ

original: sādhyaṃ caitat kiṃ tadeva mṛddravyaṃ ghaṭādivṛttibhedamanubhavati āhosvitpratyayāntaravaśādanyaccānyaccotpadyate iti ?
analyzed: sādhyam ca etat kim tat eva mṛd dravyam ghaṭa ādi vṛtti bhedam anubhavati āhosvit pratyaya antara vaśāt anyat ca anyat ca utpadyate iti
avayava bhedāt ca

original: upetya vānuvṛttiṃ brūmaḥ- na hi tadekaṃ mṛddravyam,
analyzed: upetya vā anuvṛttim brūmaḥ na hi tat ekam mṛd dravyam
kim tarhi bahavaḥ mṛd paramāṇavaḥ neka deśa avacchinna vṛttayaḥ iti
kim ca anyat
nivṛtti vibhakti grahaṇāt
tat hi mṛd dravyam saṃsthānam apekṣya api gṛhyate
na tu artha grahaṇam an apekṣya buddheḥ grahaṇam asti
tasmāt viṣamaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: parimāṇādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam sattvādīnāmaṅgāṅgibhāvaniyamāttena tenārthagrahaṇātmanā vipariṇāmo vṛttiriti /
analyzed: parimāṇāt adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam sattva ādīnām aṅga aṅgi bhāva niyamāt tena tena artha grahaṇa ātmanā vipariṇāmaḥ vṛttiḥ iti
etat ca ayuktam
ubhaya kalpane doṣa prasaṃgāt
yadi dharma antara upādāna parityāgau vyakta vyaktī
datta uttaraḥ eṣa pakṣaḥ

original: atha nāśotpādau tena dharmadharmiṇorananyatvāddharmāṇāṃ nāśotpādādbuddherapi nāśotpādaprasaṃgaḥ /
analyzed: atha nāśa utpādau tena dharma dharmiṇoḥ ananya tvāt dharmāṇām nāśa utpādāt buddheḥ api nāśa utpāda prasaṃgaḥ
tad anabhyupagame vā anyatvam iti doṣaḥ āha ca
naṣṭa utpannam ananya tvāt anityam nityam eva vā
naṣṭa utpanna a vinaṣṭānām nityam na asti ca ekadā
yat api uktam sattva ādīnām aṅgāṅgibhāva niyamāt iti
tat ayuktam
atas eva anitya tva siddheḥ
tulyānām guṇa pradhāna bhāva anupapatteḥ
sattva ādīn anaṅga aṅgi bhāva abhyupagamāt vṛddhi kṣayau abhyupagantavyau
tatas ca buddhiḥ anityā iti prāptam
tebhyaḥ na anya tvāt
atha matam tad avasthā api asau nityā iti
na tarhi sattva ādi ātma bhūtā buddhiḥ iti prāptam
tatas ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ avivekaḥ iti asya virodhaḥ
tasmāt anityā buddhiḥ iti
ucyate yat tāvat uktam hetu apekṣaṇāt anityā buddhiḥ iti tat ayuktam
kasmāt siddha sādhanāt

original: kasyātra vipratipattiranityā vā buddhiḥ syānnityā veti ?
analyzed: kasya atra vipratipattiḥ anityā vā buddhiḥ syāt nityā vā iti
kim tarhi hetumat anityam vyaktam iti vacanāt anityā eva
tasmāt iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam
ataeva kṣaṇika tvam iti ced
atha api syāt hetu apekṣā hi saṃskṛta tvam
saṃskṛtam tu kṣaṇikam
tat yathā pradīpaḥ iti

original: tasmādanitye satyapi viśeṣānabhidhāne kṣaṇikatvamevānena hetunā buddheḥ pratipādyata iti /
analyzed: tasmāt anitye sati api viśeṣa anabhidhāne kṣaṇika tvam eva anena hetunā buddheḥ pratipādyate iti
kasmāt uttara vacana virodha prasaṃgāt
evam api yat uttaram kṣaṇika tva prasiddhi artham ucyate prati artha grahaṇa anyatvāt anitya ityādi tasya ānarthakyam
tasmāt pūrva uttara viruddha tvāt sakalam eva idam prakaraṇam na adhyayanam
na pratyākhyānam arhati
pareṣām tu abhiniṣṭā buddhiḥ atra iti asaṃgata artha uttara apavāda doṣam an apekṣya api pratyekam api etat asādhanam
vṛtti viṣaya tvāt

original: svakāraṇapariniṣpannāyā hi buddhervyāpāro 'rthagrahaṇasaṃjñaka indriyādisannidhānāpekṣo na buddhiḥ /
analyzed: sva kāraṇa pariniṣpannāyāḥ hi buddheḥ vyāpāraḥ rtha grahaṇa saṃjñakaḥ indriya ādi sannidhāna apekṣaḥ na buddhiḥ
tad ananyatvāt prasaṃga nivṛttiḥ iti ced atha matam
vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ ananyatvāt ittham api kalpayitvā ayam prasaṃgaḥ na nivartate
tathā ca uktam svālakṣaṇyam vṛttiḥ trayasya iti
tat api abādhakam
kasmāt upacārāt
satyam ananyā
vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ bhedena agrahaṇāt

original: tathāpyuparatavyāpārasyāpi paraśvādervṛttimataḥ svarūpa noparamatīti bhedamupacarya vyavahāro nānākāryaviṣayaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: tathā api uparata vyāpārasya api paraśu ādeḥ vṛttimataḥ sva rūpa na uparamati iti bhedam upacarya vyavahāraḥ nānā kārya viṣayaḥ pravartate
ataeva anyatvam api syāt iti tat ayuktam ekāntāt
tat yathā senā paṅkti senā kuṇḍala ādi uparame na tad sanniveśinām uparamaḥ kārya bhedaḥ ca
na ca anya tvam
evam vṛtti tadvatoḥ api ca syāt
tasmāt yuktam etat hetu apekṣaṇasya vṛtti viṣaya tvāt na buddheḥ anitya tvam iti
etena vyakti vikalpaḥ prayuktaḥ

original: so 'pi vṛttiviṣaya iti kṛtvā tadapyuktamindriyādibhede bhedāditi /
analyzed: saḥ pi vṛtti viṣayaḥ iti kṛtvā tat api uktam indriya ādi bhede bhedāt iti
tat api anena eva uktam
vṛtti bhedaḥ tra na bhedaḥ iti
kim ca anekāntāt
yathā udaka ādi bhedāt pratibimba bhedaḥ na ca avyaṅgya tvam evam anyatra api syāt
dravya antara utpatteḥ adoṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam

original: udakasyānanasaṃyogāddravyāntarameva pratibimbalakṣaṇamutpadyate na tu mukhaṃ bhidyate iti asadetat /
analyzed: udakasya ānana saṃyogāt dravya antaram eva pratibimba lakṣaṇam utpadyate na tu mukham bhidyate iti asat etat

hi mukhaḥ nimittam śakyam vaktum

yat punar etat uktam vṛtti bhedāt adoṣaḥ mṛd vat iti tathā tat astu
yat tu uktam ananyatvāt dṛṣṭānta asiddheḥ ca iti vṛtti ananyatvam idānīm eva pratyuktam

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgapratiṣedhe coktaṃ na pṛthivyādīnāmanyathā cānyathā cotpattiḥ /

original: yatpunaretaduktaṃ naikaṃ mṛddravyamiti tatra buddhiḥ pramāṇam /

original: tatra yadi mṛdo 'nekatvena prayojanaṃ buddhirupalabhyate- vayamiti /
analyzed: tatra yadi mṛdaḥ neka tvena prayojanam buddhiḥ upalabhyate vayam iti

original: mṛddravyasya saṃsthānavyatirekeṇa svabhāvo 'vadhāryate na tu buddherarthagrahaṇamantareṇa svarūpagrahaṇamiti,

tat ayuktam

yathā bāhya ādi avasthāsu vyākārā citta santatiḥ

original: yathā bāhyārthākāravaccittasantatiratha ca suptamūrchitavirodhasamāpannānāmartharūpādṛte bījamātrāstītyupagamyate sā citi kāpi vāvastheti vacanāt,

original: na ca gṛhyate tathā buddhirapīti kasmānna parikalpyate ?
analyzed: na ca gṛhyate tathā buddhiḥ api iti kasmāt na parikalpyate

original: yatpunaretaduktam yadi dharmāntaropādānaparityāgau vyaktavyaktī dattottara eṣa pakṣa iti /

original: nāśotpādau tu aniṣṭāveveti na parihāraṃ pratyādaraḥ kriyate /

original: bhavata eva naṣṭotpannebhyaḥ skandhebhyo nānyā santatiratha ca nāsti doṣaḥ /

original: tatra śrutismṛtivihitānāṃ karmaṇāmanuṣṭhānādbuddhyavasthaḥ sattvāvayava āśayabhūto dharma ityucyate /

sa tu dvividhaḥ
brahma ādi sthāneṣu abhipreta śarīra indriya viṣaya upabhoga nirvartakaḥ jñāna ādi aṅga bhūtaḥ ca prathamaḥ
agnihotra havana ādi kriyā anuṣṭhāna sādhanaḥ yama niyama sādhanaḥ itaraḥ
tatra ahiṃsā satyam asteyam akalka tā brahmacaryam iti pañca yamāḥ

original: akrodho guruśuśrūṣā śaucamāhāralāghavamapramāda iti pañca niyamāḥ /
analyzed: akrodhaḥ guru śuśrūṣā śaucam āhāra lāghavam apramādaḥ iti pañca niyamāḥ
eteṣām avilopena anuṣṭhānāt yateḥ evaṃvidha uttaraṇe sattva dharmaḥ āśaya tām pratipadyate
yaḥ jñāna ādīnām rūpāṇām āpyāyanam karoti
etat abhyudaya niḥśreyasayoḥ sopāna bhūtam prathamam parva
yatra ayam avasthitaḥ yatiḥ itareṣām parvaṇām anuṣṭhāne yogyaḥ bhavati
jñānam dvividham śabda ādi upalabdhi lakṣaṇam guṇa puruṣa antara upalabdhi lakṣaṇam ca
tatra śabda ādi upalabdhi lakṣaṇam pratyakṣa anumāna āgama rūpam
guṇa puruṣa antara upalabdhi lakṣaṇam ca dvividham apūrvam abhyāsa jam ca
tayoḥ apūrvam ūhaḥ śabdaḥ dhī ayanam iti
siddhi kāṇḍa anupatitāni pramāṇāni

original: abhyāsajaṃ punaḥ vairāgyapūrvāvajayapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ śāntamamalaṃ dhruvaṃ sakalabhavābhavapratipakṣabhūtam /

yat ācāryaḥ vakṣyati
evam tattva abhyāsāt na asmi na me na aham iti apariśeṣam
aviparyayāt viśuddham kevalam utpadyate jñānam iti
virāgaḥ tu rāga pratipakṣa bhūtaḥ jñāna abhyāsa upajanitaḥ buddheḥ prasādaḥ
tasya tu yatamāna vyatireka eka indriya vaśīkāra lakṣaṇāḥ catasraḥ vasthāḥ bhavanti

original: tatrendriyāṇāṃ viṣayābhilāṣalakṣaṇakaṣāyapācanaṃ prati yaḥ prayatna utsāhaḥ sā yatamānasaṃjñā /

original: yadā tu keṣāṃcidindriyāṇāṃ paripakvaṃ sā vyatirekasaṃjñā /

original: vyatiricyante hi tadā yaterindriyāṇi paripakvāṇyaparipakvebhyo viśiṣṭatarāṇi bhavantītyarthaḥ /

original: nivṛttasarvendriyaviṣayecchasya yaterekameva manolakṣaṇamindriyaṃ tadā paripakvaṃ bhavati /

original: kartuḥ svātmapratyavamarśātmako yo 'yamahamiti pratyaya utpadyate sa khalvahaṃkāraḥ,
analyzed: kartuḥ sva ātma pratyavamarśa ātmakaḥ yaḥ yam aham iti pratyayaḥ utpadyate sa khalu ahaṃkāraḥ
mahataḥ tattva antaram
kasmāt tasya sarva viṣaya adhyavasāya rūpa tvāt
asya tu sva ātma pratyavamarśāt
na tu artha antaram

original: kasmāt ? prakṛtivikārayorananyatvābhyupagamāt na hi naḥ prakṛterarthāntarabhūto vikāra iti prāgvistareṇa pratipāditam /
analyzed: kasmāt prakṛti vikārayoḥ ananyatva abhyupagamāt na hi naḥ prakṛteḥ artha antara bhūtaḥ vikāraḥ iti prāk vistareṇa pratipāditam
sa ca mūrti pratyayābhyām mahataḥ sthūlataraḥ
kasmāt avibhāgāt
vibhāga niṣpatteḥ kāla ādi vat
triguṇasya ca mahataḥ vikāra tvāt asau api triguṇaḥ
kasmāt prakṛti rūpasya vikāre dṛṣṭa tvāt tantu paṭa vat
tad bhāva sanniviṣṭāḥ tu ye sattva ādayasya ācāryaiḥ vaikārika taijasa bhūta ādi śabdena ākhyāyante

original: tathā ca śāstramāha “etasmāddhi mahata ātmana ime traya ātmānaḥ sṛjyante vaikārikataijasabhūtādayo 'haṃkāralakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca śāstram āha etasmāt hi mahataḥ ātmanaḥ ime trayaḥ ātmānaḥ sṛjyante vaikārika taijasa bhūta ādayaḥ haṃkāra lakṣaṇāḥ
aham iti eva eṣām sāmānya lakṣaṇam bhavati
guṇa pravṛttau ca punar viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti
āha kā punar guṇa pravṛttiḥ yasyām asmipratyaya ekarūpasya ahaṅkārasya viśeṣa pratipattiḥ bhavati iti
ucyate yaḥ yam
tasmāt dvividhaḥ pravartate sargaḥ
dvividhaḥ indriya lakṣanaḥ tanmātra lakṣaṇaḥ ca
sā guṇa vṛttiḥ iti ucyate
kasmāt tad kārya tvāt
guṇa pravṛtti kāryaḥ hi sargaḥ
dṛśyate ca khalu loke kārya kāraṇam upacaryamāṇam
tat yathā śālīn bhuṅkte iti
āha prāk uktam ahaṃkārāt ṣoḍaśakaḥ gaṇaḥ utpadyate
idānīm punar ucyate tasmāt dvividhaḥ pravartate sargaḥ
tat idam pūrva uttara vyāghātāt ayuktam iti
ucyate na sāmānyena vivakṣita tvāt

original: abhedavivakṣāyāṃ hi kṛtvā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇamevamasmābhirupadiṣṭaṃ dvividhaḥ sarga iti /
analyzed: abheda vivakṣāyām hi kṛtvā kārya kāraṇa lakṣaṇam evam asmābhiḥ upadiṣṭam dvividhaḥ sargaḥ iti
bheda vivakṣāyām punar
aindriyaḥ ekādaśakaḥ tānmātraḥ pañcakaḥ ca eva
indriyāṇām ayam aindriyaḥ ekādaśa parimāṇam asya ekādaśakaḥ
evam tanmātreṣu vaktavyam
tanmātrāṇām śabda sparśa ādīnām ayam tānmātraḥ sargaḥ
pañcakaḥ ca pañca parimāṇam asya iti pañcakaḥ

original: asya tu ṣoḍaśakasya vikārasya saṃjñālakṣaṇaprayojanānyuttaratra vakṣyati /
analyzed: asya tu ṣoḍaśakasya vikārasya saṃjñā lakṣaṇa prayojanāni uttaratra vakṣyati

original: yasyāmasmipratyayasya viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ bhavati- śabde 'haṃ sparśe 'haṃ rūpe 'haṃ rase 'haṃ gandhe 'hamiti /

tat na vaktavyam
kasmāt ānarthakyāt

original: na hi tattvāntarasanniveśināṃ sattvādīnāṃ saṃjñāntarābhidhāne kiṃcitprayojanamastīti,

ucyate na kārya viśeṣa hetu tvāt

original: mahadādilakṣaṇānāṃ hi guṇānāmanekarūpastattvārambha iti hi na saṃjñāntaramārabhyate /
analyzed: mahat ādi lakṣaṇānām hi guṇānām aneka rūpaḥ tattva ārambhaḥ iti hi na saṃjñā antaram ārabhyate
ahaṃkāraḥ tu sattva tamaḥ bahulayoḥ indriya tanmātra parvaṇoḥ prakṛtiḥ tad artham ācāryāṇām yatna viśeṣaḥ

original: dharmādiviśeṣābhyupāmānmahati prasaṃga iti cet na viśeṣitatvāt /
analyzed: dharma ādi viśeṣa abhyupāmāt mahati prasaṃgaḥ iti ced na viśeṣita tvāt

original: na tu dharmādayastattvāntaramato na mahati prasaṃgaḥ /
analyzed: na tu dharma ādayaḥ tattva antaram atas na mahati prasaṃgaḥ

original: kaḥ punaratra viśeṣo yena dharmādi na tattvāntaram,
analyzed: kaḥ punar atra viśeṣaḥ yena dharma ādi na tattva antaram
tattva antaram tu śrotra ādi iti
etat ca na evam kutas
vṛtti mātre tad upacārāt
vṛtti mātre hi mahataḥ dharma ādi upacāraḥ

vṛtti niṣpāditaḥ tu saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ vṛttimataḥ tattva antaram iti anayoḥ viśeṣaḥ
tasmāt yuktam etat kārya viśeṣa hetu tvam iti
kārikā

original: āha, yadyevamidaṃ tarhi vaktavyamuṣya kāryaviśeṣasyaivaṃ saṃjñakādahaṃkārātpravṛttiriti /

ucyate

pūrva sūtre tad sāmānādhikaraṇyāt
atas na punar indriya grahaṇam

ucyate
bhūtādeḥ tānmātraḥ sa tāmasaḥ
bhūtādeḥ bhūtādi saṃjñakāt tamaḥ pradhānāt tānmātraḥ sargaḥ
tānmātraḥ tu tamaḥ bahulaḥ bhūtādi saṃjñakāt ahaṅkārāt pravartate

original: tadyadi sattvaṃ vaikārikaśabdenocyate vaikārikāṇi caindriya ekādaśakaḥ sargaḥ pravartata ityukte gamyata etat sāttviko 'sau,
analyzed: tat yadi sattvam vaikārika śabdena ucyate vaikārikāṇi ca aindriyaḥ ekādaśakaḥ sargaḥ pravartate iti ukte gamyate etat

original: kasmāt ? na hyasti sambhavo yatsattvāttamobahulaḥ sargaḥ syāttamasaśca sattvabahula iti /
analyzed: kasmāt na hi asti sambhavaḥ yat sattvāt tamaḥ bahulaḥ sargaḥ syāt tamasaḥ ca sattva bahulaḥ iti

yasya eva arthasya jñāpana artham evam iha kriyate
katham gamyate sattvam vaikārika śabdena ucyate
tamaḥ bhūta ādi śabdena
rajaḥ taijasa śabdena

original: aprasiddhārthā hi tāntrikī paribhāṣeyamanirṇītā na gamyata iti /

original: katham ? yadā hi vaikāriko 'haṅkāra indriyabhāvena pravartate tadā niṣkriyatvāttaijasaṃ pravartakatvenākāṃkṣati,

vaikārikam bheda tvena

badhira ādiṣu tad abhāva prasaṃgāt

original: yadi samastendriyavṛttiḥ saṃkalpaḥ syātprāṇādivaditi cet syānmatam,
analyzed: yadi samasta indriya vṛttiḥ saṃkalpaḥ syāt prāṇa ādi vat iti ced syāt matam
yathā samasta indriya vṛttiḥ prāṇa ādiḥ
na ca anyatara vaikalye tad abhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ samastendriyavṛttiḥ saṃkalpaḥ syānna cānyataravaikalye tadabhāvaḥ syāditi /
analyzed: evam samasta indriya vṛttiḥ saṃkalpaḥ syāt na ca anyatara vaikalye tad abhāvaḥ syāt iti
etat ca anupapannam
viśeṣita tvāt
nirviṣayā prāṇa ādi vṛttiḥ
śabda ādi viṣayaḥ tu saṃkalpaḥ iti viśeṣitam
tasmāt vyasta samastānām indriyāṇām saṃkalpa anupapatteḥ manasaḥ liṅgam etat astitve iti siddham
āha tat avadhāraṇīyam
indriya dvaividhyāt
dvi prakārāṇi hi indriyāṇi purastāt upadiṣṭāni
tatra manaḥ api avadhāraṇīyam kim buddhīndriyam atha karmendriyam iti
ucyate
tat ca indriyam ubhayathā samākhyātam
hi arthe caḥ paṭhitaḥ
tat hi indriyam ubhayathā iti arthaḥ

original: mano na kevalaṃ buddhīndriyamapi tu karmendriyamapi /
analyzed: manaḥ na kevalam buddhīndriyam api tu karmendriyam api
niyama hetu abhāvāt ayuktam iti ced syāt punar etat
kaḥ tra niyama hetuḥ yat indriya tva aviśeṣe manasaḥ eva ubhaya pracāra tvam abhyupagamyate
na anyeṣām iti
ucyate
antar tri kāla viṣayam tasmāt ubhaya pracāram tat
tri kāla viṣaya tvāt

original: iha yasyāntastriṣu ca kāleṣu karaṇasya vṛttistadubhayapracāram,
analyzed: iha yasya antar triṣu ca kāleṣu karaṇasya vṛttiḥ tad ubhaya pracāram
tat yathā buddhiḥ
sākṣāt viṣaya anabhisandhānāt atīta anāgata vartamāna viṣaya tvāt ca manaḥ ntar tri kāla viṣayam
tasmāt ubhaya pracāram tat iti siddham
yuktidīpikāyām sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau ṣaṣṭham āhnikam
kārikā
samadhigatam karaṇa parva
tasya idānīm vyasta samasta vṛttayaḥ vaktavyāḥ
sati ca ubhaya abhidhāne vyasta vṛttiḥ eva tāvat ucyate
na samasta vṛttiḥ
kim kāraṇam
prakaraṇa śeṣa bhūta tvāt
śrotra ādīnām hi sadbhāva prakaraṇam idam anukrāntam
sa ca eṣām sadbhāvaḥ śakti viśeṣa upālambhāt iti uktam
idānīm asau śakti viśeṣaḥ smākam vyasta vṛttiḥ iti ucyate
tasmāt tat anukramaṇam kariṣyāmaḥ

original: āha, yadyevaṃ tasmāducyatāṃ tasya karaṇasya kasminnarthe vṛttiḥ,
analyzed: āha yadi evam tasmāt ucyatām tasya karaṇasya kasmin arthe vṛttiḥ
kim lakṣaṇam vā iti

original: ucyate- yaduktaṃ tasya kasminnarthe vṛttirityatra brūmaḥ
analyzed: ucyate yat uktam tasya kasmin arthe vṛttiḥ iti atra brūmaḥ
rūpa ādiṣu pañcānām ālocana mātram iṣyate vṛttiḥ

original: rūpādiṣu śabdasparśarūparasagandheṣu svabhedabhinneṣu pañcānāṃ śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇānāṃ śravaṇasparśanadarśanarasanaghrāṇalakṣaṇo vyāpāro  #
analyzed: rūpa ādiṣu śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandheṣu sva bheda bhinneṣu pañcānām śrotra tvac cakṣuḥ jihvā ghrāṇānām śravaṇa sparśana darśana rasana ghrāṇa lakṣaṇaḥ vyāpāraḥ
vṛttiḥ iti ucyate

original: tatra karaṇanirdeśe śrotrendriyasya prākpāṭhāttadviṣayanirdeśātilaṃghane prayojanaṃ nāstīti kṛtvā śabdādiṣu pañcānāmityeva paṭhitavyam /
analyzed: tatra karaṇa nirdeśe śrotra indriyasya prāk pāṭhāt tad viṣaya nirdeśa atilaṃghane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā śabda ādiṣu pañcānām iti eva paṭhitavyam
prāktanaḥ tu pramāda pāṭhaḥ
yat punar etat uktam kiṃlakṣaṇā iti atra brūmaḥ ālocana mātram iṣyate
ālocanam grahaṇam iti anarthāntaram

original: tadyathā bhaikṣamātramasmingrāme labhyata ityukte nānyo viśeṣa iti jñāyate /
analyzed: tat yathā bhaikṣa mātram asmin grāme labhyate iti ukte na anyaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti jñāyate
chandraḥ mātram adhīte māṇavakaḥ iti ukte na anyat adhīte iti

original: evamālocanamātramindriyāṇāmiṣyate vṛttirityukte nānyo viśeṣa iti gamyate /
analyzed: evam ālocana mātram indriyāṇām iṣyate vṛttiḥ iti ukte na anyaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti gamyate
tena kim siddham bhavati

original: yaduktamanyairācāryaiḥ sāmānyajñānamindriyāṇāṃ viśeṣajñānaṃ buddheriti tatpratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yat uktam anyaiḥ ācāryaiḥ sāmānya jñānam indriyāṇām viśeṣa jñānam buddheḥ iti tat pratiṣiddham bhavati

original: āha, kaḥ punarasmindarśane doṣo yata etatpratiṣidyata iti ?
analyzed: āha kaḥ punar asmin darśane doṣaḥ yatas etat pratiṣidyate iti
ucyate sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ itaretara apekṣa tve sati ekasmin avirodhāt anyatara parikalpanā ānarthakyam

original: yadi khalvindriyasya sāmānyajñānaṃ na syāttena viśeṣāpekṣaṃ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyāpekṣaśca
analyzed: yadi khalu indriyasya sāmānya jñānam na syāt tena viśeṣa apekṣam sāmānyam sāmānya apekṣaḥ ca

original: viśeṣa iti yatra sāmānyajñānaṃ tatra viśeṣajñānamapi na pratiṣidhyata ityubhayamapīndriyasya syāt /
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ iti yatra sāmānya jñānam tatra viśeṣa jñānam api na pratiṣidhyate iti ubhayam api indriyasya syāt
tatas ca antaḥkaraṇa parikalpanā ānarthakyam

original: viśeṣavato vāntaḥkaraṇasya kaḥ sāmānyena virodha ityubhayasyāpi tatra sambhavādindriyānarthakyam /
analyzed: viśeṣavataḥ vā antaḥkaraṇasya kaḥ sāmānyena virodhaḥ iti ubhayasya api tatra sambhavāt indriya ānarthakyam
tasmāt apratyayam indriyam iti
indriyasya ced pratyayaḥ syāt yathā pratyayavataḥ ntaḥkaraṇasya aniyata viṣaya tvam
evam asya api syāt na tu tat asti
tasmāt apratyayam indriyam iti
kiṃca kāla ativṛtti prasaṃgāt

original: indriyasya cetpratyayaḥ syādyathā pratyayavato 'ntaḥkaraṇasya trikālaviṣayatvamevamasyāpi syāt /
analyzed: indriyasya ced pratyayaḥ syāt yathā pratyayavataḥ ntaḥkaraṇasya tri kāla viṣaya tvam evam asya api syāt
na tu tat asti
tasmāt apratyayam indriyam iti
kim ca anyat smṛti adarśanāt
indriyasya ced pratyayaḥ syāt yathā pratyayavataḥ ntaḥkaraṇasya ādi rūpa upapattiḥ evam atra api syāt
na tu tat asti
tasmāt apratyayam indriyam siddham iti
ucyate na kāraṇa antara prasaṃgāt

original: yadi pradīpavadindriyaṃ prakāśakaṃ syāttena yathā tatprakāśiteṣu ghaṭādiṣvartheṣu karaṇāntaramārgaṇamevamatrāpi syāt /
analyzed: yadi pradīpa vat indriyam prakāśakam syāt tena yathā tad prakāśiteṣu ghaṭa ādiṣu artheṣu karaṇa antara mārgaṇam evam atra api syāt
na ca etat iṣṭam
atas na pradīpavat indriyam prakāśakam iti

original: antaḥkaraṇasadbhāvādayuktamiti cet syānmatam- asti kāraṇāntaraṃ buddhilakṣaṇaṃ yadindriyeṇa pradīpavatprakāśitamarthaṃ gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa sadbhāvāt ayuktam iti ced syāt matam asti kāraṇa antaram buddhi lakṣaṇam yat indriyeṇa pradīpa vat prakāśitam artham gṛhṇāti
tasmāt paravāda anuvādaḥ yam kriyate
na pratiṣedhaḥ iti
tat ca na evam
kasmāt pradīpa indriyayoḥ anyatara anupādāna prasaṃgāt
indriyam api prakāśakam
tatra anyatarasya anupādānam prasaktam
kasmāt na hi eka artha kāriṇaḥ yugapad karaṇe sāmarthyam asti iti
kim ca anyat
antaḥkaraṇa hāneḥ
indriyeṇa pradīpa vat prakāśitān bāhyān arthān sākṣāt antaḥkaraṇam gṛhṇāti iti vadataḥ ntaḥkaraṇam eva hīyate
tasmāt ayuktam antaḥkaraṇasya sāmarthyam
puruṣasya iti ced na karaṇa ānarthakya prasaṃgāt
sākṣāt viṣaya grahaṇa samartham puruṣam icchataḥ karaṇa ānarthakyam prasajyate
tasmāt yuktam etat grāhakam indriyam na tu pradīpa vat prakāśakam iti
āha bhavatu tāvat grahaṇa mātram indriya vṛttiḥ apratyayā
grahaṇa pratyaya prakāśa abhedaḥ
ucyate viṣaya samparkāt tādrūpya āpattiḥ indriya vṛtti grahaṇam

original: tathā viṣayendriyavṛttyanukāreṇa niścayo gaurayaṃ śuklo dhāvatītyevamādiḥ pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā viṣaya indriya vṛtti anukāreṇa niścayaḥ gauḥ ayam śuklaḥ dhāvati iti evamādiḥ pratyayaḥ
tathā viṣaya samparka āgame śrotra ādi vṛtteḥ tādrūpya āgamaḥ vartamāna kālatā

original: grahaṇasyānubhavāttu saṃskārādhānaṃ tatpūrvikā ca smṛtiriti trikālaviṣayā pratyayasyetyayamanayorviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: grahaṇasya anubhavāt tu saṃskāra ādhānam tad pūrvikā ca smṛtiḥ iti tri kāla viṣayā pratyayasya iti ayam anayoḥ viśeṣaḥ
bāhyaḥ tu prakāśaḥ na viṣaya rūpa āpannaḥ

original: saṃskārāttu ghaṭādīnāṃ vyavadhānarūpaṃ pārthivaṃ chāyālakṣaṇaṃ vyañjakatvāya kalpate,
analyzed: saṃskārāt tu ghaṭa ādīnām vyavadhāna rūpam pārthivam chāyā lakṣaṇam vyañjaka tvāya kalpate
cakṣuṣaḥ nugrahāya
ubhayoḥ vā cakṣuḥ viṣayayoḥ iti apare
tasmāt upapannam etat prakāśakam pradīpa ādi
grāhakam śrotra ādi
vyavasāyakam antaḥkaraṇam iti

original: atha karmendriyāṇāṃ kā vṛttirityucyate- naiyāyikāstvevamāhuḥ- ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvakcchrotrāṇīndriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ /
analyzed: atha karmendriyāṇām kā vṛttiḥ iti ucyate naiyāyikāḥ tu evam āhuḥ ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotrāṇi indriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ

original: bhūtebhya ityanena svaviṣayopalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ hīndriyāṇāṃ bhūtaprakṛtitve sati nirvahati (?) nānyathā /
analyzed: bhūtebhyaḥ iti anena sva viṣaya upalabdhi lakṣaṇam hi indriyāṇām bhūta prakṛti tve sati nirvahati na anyathā
tāni punar indriya kāraṇāni pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni

original: ebhyaḥ pañcabhyo yathāsaṃkhyaṃ ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvakcchrotrāṇi pañcendriyāṇi bhavanti /
analyzed: ebhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ yathāsaṃkhyam ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotrāṇi pañca indriyāṇi bhavanti
bhūta prakṛti tvam iti bhūta svabhāvam vyākhyāyamānam pañcasu api sambhavati
bhūta kāraṇa tvam tu anyeṣu caturṣu tathā eva
śrotre tu kathaṃcid karṇa śaṣkulī avacchinna nabhaḥ bhāga abhiprāyeṇa vyavahārataḥ samarthanīyam

original: evaṃ bhautikānīndriyāṇi svasvaviṣayamadhigantumutsahanta iti tallakṣaṇatvameṣāṃ sidhyatīti,
analyzed: evam bhautikāni indriyāṇi sva sva viṣayam adhigantum utsahante iti tad lakṣaṇa tvam eṣām sidhyati iti
atas bhūtebhyaḥ iti uktam
etat tu sāṃkhya ācāryāṇām na iṣṭam

original: evaṃ hi sāṃkhyavṛddhā āhuḥ- āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇi arthaṃ sādhayitumarhanti nānyathā /
analyzed: evam hi sāṃkhya vṛddhāḥ āhuḥ āhaṅkārikāṇi indriyāṇi artham sādhayitum arhanti na anyathā

original: tathā hi kārakaṃ kārakatvādeva prāpyakāri bhavati /
analyzed: tathā hi kārakam kāraka tvāt eva prāpya kāri bhavati

original: bhautikāni cendriyāṇi kathaṃ prāpyakārīṇi duravartini viṣaye bhaveyuḥ ?
analyzed: bhautikāni ca indriyāṇi katham prāpya kārīṇi duravartini viṣaye bhaveyuḥ
āhaṃkārikāṇām tu teṣām vyāpaka tvāt

original: viṣayākārapariṇāmātmikā vṛttirvṛttimato 'nanyā satī sambhavatyeveti suvacaṃ prāpyakāritvam api ca mahadaṇuguṇagrahaṇamāhaṅkāritve teṣāṃ kalpate,
analyzed: viṣaya ākāra pariṇāma ātmikā vṛttiḥ vṛttimataḥ na anyā satī sambhavati eva iti suvacam prāpyakāri tvam api ca mahat aṇu guṇa grahaṇam āhaṅkāri tve teṣām kalpate
na bhautika tve

original: bhautikatve hi yatparimāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ tatparimāṇaṃ grāhyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: bhautika tve hi yad parimāṇam karaṇam tad parimāṇam grāhyam gṛhṇīyāt
āha atha karmendriyāṇām kā vṛttiḥ iti
ucyate
vacana ādāna viharaṇa utsarga ānandāḥ ca pañcānām

original: vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthānāṃ tu vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandalakṣaṇā yathākramaṃ vṛttayaḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ /
analyzed: vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upasthānām tu vacana ādāna viharaṇa utsarga ānanda lakṣaṇāḥ yathākramam vṛttayaḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ
tatra ucyate nena iti vacanam

original: tasmādya evārthapratyāyanasamartho varṇasamudāyaḥ padavākyaślokagranthalakṣaṇaḥ sa vāgindriyasyārtho nānyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yaḥ eva artha pratyāyana samarthaḥ varṇa samudāyaḥ pada vākya śloka grantha lakṣaṇaḥ sa vāc indriyasya arthaḥ na anyaḥ
ādīyate nena iti ādānam
āṅ abhividhi arthe prayujyate

original: tataśca yadeva prakṣālanaparimārjanopasparśanādhyayanapraharaṇaśilpavyāyāmādi kṛtsnaṃ grahaṇaṃ sa indriyārthā nānyaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca yat eva prakṣālana parimārjana upasparśana adhyayana praharaṇa śilpa vyāyāma ādi kṛtsnam grahaṇam saḥ indriya arthāḥ na anyaḥ
viśiṣṭam haraṇam viharaṇam
atas ca yat eva sama viṣama nimna unnata caṅkramaṇa parivartana nāṭya vyāyāma ādiḥ saḥ indriyārthaḥ na anyaḥ
evam utkṛṣṭaḥ sargaḥ utsargaḥ
na anyaḥ

original: ataśca ya evāśitapītavipariṇāmasya samyakstrotomārgānusāriṇo visargaḥ sa indriyārtho nānyaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca yaḥ eva aśita pīta vipariṇāmasya samyak strotaḥ mārga anusāriṇaḥ visargaḥ saḥ indriya arthaḥ na anyaḥ
evam abhivyāpya ānandam ānandaḥ
tatas ca yaḥ eva asādhāraṇa prīti nayana abhiniṣpatti lakṣaṇaḥ saḥ indriya arthaḥ na anyaḥ  /
kārikā
āha prāk antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti nirdeśaḥ
sarga krama anugamāt pūrvam buddhi ahaṃkāra manasām vṛtti nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
kim kāraṇam
evam hi sarga kramaḥ nugataḥ bhavati
krama bhede vā prayojanam vaktavyam iti
ucyate na indriya vṛtti pūrvakatvāt
antaḥkaraṇasya hi indriya vṛtti pravartakaḥ pratyayaḥ

original: tathā ca vakṣyati- dṛṣṭe tathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiriti (ISk 30) /
analyzed: tathā ca vakṣyati dṛṣṭe tathā api adṛṣṭe trayasya tad pūrvikā vṛttiḥ iti

original: tasmātsargakrameṇa vinā tannirdeśaḥ prāgācāryeṇa kriyate iti /
analyzed: tasmāt sarga krameṇa vinā tad nirdeśaḥ prāk ācāryeṇa kriyate iti
āha tad asambhavaḥ
śāstre prāk abhimāna abhidhānāt

original: śāstraṃ hyevamāha- kā nu bhoḥ saṃjñā māturudare 'vasthitaṃ kumāraṃ pratyabhinirviśata iti ?
analyzed: śāstram hi evam āha kā nu bhoḥ saṃjñā mātuḥ udare vasthitam kumāram pratyabhinirviśate iti
asmi iti eṣā māhātmī saṃvid iti
tathā kārya kāraṇa vyūha sama kālam māhātmya śarīraḥ smi iti pratibuddhyate
pravṛttāḥ ca eva hi avyaktāḥ bhavanti asmi iti asmitā mātrāḥ
pramāṇam ca śāstram
tasmāt prāk antaḥkaraṇa nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
ucyate tad nimitta arthena vivakṣita tvāt
satyam etat kārya kāraṇa vyūha niṣpatti sama kālam asmi iti eṣā māhātmī saṃvid pratyupadhīyate
śabda ādi viṣayaḥ tu antaḥkaraṇa pratyayaḥ śrotra ādi nimittaḥ iti
etat pūrva śabdena vivakṣitam
na ca nimittam atikramya naimittika abhidhānam nyāyyam

original: athavā naiva vayamidaṃ praṣṭavyā yathā prāgantaḥkaraṇavṛttinirdeśaḥ kartavya iti /
analyzed: athavā na eva vayam idam praṣṭavyāḥ yathā prāk antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti
kim kāraṇam yasmāt
svālakṣaṇyam vṛttiḥ trayasya
sva lakṣaṇam eva svālakṣaṇyam
svārthe taddhita vṛttiḥ
anya bhāvaḥ tu kāla śabda vyavāyāt iti

original: yathā buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ hi saukṣmyānna śakyaṃ svarūpamabhidhātumityato vṛttireva lakṣaṇabhāvenopadiśyate /
analyzed: yathā buddhi ahaṃkāra manasām hi saukṣmyāt na śakyam svarūpam abhidhātum iti atas vṛttiḥ eva lakṣaṇa bhāvena upadiśyate
śrotra ādīnām api ca saukṣmyāt lakṣaṇam apadeṣṭum aśakyam iti vṛttiḥ evā ucyate
na lakṣaṇam
tat eva ca eṣā lakṣaṇam bhavati
yat śabda ālocana samartham tat śrotram
evam itareṣu api vaktavyam
buddhi ahaṃkāra manasām ca lakṣaṇam adhyavasāya ādi uktam

original: tadeva vṛttitvenācakṣāṇaḥ śrotrādīnāmeva cābhidadhānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cāpyācakṣāṇo vṛttivṛttimatorananyatvaṃ jñāpayati /
analyzed: tat eva vṛtti tvena ācakṣāṇaḥ śrotra ādīnām eva ca abhidadhānam lakṣaṇam ca api ācakṣāṇaḥ vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ ananyatvam jñāpayati

original: anyathā tu yathādhyavasāyādi lakṣaṇamevaṃ rūpādiṣu pañcānāmalocanamātraṃ lakṣaṇamityucyate,
analyzed: anyathā tu yathā adhyavasāya ādi lakṣaṇam evam rūpa ādiṣu pañcānām alocana mātram lakṣaṇam iti ucyate
na tu vṛttiḥ iti
śrotra ādi vat buddhi ādīnām api vyavasāya ādayaḥ vṛttiḥ iti ucyate
na tu lakṣaṇam

original: tasmādanyathā nirdeśo jñāpakaṃ vṛttivṛttimatoranyatvasyeti vyākhyātā karaṇavṛttiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt anyathā nirdeśaḥ jñāpakam vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ anya tvasya iti vyākhyātā karaṇa vṛttiḥ
sā eṣā bhavati asāmānyā
sā iti pūrva kṛtām vṛttim abhisambadhnāti

original: eṣeti sarvanāmnā pratyākṛṣṭāṃ tāmeva pratyakṣaṃ prati nirdiśati /
analyzed: eṣā iti sarvanāmnā pratyākṛṣṭām tām eva pratyakṣam prati nirdiśati
bhavati iti vakṣyamāṇena dharma antareṇa asyāḥ tadvat tā anubhāvitam khyāpayati
asāmānyā iti dharmam ācaṣṭe
sāmānyā sādhāraṇā iti arthaḥ
na sāmānya asāmānyā
pratikaraṇam niyatā iti uktam bhavati

original: yā hīyamanukrāntā karaṇaparvaṇo 'dhyavasayādikā vṛttiriyaṃ vyastānāṃ karaṇānāṃ pratisvaṃ niyatā /
analyzed: yā hi iyam anukrāntā karaṇa parvaṇaḥ dhī avasaya ādikā vṛttiḥ iyam vyastānām karaṇānām pratisvam niyatā
tatas ca eṣām buddhi ādīnām kārya viśeṣa nimitta bhāva saṃsūcitasya svarūpasya asaṃkaraḥ siddhaḥ
āha sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ itaretara apekṣa tvāt asāmānya abhidhānena sāmānyasya api abhidhānāt adhyavasāya ādikā karaṇānām asāmānyā vṛttiḥ iti ukte rthāt āpannam eṣām

ucyate

original: taiḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaḥ prāṇa iti vedānteṣvapi /

original: na ca dharmāntaraṃ dharmāntarasya vyāpāro bhavitumarhatīti /

original: kiṃ tu sāmānyakaraṇavṛttyā preryamāṇo vāyustatpravaṇatvāttatkāryatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: kim tu sāmānya karaṇa vṛttyā preryamāṇaḥ vāyuḥ tad pravaṇa tvāt tad kārya tām pratipadyate

original: tatra prāṇādikārye vāyau prāṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā evamucyate- prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañca /

original: kathametadavagamyate 'rthāntarapreritasya vāyoriyaṃ kriyā bhavati na punaḥ svatantrasyeti ?

original: kasmāt ? sarvatra prasaṃgāt svābhāvike hi vāyordiksaṃcāre 'bhyupagamyamāne sarvatra tatsaṃbhavaḥ syāt /

original: yo 'yaṃ rasaṃ dhātūn śukraṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vātārtavagarbhāṃścākarṣannadhogacchannayamantarvṛttirvāyurapāna ityabhidhīyate /

original: yaccāpi kiṃcidapakramaṇaṃ nāma bhūteṣu tadyathā apakrānto 'yaṃ dharmādibhyastadviparītebhyo vā iti bāhyā khalvapānavṛttireṣā /

original: eṣā hyetaṃ prāṇamūrdhvaṃ vartamānamarvāgeva sanniyacchati arvāgeva sanniruṇaddhi /

original: sa caiṣo 'trābhivyakto bhavati śītodakena vā paryukṣitasya prāsamasiṃ vikośaṃ codyatamabhipaśyataḥ /

analyzed: dānam parigrahaḥ śaucam śraddhāyām lakṣaṇam smṛtam

original: sukhārthī yastu seveta vidyāṃ karma tapāṃsi vā /
analyzed: sukha arthī yaḥ tu seveta vidyām karma tapāṃsi vā

original: prāyaścittaparo nityaṃ sukhāyāṃ sa tu vartate //
analyzed: prāyaścitta paraḥ nityam sukhāyām sa tu vartate
dvi tva eka tva pṛthaktvam nityam cetanam acetanam sūkṣmam
satkāryam asatkārya vividiṣitavyam vividiṣāyāḥ
viṣa pīta supta matta vat a vividiṣā dhyāyinām sadā yoniḥ
kārya karaṇa kṣaya karī prākṛtikā gatiḥ samākhyātā
viṣaya sa tattvam punar sarva viṣayiṇī dhṛtiḥ
āśrama viṣayiṇī śraddhā
dṛṣṭa ānuśravika viṣayiṇī sukhā
vyakta viṣayiṇī vividiṣā
avyakta viṣayiṇī avividiṣā
guṇa samanvayaḥ tu rajaḥ tamaḥ bahulā dhṛtiḥ
sattva rajaḥ bahulā śraddhā
sattva tamaḥ bahulā sukhā
rajaḥ bahulā vividiṣā
tamaḥ bahula vividiṣāḥ iti uktam ca
lakṣaṇa viṣaya sa tattvam traiguṇya samanvayam ca pañcānām

original: yonīnāṃ yo vidyādyativṛṣabhaṃ taṃ tvahaṃ manye //
analyzed: yonīnām yaḥ vidyāt yati vṛṣabham tam tu aham manye
iti uktāḥ prāṇa ādayaḥ yonayaḥ ca
etat dvayam adhigamya samyak mārga anugamanam kuryāt
rajaḥ tamaḥ dharma ādi sādhana bhāva vinivṛttitaḥ tu atra prāṇānām antar vṛttiḥ anupādhika tvāt anivartyā
bahis vṛttiḥ tu mārga amārga viṣaya tayā prayoktavyā
katham iti ucyate prāṇa viṣayā tāvat praṇatiḥ dharma ādi viṣaye eva aparoddhavyā
tatas hi asya sattva vṛddhiḥ
sattva vṛddheḥ ca uttarottara buddhi rūpa adhigamaḥ

original: apānaviṣayastvapakramaṇaṃ dharmādiviṣaya evāparoddhavyamevaṃ hyasya khyātiviṣayākārasya tamaso nirhrāsaḥ /
analyzed: apāna viṣayaḥ tu apakramaṇam dharma ādi viṣayaḥ eva aparoddhavyam evam hi asya khyāti viṣaya ākārasya tamasaḥ nirhrāsaḥ
tatas ca uttara uttara buddhi rūpa adhigamaḥ
tathā samāna viṣayam sāhacarya sattva dharma anuguṇam kuryāt
yasmāt śāstram āha sattva ārāmaḥ sattva mithunaḥ ca sadā syāt iti
ātma utkarṣa tu udāna viṣayam
avidyā parvaṇaḥ ntyam rūpam vivarjya tad pratipakṣaiḥ nivartayet

original: atyantāvinābhāvaṃ ca vyānaviṣayaṃ jñānaviṣaya eva bhāvayet /
analyzed: atyanta avinābhāvam ca vyāna viṣayam jñāna viṣaye eva bhāvayet
yonīnām catasṛṇām dharmatā bīja tām eva ādadyāt
a vividiṣām api aniṣṭa phala hetuṣu bhāvayet

original: so 'yaṃ dharmādiṣu pravaṇastatpratipakṣāpakrāntaḥ sattvārāmo vinivṛttābhimāno jñānaniṣṭhaḥ saviśuddhayoniracireṇa parama brahmopapadyata iti  #
analyzed: saḥ yam dharma ādiṣu pravaṇaḥ tad pratipakṣa apakrāntaḥ sattva ārāmaḥ vinivṛtta abhimānaḥ jñāna niṣṭhaḥ sa viśuddhayoniḥ acireṇa parama brahma upapadyate iti
āha ca
bāhyām prāṇa vivṛttim samyak mārge budhaḥ pratiṣṭhāpya
vinivṛtta vikhara kaluṣaḥ dhruvam amṛtam sthānam abhyeti
pañcānām yonīnām dharma ādi nimitta tām ca saṃsthāpya
paripakvam iti adhastāt na punar tad bhāvitaḥ gacchet
iti vyākhyātā vyasta samastā karaṇānām vṛttiḥ
kārikā

original: āha, yeyamekaikasmin rūpādāvarthe karaṇacatuṣṭayasya vṛttiḥ sā kiṃ yugapat āhosvit krameṇeti ?
analyzed: āha yā iyam ekaikasmin rūpa ādau arthe karaṇa catuṣṭayasya vṛttiḥ sā kim yugapad āhosvit krameṇa iti

original: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet ubhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: kutas saṃśayaḥ iti ced ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt
iha eka artha viṣayāṇām yugapad api vṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā
tat yathā candra maṇḍale cakṣuṣām manasaḥ vā
kramaśas ca tat yathā ghaṭe madhu udaka payasām
eka artha viṣayam ca karaṇa catuṣṭayam

original: ato naḥ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ cakṣurmanovadyugapadasya vṛttiḥ,
analyzed: atas naḥ saṃśayaḥ kim cakṣuḥ manaḥ vat yugapad asya vṛttiḥ
āhosvit madhu ādi vat krameṇa iti
ucyate yathādarśanam api tāvat ucyatām
kim atra yuktam bhavān manyate

original: sa cetsapyagupadekṣyasi ko nirbandhastadeva pratipadyāmahe iti /
analyzed: sa ced sapyak upadekṣyasi kaḥ nirbandhaḥ tat eva pratipadyāmahe iti
yat yavam tasmāt idam asmad darśanam
yugapad catuṣṭayasya tu vṛttiḥ
tuśabdaḥ yugapad eva iti arthaḥ
buddhi ahaṃkāra manasām hi buddhīndriyāṇām ca samāna deśa tvam

original: tatra na śakyata etadvaktuṃ sati śaktisadbhāve viṣayasambandhe ca kasyacittatra vṛttiḥ kasyacinneti /
analyzed: tatra na śakyate etat vaktum sati śakti sadbhāve viṣaya sambandhe ca kasyacid tatra vṛttiḥ kasyacid na iti
kim ca anyat
megha stanita ādiṣu krama anupalabdheḥ

original: yadi hi krameṇa śrotrādīnāmantaḥkaraṇasya ca bāhye 'rthe vṛttiḥ syādapi tarhi meghastanitakṛṣṇasarpālocanādiṣvapyupalabhyate kramaḥ /
analyzed: yadi hi krameṇa śrotra ādīnām antaḥkaraṇasya ca bāhye rthe vṛttiḥ syāt api tarhi megha stanita kṛṣṇa sarpa ālocanā ādiṣu api upalabhyate kramaḥ
na tu upalabhyate
tasmāt yugapad eva bāhye rthe catuṣṭaya vṛttiḥ iti

original: ucyate- yaduktaṃ śrotrādīnāmantaḥkaraṇasya cābhinnakālaṃ vṛttirityatra brūmaḥ,
analyzed: ucyate yat uktam śrotra ādīnām antaḥkaraṇasya ca abhinna kālam vṛttiḥ iti atra brūmaḥ
ayuktam etat
kim kāraṇam
yasmāt asmākam
kramaśas ca tasya nirdiṣṭā
tasya iti catuṣṭayam api sambadhyate
caśabdaḥ vadhāraṇa arthaḥ
kramaśas eva iti arthaḥ
kramaśas eva hi bāhya antaḥkaraṇa vṛttyoḥ eka artha nipātaḥ
yat tu uktam samāna deśānām śakti sambandha sadbhāve vṛtti abhāva anupapattiḥ iti
atra brūmaḥ cakṣuḥ ādi vat etat syāt

original: tadyathā cakṣustvacoḥ samānadeśatve śaktiviṣayasambandhopapattau rajodhūmātapādigataḥ sparśa evopalabhyate, na rūpam /
analyzed: tat yathā cakṣuḥ tvacoḥ samāna deśa tve śakti viṣaya sambandha upapattau rajaḥ dhūma ātapa ādi gataḥ sparśaḥ eva upalabhyate na rūpam
evam iha api syāt tasmāt
dṛṣṭe tathā api adṛṣṭe
kramaśas eva catuṣṭayasya vṛttiḥ
adṛṣṭa grahaṇena punar atra atīna āgata vyavahita viṣaya grahaṇam
tatra atītam dvividham
dṛṣṭa viṣaya dṛṣṭa viṣayam ca
atra api dṛṣṭa viṣayam pratyabhijñānam iti abhipretam
adṛṣṭa viṣayam smṛtiḥ
sā tu liṅga āgamābhyām akasmāt vā bhavati

original: tathā ca vṛṣagaṇavīreṇāpyuktaṃ bhavati ___ anāgatavyavahitaviṣayajñānaṃ tu liṅgagāgamābhyām / āha ca
analyzed: tathā ca vṛṣa gaṇa vīreṇa api uktam bhavati anāgata vyavahita viṣaya jñānam tu liṅga ga āgamābhyām āha ca
viṣaya indriya saṃyogāt pratyakṣa jñānam ucyate
tat eva atīndriyam jātam punar bhāvanayā smṛtiḥ
tat eva bhāvanā apekṣa jñānam kāla antare punar
tatra eva sa indriyam jātam pratyabhijñānam ucyate

original: tatra duṣṭe kramaḥ prati nāsti sandehaḥ /
analyzed: tatra duṣṭe kramaḥ prati na asti sandehaḥ

original: yatpunaretaduktaṃ dṛṣṭe meghastanitakṛṣṭasarpālocanādau kramānupalabdheryugapaccatuṣṭayasya vṛttirityatra brūmaḥ- etadapyayuktam /
analyzed: yat punar etat uktam dṛṣṭe megha stanita kṛṣṭa sarpa ālocanā ādau krama anupalabdheḥ yugapad catuṣṭayasya vṛttiḥ iti atra brūmaḥ etat api ayuktam
kim kāraṇam yasmāt
trayasya tad pūrvikā vṛttiḥ
na tāvat buddhi ahaṃkāra manasām sākṣāt bāhya artha grahaṇa sāmarthyam asti
antaḥkaraṇa anupapatti prasaṃgāt
śrotra ādi vaiyarthya prasaṃgāt
dvāri dvāra bhāva vyāghāta prasaṅgāt ca
tasmāt pūrvam śrotra ādīnām artha sambandhaḥ sti megha stanita ādau api avaśyam etat abhyupagantavyam
paścāt tu tad vṛtti upanipātāt antaḥkaraṇasya iti asti

original: tatra yaduktaṃ meghastanitādiṣu kramānanugate yugapaccatuṣṭayasya vṛttirityetadayuktam /
analyzed: tatra yat uktam megha stanita ādiṣu krama ananugate yugapad catuṣṭayasya vṛttiḥ iti etat ayuktam
anyaiḥ tu anyathā anvayaḥ darśitaḥ

original: tadyathā catuṣṭayasya mano 'haṃkārabuddhīnāmantaḥkaraṇānāṃ bāhyenaikena karaṇena śrotreṇa vā cakṣuṣā vā saha catuṣṭayasyetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā catuṣṭayasya manaḥ haṃkāra buddhīnām antaḥkaraṇānām bāhyena ekena karaṇena śrotreṇa vā cakṣuṣā vā saha catuṣṭayasya iti arthaḥ
asya dṛṣṭe vartamāne yugapad vṛttiḥ pūrva ācāryaiḥ nirdiṣṭā
ācāryeṇa tu krameṇa iti arthaḥ
adṛṣṭe tīta ādau api kramaśas ca krameṇa eva
yatas trayasya antaḥkaraṇasya tad pūrvikā bāhya indriya pūrvikā vṛttiḥ
yadā yathā anubhavaḥ tathā saṃskāraḥ
yathā ca saṃskāraḥ tathā smṛtiḥ iti evam vṛttiḥ bāhya indriya pūrvikā iti
kārikā

original: āha, kiṃ punareṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ svaviṣayaniyamena vṛttirbhavati āhosvidvyatikareṇeti ?
analyzed: āha kim punar eṣām karaṇānām sva viṣaya niyamena vṛttiḥ bhavati āhosvit vyatikareṇa iti

original: ucyate- nanu ca prāgeva rūpādiṣu pañcānāmālocanamātramiṣyate vṛttiriti (ISk 28)
analyzed: ucyate nanu ca prāk eva rūpa ādiṣu pañcānām ālocana mātram iṣyate vṛttiḥ iti
ca uktvā ācāryeṇa ante padiṣṭam sā eṣā bhavati asāmānyā iti
tatra evam gate bhavataḥ saṃśayaḥ
kutas iti ucyate satyam eva etat
tathā api jāyate saṃśayaḥ
kutas karaṇa antareṇa sva viṣaya upalabdhau karaṇa antara autsukya darśanāt

original: iha karaṇāntareṇa cakṣuṣāmradāḍimādirūpopalabdhau satyāṃ karaṇāntarasya jihvālakṣaṇasyautsukyaṃ pravṛttiścopalabdhā /
analyzed: iha karaṇa antareṇa cakṣuṣā āmra dāḍima ādi rūpa upalabdhau satyām karaṇa antarasya jihvā lakṣaṇasya autsukyam pravṛttiḥ ca upalabdhā
tat yadi sva viṣaya niyatāni indriyāni
na eṣām karaṇa antara viṣaya upalambhāt tad sāhacarya apekṣaḥ sva viṣaya grahaṇa bhāvaḥ syāt
asti ca
tasmāt upapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ
tatra idānīm bhavataḥ pratipattiḥ iti

original: ucyate- atrāpi nāstīndriyāṇāṃ svaviṣayagrahaṇavyatikaraḥ / kiṃ tarhi
analyzed: ucyate atra api na asti indriyāṇām sva viṣaya grahaṇa vyatikaraḥ kim tarhi
svām svām pratipadyante paraspara ākūta hetukīm vṛttim

original: puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacit kāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
analyzed: puruṣa arthaḥ eva hetuḥ na kenacid kāryate karaṇam

original: yasya karaṇasya yā vṛttirapadiṣṭā tadyathā śrotrasya śabdagrahaṇam,
analyzed: yasya karaṇasya yā vṛttiḥ apadiṣṭā tat yathā śrotrasya śabda grahaṇam
cakṣuṣaḥ rūpa grahaṇam ityādi
tām eva pratipadyante sva viṣaya jidhṛkṣayā avalambantaḥ iti arthaḥ
parasparasya ākūtam paraspara ākūtam
ākūtam abhiprāyaḥ bhisandhiḥ iti arthaḥ
paraspara ākūtam hetuḥ pratipatteḥ asyāḥ
sā iyam paraspara ākūta hetukī

original: parasparākūtaṃ pratipatteḥ kāraṇamiti kṛtvā tācchabdyaṃ labhate /
analyzed: paraspara ākūtam pratipatteḥ kāraṇam iti kṛtvā tācchabdyam labhate
tat yathā dadhi trapusam jvaraḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati yadā cakṣuṣāmradāḍimādi rūpamupalabdhaṃ bhavati tadā rasanendriyamupāttaviṣayasya cakṣuṣo vṛttiṃ saṃvedya svaviṣayajighṛkṣayautsuktavadvikāramāpadyate,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yadā cakṣuṣā āmra dāḍima ādi rūpam upalabdham bhavati tadā rasana indriyam upātta viṣayasya cakṣuṣaḥ vṛttim saṃvedya sva viṣaya jighṛkṣayā autsukta vat vikāram āpadyate

original: rasanasya vṛtiṃ saṃvedya pādau viharaṇamārabhete hastāvādānaṃ,
analyzed: rasanasya vṛtim saṃvedya pādau viharaṇam ārabhete hastau ādānam
tāvat yāvat asau viṣayaḥ rasana indriya yogya tām nītaḥ
tatas rasanam sva viṣaye pravartate
evam itareṣu api vaktavyam
āha yadi evam tena tarhi indriya antara vṛtti saṃvedane kṣa pratyayava tva prasaṃgaḥ
yadi tarhi indriya antareṇa indriya antarasya vṛttiḥ saṃvedyate
prāptam asya pratyayavat tvam
atha apratyayam indriyam paraspara ākūta saṃvedanam
tarhi na vācyam iti
kim ca paraspara dvāri dvāra bhāva prasaṃgaḥ ca
indriya antaram ced indriya antarasya vṛttim saṃvedya sva artham ākāṃkṣet
prāptam asya dvāri tvam itarasya ca dvāra tvam
tat ayuktam indriyāṇām paraspara ākūta saṃvedanam iti
ucyate na upacārāt
prāk eva upadiṣṭam asmābhiḥ apratyayam indriyam iti

original: kiṃ tarhi svaviṣayasya paṭoḥ sahacāriṇamarthamindriyāntaraviṣayatāmāpannaṃ saṃspṛśya svabhāvata indriyāntaraṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati sākāṃkṣaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: kim tarhi sva viṣayasya paṭoḥ sahacāriṇam artham indriya antara viṣaya tām āpannam saṃspṛśya svabhāvataḥ indriya antaram sva viṣayam prati sākāṃkṣam bhavati
tad sannidhau vikriyā darśanāt
tatra saṃvedanam upacarya evam ucyate iti adoṣaḥ
kim ca anyat
bhautika avayava pratyaya vivṛtti vat tad vivṛtteḥ

original: yathā buddheḥ prasādamanantaraṃ bhautikānāmavayavānāṃ mukhanayanādīnāṃ prasādo bhavati,
analyzed: yathā buddheḥ prasādam anantaram bhautikānām avayavānām mukha nayana ādīnām prasādaḥ bhavati
na ca eṣām pratyayavat tvam
evam iha api syāt
na ca pratyayavat tvam
etena dvāri dvāra bhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ
manaḥ dhiṣṭhāna sāmarthyāt vā
athavā paraspara viṣayam ākūtam paraspara ākūtam
yathā jala viṣayaḥ puruṣaḥ jala puruṣaḥ
ākūtam icchā saṃkalpaḥ manaḥ iti arthaḥ
sa hetuḥ asyāḥ sā iyam paraspara ākūta hetukī tām
etat uktam bhavati

original: yathā kiṃcidindriyaṃ viṣaye pravṛttaṃ bhavati tadā taddvāreṇa samastamarthamupalabhya tatsahacāriṇamarthāntaramākāṃkṣadindriyāntaraṃ vṛttyā  #
analyzed: yathā kiṃcid indriyam viṣaye pravṛttam bhavati tadā tad dvāreṇa samastam artham upalabhya tad sahacāriṇam artha antaram ākāṃkṣat indriya antaram vṛttyā
pratitiṣṭhate
tena ākāṃkṣāvatā manasā adhiṣṭhitām indriyam vikriyām āpadyate

original: tathā ca tantrāntare 'pyuktaṃ- “yasya yasyendriyasya viṣayaṃ manodhyāyatyabhisampattyarthena tasya tasyautsukyaṃ pravṛttiśca bhavatīti /
analyzed: tathā ca tantra antare pi uktam yasya yasya indriyasya viṣayam manaḥ dhyāyati abhisampatti arthena tasya tasya autsukyam pravṛttiḥ ca bhavati iti

original: ” etaduktaṃ svāṃ svāṃ pratipadyante parasparākūtahetukīṃ vṛttiriti /
analyzed: etat uktam svām svām pratipadyante paraspara ākūta hetukīm vṛttiḥ iti

original: kimindriyaṃ manovṛttyādhiṣṭhāya svaviṣaye pravartayati yathā paraśvādīṃścaitra iti ?
analyzed: kim indriyam manaḥ vṛttyā adhiṣṭhāya sva viṣaye pravartayati yathā paraśu ādīn caitraḥ iti
na iti ucyate

original: kiṃ tarhi svaviṣayasaṃkalpānugṛhītasya manasaḥ saṃsparśātsvayamevendriyaṃ svaviṣayaṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: kim tarhi sva viṣaya saṃkalpa anugṛhītasya manasaḥ saṃsparśāt svayam eva indriyam sva viṣayam pratipadyate
kasmāt prayoga śakti asiddheḥ

original: na hi yathā caitrasya paraśvādiprayogaśaktiḥ siddhā evaṃ manasa indriyaprayogaśaktiḥ /
analyzed: na hi yathā caitrasya paraśu ādi prayoga śaktiḥ siddhā evam manasaḥ indriya prayoga śaktiḥ
tasmāt ayuktam indriyasya manaḥ prerakam iti
rajaḥ iti ced syāt matam
rajasaḥ hi indriya antara prayoga sāmarthyam vidyate
tasmāt ayuktam uktam prayoga śakti asiddheḥ na indriyāṇām manaḥ prayojakam iti
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt aviśeṣāt

original: indriyāntare 'pi hi tarhi rajo 'stītyata ātmabhūtenaivāsya nimittena pravṛttirapratiṣiddhā,
analyzed: indriya antare pi hi tarhi rajaḥ sti iti atas ātma bhūtena eva asya nimittena pravṛttiḥ a pratiṣiddhā
kim manasā parikalpitena iti
kim ca anyat karaṇa antara anupapatteḥ

original: caitro hi paraśvādīnāṃ prayogaṃ karaṇāntareṇa karoti /
analyzed: caitraḥ hi paraśu ādīnām prayogam karaṇa antareṇa karoti
na tu manasaḥ karaṇa antaram asti iti asamānam
pāṇi vat iti ced na caitra vyāpāra apekṣa tvāt

original: tadapi hi caitravyāpārāpekṣaṃ pravartate na svataḥ /
analyzed: tat api hi caitra vyāpāra apekṣam pravartate na svatas
kiṃca tad vyatirekeṇa pravṛtti upalabdheḥ

original: yasya hi prayojakāntarāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ na tasya kadācidapi svatantrasya bhavati /
analyzed: yasya hi prayojaka antara apekṣā pravṛttiḥ na tasya kadācid api svatantrasya bhavati

original: na cetkārakaṃ yathā maulānāṃ guṇānāmevamihāpi puruṣārtha evaṃ heturna kena citkāryate karaṇamiti siddham // 31 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------------

analyzed: jagāma tam vana uddeśam vyāsaḥ saha mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

evam sa antaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sarvam viṣayam avagāhate
viśiṣṭān aviśiṣṭān ca śabda ādīn sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭa vyavahitān pramāṇa balena sva vṛtte viṣayīkaroti iti arthaḥ
etat uktam bhavati aniyata viṣayaḥ dvārī
niyata viṣayāṇi dvārāṇi

original: tadyathā prāsādasya pūrvottaradakṣiṇapaścimānāṃ svadiṅniyamo na pūrvamuttaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ paścimaṃ vā kadācidbhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā prāsādasya pūrva uttara dakṣiṇa paścimānām sva diś niyamaḥ na pūrvam uttaram dakṣiṇam paścimam vā kadācid bhavati
tathā itarāṇi api dvārīṇi

original: tatrāniyatāḥ sarvadigavasthitairdvāraiḥ pravartanta evamihāpi śrotrādīni svaviṣayaniyatāni /
analyzed: tatra aniyatāḥ sarva diś avasthitaiḥ dvāraiḥ pravartante evam iha api śrotra ādīni sva viṣaya niyatāni

original: sāntaḥkaraṇā tu buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayamavagāhate yasmāt tasmādaniyataviṣayatvādupapannamettrividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri,
analyzed: sa antaḥkaraṇā tu buddhiḥ sarvam viṣayam avagāhate yasmāt tasmāt aniyata viṣaya tvāt upapannam et trividham karaṇam dvāri
dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi iti
kārikā
ete pradīpa kalpāḥ paraspara vilakṣaṇāḥ guṇa viśeṣāḥ

original: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
analyzed: kṛtsnam puruṣasya artham prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti
ete iti anena trayam abhisambadhnāti śrotra ādīnām anyatamam manaḥ haṃkāraḥ ca
pradīpa kalpāḥ iti anena prakāśa sāmyam karaṇa parvaṇaḥ ācaṣṭe
yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśakaḥ evam karaṇam api
tad vyāpāre sati viṣaya āvirbhāva anupapatteḥ
paraspara vilakṣaṇaḥ iti anena vyasta vṛttim pūrva uktām ākarṣati
tayā hi eṣām vailakṣaṇyam anumīyate
ālocana saṃkalpa abhimāna bhedāt

original: guṇaviśeṣā ityanena sattvādīnāṃ puruṣavijñānamuddiśya tadbhāvena pariṇāmaṃ khyāpayati /
analyzed: guṇa viśeṣāḥ iti anena sattva ādīnām puruṣa vijñānam uddiśya tad bhāvena pariṇāmam khyāpayati

original: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthamiti viśeṣāviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ āhāryadhāryaprakāśyatayā yathāsambhavaṃ prakāśya svavṛttyanuguṇaṃ kṛtvā viṣayavyāpāreṇānubhūya
analyzed: kṛtsnam puruṣasya artham iti viśeṣa aviśeṣa lakṣaṇam kāryam āhārya dhārya prakāśya tayā yathāsambhavam prakāśya sva vṛtti anuguṇam kṛtvā viṣaya vyāpāreṇa anubhūya
a tad viṣaya tām āpādayati iti arthaḥ
kadācid tu buddhiḥ eva bāhya karaṇa saṃkalpa abhimāna gṛhītam

original: sarvathā tvayaṃ śāstrārtho yena vā tena karaṇena viṣayamupāttaṃ buddhiradhyavasyati /
analyzed: sarvathā tu ayam śāstra arthaḥ yena vā tena karaṇena viṣayam upāttam buddhiḥ adhyavasyati

original: tayā cādhyavasāyarūpāpannayā cetanāśaktiranugṛhyate na karaṇāntarasya puruṣeṇa samabandho 'sti /
analyzed: tayā ca adhyavasāya rūpa āpannayā cetanā śaktiḥ anugṛhyate na karaṇa antarasya puruṣeṇa samabandho sti
tatas ca dvāriṇām bahu tvāt tad darśana viśeṣa svātantrya samuccaya antaḥkaraṇa puruṣa kartṛ tva doṣāṇām aprasaṃgaḥ
kārikā

original: āha, kaḥ punaratra heturyena dvāritvāviśeṣe satyahaṃkāramanasī buddhau viṣayādhānaṃ kuruto na punaranayoḥ sākṣātpuruṣeṇa sambandha iti ?
analyzed: āha kaḥ punar atra hetuḥ yena dvāri tva aviśeṣe sati ahaṃkāra manasī buddhau viṣaya ādhānam kurutaḥ na punar anayoḥ sākṣāt puruṣeṇa sambandhaḥ iti
ucyate

original: sarva pratyupabhogaṃ yasmāt puruṣasya sādhayati buddhiḥ /
analyzed: sarva pratyupabhogam yasmāt puruṣasya sādhayati buddhiḥ
ahaṃkāra manasoḥ hi
na asti niścaya rūpa tā
saṃkalpa abhimāna mātra rūpa tvāt

original: aniścitaviṣayayā ca karaṇavṛttyā puruṣasya samandho 'narthakaḥ syāt /
analyzed: aniścita viṣayayā ca karaṇa vṛttyā puruṣasya samandhaḥ narthakaḥ syāt
svayam vā niścetuḥ asya kartṛ tvam syāt
tatas ca amiśra niścaya kāraṇa tvāt ayam api āmiśra rūpaḥ syāt
sarvam ca etat ukta uttaram niścaya rūpā hi buddhiḥ

original: atastadvṛttyupanipātī viṣayaḥ sannidhānamātrātpuruṣeṇa saṃcetito nāsyaudāsīnyaṃ bādhitumutsahate,
analyzed: atas tad vṛtti upanipātī viṣayaḥ sannidhāna mātrāt puruṣeṇa saṃcetitaḥ na asya audāsīnyam bādhitum utsahate
no khalu api ānarthakyam anuṣajyate

original: etaduktaṃ sarvaṃ pratyupabhogaṃ yasmātpuruṣasya sādhayati buddhiriti /
analyzed: etat uktam sarvam pratyupabhogam yasmāt puruṣasya sādhayati buddhiḥ iti
āha evam api śabda ādi lakṣaṇaḥ viṣayaḥ prakṛtaḥ
sa ca buddhyā sarvaḥ pratipādyate
tatra viṣaya antaram api asti pradhāna puruṣa antara lakṣaṇam
tathā ca āhuḥ
upabhogasya śabda ādi upalabdhiḥ ādiḥ guṇa puruṣa upalabdhiḥ antaḥ
tasmāt tad pratipatti artham karaṇa antaram vaktavyam iti
ucyate na vaktavyam
kim kāraṇam yasmāt

original: saiva ca viśinaṣṭi punaḥ pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ sūkṣmam // ISk_37 //
analyzed: sā eva ca viśinaṣṭi punar pradhāna puruṣa antaram sūkṣmam

original: yato yasmātkāraṇāt sā buddhireva hi kāṣṭhāpannena tamasābhibhūtatvāddharmādīnāṃ sattvadharmāṇāṃ
analyzed: yatas yasmāt kāraṇāt sā buddhiḥ eva hi kāṣṭha āpannena tamasā abhibhūta tvāt dharma ādīnām sattva dharmāṇām
prakṛti bhūtān vikāra bhūtān paratantrān upakārya an upakārakān acetanān saṃsarga dharmiṇaḥ ca
guṇān ātma tvena adhyavasya puruṣāya upaharati

original: sa ca mithyājñānābhyāsavāsanānurañjitaṃ buddhipratyayamanurudhyamāno darśitaviṣayatvāttathaiva pratipadyate /
analyzed: sa ca mithyā jñāna abhyāsa vāsanā anurañjitam buddhi pratyayam anurudhyamānaḥ darśita viṣaya tvāt tathā eva pratipadyate

original: yadā tu dharmādyabhyāsāttamorūpāgame satyuttarottarāṇāṃ sattvadharmāṇamutkarṣastadā vinivṛttamithyāpratyayā vṛttiḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu dharma ādi abhyāsāt tamaḥ rūpāgame sati uttarottarāṇām sattva dharmāṇam utkarṣaḥ tadā vinivṛtta mithyāpratyayā vṛttiḥ
na prakṛti vikāra bhūtaḥ svatantraḥ n upakāryaḥ n upakārakaḥ saṃsarga dharmā ca

original: tato viparītāśca guṇā iti śuddhādhyavasāyaṃ karoti /
analyzed: tatas viparītāḥ ca guṇāḥ iti śuddha adhyavasāyam karoti
puruṣaḥ ca para upahṛta pravṛtti tvāt tathā eva pratipadyate

original: tadetad guṇānāṃ puruṣasya cāntaraṃ dvayorapi niścayasvabhāvatvādasmātpūrvoktadharmabhede 'pi sati sūkṣmaṃ gambhīraṃ durjñeyam /
analyzed: tat etat guṇānām puruṣasya ca antaram dvayoḥ api niścaya svabhāva tvāt asmāt pūrva ukta dharma bhede sati sūkṣmam gambhīram durjñeyam
atas ca sūkṣmam yat buddhi mātram avalambya tat aviśiṣṭāyāḥ cetanā śakakteḥ grāhya grāhaka

tena ekaikasmāt tanmātrāt ekaikasya viśeṣasya utpattiḥ siddhā

original: tataśca yadanyeṣāmācāryāṇāmabhipretam ekalakṣaṇebhyastanmātrebhyaḥ parasparānupraveśādekottarā viśeṣāḥ sṛjyanta iti tatpratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati
analyzed: tatas ca yat anyeṣām ācāryāṇām abhipretam eka lakṣaṇebhyaḥ tanmātrebhyaḥ paraspara anupraveśāt eka uttarāḥ viśeṣāḥ sṛjyante iti tat pratiṣiddham bhavati

original: kintarhi antareṇāpi tanmātrānupraveśamekottarebhyo bhūtebhya ekottarāṇāṃ bhūtaviśeṣāṇāmutpattiḥ /

original: snehaḥ saukṣmyaṃ prabhā śauklyaṃ mārdavaṃ gauravaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: snehaḥ saukṣmyam prabhā śauklyam mārdavam gauravam ca yat

original: ūrdhvagaṃ pāvakaṃ dagdhṛ pācakaṃ laghu bhāsvaram /
analyzed: ūrdhva gam pāvakam dagdhṛ pācakam laghu bhāsvaram
pradhvaṃsi ojasvi tā jyotiḥ pūrvābhyām sa vilakṣaṇam

sarvatogatiḥ avyūhaḥ viṣkambhaḥ ca iti te trayaḥ
ākāśa dharmāḥ vijñeyāḥ pūrva dharma virodhinaḥ

original: saṃhatānāṃ tu yatkāryaṃ sāmānyaṃ te gavādayaḥ /
analyzed: saṃhatānām tu yat kāryam sāmānyam te gavādayaḥ
itaretara dharmebhyaḥ viśeṣāt na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tatrākārādidharmaiḥ pṛthivyā lokasya copakriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca /
analyzed: tatra ākāra ādi dharmaiḥ pṛthivyāḥ lokasya ca upakriyate bhūta antarāṇām ca
tatra ākārāt tāvat gavā ādīnām ghaṭa ādīnām ca ākāra nirvṛttiḥ gauravāt eṣām avasthānam
raukṣyāt apām saṃgrahaḥ vaiśadyam ca bhūtānām
varaṇāt anabhipretānām chādanam
sthairyāt vṛttiḥ prajānām bhūta antarāṇām ca
sthiteḥ mātrā ādi sannidhāna ādi anugrahaḥ
bhedāt ghaṭa ādi niṣpattiḥ
vyūhaḥ ca avayavānām
kṣānteḥ upabhoga bhogya tā
kṛṣṇa chāya tvāt rātri sampad chāyā kārya prasiddhiḥ ca
sarva upabhogya tvāt sarva bhūta anugrahaḥ
evam sneha ādibhiḥ lokasya upakāraḥ kriyate bhūta antarāṇām ca
snehāt rūpa saṃpad vāyu pratīkāraḥ gni śamanam saṃgrahaḥ ca pṛthivyāḥ

śauklyāt candrāt vinirvṛttiḥ

ūrdhva gateḥ pāka prakāśa siddhiḥ

dāhaka tvāt kṣāra utpattiḥ

bhāsvara tvāt dravya antara prakāśanam
pradhvaṃsi tvāt dagdha pakvānām upabhogaḥ

original: tathā tiryakpātādibhirdharmairvāyunā lokasya copakāraḥ kriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca /

original: tathā sarvatogatyādibhirdharmairnabhasā lokasyopakāraḥ kriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca /
