tatra loma rudhira māṃsānām mātṛtaḥ sambhavaḥ
asthi snāyu śukrāṇām pitṛtaḥ
tatra eva aśita pīta adhyāsāḥ daṣṭau kośān apare vyācakṣate
katham punar eṣām kośa tvam
āveṣṭana sāmarthyāt
yathā kośakāraḥ kośena āveṣṭitaḥ svatantraḥ
evam sūkṣmaśarīram sa prāṇam etaiḥ āveṣṭitam asvatantram tat tat karma upacinoti
prabhūtāḥ tu udbhid jāḥ sveda jāḥ ca tat etaiḥ trividhaiḥ daiva mānava tairyagyona lakṣaṇaḥ trividhaḥ bhūta sargaḥ ārabhyate
tatra devānām caturvidham śarīram pradhāna anugrahāt
yathā parama ṛṣeḥ viriñcasya ca

original: tatsiddhibhyo yathā brahmaṇaḥ putrāṇāṃ tatputraputrāṇāṃ ca /
analyzed: tad siddhibhyaḥ yathā brahmaṇaḥ putrāṇām tad putra putrāṇām ca
mātā pitṛtaḥ yathā aditeḥ kaśyapasya ca putrāṇām
kevalāt vā yathā pitṛtaḥ mitrāvaruṇābhyām vaśiṣṭhasya
manuṣyāṇām tu jarāyu jam
dharma śakti viśeṣāt tu kasyacid anyathā api bhavati
yathā droṇa kṛpa kṛpī dhṛṣṭadyumna ādīnām
tiryagyonīnām api caturvidham
jarāyu jam gavādīnām aṇḍa jam ca eva pakṣiṇām
tṛṇa ādeḥ ca udbhijjam kṣudrajantūnām sveda jam smṛtam
evam trividhāḥ viśeṣāḥ vyākhyātāḥ

original: tatra kecinniyatāḥ kecidaniyatā ityāha- ke punaratra niyatāḥ,
analyzed: tatra kecid niyatāḥ kecid aniyatāḥ iti āha ke punar atra niyatāḥ
ke vā a niyatāḥ
sūkṣmāḥ teṣām niyatāḥ mātā pitṛ jāḥ nivartante
sūkṣmāḥ āsarga pralayāt nityāḥ mātṛ pitṛ jāḥ nivartante
saha prabhūtaiḥ iti vartate
kecid tu prabhūta grahaṇena bāhyānām eva viśeṣāṇām grahaṇam icchanti
teṣām udbhid ja sveda jayoḥ agrahaṇam
tasmāt ubhayathā prabhūtāḥ iti etat anavadyam
āha sūkṣma abhidhānam aprasiddha tvāt

original: mātāpitṛjāśca prabhūtāśca ityato yukta eṣāṃ parigrahaḥ /
analyzed: mātā pitṛ jāḥ ca prabhūtāḥ ca iti atas yuktaḥ eṣām parigrahaḥ
sūkṣmā astu aprasiddhā
tasmāt vaktavyam katham eṣām utpattiḥ astitvam vā iti

original: ucyate- pūrvasarge prakṛterupapannānāṃ prāṇināṃ sattvadharmotkarṣādantareṇa dvayasamāpattiṃ manasaivāpatyamanyadvā yathepsitaṃ prādurbabhūva
analyzed: ucyate pūrva sarge prakṛteḥ upapannānām prāṇinām sattva dharma utkarṣāt antareṇa dvaya samāpattim manasā eva apatyam anyat vā yathā īpsitam prādurbabhūva

original: priyaṃ khalvapi cakṣuṣā nirīkṣya kṛtārthamātmānaṃ manyate /
analyzed: priyam khalu api cakṣuṣā nirīkṣya kṛtārtham ātmānam manyate
tasyām api kṣīṇāyām vāc siddhiḥ babhūva
abhibhāṣya prāṇinaḥ yat icchanti tat āpādayanti
tat adya api anuvartate yat śaṅkhī virutena apatyam bibharti
priyam khalu api sambhāṣya mahatīm prītim anubhavati
tasyām upakṣīṇāyām hasta siddhiḥ babhūva
saṃspṛśya pāṇim īpsitam artham upapādayanti

original: tadetadadyāpyanuvartate- yatpriyaṃ cirādālokya pāṇau saṃspṛśya prītirbhavati /
analyzed: tat etat adya api anuvartate yat priyam cirāt ālokya pāṇau saṃspṛśya prītiḥ bhavati
asyām upakṣīṇāyām āśleṣa siddhiḥ babhūva
āliṅganena prāṇinaḥ īpsitam labhante
tat etat adya api anuvartate yat priyam āliṅgya nirvṛttiḥ bhavati
tasyām upakṣīṇāyām dvandva siddhiḥ ārabdhā

original: strīpuṃsau saṃdhṛṣyāpatyamutpādayetāṃ mamedaṃ mamedamiti ca parigrahāḥ pravṛttāḥ /
analyzed: strī puṃsau saṃdhṛṣya apatyam utpādayetām mama idam mama idam iti ca parigrahāḥ pravṛttāḥ
etasmin eva avasare saṃsāraḥ varṇyate
tatra ca ācāryāṇām vipratipattiḥ

original: pañcādhikaraṇasya tāvadvaivartaṃ śarīraṃ mātāpitṛsaṃsargakāle karaṇāviṣṭaṃ śukraśoṇitamanupraviśati /
analyzed: pañca adhikaraṇasya tāvat vaivartam śarīram mātā pitṛ saṃsarga kāle karaṇa āviṣṭam śukra śoṇitam anupraviśati
tad anupraveśāt ca kalala ādi bhāvena vivardhate

original: vyūḍhāvayavaṃ tūpalabdhapratyayaṃ māturudarānnissṛtya yau dharmādharmau ṣaṭsiddhyupabhogakāle kṛtau tadvaśādavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: vyūḍha avayavam tu upalabdha pratyayam mātuḥ udarāt nissṛtya yau dharma adharmau ṣaṣ siddhi upabhoga kāle kṛtau tad vaśāt avatiṣṭhate
yāvat tad kṣayāt śarīrapātaḥ tāvat

original: yadi dharmasaṃskṛtaṃ karaṇaṃ tato dyudeśaṃ sūkṣmaśarīreṇa prāpyate,
analyzed: yadi dharma saṃskṛtam karaṇam tatas dyu deśam sūkṣmaśarīreṇa prāpyate
tad viparyayāt tu yātanā sthānam tiryagyonim vā
miśrībhāvena mānuṣyam

original: evamātivāhikaṃ sūkṣmaśarīramindriyāṇāṃ dhāraṇaprāpaṇasamarthaṃ nityaṃ bāhyenāpāyinā pariveṣṭyate parityajyate ca /
analyzed: evam ātivāhikam sūkṣmaśarīram indriyāṇām dhāraṇa prāpaṇa samartham nityam bāhyena apāyinā pariveṣṭyate parityajyate ca

original: patañjalestu sūkṣmaśarīraṃ yatsiddhikāle pūrvamindriyāṇi bījadeśaṃ nayati tatra tatkṛtāśayavaśāt dyudeśaṃ yātanāsthānaṃ vā karaṇāni vā prāpayya  #
analyzed: patañjaleḥ tu sūkṣmaśarīram yat siddhi kāle pūrvam indriyāṇi bīja deśam nayati tatra tad kṛta āśaya vaśāt dyu deśam yātanā sthānam vā karaṇāni vā prāpayya
nivartate

original: tatra caivaṃ yuktāśayasya karmavaśādanyadutpadyate yadindriyāṇi bījadeśaṃ nayati tadapi nivartate,
analyzed: tatra ca evam yukta āśayasya karma vaśāt anyat utpadyate yat indriyāṇi bīja deśam nayati tat api nivartate
śarīrapāte ca anyat utpadyate
evam anekāni śarīrāṇi
vindhyavāsinaḥ tu vibhu tvāt indriyāṇām bīja deśe vṛttyāḥ janma
tad tyāgaḥ maraṇam
tasmāt na asti sūkṣmaśarīram
tasmāt nirviśeṣaḥ saṃsāraḥ iti pakṣaḥ
eṣā sūkṣmaśarīrasya utpattiḥ
kārikā
āha evam aneka niścayeṣu ācāryeṣu bhavataḥ kā pratipattiḥ iti
ucyate yat tāvat patañjaliḥ āha sūkṣmaśarīram vinivartate punar ca anyat utpadyate

original: tat sūkṣmāsteṣāṃ niyatā iti vacanādasmābhirnābhyupagamyate / tasmāt
analyzed: tat sūkṣmāḥ teṣām niyatāḥ iti vacanāt asmābhiḥ na abhyupagamyate tasmāt
pūrva utpannam asaktam niyatam mahat ādi sūkṣma paryantam
saṃsarati nirupabhogam bhāvaiḥ adhivāsitam liṅgam
tatra pūrva utpannam iti anena mahat ādeḥ sūkṣma paryantasya liṅgasya āsarga pralayāt nitya tvam āha
asaktam iti anena gūḍha sthira bīja anupraveśam ācaṣṭe
na hi liṅgam kvacid vyāhanyate
kim tarhi likṣā ādi bījam api āviśati
badara golam api bhitvā praviśati
niyatam iti anena prati puruṣa vyavasthām pratijānāti
sādhāraṇaḥ hi mahān prakṛti tvāt iti vārṣagaṇānām pakṣaḥ

original: mahadādītyanena prāṇāṣṭakaṃ parigṛhṇāti pūrvātmānaḥ prāṇādyāśca pañca vāyava iti /
analyzed: mahat ādi iti anena prāṇa aṣṭakam parigṛhṇāti pūrva ātmānaḥ prāṇa ādyāḥ ca pañca vāyavaḥ iti
sūkṣma paryantam iti tattva antara pratiṣedham āha
etāvat eva na atas nyaditi
saṃsarati iti gatim ācaṣṭe
tatas ca avibhu tvāt bīja āveśa tyāgau prakhyātaḥ bhavataḥ
nirupabhogam iti śarīra antarasya avakāśam karoti
sūkṣmaśarīrasya hi upabhoga sāmarthye bhyupagamyamāne śarīra antarasya niravakāśa tvāt anutpatti prasaṃgaḥ syāt
bhāvaiḥ adhivāsitam iti anena bhāva aṣṭaka parigraham dyotayati
buddhi rūpaiḥ iha dharma ādibhiḥ adhivāsitam
tad sāmarthyāt sarvatra apratihatam prāṇa aṣṭakam sūkṣmaśarīre va sthāna gamana mātra phale vyavasthitam

original: dyutiryakpreteṣu saṃsaratīti tenaiva cārthasiddhau śarīrāntaraparikalpanānarthakyamato na bahūni śarīrāṇi // 40 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: dyu tiryak preteṣu saṃsarati iti tena eva ca artha siddhau śarīra antara parikalpanā ānarthakyam atas na bahūni śarīrāṇi  /
kārikā

original: yatpunaretaduktam- vibhutvādindriyāṇāṃ svātmanyavasthānaṃ vṛttilābho vṛttinirodhaśca saṃsāra iti,
analyzed: yat punar etat uktam vibhu tvāt indriyāṇām sva ātmani avasthānam vṛtti lābhaḥ vṛtti nirodhaḥ ca saṃsāraḥ iti
ayuktam etat
kasmāt vibhu tva asiddheḥ
na hi vibhu tvam indriyāṇām kaścid abhyupagacchati
kim kāraṇam
satata upalabdhi prasaṃgāt
yugapad upalabdhi prasaṃgāt ca
kārya karaṇa puruṣāṇām hi vibhu tve satata upalabdhi prasaṃgaḥ
viṣayāṇām pratibandha abhāvāt prasajyate
sarva viśeṣāṇām yugapad upalabdhi prasaṃgaḥ
vyavahita viṣaya grahaṇam ca
sarvatra sannidhānāt sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭayoḥ pratyakṣa anumāna āgamānām ca aviśeṣaḥ prasajyate
vṛtti viśeṣāt tad viśeṣaḥ iti ced na
hetu abhāvāt
vibhūnām iha asti vṛtti viśeṣaḥ iti atra hetuḥ anuktaḥ
tasmāt na karaṇānām vibhu tvam upapadyate tasmāt

original: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā cchāyā /
analyzed: citram yathā āśrayam ṛte sthāṇu ādibhyaḥ vinā yathā chāyā

original: tadvadvinā viśeṣairna tiṣṭhati nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam // ISk_41 //
analyzed: tadvat vinā viśeṣaiḥ na tiṣṭhati nirāśrayam liṅgam
yathā hi citrasya kuḍyam ṛte na asti

original: sthāṇupuruṣādibhyo vā vinā cchāyāyāḥ tadvadvinā viśeṣairna tiṣṭhati nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam /
analyzed: sthāṇu puruṣa ādibhyaḥ vā vinā chāyāyāḥ tadvat vinā viśeṣaiḥ na tiṣṭhati nirāśrayam liṅgam
tasmāt upapannam etat sa viśeṣaḥ saṃsāraḥ
āha yadi sa viśeṣaḥ saṃsāra bīja deśa gamane śarīram upalabhyeta
na tu evam
tasmāt ayuktam etat
ucyate na viśeṣita tvāt
sūkṣmam tat śarīram iti viśeṣitam
tatas na asya ahetukam agrahaṇam iti
āha sūkṣmaśarīra yogāt pūrva īśvara tva prasaṃgaḥ
tasmāt ayuktam tad nimittam asya agrahaṇam iti
ucyate na anekāntāt
tat yathā kṣudra jantūnām sūkṣma śarīram laghimā ca
na ca eṣām īśvara tvam evam sarva prāṇinām syāt

original: atha matamagṛhyamāṇena sambandhāt sthūlasyāpi śarīrasyāgrahaṇaṃ pretāñjanasiddhamālyādivat /
analyzed: atha matam agṛhyamāṇena sambandhāt sthūlasya api śarīrasya agrahaṇam preta añjana siddha mālya ādi vat
tat api anupapannam
anekāntāt
tat yathā karaṇaiḥ agṛhyamāṇaiḥ śarīrasya sambandhaḥ
na ca agrahaṇam
piśāca ādibhiḥ vā tathā etat api syāt
kiṃca antaḥkaraṇa anuvidhāne ca aiśvarya abhimānāt
yasya ca adhyavasāyam anuvidadhati aṇima ādīni tasya aiśvaryam abhipretam
na tu yasya svabhāva siddhāni
anyathā tu pipīlika ādīnām api ākāśa gamanāt aiśvaryam syāt
āha na śarīra anupapatti prasaṃgāt
sūkṣmaśarīra utpattau tarhi caritārthayoḥ śarīra antara sāmarthyam virudhyate
tasmāt ayuktam sa viśeṣaḥ saṃsāraḥ
ucyate na anabhyupagamāt
na dharma adharma nimittam vaivartam śarīram
kim tarhi ādhikārikam iti adoṣaḥ
na ca aneka śarīra tvam abhyupagamyate
tasmāt pakṣa antara upālambhaḥ yam
kim ca kṛtsna āśaya pariṇāma a pratijñānāt

original: kṛtsnasyāśayasya pariṇāmaṃ jānannevamupālabhyaḥ syādekadeśastu no vipariṇāmī /
analyzed: kṛtsnasya āśayasya pariṇāmam jānan evam upālabhyaḥ syāt eka deśaḥ tu no vipariṇāmī
tasmāt na kiṃcid etat
nimitta avaśeṣāt āśaya eka deśa abhivyaktiḥ ayuktā iti ced
syāt matam iha nimittānām alpa bahu tva viśeṣāt āśaya abhivyakti viśeṣaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tat yathā vāyu ādi krodha ādiṣu
prāyaṇa kālaḥ ca ayam phala abhivyaktau nimittam
a viśiṣṭaḥ ca asau
tasmāt āśaya eka deśa pariṇāmaḥ nu papannaḥ iti
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt naimittika tvāt
pūrva kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phala bhoga parisamāptiḥ
sāmpratasya ca phala upabhoga artha vipariṇāmaḥ prāyaṇasya nimittam
na tu prāyaṇaḥ vipariṇamasya iti
kiṃca śarīra antara abhāvaḥ ca
kṛtsnasya āśayasya abhivyaktim icchataḥ śarīra antara abhāvaḥ nimitta antara abhāvāt prāpnoti
tatra kṛtena iti ced na

original: tatra kṛtābhyāṃ hi bījāveśaḥ karaṇasya niṣpādito yāvatkalalādyasthāyāmeva taccharīraṃ vinaṣṭamiti tatra kṛtāśayasyāsambhavāccharīrāntarānupapattiprasaṃgaḥ
analyzed: tatra kṛtābhyām hi bīja āveśaḥ karaṇasya niṣpāditaḥ yāvat kalala ādi asthāyām eva tat śarīram vinaṣṭam iti tatra kṛta āśayasya asambhavāt śarīra antara anupapatti prasaṃgaḥ
kim ca sthāvarāṇām ca śarīra antara asambhavaḥ

original: āśayasya sthāvaraśarīrārambhe caritārthatvātsthāvaraśarīreṇa cāśayopādānasambhavāttasya saṃsārābhāvaḥ prāptaḥ /
analyzed: āśayasya sthāvara śarīra ārambhe caritārtha tvāt sthāvara śarīreṇa ca āśaya upādāna sambhavāt tasya saṃsāra abhāvaḥ prāptaḥ
tasmāt upapannam etat puruṣa artham ādi sarga utpannam sūkṣmaśarīram saṃsarati
yāvat ca sa puruṣa arthaḥ na parisamāpyate tāvat tiṣṭhate iti
kārikā

original: āha, yadi puruṣārthā liṅgasyotpattirabhyupagamyate tatsamanantaramevānena puruṣārtho 'vasāyayitavyo na punardevamānuṣatiryagbhāvena punaḥ punarājañjavībhāvo  #
analyzed: āha yadi puruṣa arthā liṅgasya utpattiḥ abhyupagamyate tad samanantaram eva anena puruṣa arthaḥ vasāyayitavyaḥ na punar deva mānuṣa tiryak bhāvena punar punar ājañjavībhāvaḥ
anuṣṭhātavyaḥ iti
ucyate
puruṣa artha hetukam idam nimitta naimittika prasaṅgena
prakṛteḥ vibhu tva yogāt naṭa vat vyavatiṣṭhate liṅgam
yadi api puruṣa artha siddhi artham liṅgam utpadyate

original: tathāpi sattvarajastamasāṃ trayāṇāmapi prādhānyādrajastamobhyāmabhibhūte sattve tatpreritaṃ nimittanaimittikaśarīrendriyaviṣayopabhoganirvartakaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā api sattva rajaḥ tamasām trayāṇām api prādhānyāt rajaḥ tamobhyām abhibhūte sattve tat preritam nimitta naimittika śarīra indriya viṣaya upabhoga nirvartakam
śṛṇoti
tat yathā agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ
yama rājyam agniṣṭomena abhijayati iti

original: tatra phalecchayā yonīḥ prāṇādīṃśca sammukhīkṛtya kriyāmārabhate /
analyzed: tatra phala icchayā yonīḥ prāṇa ādīn ca sammukhīkṛtya kriyām ārabhate
guṇa vṛtta vaicitryāt ca prayatnavān api manaḥ vāc dehaiḥ malinam api karma karoti

original: tataśca prakṛtervibhutvayogāttena tena nimittenopasthāpitaṃ devamanuṣyatiryakpretādiśarīramekasvabhāvamapi sannaṭavadvyavatiṣṭhate liṅgamākṛtiviśeṣopādānatyāgasāmyataḥ
analyzed: tatas ca prakṛteḥ vibhu tva yogāt tena tena nimittena upasthāpitam deva manuṣya tiryak preta ādi śarīram eka svabhāvam api sat naṭa vat vyavatiṣṭhate liṅgam ākṛti viśeṣa upādāna tyāga sāmyataḥ
vibhu tvam guṇānām trayāṇām api sāmyāt itaretara abhibhavaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tasmāt bhāva nimittaḥ saṃsāraḥ
tad nimitta anupādānāt mokṣaḥ
kārikā
āha bhāvāḥ iti tatra bhavatā abhidhīyate
na ca asya śabdasya artham pratipadyāmahe
tasmāt vaktavyam idam ke punar amī bhāvāḥ iti
ucyate dharma ādyāḥ bhāvāḥ
dharmaḥ jñānam vairāgyam aiśvaryam adharmaḥ jñānam avairāgyam anaiśvaryam iti ete bhāvāḥ
tatra ācāryāṇām vipratipattiḥ

original: pañcādhikaraṇasya tāvaddvividhaṃ jñānaṃ prākṛtikaṃ vaikṛtikaṃ ca /
analyzed: pañca adhikaraṇasya tāvat dvividham jñānam prākṛtikam vaikṛtikam ca
prākṛtikam trividham tattva sama kālam sāṃsiddhikam ābhiṣyandikam ca

original: tatra tattvasamakālaṃ saṃhataśca mahāṃstattvātmanā mahati pratyayo bhavati /
analyzed: tatra tattva sama kālam saṃhataḥ ca mahān tattva ātmanā mahati pratyayaḥ bhavati
utpanna kārya kāraṇasya tu sāṃsiddhikam ābhiṣyandikam ca bhavati
sāṃsiddhikam yat saṃhata vyūha sama kālam niṣpadyate
yathā parama ṛṣeḥ jñānam
ābhiṣyandikam ca saṃsiddha kārya karaṇasya kāraṇa antareṇa utpadyate

original: vaikṛtaṃ tu dvividhaṃ svavaikṛtaṃ paravaikṛtaṃ ca /
analyzed: vaikṛtam tu dvividham svavaikṛtam paravaikṛtam ca
sva vaikṛtam tārakam
para vaikṛtam siddhi antarāṇi āha ca
tattva samam vaivartam tatra ābhiṣyandikam dvitīyam syāt
vaikṛtam atas tṛtīyam ṣāṭkauśikam etat ākhātam
atra tu sattvaiḥ saha utpatti aviśeṣāt sāṃsiddhikam abhedena āha

original: vaikṛtamapi ca dvividhaṃ svavaikṛtaṃ tatra tārakaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: vaikṛtam api ca dvividham svavaikṛtam tatra tārakam bhavati
syāt saptavidham para vaikṛtam sva tārā ādi nirdiṣṭam
iti yathā jñānam evam dharma ādayaḥ api iti
vindhya vāsinaḥ tu nā asti tattva samam sāṃsiddhikam ca
kim tarhi siddhi rūpam eva

original: tatra paramarṣerapi sargasaṃghātavyūhottarakālameva jñānaṃ niṣpadyate yasmād gurumukhābhipratipatteḥ pratipatsyata ityapītyāha- siddhaṃ nimittaṃ  #
analyzed: tatra parama ṛṣeḥ api sarga saṃghāta vyūha uttara kālam eva jñānam niṣpadyate yasmāt guru mukha abhipratipatteḥ pratipatsyate iti api iti āha siddham nimittam
naimittikasya anugraham kurute
na apūrvam utpādayati iti
nimitta naimittika bhāvāt ca evam upapadyate

original: tatra paramarṣeḥ paṭurūhaḥ anyeṣāṃ kliṣṭa ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra parama ṛṣeḥ paṭuḥ ūhaḥ anyeṣām kliṣṭaḥ iti ayam viśeṣaḥ

original: sarveṣāmeva tu tārakādyaviśiṣṭamācārya āha- trividhā bhāvāḥ sāṃsiddhikāḥ prākṛtikā vaikṛtikāśceti /
analyzed: sarveṣām eva tu tārakā ādi a viśiṣṭam ācāryaḥ āha trividhāḥ bhāvāḥ sāṃsiddhikāḥ prākṛtikāḥ vaikṛtikāḥ ca iti
tatra sāṃsiddhika grahaṇāt tattva sama kālam pratyācaṣṭe
na eva tat asti iti

original: katham ? yadi hi tathā syāttattvāntarānutpattisaṃghāto vyūhaścānarthakaḥ syāt /
analyzed: katham yadi hi tathā syāt tattva antara anutpatti saṃghātaḥ vyūhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ syāt
mahati utpannam jñānam tatra eva upalabdham iti kaḥ saṃghāta arthaḥ

original: tadyathā salilaughastṛṇaṃ kāṣṭhamaśmānaṃ prāṇinaṃ vā svamūrtisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ sarvamevābhyāvahati,

original: tathā bījānmūlaṃ mūlādaṅkuramiti vahati / tathā cāha

original: sa khalvayaṃ yogī kālamavajitya padārthāntarābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti manyate /

tatas ca punar āvartate

original: yadā tu satyapi kālasāmarthye bhāvānāmutpattiḥ bhāgyānapekṣate /

kim ca abhyutthāna anupapatti prasaṃgāt

original: yathā hi śīrṇānāmapi tṛṇalatādīnāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ prāpya punarāpyāyanaṃ bhavati,

original: ” sa khalvayaṃ yogī bhāgyānyavajitya tanmahimnā jagadaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā padārthāntarasyābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti gṛhṇāti /

āha kāla bhāgyayoḥ apratipattiḥ

original: prakṛtyātmakasya tāvadyogino 'ṣṭau prakṛtayo viṣaya ityuktaṃ purastāt /

bhāgya saṃjñā tu dharma adharmayoḥ
tau ca buddhi dharmau iti prāk apadiṣṭam

āha na tuṣṭi antara tvāt
prakṛti tvāt mahān pūrvam prakṛti ākhyāyām tuṣṭau avaruddhaḥ

original: mahataśca rūpaṃ dharmādikaṃ mahato 'rthāntaraṃ bhāgyamiti bhāgyavān /

duḥkhāni trīṇi ādhyātmika ādīni

original: tatra cādhyātmikānāṃ vātādīnāṃ siddhipratyanīkānāmāyurvedakriyānuṣṭhānena vighātaṃ kṛtvā pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati sā caturthī  #
analyzed: tatra ca ādhyātmikānām vāta ādīnām siddhi pratyanīkānām āyurveda kriyā anuṣṭhānena vighātam kṛtvā pūrveṣām trayāṇām anyatamena sādhayati sā caturthī  /
siddhiḥ pramodam iti abhidhīyate

original: katham ? nivṛttarogā hi prāṇinaḥ pramodanta iti kṛtvā /
analyzed: katham nivṛtta rogāḥ hi prāṇinaḥ pramodante iti kṛtvā

original: yadā tvādhibhautikānāṃ mānuṣādinimittānāṃ siddhipratyanīkānāṃ sāmādinā yatidharmānuguṇena vopāyena pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati,
analyzed: yadā tu ādhibhautikānām mānuṣa ādi nimittānām siddhi pratyanīkānām sāma ādinā yati dharma anuguṇena vā upāyena pūrveṣām trayāṇām anyatamena sādhayati
sā pañcamī siddhiḥ pramuditam iti abhidhīyate

original: katham ? anudvigno hi pramudita iti kṛtvā /
analyzed: katham an udvignaḥ hi pramuditaḥ iti kṛtvā

original: yadā tu śītādīnyādhidaivikāni dvandvāni siddhipratyanīkāni svadharmānurodhena pratihatya pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati,
analyzed: yadā tu śīta ādīni ādhidaivikāni dvandvāni siddhi pratyanīkāni svadharma anurodhena pratihatya pūrveṣām trayāṇām anyatamena sādhayati
sā ṣaṣṭhī siddhiḥ moda nāmam iti abhidhīyate

original: katham ? dvandvānupahatā hi prāṇino modanta iti kṛtvā /
analyzed: katham dvandva an upahatāḥ hi prāṇinaḥ modante iti kṛtvā

original: suhṛtprāptiḥ- yadā tu kṛśalaṃ saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sanmitramāśritya sandehanivṛttiṃ labhate,
analyzed: suhṛd prāptiḥ yadā tu kṛśalam saṃspṛṣṭam sat mitram āśritya sandeha nivṛttim labhate

original: dānam- yadā tu daurbhāgyaṃ dānenātītya pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati sāṣṭāmī siddhiḥ sadāpramuditamityabhidhīyate /

iti evam etāḥ siddhayaḥ ṣṭau vyākhyātāḥ

original: etāsāṃ saṃśrayeṇābhipretamarthaṃ yataḥ saṃsādhayantītyataḥ pūrvācāryāgataṃ mārgamārurukṣustatpravaṇaḥ syāditi /

original: tadyathā paurṇamāsyāṃ dakṣiṇataḥ khaṇḍasyendumaṇḍalasya piśācādīnāṃ pāṇḍarasya ca nabhasa ityādi /

diśaḥ valokayan sa brahma lokeṣu api lokeṣu trātāram avindan rāga ādi aneka kālāt pakvena ātma graheṇa ātma kārya karaṇa upahyimāṇa buddhiḥ manda mandeṣu api

mahātmabhiḥ parama ṛṣi ādibhiḥ andhatāmisra śabdena apadiṣṭaḥ maraṇa kṛtam duḥkham
tat ca idam duḥkham pradhāna mahat ahaṃkāra tanmātra indriya bhūta viśeṣa lakṣaṇasya tattva parvaṇaḥ caitanya asambhavāt puruṣaḥ eva caitanya śakti yogāt upalabhyate

original: tadapi samīkṣyoktamācāryeṇa atra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣa iti /

original: vāyunā karaiśca saṃsparśadasibhiriva tudyamānaḥ svasaṃvedyaṃ duḥkhamātmani vartamānamākhyātumasamarthaḥ

tasmāt avyāpi tvāt tayoḥ api agrahaṇa prasaṃgaḥ
ucyate na smṛti vacanāt
jīryate naya iti jarā kṣayaḥ iti uktam bhavati
sa ca deva bhūmau api bhavati
kasmāt evam hi āha
rajaḥ viṣaktiḥ aṅgeṣu vaivarṇyam mlāna puṣpa tā
patiṣyatām deva lokāt prāṇinām upajāyate
śakra ādīnām vyādhi śravaṇāt śarīra kṣayaḥ

original: evaṃ hyāha- “tvāṣṭrīyaṃ sāma bhavati indraṃ kṣāmamapi na sarvabhūtāni prasvāpayituṃ nāśaknuvaṃ stametena sāmnā tvāṣṭrīyeṇāsvāpayaditi /
analyzed: evam hi āha tvāṣṭrīyam sāma bhavati indram kṣāmam api na sarva bhūtāni prasvāpayitum na aśaknuvam stam etena sāmnā tvāṣṭrīyeṇa asvāpayat iti
tathā prajāpateḥ vāyuḥ akṣayīt
dakṣa abhiśāpāt ca somasya kṣayaḥ
tathā prajāpatiḥ vai somāya rājñe duhitḥ radāt nakṣatrāṇi
sa rohiṇyām eva avasat
tāni apekṣyamāṇāni punar agacchan
tasmāt svān an upeyamānā punar gacchati
tāni anvāgacchat tāni punar ayācata
tāni asmai na punar adadāt
sā bravīt sarveṣu eva samāsata vasa atha te punar dāsyāmi iti
sa rohiṇyām eva avasat tasmin anṛte yakṣmaḥ gṛhṇāt

original: candramā vai somo rāja yadrājānaṃ yakṣmogṛhṇāttadrājayakṣmasya janma /
analyzed: candramāḥ vai somaḥ rāja yat rājānam yakṣmaḥ gṛhṇāt tat rājayakṣmasya janma
sa tṛṇam iva aśuṣyat
sa prajāpatau anāthata
saḥ bravīt sarveṣu eva samāvat vasa atha tvā atas mokṣyāmi iti
tasmāt candramāḥ sarveṣu nakṣatreṣu samāvat vasati

original: taṃ vaiśvadevena caruṇāmāvasyāṃ rātrīmayā yajante nainaṃ yakṣmodamuñcadityādi /
analyzed: tam vaiśvadevena caruṇā amāvasyām rātrīm ayā yajante na enam yakṣmā udamuñcat ityādi
tasmāt deva bhūmau api jarā kṛtam duḥkham asti
tathā maraṇa kṛtam bhūmi antara gamanāt tatra utpannānām yayātiḥ udāharaṇam

original: yathā gopathabrāhmaṇam- “devānāṃ ha vā pañcadaśaśatāni āsaṃstāni brahmakilbiṣādakṣīyanta /
analyzed: yathā gopatha brāhmaṇam devānām ha vā pañcadaśa śatāni āsan tāni brahma kilbiṣāt akṣīyanta
tatas trayastriṃśat eva āsata tat etat ṛcā api uktam
sodaryāṇām pañcadaśānām śatānām trayastriṃśat udaśiṣyanta devāḥ
śeṣāḥ prāsīyanta iti
śveta araṇye ca antakasya rudreṇa kṛtam duḥkham asti iti
udāharaṇa mātrāt vā
athavā udāharaṇa mātram eva duḥkhānām
ādi śabda lopaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ
jarā maraṇa kṛtam eva udāharaṇa tvena abhipretam
na punar duḥkha antaram

original: kasmāt ? tatrāpi hyādiśabdalopa udāharaṇamātratvāt śaktyā parikalpayitumidamityucyate /
analyzed: kasmāt tatra api hi ādi śabda lope udāharaṇa mātra tvāt śaktyā parikalpayitum idam iti ucyate
na sarva duḥkha āspada tvāt
sarveṣām hi duḥkhānām āspadam jarā maraṇa kṛtam sādhāraṇam
katham tad bandhu mitrāṇām api udvega hetu tvāt
na tu janma kṛtam
sambandhinām praharṣa nimitta tvāt

original: yataśca brahmādau stambaparyante jagati jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na kaścidativartate /
analyzed: yatas ca brahma ādau stamba paryante jagati jarā maraṇa kṛtam duḥkham na kaścid ativartate
liṅgasya vinivṛtteḥ tasmāt duḥkham samāsena
sukha leśasya tad vyāpta tvāt

original: yāvadidaṃ liṅgaṃ na nivartate tāvadavaśyaṃ duḥkhena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: yāvat idam liṅgam na nivartate tāvat avaśyam duḥkhena bhavitavyam
paryāyeṇa saṃskārasya sāmarthyāt loka antara upapatteḥ tathā ca āha

original: sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca hi saṃśayaṃ vāreṇāyaṃ sevate tatra tatra /
analyzed: sukham ca duḥkham ca hi saṃśayam vāreṇa ayam sevate tatra tatra
katham punar duḥkhena vyāptam sukham iti ced
ābrahmaṇaḥ śuddhyā atiśaya upapatteḥ
tasyāḥ ca duḥkha mūla tvāt
prajāpateḥ akṣi roga śravaṇāt
indrasya kāma upatāpāt
gautama paribhāvāt rambhāyāḥ ca abhiśāpāt pāṣāṇa bhāva upapatteḥ
nāgānām sarpa satra āyāsāt
vaiśravaṇasya yaska abhiśāpāt hasti bhāva upapattiḥ
pitṝṇām ca garte valambanāt
piśācānām mantra oṣadhi maṅgala prayogaiḥ udvāsanāt mānuṣa tiraścām pratyakṣatas eva prāyeṇa duḥkha āspada tvāt

original: tasmānnāsti saṃsāre kaścitpradeśo yatra saha liṅgenātmānaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāvāpnuyādityata evaṃ prayatitavyaṃ yena liṅgasyaivātyantocchedaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt nā asti saṃsāre kaścid pradeśaḥ yatra saha liṅgena ātmānam duḥkham na avāpnuyāt iti atas evam prayatitavyam yena liṅgasya eva atyanta ucchedaḥ
tatas hi sarva duḥkhānām atyanta upaśamaḥ
samāsa grahaṇam tu sukha mohayoḥ avakāśa dāna artham
anyathā saṃsāre tayoḥ abhāvaḥ eva abhyupagataḥ syāt
kārikā
evam yathāvat sargam upākhyāya upasaṃharan āha
iti eṣa prakṛti vikṛtaḥ pravartate tattva bhūta bhāva ākhyaḥ

original: pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ svārtha iva parārtha ārambhaḥ // ISk_56 //
analyzed: prati puruṣa vimokṣa artham sva arthe iva para arthe ārambhaḥ
iti karaṇena sarga samāptim dyotayati
eṣaḥ iti uktam api pratyāmnāya artham punar apekṣate
prakṛtyā kṛtaḥ prakṛti kṛtaḥ
anena vākya parisamāpti artham vīta avītābhyām siddham pradhāna astitvam
aṇu ādi pratiṣedham ca apekṣate
prakṛti kṛtaḥ eva na aṇu ādi kṛtaḥ
pravartate iti kriyā prabandham āha

original: pravṛtto na pravartsyati kiṃ tarhi pravartata evānantānāṃ śarīrādibhāvena parasparānugraheṇa ca /
analyzed: pravṛttaḥ na pravartsyati kim tarhi pravartate eva anantānām śarīra ādi bhāvena paraspara anugraheṇa ca
na iyam kriyā kadācid api bhūta bhaviṣyat rūpā bhavati
kintarhi vartamāna rūpā
yathā vahanti nadyaḥ
tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ iti
tattva bhūta bhāva ākhyaḥ iti uktānām nigama artham pratyāmnāyam karoti
tattva ākhyaḥ mahat ādibhiḥ bhāva ākhyaḥ vyoma ādiḥ
puruṣam puruṣam prati vimokṣaḥ prati puruṣa vimokṣaḥ
tad artham prati puruṣa vimokṣa artham
sarva puruṣa adhikāra nibaddhāyāḥ sarva śakteḥ nirākāṃkṣīkaraṇa artham iti arthaḥ
sva arthe iva para arthe ārambhaḥ
kārya kāraṇa bhāvena

original: tatra kāryasya tāvacchabdādeḥ svārtha ivendriyāṇāṃ viṣayabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tatra kāryasya tāvat śabda ādeḥ sva arthaḥ iva indriyāṇām viṣaya bhāvaḥ
indriyāṇām aprāpta viṣayāṇām laulyam adhiṣṭhāna vikāra anumeyam svārtham iva

original: karaṇānāṃ ca saṃkalpābhimānādhyavasāyānāṃ viṣayadvāribhāvopagamanaṃ manaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ ca svapravṛttiviṣayatvam /
analyzed: karaṇānām ca saṃkalpa abhimāna adhyavasāyānām viṣaya dvāri bhāva upagamanam manaḥ prabhṛtīnām ca sva pravṛtti viṣaya tvam

original: mano 'haṃkārayośca buddhau svapravṛttyupasaṃhāro buddheśca śāntaghoramūḍhatvaṃ vyavasāyakartṛtvaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ haṃkārayoḥ ca buddhau sva pravṛtti upasaṃhāraḥ buddheḥ ca śānta ghora mūḍha tvam vyavasāya kartṛ tvam
ca satta rajaḥ tamasām ca prakāśa pravṛtti niyama lakṣaṇaiḥ dharmaiḥ paraspara upakāri tvam
na ca eṣa sva arthaḥ
sarvasya asya ācaitanyāt
kim tarhi para arthaḥ eva ayam ārambhaḥ
saṃghāta tvāt iti
āha yat uktam prati puruṣa vimokṣa artham ayam ārambhaḥ iti tat ayuktam
ācārya vipratipatteḥ
prati puruṣam anyat pradhānam śarīra ādi artham karoti

original: teṣāṃ ca māhātmyaśarīrapradhānaṃ yadā pravartate tadetarāṇyapi /
analyzed: teṣām ca māhātmya śarīra pradhānam yadā pravartate tadā itarāṇi api

original: tannivṛttau ca teṣāmapi nivṛttiriti paurikaḥ sāṃkhyācāryo manyate /
analyzed: tad nivṛttau ca teṣām api nivṛttiḥ iti paurikaḥ sāṃkhya ācāryaḥ manyate
tat katham a pratiṣidhya ekā prakṛtiḥ abhyupagamyate iti
ucyate na pramāṇa abhāvāt
na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ eva tat śakyam niścetum
pradhānānām atīndriya tvāt
liṅgam ca asandigdham na asti
āptāḥ ca naḥ na abhidadhuḥ atas manyāmahe na etat evam iti
kiṃca ekena artha parisamāpteḥ
aparimita tvāt etat ekam pradhānam alam sarva puruṣa śarīra utpādanāya
tasmāt anya parikalpanā ānarthakyam
parimitam iti ced atha matam
parimitam pradhānam iti na
uccheda prasaṃgāt
evam api tasya ucchedaḥ prāptaḥ kṣīra vat
tathā ca saṃsāra uccheda prasaṃgaḥ
kim ca anavasthā prasaṃgāt
ekasya īśvarasya yoginaḥ vā icchā yogāt aneka śarīra tvam
tad parimitāt ayuktam
pratiśarīram vā pradhāna parikalpane pradhāna anavasthā bhavati
parimita śarīra kāraṇa tva abhyupagamāt anya parikalpanā ānarthakyam
tatas ca pradhāna eka tvam eva
tasmāt ayuktam pratipuruṣam pradhānāni iti

original: yattūktaṃ māhātmyaśarīrapradhānapravṛttāvitareṣāṃ pravṛtistannivṛttau nivṛttirityatra brūmaḥ- na,
analyzed: yat tu uktam māhātmya śarīra pradhāna pravṛttau itareṣām pravṛtiḥ tad nivṛttau nivṛttiḥ iti atra brūmaḥ na
atiśaya abhāvāt

original: yathā kṣetrajñānāṃ niratiśayatvāditaretarāpravartakatvamevameṣāmapi sātiśayatve vā pradhānānupapattiprasaṃgaḥ, vaiṣamyāt /
analyzed: yathā kṣetrajñānām niratiśaya tvāt itaretara a pravartaka tvam evam eṣām api sa atiśaya tve vā pradhāna anupapatti prasaṃgaḥ vaiṣamyāt
tasmāt yuktam prati puruṣa vimokṣa artham ekā prakṛtiḥ pravartate iti
kārikā
āha tad anupapattiḥ ācetanyāt
iha acetanānām ghaṭa ādīnām uddiśya pravṛttiḥ adṛṣṭā

original: sā cediyamacetanā prakṛtirasyā apyuddiśya puruṣārthaṃ pravṛttirnopapadyate /
analyzed: sā ced iyam acetanā prakṛtiḥ asyāḥ api uddiśya puruṣa artham pravṛttiḥ na upapadyate
bhavati ced caitanyam tarhi prāptam asyā

original: tatra yaduktaṃ pratipuruṣavimokṣārtha prakṛteḥ pravṛttiriti etadayuktamiti /
analyzed: tatra yat uktam prati puruṣa vimokṣa artha prakṛteḥ pravṛttiḥ iti etat ayuktam iti
ucyate na dṛṣṭānta upapatteḥ
vatsa vivṛddhi nimittam kṣīrasya yathā pravṛttiḥ ajñasya
puruṣa vimokṣa nimittam tathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasya
yathā kṣīram acetanam vatsa vivṛddhim uddiśya pravartate
evam pradhānam api puruṣa vimokṣam uddiśya pravartate
na ca asya caitanyam syāt
sādhya tvāt ayuktam iti ced syāt matam

original: sādhyametat kiṃ kṣīrasyoddiśya vatsavivṛddhiṃ pravṛttiḥ, atha neti ?
analyzed: sādhyam etat kim kṣīrasya uddiśya vatsa vivṛddhim pravṛttiḥ atha na iti
tasmāt udāharaṇam sādhya tvāt ayuktam iti
etat ca ayuktam
kasmāt tad abhāve bhāvāt tad bhāve ca bhāvāt

original: yatra nāsti vatsavivṛddhistatra na kṣīrasya pravṛttirupalabdhā /
analyzed: yatra na asti vatsa vivṛddhiḥ tatra na kṣīrasya pravṛttiḥ upalabdhā
yatra asti tatra upalabdhā

original: yadyasmin sati bhavati tasya tadarthā pravṛttirdṛṣṭā /
analyzed: yadi asmin sati bhavati tasya tad arthā pravṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā
tat yathā ghaṭe kumbhakārasya

tasmāt na asti udāharaṇa sādhya tvam iti
asadbhāva abhidhānāt satkārya virodhaḥ iti ced na
vyakti paryāya tvāt
vyakti paryāyaḥ hi tat iti śāstra loka prāmāṇyāt

original: śāstraṃ tāvat sattāmātro mahān vyaktimātra ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: śāstram tāvat sattā mātraḥ mahān vyakti mātraḥ iti arthaḥ
loke pi na asti asmin kūpe salilam iti ucyate

original: na kvacidapi kūpe salilaṃ nāstyabhivyaktaṃ na tad bhavati /
analyzed: na kvacid api kūpe salilam na asti abhivyaktam na tat bhavati
tasmāt na satkārya virodhaḥ
adṛṣṭa preraṇa tvāt asiddhiḥ iti ced atha matam
dharma adharma preritam kṣīram pravartate na vatsa vivṛddhi artham iti
tat api ayuktam
kasmāt doṣa sāmyāt

original: dharmādharmāvacetanau vivṛddhikāle kṣīraṃ pravartayatastadavasāne ca nivartayataḥ /
analyzed: dharma adharmau acetanau vivṛddhi kāle kṣīram pravartayataḥ tad avasāne ca nivartayataḥ
parikalpyamāne samānaḥ doṣaḥ

original: īśvarapreraṇāditi cet syānmatam īśvarastatra kṣīraṃ pravartayate vatsārthaṃ,
analyzed: īśvara preraṇāt iti ced syāt matam īśvaraḥ tatra kṣīram pravartayate vatsa artham

tat ayuktam

prāk pratiṣiddham īśvara karma

evam ced avasthitaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: vārṣagaṇānāṃ tu yathā strīpuṃśarīrāṇāmacetanānāmuddiśyetaretaraṃ pravṛttistathā pradhānasyetyayaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: vārṣagaṇānām tu yathā strī pum śarīrāṇām acetanānām uddiśya itaretaram pravṛttiḥ tathā pradhānasya iti ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: āha, kathamavagamyate tādarthyādutpannena vyaktena puruṣasya sambandho na punaḥ sānnidhyamātrāt,
analyzed: āha katham avagamyate tādarthyāt utpannena vyaktena puruṣasya sambandhaḥ na punar sānnidhya mātrāt

ucyate na anapavarga prasaṃgāt

tasmāt ayuktam etat

original: apravartayitāraṃ prati kāryakāraṇānāṃ pravṛttirayukteti cet syānmatam- apravartayitā kṛṣṇādīnāṃ bhikṣurato na teṣāmapi taṃ prati pravṛttiḥ
analyzed: apravartayitāram prati kārya kāraṇānām pravṛttiḥ ayuktā iti ced syāt matam apravartayitā kṛṣṇa ādīnām bhikṣuḥ atas na teṣām api tam prati pravṛttiḥ
evam a pravartayitā kārya karaṇānām puruṣaḥ

original: vatso hi kṣīrasyāpravartayitātha ca taṃ prati tasya pravṛttiḥ /

tasmāt yuktam etad puruṣa vimokṣa arthā prakṛtteḥ pravṛttiḥ na caitanya prasaṃgaḥ iti
kārikā
āha na apravṛtti prasaṃgāt

original: yadi pradhānasya puruṣakaivalyārthā pravṛttistena tadabhāve kaivalyaṃ siddhamevetyapravṛttiprasaṃgaḥ /
analyzed: yadi pradhānasya puruṣa kaivalya arthā pravṛttiḥ tena tad abhāve kaivalyam siddham eva iti apravṛtti prasaṃgaḥ

original: atha kevale puruṣe pradhānaṃ pravartate na tarhyasya tadarthā pravṛttiriti /

autsukya nivṛtti artham yathā kriyāsu pravartate lokaḥ

original: dṛṣṭā coparamārthāpi lokasyautsukyanivṛttyarthā pravṛttistathā pradhānasyāpyuparamārthā pravṛttiḥ /

original: atha dṛśyadarśanaśaktyorautsukyanivṛttyarthaṃ pravartata ityekatra kṛtārthatvāditareṣvapravṛttiprasaṃga iti cet syādetat /

pradhānam ekasya puruṣasya ātmānam dṛśya darśana śaktayoḥ autsukya nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati  /

apravṛttiḥ ca iti etat api nā upapannam

tat yathā kim
ucyate

original: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt /

original: puruṣasya tathātmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ // ISk_59 //

katham
